story:
The handmade BeraShield supports various types of smartphones. For models not listed, please contact us by message.

 

Unlike the Apple battery case, BeraShield Battery and Charger are compatible with BeraShield Cases for all types of smartphones. Even if you change your smartphone later, you can still use the BeraShield Battery and Charger if you only buy a BeraShield Case.

 

BeraShield is a total protection system that consists of a Case, Battery and Charger. It is designed to protect your smartphone perfectly.

 

BeraShield is the only solution that can solve all the inconveniences of using a smartphone.

 

We sent BeraShield to backers in 37 countries through the first Kickstarter campaign.

Let us introduce 'BeraShield 2' with improved functions based on feedbacks from our first Kickstarter campaign backers.

 

 The Berashield case made of Aerospace Grade Titanium, which is 4 times stronger than bullet-proof carbon fiber-polycarbonate material.

 In addition, patented special heat treatment technology applied to pure titanium metal does not disturb mobile phone signal at all.

 

 The BeraShield Case is ergonomically designed to allow you to feel your phone as is while protecting it completely.

 

 

The Berashield case made of Aerospace Grade Titanium, which is extraordinary corrosion and impact resistance, the lightest and hardest metal in the world.
 

 The Berashield case is thinner and lighter than other smartphone cases that are certified as Military Grade Drop Protection.

 

 

 The BeraShield Battery is a true wire-free battery that can be charged wirelessly both when charging the phone and when replenishing the battery with an external charger. It supports 10 watt when wireless charging the phone and 15 watt maximum wireless charging rate when replenishing via an external charger.

 The BeraShield Battery is made from SAMSUNG SDI's genuine Li-ion battery cell which passed the short-circuit, heating, crush, abnormal charging, and impact tests.

 Also, BeraShield Battery provides Over-voltage/current/temperature protection and (FOD) Foreign Object Detection function for wireless charging.

 

 

The ultraslim BeraShield Battery can be attached to the smartphone using a strong magnet and does not require a bulky and filmsy charging cable.  This will allow you to freely use your phone while charging.

 

 

BeraShield Battery is the world's first wireless rechargeable battery that can charge your smartphone even under water with a true wire-free concept and complete sealing.

 

 

BeraShield Battery supports IP68 rated waterproofing so that it can be safely charged whether you're in the bath tub or the swimming pool.

 

 

Do you need more power? Just stick it!

 

The BeraShield Battery is ultra-slim, lightweight, and easy to carry with no cables required.

 

 Isn't it inconvenient to play a mobile game with a wire?

 

 By alternatively using two BeraShield Batteries, you can use your smartphone for 24 hours without wired charging.

 

 

 The BeraShield Batteries can be stacked on top of each other and charged simultaneously on a single BeraShield Charger. You can take multiple batteries on-the-go and swap them out once one is depleted.

 

 The BeraShield Charger can be used anywhere on the Table / Car / Wall with strong magnets and various mounts.

 The BeraShield Charger supports 15W Lightning Fast Charging, allowing charging at the same speed as a wired cable. When the BeraShield Battery is charged using the BeraShield Charger, it is fully charged within 2 hours.

 

 

 

 Place the your smartphone on top of the already charging BeraShield Batteries to begin charging at the same time!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 We take great consideration for your health. Titanium is harmless to the human body and has been used in artificial bone. The small screws that go into the case are specially made with materials that do not incorporate harmful metals such as nickel. BeraShield cares for your health as well as your smartphone.

story:
Mother's Day Update!

Drive Your Mom to Tears (of Joy)!  

___________________________________________________________________________________

Create a surprise "Mom! We Love You!!!" online photo album in 3 easy steps. http://bit.ly/MomGift21. 

End of Mother's Day Update

 

Why 17 Million Grandmas Initiative?

1. Being online helps stay in touch. Vital.

2. Our easy and safe app gets Grandma on Facebook in 30 minutes

3. The EasyFamily Social®app is available NOW for iPad, Mac, and Windows PC!

Grandma can be on Facebook this Mother's Day!

Please download the app for FREE at www.EasyFamilySocial.com 

 
Get your Grandma the best Mother’s Day Gift possible! 
 
 

Please help us develop the Android version!

4. Thank you! You will find the complete infographic and more interesting information on the project below.

We are now at mid private beta stage with a few features in the pipeline. We can commit the following timeline — App and User guide — release of the functional stable public beta to our supporter group by 1st of May — certainly in time for Mother's Day — 12 May 2013. Tutorial — 15 of June — Father's Day.

 

How we’ll allocate the budget

$8k is budgeted to go towards app development. $2k is budgeted towards User Guide and Tutorial . We hope to get features voted in/out by supporters – this will help us optimize the App and Guide/Tutorial budgets.

How will we make it sustainable?

We are undecided on the future revenue model for the Facebook Beginner Kit – application, guide and tutorial. We would like it to be self-sustainable yet affordable to all – and 50% of isolated seniors are financially challenged. We hope to discuss the possible approaches with our supporter group – you! One idea we had is ‘honor-ware model’ – pay as much as you feel fair – if you can pay at all.

5. Project expert support

Mary Furlong, Founder SeniorNet, Third Age Media, Mary Furlong and Associates, Expert in Aging

“The importance of being online is to connect generations, to connect people together, to mitigate the loneliness that some older adults feel as they are farther away from friends and family.

 

Jim Tobias, Inclusive Technologies, Strategies and Stakeholders at RaisingtTheFloor.org Mission: “To make the web and mobile technologies accessible to everyone with disability, literacy and aging-related barriers, regardless of their economic status.”

“The app is a great example of how an aggregating service can unify what the user experiences, and simplify both choices and layout so that users with limited abilities and low confidence can succeed.“

Laurie Orlov,Founder, Aging in Place Technology Watch, Leading Industry Analyst, VP, Forrester Research Expert in Aging Technologies

“I believe that 100% of older adults need to be online, that the Internet has enabled people to have access to other people, to information, to socialization that otherwise they will be completely missing.

The best thing you can do for an older adult as we come into Mother’s Day and Father’s Day is help people get the training they need, get the access they need, get the devices they need and help them get online.”

P.S. An Unexpected Reward

This project started as a tribute to our parents, our mothers. They gave us this world, and it felt right to try and give them access of our new world – our life online.

Quite unexpectedly, two months into the project I received a special reward – and please decide how valuable it could be. While researching the aging segment, I came across some interesting studies suggesting that thanks to advances in biosciences and improved lifestyle options, people in their 40s – including myself – will live on average about 100 years. Prior to that I had a number of around 75-80 in mind. Those who are fortunate to be in their 20s and 30s will likely get to 110-115 mark.

Better still, as Greta, Francis, Franco and many other seniors proved beyond all doubt, we can live an active life that goes well beyond our sixties.

The Stanford Center for Longevity recommends planning for longer, and more fun-filled life. Taking year long mini-retirements now and then, and taking the time to enjoy life, is a viable option. My life plan is now being revamped – there’s more time left than I could have imagined.

Yet another reason to say ‘Thanks!’ to my Mom and Dad!

Ivan and GrandmaOnFacebook.org Team.

Studies:

1. Increased mental stimulation = – 46% risk of dementia http://rng.org.au/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/2005-Brain-reserve-and-dementia-a-systematic-review.pdf http://www.nbcnews.com/id/11025839/#.UUxRxxdTArV

2. “Computer Activities, Physical Exercise, Aging, and Mild Cognitive Impairment: A Population-Based Study”, Mayo clinic, Arizona, May 2012 http://www.eurekalert.org/pub_releases/2012-05/mc-cua042612.php

3. University of Chicago in 2010 http://news.uchicago.edu/article/2010/03/17/feeling-lonely-adds-rate-blood-pressure-increase-people-50-years-old-and-older

4. Feeling lonely adds to rate of blood pressure increase in people 50 years old and older http://news.uchicago.edu/article/2010/03/17/feeling-lonely-adds-rate-blood-pressure-increase-people-50-years-old-and-older

5. “Older Adults and Internet Use”, Pew Research Center, June 2012 http://www.pewinternet.org/Reports/2012/Older-adults-and-internet-use.aspx

6. 20% reduction in depression among the elderly as result of Internet use. http://www.phoenix-center.org/DepressionOct152009.pdf

7. An enormous study titled Midlife in the United States, or Midus, in one of its recent findings (Jan 2012) http://www.midus.wisc.edu/

8. Poker can reduce risk of dementia by 50% http://news.sportsinteraction.com/poker/poker-can-reduce-risk-of-alzheimers-disease-62405/

Why do 17 million grandmas need to be on Facebook? (complete infographic)

story:
Brief summary

The Ultimate 3D is a printer using the FDM technology (Fused deposition modeling).
We chose this technology because it allows a very low cost of printing.
Despite its reasonable size, print volume of 20.2 liters in fact one of the largest in its class.

It includes 2 activated carbon filters, customizable LED lighting, and many more.

Our goal for this campaign is to raise enough funds to expand our equipment fleet and finalize our product.
In exchange for your help, you will receive the finished product before it hits the market at a price well below its retail value.




Overview of the different models

The Ultimate 3D range consists of 4 models available in 6 different colors and two limited editions only available during the Indiegogo campaign.

  • U3D
  • U3D Vision
  • U3D Vision Matte Grey (limited edition of 100 copies)
  • U3D Prestige
  • U3D Vision Prestige
  • U3D Vision Prestige Matte Grey (limited edition of 100 copies)


U3D

No WIFI camera or storage cabinet.

Available colors : Blue, white, red, green, black, orange.


U3D Vision

Version with WiFi camera.

Available colors : Blue, white, red, green, black, orange.


U3D Vision Matte Grey

Similar to the U3D Vision. The sections of this limited edition are anodized in black, the windows are covered with iridescent film and it comprises a plate and the Ultimate 3D logo on the front.

Available color : Matte Grey.


U3D Prestige

U3D model with the storage cabinet.

Available colors : Blue, white, red, green, black, orange.


U3D Vision Prestige

U3D Vision  model with the storage cabinet.

Available colors : Blue, white, red, green, black, orange.


U3D Vision Prestige Matte Grey

U3D Vision Matte Grey model with the storage cabinet.

Available color : Matte Grey.



Print Volume

With a print volume of 20.2 liters (26x26x30cm), the Ultimate 3D printers have a volume equivalent to printers in excess of 2,000 $.

Accuracy

For maximum accuracy, machining parts plywood, aluminum and polycarbonate and performed on digital control machine.

With a height of 0.03 mm minimum layer, the Ultimate 3D is one of the most accurate 3D printers.

Print head

All Ultimate 3D models are equipped with a printhead with 2 extruders entirely of metal.

it is capable of heating up to 400 ° C allowing it to melt any type filaments available to date: PLA, ABS, PET, nylon, polycarbonate, HDPE, PVA, HIPS, POM, wood, stone, copper, bronze, brass and MORE.

The head is also equipped with a sensor to automate the upgrade of the heating plate. This sensor greatly increases the accuracy of printing.

 

Standalone printer

With its LCD control screen and SD card reader, the Ultimate 3D does not need to be connected to a PC for printing. A single outlet enough.

All print settings (upgrade, print speed, heating temperature, etc.) are adjustable from this screen.

Language of the interface available : English, Polish , French , German, Spanish, Russian , Italian, Portuguese, Finnish.


Led lighting

 Our printers are illuminated by 24 LED RGB. Remote control 44 keys to adjust the brightness, color and even store 6 custom colors.


WIFI camera

With WiFi IP camera, you can view the progress of your prints wherever you are. To do this, simply connect from a smartphone, tablet, or PC.


Storage cabinet

The storage cabinet allows additional height (+ 80cm). It includes storing two coils of wire.
It is equipped with a drawer and 2 locations to store all your printing accessories.

useful dimensions

1 - width 335 x height 130 x depth 360 mm

2 - width 118 x height 270 x depth 365 mm

3 - width 367 x height 280 x depth 365 mm


Carbon filters

The Ultimate 3D printers are the only printers completely closed to be fitted with activated carbon filters.
Filters allow you to make disappear the unpleasant smell of melted plastic.
They have a life of 4 to 6 months.
Each printer comes with 10 filters. The filters will be available in our web shop.


T-Shirt

Sol's Unisex T-Shirt Imperial Mouse Grey 100% cotton Weight: 190 g/m with our logo. Available in sizes S - M - L - XL - XXL

Before shipping, you will receive an email to tell us the size selected.


Ultimate 3D printed logo

Material : ABS red.


Shipping

The shipping costs will be paid before the shipment of your item.

For payment of postage, days before the shipment, you will receive an email with our bank details and our PayPal détails.

A survey will be joined to make adjustments according to your country (power cord, voltage), the color you have chosen, the size for the t-shirts, etc.

story:
Power Out? Power on!

The Candle Charger by Stower is the first indoor power plant for smartphones. Candle + water = essential USB power for your home during grid outages and blackouts. Great for camping! Stay charged...no matter what.

  • Stay connected to family and friends 
  • Ultra dependable 2.5W USB power source - indoors or out
  • Six hours per candle - fully charge 2 smartphones
  • New, personal energy design for ready storage and use.  

TIME - "Should be in your emergency kit"

News Ledge - "Its a damn cool product"

FastCo - "A product everyone should have in their homes"

When power outages hit, staying connected to family, friends, and emergency services is critical. But how to keep charged?  

  • Batteries store power - they don't make it 
  • We love solar, but it doesn't work at night or indoors
  • Hand cranks produce minimal power. 10 hours cranking to charge a phone? That's tough. 

We want a reliable solution, and the Candle Charger is the first indoor generator designed to charge smartphones and keep them charged.


We also offer the Candle Charger in the new Stower P.O.P. Kit! P.O.P = Power Outage Prepared, a necessary update for home readiness. 

Thanks to our amazing community of crowdfunding supporters (thank you! thank you! thank you!), we raised enough money to manufacture and ship our first product, the FlameStower - its now for sale across the US and Canada.

The FlameStower is portable power for campers. Based on your invaluable feedback and our own experiences we needed to design a power generator - elegant and simple - to work inside the home during blackouts.

The Candle Charger fits in existing emergency kits and works readily with common household items: candles and water.

With your help, we want to make the Candle Charger a reality and modernize power outage readiness. We hope you'll join us and Get Charged!


The Candle Charger uses the heat energy from candles to generate electricity. 


Bonus! The Candle Charger also quickly boils and sterilizes water, which you can reuse for cooking or making a cup of something nice before the grid returns. We recommend tea, Earl Grey, hot. 

$125 - P.O.P KIT

Most emergency kits are overkill and don't really offer much for the usual 2-3 day power outage. 

So we built a better one! For the first time ever, we're excited to introduce the P.O.P Kit by Stower! P.O.P = Power Outage Prepared!

The P.O.P Kit includes everything needed to operate the Candle Charger and more:

  • A Candle Charger and two 6-hr Stower Candles for charging and boiling water
  • Matches and emergency water pouches
  • Long-burning candles and USB rechargeable flashlights
  • A kickass multitool and basic first aid kit to take care of business
  • Some hand wipes to keep it clean.

Stower is a leader in personal energy product engineering and design. Together with our manufacturing partner PCH, Stower makes smart, reliable energy products that 1) do their job and 2) do it well.

The Candle Charger contains two core pieces of technology: 

  • A thermoelectric module, also known as a Peltier cooler. Thermoelectric modules are semiconductor devices that convert temperature gradients – one side hot, one side cold – into electricity. The Candle Charger uses nontoxic bismuth telluride-based modules, which have been in mass production for over twenty years for scientific, refrigeration, and automotive industries. 
  • The Stower smart circuit that conditions the power coming from the module to match power requirements of the device being charged (e.g. a smartphone). 

What makes the Candle Charger an important innovation is the conversion efficiency of the device, its electrical strategy, and the focus on design for indoor use. 

Conversion Efficiency

The Candle Charger achieves class-leading power output from thermoelectric modules, providing reliable USB power over extended periods of operation. We do this through a combination of patented mechanical engineering steps to optimize heat transfer from the candle, to the thermoelectric module, and into the water bath; careful control over thermal interfaces; and spatial design to position the Candle Charger relative to a heat source (i.e. the candle).

Electrical Strategy 

To increase cost savings and overall efficiency, Stower directly charges your electronic devices rather than charge an intermediate battery. We’re able to do this through circuitry developed exclusively for Stower products that

  • continually monitors the power output from the thermoelectric generator,
  • boosts the voltage to USB standard 5V,
  • conditions the power from the generator so it matches internal charging requirements of smartphones, switching between “bands” of acceptable current levels and gradually dropping the voltage so phones don’t drop the charge,
  • provides LED indicator sequences to clearly show power availability – a flashing light means power is available, while a stead light means steady power is achieved and the power output is “iPhone ready.” 

Designed for Indoor Use

We began with energy - the candle - and built the Candle Charger from there. The Candle Charger is sturdy enough to work outdoors, but its sleek design fits in with other beautiful shelf items for in-home storage and use. 

The handle and locking mechanism are necessary features that provide safe interface with the water bath during operation and collapsability for anywhere storage. The all-aluminum exterior - designed for maximum thermal efficiency - lends a modern look while being durable enough to take outdoors.

 Stower's been a hard charging machine since our birth in 2012.

Stower is led by Andy, Adam, and Jason. Andy and Adam met in grad school studying materials science. Both were obsessed with solar technologies and nanomaterials - so much so that Adam once illicitly snuck Andy into the campus nanofab, bunny suits and all, to help characterize sapphire wafers. STOWER GONE WILD!

We're also lucky enough to work with some extremely talented advisors and partners that help make Stower a reality, including:

  • Dr. Reza Kassayan - our world-class electrical engineer and advisor
  • PCH - our supply chain, design, and manufacturing partners
  • REI, Sportsman's Warehouse, FGL Sports in Canada, and other retail partners who've helped deliver our first product nationwide.
  • Stanford, StartX, and Orange Fab - hundreds of folks who support and help us make new energy innovations. 

Stower builds energy products for individuals, making it easier and more efficient to generate and control our own electricity. Smartphones are amazing machines: Stower chargers keep these powered when the grid can't. 

With this technology, Stower is also introducing electricity to thousands of homes in emerging markets. To learn more about our work with clean cookstoves, you can visit the Patents for Humanity website. 

Thank you for visiting our page and checking out what we're up to! Before you leave, please check out our website for more information on us and be sure to pass on the news that now we all have control of our power - with the Candle Charger!

Risks and challenges

We're big on reliability - we've built the Candle Charger to be more dependable than the grid!

From top to bottom, Stower is committed to delivering for you, our early backers, just as we did for our first crowdfunding projects. You take a big gamble on new innovations, and we appreciate that. Thank you.

All the pictures on this page are early production units made with Stower's new manufacturing partner, PCH. We're working with PCH and specifically its PCH Access program to make and ship the Stower Candle Charger to you, our backers. For those of you who don't know, PCH designs custom product solutions for the world's best brands from startups to Fortune 500s such as Apple.

Because of this, delivery of the Candle Charger is guaranteed. No questions asked - you will receive your order. And all sales are backed by Stower's 1-year warranty.
story_txt:
Power Out? Power on!
The Candle Charger by Stower is the first indoor power plant for smartphones. Candle + water = essential USB power for your home during grid outages and blackouts. Great for camping! Stay charged...no matter what.



Stay connected to family and friends 
Ultra dependable 2.5W USB power source - indoors or out
Six hours per candle - fully charge 2 smartphones
New, personal energy design for ready storage and use.  



TIME - "Should be in your emergency kit"
News Ledge - "Its a damn cool product"
FastCo - "A product everyone should have in their homes"

When power outages hit, staying connected to family, friends, and emergency services is critical. But how to keep charged?  

Batteries store power - they don't make it 
We love solar, but it doesn't work at night or indoors
Hand cranks produce minimal power. 10 hours cranking to charge a phone? That's tough. 

We want a reliable solution, and the Candle Charger is the first indoor generator designed to charge smartphones and keep them charged.



The Candle Charger is a safe, miniature power plant that provides on-demand electricity when the grid can't. It's power we control, anywhere we need it - indoors or out, day or night, grid or no grid. 






We also offer the Candle Charger in the new Stower P.O.P. Kit! P.O.P = Power Outage Prepared, a necessary update for home readiness. 







Thanks to our amazing community of crowdfunding supporters (thank you! thank you! thank you!), we raised enough money to manufacture and ship our first product, the FlameStower - its now for sale across the US and Canada.
The FlameStower is portable power for campers. Based on your invaluable feedback and our own experiences we needed to design a power generator - elegant and simple - to work inside the home during blackouts.


The Candle Charger fits in existing emergency kits and works readily with common household items: candles and water.


With your help, we want to make the Candle Charger a reality and modernize power outage readiness. We hope you'll join us and Get Charged!






The Candle Charger uses the heat energy from candles to generate electricity. 




Bonus! The Candle Charger also quickly boils and sterilizes water, which you can reuse for cooking or making a cup of something nice before the grid returns. We recommend tea, Earl Grey, hot. 







$125 - P.O.P KIT
Most emergency kits are overkill and don't really offer much for the usual 2-3 day power outage. 
So we built a better one! For the first time ever, we're excited to introduce the P.O.P Kit by Stower! P.O.P = Power Outage Prepared!




The P.O.P Kit includes everything needed to operate the Candle Charger and more:

A Candle Charger and two 6-hr Stower Candles for charging and boiling water
Matches and emergency water pouches
Long-burning candles and USB rechargeable flashlights
A kickass multitool and basic first aid kit to take care of business
Some hand wipes to keep it clean.

What makes the Candle Charger an important innovation is the conversion efficiency of the device, its electrical strategy, and the focus on design for indoor use.

We do this through a combination of patented mechanical engineering steps to optimize heat transfer from the candle, to the thermoelectric module, and into the water bath; careful control over thermal interfaces; and spatial design to position the Candle Charger relative to a heat source (i.e. the candle).

continually monitors the power output from the thermoelectric generator,
boosts the voltage to USB standard 5V,
conditions the power from the generator so it matches internal charging requirements of smartphones, switching between “bands” of acceptable current levels and gradually dropping the voltage so phones don’t drop the charge,
provides LED indicator sequences to clearly show power availability – a flashing light means power is available, while a stead light means steady power is achieved and the power output is “iPhone ready.”

The handle and locking mechanism are necessary features that provide safe interface with the water bath during operation and collapsability for anywhere storage. The all-aluminum exterior - designed for maximum thermal efficiency - lends a modern look while being durable enough to take outdoors.

story:
Hello 

   Welcome to  Project 

 

 


          

Why EZstand ?

Our hands are meant to be used for a variety of unlimited chores. The world has limited our freedom of movement as now we are all busy holding our devices, some of us for hours. Almost all of our information is inside this device which does have an advantage but we having to hold our Smartphone’s constantly brings inconvenience especially during the viewing. Even if we put our phone on a table or another surface, we still need to bend over with our heads in our screens, making this both limiting and uncomfortable.

This reason alone led me to look for a combined solution and to come up with this exclusive design patent: "EZstand".


EZstand Function Video

 

EZstand is A multi-functional tool 

to make your life easier!


If you enjoy watching clips, movies while lying on your side, or playing while your sits, EZstand designed for any your position.


Use it on any surface: bed, mattress, carpet, car dashboard, glass or grass. The EZstand will keep your phone and camera stable so you always want to you use it. 




    EZstand Features

    EZstand Specification

  • Base Material: Silicone.
  • Holder mechanism: Plastic PC (poly-carbonate).
  • Stand Holder Shelf: Plastic PC (poly-carbonate).
  • Bottom Plunger: Smooth Silicone.

    Unit Measuring

  • Length: 218mm / 8.6in
  • Width: 92mm / 3.6in
  • Height: 22mm / 0/86in
  • Net Weight: 176gr / 0.39 pound (Ib)

    Compatible with 

        Most Smartphone's such as:
  • iPhone, 5/5S, 6, 6 Plus, 6s 6s Plus
  • Samsung: Galaxsy s3, s4, s5, s6, Edge
  • Note 3, 4, 5
  • LG: G2, G3, G4 Nexus 5
  • Motorola: Nexus 6
 * max measuring:  160mm/6.3in by 9mm/ 0.35inches.

We have create the EZstand in Black, White, Blue, Green, And Pink.


Use EZstand -

anywhere everywhere!



EZstand From beginning:

Art-Work, Prototype, Patent Application... 




About Us

My name is Jack Ohanna and I am a product designer. I have been running a grade team company since 2006 in Hong Kong, which specializes in the invention of a product patent, including manufacturing.



1.  How much will the EZstand cost?

     The EZstand will be retailed at a market price of $30.00.

2.  How much is the shipping fee?

      The shipping fee is approximately $6.00 worldwide; please check your         shipping rate on the check-out menu.

3.  How many colors does the EZstand have?

      The EZstand comes in 5 colors: White, Black, Blue, Pink and Green.

4.  Can I purchase more than one EZstand?

      Yes you can. Just add the appropriate amount and state what colors             you would like to order.

5.  I am a retailer/distributor. How and at what price can I order the             EZstand?

      You can order up to 50 units. If you’re interested in ordering a larger             quantity please feel free to contact us at www.ezstand.net.

6. Does the EZstand support all mobile phones?

     EZstand supports most mobile phones – iPhone 5/6/6S/ Plus,                        Samsung Galaxy S6, LG G4 etc. Max measures: 160 mm by 9 mm.

7. How stable is the EZstand while I am driving?

      EZstand sticks to the dashboard and is very stable.

8. Can I charge my device when using EZstand?

      Yes, the EZstand is designed in a way that enables use even when the           device is charging.



TimeLine





Why is this campaign important?

Our goal is to think about peoples’ needs and to create products in various fields that meet these needs, while at the same time integrating design, process control, costs, and materials, manufacturing techniques as well as limitations, reliability and safety. What we have here is a wonderful platform in which many more people can join us in meeting our goal and help bring it to life.

What is your part?

Backers here will help us launch the EZstand product as well as future product lines.

What we need?

To achieve our goal and meet our objectives we need a further investment of $20,000, the purpose of which is to create tooling and open our production line for manufacturing.

What will you get?

There are different kinds of perks available, early bird (between 40% to 50% discount) or two units / complete color set for a discount too.

Hurry up to contribute now!

What will happen if we don’t reach our goal?

In the case that we don't reach our entire goal, all funds will be donated to a hospital unit, helping disabled people.

Challenges

Having years of experience in the industry I am aware that creating a product from A-Z will prove to be a challenge, however, once we meet mass needs and don’t limit ourselves to a particular sector, our EZstand solution will finally be everywhere!

Other ways you can help

Please use Indiegogo share tools and share with your friends, helping us ‘make a noise’ on your social media.


Please Support us 

Thanks!

story: .

Short Summary

We had this idea back in September that we thought could change the world. We worked on it day and night, countless hours, for 7 months, until it finally grew into a Company called GetWithIt. Now we need your help with the next step to help my team and I push this dream forward.

GetWithIt is a mobile app that allows people to find & post parties and events in real-time. The simple layout makes it as easy as an "Instagram for Events"(see alpha demo video).

We would like to grow this product to the next stage. Our team has already proven that we can create an app with our alpha release designed for investors and promotion. And now we want to tweak it, implement the NEW & slick design and launch it for the public this fall.

We already have 20,000 people on our Facebook page per week and 3,000 likes in a short period of time!

With the genius devlopment and design team we are outsourcing from India, we can literally see every dollar be spent to the different parts of creating the app. We WILL have this app in the store this fall and I am proud to finally be able to say it.

 

We had a dream back in September. The dream was to make an app that would help students and other people be more active, find events that interest them and meet new friends. Our dream is to let GetWithIt change the world.

Please help us make this a reality and please Get With It!

 

Perks

These perks really do speak for themselves.

 

You can get a VIP button next to your name in the app when creating events. This VIP button highlights you as a premium member of GetWithIt!

Considering that this feature will be launched on a subscription basis this is a steal.

 

 

You can feature a shoutout for yourself or a special loved one on our high-traffic Facebook page (10 per post). We get over 20,000 people reaching our page every week. www.facebook.com/getwithitapp

You or a loved one can be recognized as our friend, a donor and supporter of GetWithIt!

 

You can get your name put into the app in the "About" section for LIFETIME? This is one of the best perks we have to offer. You will always be able to open up the application in front of somebody and show them that your name is in it!

 

You can get an airplane ticket to Las Vegas with many perks attached to the deal! An airplane ticket to Las Vegas costs more than $300 when purchased at certain times of the year. This is a purchase to visit us in Las Vegas, hang out and see the City of Entertainment!

 

You can have dinner with the founders now or once the app reaches millions of users? This perk is very exciting because it allows you to spend time with our awesome team and see how we grew this entire company from scratch to potentially millions of users. We are so confident in our application that we believe this is a great perk to offer for the price! 

 

 

Or you can receive a LAMINATED GOLDEN MEMBERSHIP CARD. 

This card certifies you as a real part of GetWithIt! It says that you helped fund GetWithIt and that thanks to you it is now a reality. When your friends see it and ask you how the heck did you get that just tell them to Get With It!

Thank You

 

Your support means the world to all of us. You're allowing us to make a change in people's lives, to influence the way people connect. And if you pledge anything to our cause, whether it be $10 or $1,000 we would like to thank you from the bottom of our hearts. Thank you for supporting our dreams.

story:
IF YOU MISSED THE NEO3DO CAMPAIGN DONT WORRY! COME TO OUR WEBSITE AND CHECK US OUT!

 

WWW.NEO3DO.COM

 

See the Hollywood 3D Product Launch and Showcase - HERE

 

Hello 3D lovers and early adopters! 

Welcome to the World’s First Glasses-Free 3D Android Tablet crowd funding page!

Have you ever noticed that things are more realistic and cooler in real life than on TV or your iPad?

OF COURSE YOU HAVE!!

Finally the NEO3DO is here and able to provide REAL 3D EXPEREINCES for whatever you watch! Sports, Travel, Exotic, Games, Youtube, Movies, you name it!

CHECK IT OUT HERE ----->   WWW.NEO3DO.COM


Some Features!

    • 2D AND Glasses-Free 3D Viewing (Beautiful, Bright and Clear)
    • 2D to 3D real time conversion on any video!
    • Powerful processor and Android OS (Super Fast)
    • Fast internet with easy streaming  (Easy)
    • Stereo Speakers (Great sound quality!)
    • And of course front and rear cameras 

 

The problem with 2D is that it looks the same with one eye closed, boring, flat and non engaging. What’s the point of having 2 good eyes if you cant enjoy your 3D sight!? Until you have experienced 3D like this you don’t even know what you are missing out on! Let me give you a hint. A TON!

GET ONE NOW ---->  WWW.NEO3DO.COM

Check it out, Here is the technical breakdown

What: Traditional tablets are made using a thin film transistor, two-dimensional LCD providing a flat view. Our viewing glass utilizes a specialized technology called a parallax barrier which sends different visual signals to each of your eyes.


Who: We’ve spent the past year working on tablets and the past 2 years working with glasses-free 3D. We already have working production units and the app design for streaming content is almost finished!

 Why: The NEO3DO is a very easy to use tablet containing the entire Google Android App play store, it has internet, streaming video and anything else you have ever seen on a tablet. IT ALSO HAS the ability to play videos or pictures in 3D at the click of a button! Simple as that with no Glasses Needed.

 

You can get this tablet in the mail and be watching any video you want in 3D in a matter of a minute. You can play Angry Birds, fruit ninja, and other games in 3D. So easy your GRANDMOTHER could do it!

 

The indiegogo Goal! 

Hurray! We reached our GOAL!!

 

What do I get?

Since the campaign is over now come to our website www.NEO3DO.com 

 

What do people say about it?

“I have never seen a tablet like this! WOW! WOOOOW! KIDS WOULD LOVE THIS OH MY GOD!” -Janet 

“It reminds me of IMAX, I get vertigo sometimes! That’s awesome, I would rather watch movies in 3D like this without the glasses than any other way!” -Cynthia 

“That’s insane! Oh my god this thing! Are you serious!! Some of it really looks like its coming out! Actually some things are coming out of the screen! These peoples hands are like out here!” -Marc

  

So what should I do now!?

Get your own glasses free 3D tablet delivered to your doorstep of course! Pick up a NEO3DO now at WWW.NEO3DO.COM/STORE  by choosing the EARLY BIRD package to the right for well below retail cost! Be the first of your friends to have it, right on the cutting edge of technology 2013. Get the EARLY BIRD to your right, it our newest fully capable NEO3DO with all of the features of 2D and 3D without the glasses!

 

 

I WANT A BONUS!

OK FINE, IT GETS EVEN COOLER

- Real time 2D to 3D conversion for all videos (home videos?)

- SOON AFTER YOU RECEIVE YOUR TABLET NEW FIRMWARE WITH Real time 2D to 3D Conversion of nearly all Android games! (Angry birds, fruit ninja and tons more)

-You will be the first of your friends to have a 3D Tablet! Total bragging rights!

 

 

Show me the VALUE!

Your NEO3DO has the most Android computing and graphics power available in a tablet form factor. The Cortex A9 has dual 1.5GHz CPUs with 512KB L2 Cache and dual Mali400 GPUs for seamless flow of high definition and 3D video playback. The 802.11 b/g/n wireless will also provide you with all the connectivity bandwidth available from your internet service. In short, you get the most processing and display power for the lowest price making NEO3DO the best value in Android tablets today. 

The price will only go up and the uniqueness will go down. Be the first in your office, on your street, at your school or even in your TOWN to have a 3D tablet. This is a very early offer and it is guaranteed to blow your socks off. If you don’t think the 3D experience is absolutely jaw dropping I give you my personal guarantee that you need to see an Eye Doctor! BE THE FIRST BY GETTING AN EARLY BIRD! 

GET A NEO3DO TODAY! CLICK HERE

Don’t kick yourself later when you see someone else with a NEO3DO, you found it first! ITS YOURS!

Remember, The NEO3DO tablet is an AMAZING 2D tablet with all the 2D Android tablet features and apps for a lower price! When you choose to use 3D you simply use the 3D media player and it turns on! 3D video, games and photos, Easy as Pie.

Act Fast whether you are able to contribute or not, help us get this tablet concept to market today! If you can take a moment and share this using the share tools here on indiegogo you will truly help make a difference.

THANK YOU!

Nick, David and the NEO3DO team

 

 

"3D tablets are the future" Vince Pace of CameronPace Group

"The Nintendo 3D for Big Boys is finally here! Can't wait to get ours!" - The Crowdfund Mafia  www.crowdfundmafia.com

"Showing off our content on a glasses free display is a true game changer"
Brian Leupold   3dminds.com

“The new NEO3DO 3D tablets will enable users to enjoy unlimited 3D content without the use of glasses.” Techulator.com

“Discover 3D media players and watch 3D movies with your naked eyes!” Gizbot.com

“Despite previous 3D attempts with the Nintendo 3DS and the LG Optimus 3D, the new NEO3DO Android tablet is in a whole different league.” Presente3D

 

FAQs

1. Is NEO3DO adjustable? Can I watch the NEO3DO while I wear glasses?

The NEO3DO is adjustable in volume and brightness but not in 3D effect. We are currently developing a new media player that will allow for real time increase and decrease of 3D effect. The NEO3DO can be used in combination with any type of eyewear.

2. When will NEO3DO ship?

We are aiming to begin shipping NEO3DO to our Indiegogo backers in April 2013.

IF YOU MISSED THE CAMPAIGN YOU CAN FIND THEM HERE 

3.  Is NEO3DO compatible with PC? Mac? My Android phone?

Yes, absolutely!  NEO3DO communicates over Bluetooth and WiFi and is compatible with your Mac, Android, Windows and Linux. If you would like more tech information, please see our tech details!

4. How can I pledge using my credit card?

While our campaign has PayPal enabled as the preferred payment option, contributors may also select the 'Pay As A Guest' option to charge to a credit card without logging into a PayPal account. Please follow this link for more details on credit card payments.

5. I'd like to upgrade my NEO3DO pledge. How do I do that?

COME TO OUR WEBSITE WHICH IS NOW UP AND RUNNING! WWW.NEO3DO.COM

6. Where can I learn about the effects of 3D for eyes for children and adults?

For all authoritative information on eye health and 3D please visit http://3deyehealth.org/ and http://www.aoa.org/x20026.xml 

7. What about International Shipping?

If you are not in North America your tablet will come through customs as a Demo/Prototype, no commercial value since you are our SUPPORTERS not our customers.

8. What are the technical specs? How does it stack up to other Androids?

Below are the specs 

Compared to much more expensive tablets your NEO3DO has the most Android computing and graphics power available in a tablet form factor. The Cortex A9 has dual 1.5GHz CPUs with 512KB L2 Cache and dual Mali400 GPUs for seamless flow of high definition and 3D video playback. The 802.11 b/g/n wireless will also provide you with all the connectivity bandwidth available from your internet service. In short, you get the most processing and display power for the lowest price making NEO3DO the best value in Android tablets today. (HTC One X is a smart phone and the ASUS Transformer is a convertible laptop, both at much higher prices)

Hello 3D lovers and early adopters!

Have you ever noticed that things are more realistic and cooler in real life than on TV or your iPad?

Some Features!

2D AND Glasses-Free 3D Viewing (Beautiful, Bright and Clear)
2D to 3D real time conversion on any video!
Powerful processor and Android OS (Super Fast)
Fast internet with easy streaming  (Easy)
Stereo Speakers (Great sound quality!)
And of course front and rear cameras 
 
The problem with 2D is that it looks the same with one eye closed, boring, flat and non engaging. What’s the point of having 2 good eyes if you cant enjoy your 3D sight!? Until you have experienced 3D like this you don’t even know what you are missing out on! Let me give you a hint. A TON!

GET ONE NOW ---->  WWW.NEO3DO.COM
Check it out, Here is the technical breakdown
What: Traditional tablets are made using a thin film transistor, two-dimensional LCD providing a flat view. Our viewing glass utilizes a specialized technology called a parallax barrier which sends different visual signals to each of your eyes.

Who: We’ve spent the past year working on tablets and the past 2 years working with glasses-free 3D. We already have working production units and the app design for streaming content is almost finished!

 Why: The NEO3DO is a very easy to use tablet containing the entire Google Android App play store, it has internet, streaming video and anything else you have ever seen on a tablet. IT ALSO HAS the ability to play videos or pictures in 3D at the click of a button! Simple as that with no Glasses Needed.
 
You can get this tablet in the mail and be watching any video you want in 3D in a matter of a minute. You can play Angry Birds, fruit ninja, and other games in 3D. So easy your GRANDMOTHER could do it!

story:
What is Qurate?

In 2013, we have more ways to communicate than ever. It can be quite a task to remember who is on what medium or which social network your cousin sent you their phone number on. It can get confusing because humans don’t think in terms of HOW they spoke with someone. They think about WHO they spoke with. 

Enter Qurate. Qurate is a mobile-first iPhone application that helps you more easily communicate with each of your 30 closest relationships, no matter what social network they use. There’s three steps to using Qurate: sign-up to the social networks you use, choose the friends that you want to add, and start messaging! Qurate does all the work. It brings together your Facebook, Twitter, and Gmail accounts and reorganizes the communication based on the people you chose. You can respond to your best friend’s @mention on Twitter and your mother’s personal message on Facebook, all from within the same app. Here are some reasons you’ll love using it: 

  • Qurate is your favorites list on steroids
  • View your important communication across your Twitter, Facebook, and Gmail
  • Respond to friends on the same medium they chose to message you from one screen
  • Keep up with up to 30 friends who are on different social networks
  • Activate the optional language filter to protect if autocorrect tries to use unwanted profanities
  • Post directly to Facebook and Twitter simultaneously
  • Use one app to see your communication with those important to you
  • No more forgetting where your friend sent something to you
  • Automagically merge the contact information of your friends from your contacts, Facebook, Twitter, and Gmail

Who we are

Qurate is a mobile first start-up based out of St. Louis, MO. 

Ryan:

Qurate was started with the desire to revolutionize how technology views our human relationships. I've been very involved in social media for years and I've utilized different social networks due to their particular focus on communication. Problem was, it was always frustrating that my friendships seemed like they were locked away on each individual social network. There was no central hub to keep up with my interactions with my favorite people. After years of working on the concept, I took the plunge and started Qurate, a people-focused company. I've been incredibly amazed by the community that has begun to surround Qurate. 

James:

This is my first foray into the world of start-ups. My background is people. I've worked in the retail industry for years and one of the most important things that I've learned is that people simply want to be heard. With Qurate your voice doesn't diminish due to the sheer volume of communications that social media prompts daily. I've been able to look at the social media interactions I've had with my wife across multiple platforms going back months on one feed. It's been remarkable being able to be a part of something like Qurate.

What we need

Every business has a fledgling stages where it's learning how customers can best use its product. Qurate is there right now. We need $10,000 in funding so we can pursue a more efficient marketing strategy and have several versions of our app. We believe we can help change the world. The better we as a company do, the more we get to pass on. At Qurate our mission statement is "People, Not Platforms." This mission goes beyond just creating an awesome app, we want our story to reverberate and impact those around us in a positive way.Every business has a fledgling stages where it's learning how customers can best use its product. Qurate is there right now. We need $10,000 in funding so we can pursue a more efficient marketing strategy and have several versions of our app. We believe we can help change the world. The better we as a company do, the more we get to pass on. At Qurate our mission statement is "People, Not Platforms." This mission goes beyond just creating an awesome app, we want our story to reverberate and impact those around us in a positive way.

Qurate is a for-people, for–profit company and our focus is people.  We're giving half of our annual profits away to Compassions Services, an international humanitarian organization.  Compassions Services exists to offer help and hope to people living in desperate situations around the world.  They could be found in the aftermath of Hurricane Sandy and after the tornados in Oklahoma.  Qurate is partnering with CSI because we believe that the core of our business is connecting people and we take that worldview beyond the business model. 

We support four areas of Compassion Services:

Disaster Relief: Compassion Services is on call when a disaster strikes. Whether the Oklahoma tornados, the Nigerian flooding, or the Japanese tsunami, CSI has a presence at every major disaster event around the world.

Humanitarian: Compassion Services works in impoverished nations doing everything from building water wells to bringing toys and joy to orphanages.

Medical: Compassion Services takes highly qualified medical personnel to impoverished areas to provide medical attention to those who might otherwise never receive it.

Education: Compassion Services works with its international contacts to help provide school supplies to needy children around the globe.

More information about Compassion Services can be found at www.Compassionservices.org.

Other Ways You Can Help

Qurate is very close to release and we need all the help we can get to get the word out. We want you to share in our story and be a part of our mission.  Use the links below to find our social media presence, visit our website and check out our blog, use Indiegogo share tools to get people talking about Qurate.

story:
A BIG THANK YOU FOR ALL WHO CONTRIBUTED TO THIS CAMPAIGN!!!!

     Although we did not reach our goal of $5000, we did reach our goal, personally. We are bringing this product to people who can really benefit from achieving professional looking ABS models.

-Once funds are transferred an update will be posted on our Facebook page, click here ---> The Touch Up Facebook Page Direct Link

AFTER CAMPAIGN REWARD:

     Every Kit will now receive 40 grams of True Blue Makerbot ABS Filament to print Cute Octopus Says Hello! (Make sure you download your Cute Octopus Says Hello! - Link is on our campaign page under the picture)

 

NEW BONUS IF WE REACH $2500: Everyone who buys a kit will also receive 20 grams of True Blue ABS Makerbot filament to print Makerbot's Cute Octopus Says Hello! Check out more information on Makerbot filament at (http://makerbot.com).

 

The Touch-Up can provide a smoother surface to allow for a more detailed and even paint job!

 

The Colonel by Sculptor at Thingiverse.com

 

BONUS: Everyone who buys a kit will receive 20 grams of Nuclear Green ABS Makerbot filament to print Makerbot's Brain Zombie! Check out more information on Makerbot filament at (http://makerbot.com).

Spread the word to help you get more ABS sample filaments! The more kits we sell, the more free samples we can add and the closer you get to the Ultimate Sampler Pack!

The free sample of Makerbot ABS filament included in your kit will allow you to try this brand of ABS over your current brand. This will allow you to see how Makerbot's ABS polishes better then some other brands. We have not gotten any bubbles or imperfections when using Makerbot ABS, but we have had these issues with cheaply manufactured ABS filaments.

UPDATE on INFORMATION REQUESTED

     The Touch-Up is a 0.5 gallon glass container. You can place items 6" tall by 4-3/4" wide.

How The Touch-Up Works

     The Touch-Up utilizes a vapor sanding process in which it uses Acetone vapors to smooth and  polish ABS plastic. Times of processing vary depending on the size and Layer thickness of each model printed. A very small model could take 15 to 25 minutes while a larger model could take 45 minutes. It is important that you often check your model often to ensure the desired amount of polishing. You want to be sure not to over-polish as Acetone melts ABS, making it softer.  (Check your model by looking, do not remove lid while product is warm. If used in a well ventilated area you can open the lid to flip/rotate the model to get a better overall coverage) 

     Depending on the brand of ABS you are using, results may vary (as stated in the video credits). We recommend Makerbot's ABS filament because it responds very well the process everytime we've used it. Other brands of ABS may produce air pockets that cause tiny holes to form when going through the Acetone Vapor Process, ruining your models.

    The amount of Acetone also varies depending on the size of your model. I always start at 1 Tablespoon for smaller models, and for larger surface areas I use 2 Tablespoons. More may be needed. Time your process with the brand of plastic to get an understanding on how much acetone to apply. If correct amount is used you should have a beautifully polished ABS Model with no acetone left inside the glass container.    

     We posted an Instructional Video on YouTube when we started this campaign (found HERE and at the bottom of the page).


Information Update:

For our International Buyers:

     The Touch-Up runs off of 120V AC. (If you are not a US resident you may need a voltage converter).

International Converter Set Now Available for an Additional $12

       The Converter is dual wattage from 220/240V to 110/120V and will allow you to plug into:

North and South America, Africa, Asia, Australia, Europe, The Middle East, and the UK. (Includes: Great Britain, Ireland, Japan, Hong Kong, China, Fuji, New Zealand, Caribbean, and Singapore.) 

     Add $12 to your order and we will include the Converter when your kit is shipped. (EXAMPLE: $100 for the kit, $25 for shipping and $12 for your kit, for a total of $137)

 

*Use intended for those who are 18+ years or with close adult supervision*

 

 Are you tired of hand sanding and polishing your ABS printed models? Because now you don't have to!

 

 

Wouldn't it be easier to simply let The Touch-Up smooth and polish your ABS Prints?

 No more Sanding Dust Everywhere or Harsh Chemicals on the Skin!!!

Easy Clean-up

     * Remove Glass container from Heating Unit

     * Wipe out with paper towel

 

 

Start Getting Professional Looking Models!!!

 

 

Item: Garden Toad by SSW @ (Thingiverse.com) Printed using Makerbot True White ABS Filament

 

 

Item: Snail by Cerberus333 @ (Thingiverse.com) Printed using Makerbots True White ABS Filament

 

 

  

 

Item: Brain Zombie! by Makerbot (Thingiverse.com) Printed using Makerbots Nuclear Green ABS Filament (Use your 20g of Nuclear Green ABS (provided) in your kit to print and polish one of your own!)

 

 

 

                      

 

 

    

    

    

     We have all worked hard to make sure The Touch-Up will provide amazing results time after time. For us, it has proven to be an amazingly easy tool to get the results we want out of our models. With every pledge you make, with every person you let know about The Touch-Up, you are helping us bring this amazing tool to everyone... But not before we bring it to you!!

 

 

 

 

 

                      

    

     The Touch-Up is a product used to smooth and polish rough edges due to the 3D Printing Process. Achieve amazing results using various print layers. Imagine a finish you can see yourself in! Literally! STOP WASTING TIME hand sanding and hand polishing your 3D printed ABS models. Let The Touch-Up do it for you! This product allows you to get professional looking models faster by letting The Touch-Up smooth your print for you while another model prints.

     We found that when using Makerbots ABS filament, we were able to get faster polishing times with a great overall consistency with each model polished. (Same filament used in our video and pictures)

 

Item: Cute Octopus Says Hello by Makerbot (Thingiverse.com) Printed using Makerbots True Blue ABS Filament

 

 

 

                      

 

     I got into 3D Printing a year and a half ago. I mostly used my 3D Printer for misc. projects such as, custom snowflakes and ornaments for Christmas, fixing/creating parts for other devices and projects, and designing and printing my own Rep-Raps. I used to spend a lot of time finishing my models after they were printed to get a really clean and smooth surface. I tried different techniques from spray enamel to dipping the part in different chemicals. It took months until I figured out the best method for polishing 3D printed ABS models. That was to submerse the ABS model in Acetone vapor. From that came the idea of vapor sanding and The Touch-Up was conceived.

 

 

 

 

                      

 

     The first obstacle was the heating element. I used 32 Nickle-Chromium resistance wire (common heating element). This works by dispersing the electricity in the form of heat. To contain the heat I used two stainless steel plates (one coated with temp resistant paint). Then bolted the steel plates to a stainless steel wire trivet frame, which is used not only to raise the heating element off the ground as not to damage sensitive surfaces, but also provides a holder for the glass container. The container used is a 0.5 gallon glass container with lid. The lid does not seal to the container, as not to create/build pressure (which would be very dangerous). The lid is only held on by its own weight. This is so Oxygen gets pushed out of the top. The lid then contains the Acetone vapor inside the glass container. The glass container can then be removed from the heating unit to cool and condense any leftover Acetone. (If the proper amount of Acetone is used there should be no leftover Acetone, the ABS model should absorb the vapor). Always start with a small amount, add more if necessary. All that was left was to lift the model off the surface of the glass container, so we added a platform for the model to rest on. I also wanted to be able to turn the heating unit off, and know that was in fact, off. To do this, I was sure to include an ON/OFF switch cable, with LED light indicator in the 3D Printed electronics case. Then, The Touch-Up was born.

 

 

 

     Start Getting the most out of your 3D Printing Experience!!!

 

 

     Limited Edition Signature Series is a series with a total quantity of 1000. (IF ALL ARE SOLD)

 

 

 

                      

 

     Our Goal is simple. After struggling to get professional looking finishes, we want to get The Touch-Up into as many hands as possible so that everyone can get professional looking ABS models. Unleash your creativity and show it off in style! (ABS is the choice of many Engineers due to its Strength and Resilience.)

    Even if our ultimate goal is not obtained, everyone will still receive their pledged perk.

 

 

 

                      

 

     The Travel Tote was initially a stretch goal at $35,000 - but we wanted to be sure everyone got one, regardless of if we were able to reach that goal. We wanted those people who like to travel and/or plan to travel the ability to take The Touch-Up anywhere! It provides a nice case for The Touch-Up or it can be used as a re-usable grocery bag!

If we reach 500 Kits, everyone that is going to receive a kit will receive 1x extra platform (Only for those who are receiving a kit from a Perk)

 

 

If we reach 1000 Kits Everyone will receive a Bonus "Dream It, Design It, Do It" Metal Bic Pen (Those who just got the $50 Perk will receive one also) ($5 Perk ineligible)

 

 

  If we reach 2000 Kits, everyone who is going to receive a kit will receive: 1x extra platform, Metal Bic Pen, & 1x extra glass container! (Only for those who are receiving a kit from a Perk)

 

 

 

 

                      

    

     Production of your Touch-Up Kit will take place here at our home office in Ohio. Here, your kit will be assembled and tested before being ready for shipping. The Touch-Up comes ready to use right out of the box. Note: This kit does not include the Acetone required to use this product. All perks will be shipped together (so if your perk is the Limited Edition Signature Series, your T-Shirt will be boxed inside with your Kit).

 

 

 

                      

    Each Product Shipped Upon Completion!

 

     We will begin production as soon as funds are transferred from Indiegogo. Once parts arrive, production will begin, estimated in the beginning of August. First shipments of The Touch-Up will start in late August. Early Bird Special pledgers will receive theirs FIRST! The Touch-Up will be shipped upon completion, along with any additional perks. If shipment happens to run into October an Update will be posted on our Facebook Brand Page for those affected. (Click the banner below to link to our Facebook Page).

     Updates will be posted on The Touch-Up Brand Page. A link is located on the Company Page. Don't forget to "Like" the Company before you visit The Touch-Up Page!

 

 

 

                                        

           Stay tuned to our Facebook Page even after this campaign!

                 We will be doing something really cool for those who receive The Touch-Up! (Click the banner to go to our Page)

             

 

 

 

                                      

                              Subscribe to our YouTube Channel! (click Banner to visit our Page)

 

 

 

                                           

                                                 Coming Soon!!

 

 

 

Make This Easy & Simple to Use Product Part of Your 3D Printing Arsenal!!!

          Instructions will come with your kit. An instructional video is also posted on the 3D Customization Co. YouTube channel under The Touch-Up by 3D Customization Co. LLC

 

                                                                   

                                                  Click Here for the Instructional Video

 

 

 

                      

 

 1) Our first challenge is getting all of our parts in on time so we can start production of The Touch-Up.

2) If by some amazing chance we are overwhelmed by the number of Pledges, and we think production may be slowed. We will hire the necessary people required to get all your perks completed as fast as possible! We already have a plan just in case that happens, and an update will be posted on our Facebook Page (Link Above).

 

 

 

     

Even if you do not have the money to help by pledging, we can still use your help! Spread the word about this exciting new product on Facebook, Twitter, or by word of mouth! We appreciate your help, no matter what kind of help it is!! THANK-YOU for your support!!

 

 

 

 

 *3D Customization Co. LLC is not affiliated with Makerbot or any other Thingiverse users listed above.*
story_txt:
A BIG THANK YOU FOR ALL WHO CONTRIBUTED TO THIS CAMPAIGN!!!!
     Although we did not reach our goal of $5000, we did reach our goal, personally. We are bringing this product to people who can really benefit from achieving professional looking ABS models.

-Once funds are transferred an update will be posted on our Facebook page, click here ---> The Touch Up Facebook Page Direct Link

AFTER CAMPAIGN REWARD: 
     Every Kit will now receive 40 grams of True Blue Makerbot ABS Filament to print Cute Octopus Says Hello! (Make sure you download your Cute Octopus Says Hello! - Link is on our campaign page under the picture)
 
NEW BONUS IF WE REACH $2500: Everyone who buys a kit will also receive 20 grams of True Blue ABS Makerbot filament to print Makerbot's Cute Octopus Says Hello! Check out more information on Makerbot filament at (http://makerbot.com).
 
The Touch-Up can provide a smoother surface to allow for a more detailed and even paint job!
 



The Colonel by Sculptor at Thingiverse.com
 
BONUS: Everyone who buys a kit will receive 20 grams of Nuclear Green ABS Makerbot filament to print Makerbot's Brain Zombie! Check out more information on Makerbot filament at (http://makerbot.com).
Spread the word to help you get more ABS sample filaments! The more kits we sell, the more free samples we can add and the closer you get to the Ultimate Sampler Pack!
The free sample of Makerbot ABS filament included in your kit will allow you to try this brand of ABS over your current brand. This will allow you to see how Makerbot's ABS polishes better then some other brands. We have not gotten any bubbles or imperfections when using Makerbot ABS, but we have had these issues with cheaply manufactured ABS filaments.
UPDATE on INFORMATION REQUESTED
     The Touch-Up is a 0.5 gallon glass container. You can place items 6" tall by 4-3/4" wide.
How The Touch-Up Works
     The Touch-Up utilizes a vapor sanding process in which it uses Acetone vapors to smooth and  polish ABS plastic. Times of processing vary depending on the size and Layer thickness of each model printed. A very small model could take 15 to 25 minutes while a larger model could take 45 minutes. It is important that you often check your model often to ensure the desired amount of polishing. You want to be sure not to over-polish as Acetone melts ABS, making it softer.  (Check your model by looking, do not remove lid while product is warm. If used in a well ventilated area you can open the lid to flip/rotate the model to get a better overall coverage) 
     Depending on the brand of ABS you are using, results may vary (as stated in the video credits). We recommend Makerbot's ABS filament because it responds very well the process everytime we've used it. Other brands of ABS may produce air pockets that cause tiny holes to form when going through the Acetone Vapor Process, ruining your models.
    The amount of Acetone also varies depending on the size of your model. I always start at 1 Tablespoon for smaller models, and for larger surface areas I use 2 Tablespoons. More may be needed. Time your process with the brand of plastic to get an understanding on how much acetone to apply. If correct amount is used you should have a beautifully polished ABS Model with no acetone left inside the glass container.    
     We posted an Instructional Video on YouTube when we started this campaign (found HERE and at the bottom of the page).

Information Update:
For our International Buyers:
     The Touch-Up runs off of 120V AC. (If you are not a US resident you may need a voltage converter).
International Converter Set Now Available for an Additional $12
       The Converter is dual wattage from 220/240V to 110/120V and will allow you to plug into:
North and South America, Africa, Asia, Australia, Europe, The Middle East, and the UK. (Includes: Great Britain, Ireland, Japan, Hong Kong, China, Fuji, New Zealand, Caribbean, and Singapore.) 
     Add $12 to your order and we will include the Converter when your kit is shipped. (EXAMPLE: $100 for the kit, $25 for shipping and $12 for your kit, for a total of $137)
 
*Use intended for those who are 18+ years or with close adult supervision*
 
 Are you tired of hand sanding and polishing your ABS printed models? Because now you don't have to!

 
 
Wouldn't it be easier to simply let The Touch-Up smooth and polish your ABS Prints?

 No more Sanding Dust Everywhere or Harsh Chemicals on the Skin!!!
Easy Clean-up
     * Remove Glass container from Heating Unit
     * Wipe out with paper towel
 
 
Start Getting Professional Looking Models!!!
 
 
Item: Garden Toad by SSW @ (Thingiverse.com) Printed using Makerbot True White ABS Filament
 
 
Item: Snail by Cerberus333 @ (Thingiverse.com) Printed using Makerbots True White ABS Filament
 
 
  
 
Item: Brain Zombie! by Makerbot (Thingiverse.com) Printed using Makerbots Nuclear Green ABS Filament (Use your 20g of Nuclear Green ABS (provided) in your kit to print and polish one of your own!)
 
 
 
                       
 
 

     
    

    
     We have all worked hard to make sure The Touch-Up will provide amazing results time after time. For us, it has proven to be an amazingly easy tool to get the results we want out of our models. With every pledge you make, with every person you let know about The Touch-Up, you are helping us bring this amazing tool to everyone... But not before we bring it to you!!
 
 
 
 
 
                       
    
     The Touch-Up is a product used to smooth and polish rough edges due to the 3D Printing Process. Achieve amazing results using various print layers. Imagine a finish you can see yourself in! Literally! STOP WASTING TIME hand sanding and hand polishing your 3D printed ABS models. Let The Touch-Up do it for you! This product allows you to get professional looking models faster by letting The Touch-Up smooth your print for you while another model prints.
     We found that when using Makerbots ABS filament, we were able to get faster polishing times with a great overall consistency with each model polished. (Same filament used in our video and pictures)
 
Item: Cute Octopus Says Hello by Makerbot (Thingiverse.com) Printed using Makerbots True Blue ABS Filament

story:
“Apple Worm”

For iPhone 5S/5C/5

What is “Apple Worm”?

“Apple Worm” is currently the most portable multifunction USB data cable mobile phone case in the world for iPhone 5S/5C/5. It can meet your needs to charge the phone and data synchronization just do as the same as the standard USB cable. The date cable can also be used as a phone holder and an earphone winder; you can take full advantage of the combination of the mobile phone case and the data cable. 


  • Have you ever been worried about forgetting to bring the data cable when you were out?
  • Have you ever been annoyed for the data cable and earphone jumbling together?
  • Have you ever thought to free your hands to do other things when you watch videos or video chat with your phone?

We are glad to tell you that our “Apple Worm” is the right product to resolve these problems.

I, “Apple worm” in the case is not only a date cable, but a winder to comb your earphone.

II, USB data cable can be readily bent to use as a mobile phone holder, liberate your hands.

You may need a phone holder to watch videos or chat at any time when you go out, travel, work, and cook, wash up or go to toilet, ect. Our “Apple Worm” can meet all your needs.

With it, you can bring you data cable as long as you take you phone. You never need to worry about forgetting it. 


Dear Ladies and Gentlemen,

Apple worm is under production now, and it will be released to the market on March, 2014.

We are planning to cooperate with distributors in the international market and to sell on eBay in retail. 

If the campaign is over when you notice the apple worm on indiegogo, do not worry, pls pay attention to our website on www.decentodm.com or search on eBay to get the updated news. Also, the name may change into "Color worm" or "Case For iPhone Hides A Lightning Cable" after March, 2014.

Pls notice if you make order by paybal before March 15, 2014, you can also enjoy the campaign price. Send email to make order and pay by paybal!

Email: decentodm@gmail.com

Paybal: decentodm@gmail.com


Media Report

Idownloadblog: Apple Worm case for iPhone features built-in stand and Lightning cable

Iphoneclub:      Apple Worm-case: slim ontworpen beschermhoes met laadkabel

Cultofmac:        Apple Worm Case Is More Like A Caterpillar

Spinblog:          Apple Worm Case: la custodia multifunzione per iPhone

网易科技：首页酷品专栏  “苹果小虫”自带多功能数据线手机壳

Iphone-girl:       iPhoneにつける便利な「イモムシ」！「Apple Worm」

Portable Practical Simple Rapid   

We will cooperate with an outstanding manufacturer to produce Apple worm.We try to make in high quality and low price. Through B2C mode, we hope to reduce the cost, it is both good for us and our users. 

Contrast between the "Apple Worm” USB data cable and the standard USB cable:

Features

“Apple Worm” USB date cable

APLLE Lightning Standard USB cable

Unforgettable

YES

NO

Portable

YES

NO

Phone Holder

YES

NO

Earphone winder

YES

NO

Tangle

NO

YES

Thickness

3mm

7mm

USB2.0

YES

YES

Two sets “Apple Worm” for iPhone5/5S and iPhone5C

Five kinds of color for phone case

Five kinds of color for USB data cable

The application of “Apple Worm”

  • “Apple Worm” is very durable

The used material of polycarbonate (PC) and high performance polyurethane (TPU) is injected at one time, so the joints and wires are closely linked, and makes the cable more flexible and anti-scratch. The surface of phone case uses spray paint to make it more beautifully. To avoid fade and anti-fingerprint, we add transparent rubber paint to the black phone case; red shell and blue case, and add metallic paint over gold and silver case. This can also make it feels more comfortable. In a word, "Apple Worm” will be a more durable product.

  • The USB data cable of “Apple Worm” can be a phone holder

Firstly, the cable has a thickness of 3mm and the width of 12mm. We can control the hardness of high performance polyurethane (TPU) to make it moderate.

Secondly, a locating slot is set on the back of phone case. The data cable is required buckle in the locating slot after bending it. With these feature, the USB cable can be used as a phone holder.

  • The USB data cable support data synchronization

The cable has the same function as the standard USB data cable, which can meet the requirements of charging and data synchronization. What’s more, the original APPLLE Lightning chip is used to perfect support IOS7 system. Also, we will get permission for MFI certified. 

Why the fund-raising goal is USD 8,000

The concept of “Apple Worm” can indeed solve some problems for iphone users, and we believe that is what you need. We desperately hope deliver this love “little worm” to your hands. Total amount of USD 8K contains mold development, early stocking and production.

We are doing our great effort to make “Apple Worm” achieve mass production in the earlier time. We need your help and hope you can join in for this excited product. Also, we hope you can share the love worm with your family, colleagues and friends, to let more people share this information.

OUR PERKS:

Note: Prepaid $ 20 and above, and share the information on one of Facebook, Twitter or G+, you will get a phone case, do remember to send us email at decentodm@gmail.com indicating your phone model and the color you want .

Note: Prepaid $ 20 and above, and share on all Facebook,Twitter and G+, you will get two cases, do remember to send us email at decentodm@gmail.com indicating your phone model and the color you want .


Production and delivery

“Apple Worm” will be produced in China, the world’s largest manufacturing base. We have cooperated with several trusted manufacturers in Shenzhen for a long time, and we will choose the most qualified one to produce this product. Pls pay attention to our Facebook, twitter, G+ and website at www.decentodm.com for latest news.

We hereby inform you that the molding design has been finished already. As MFI authorization needs a strict verification test, We have cooperated with a member of the Apple Inc to get the permission of it. We recently will send the sample to Apple Inc laboratory in Taiwan to do the test and then send to America headquarters to get the finally check. Also because the Chinese Spring Festival holiday is approaching, the delivery date may one month later than the expected. We will push the process to get the permission in earlier time and send apple worm to you once available.

Thanks for your great patient and understanding!

We will try to do the best!

We have a team with rich shipment experience and they will deliver the “Apple Worm” to your hands by courier or freight forwarding no matter where you are in the world. The targeted retail price is USD40.00 for one set (a phone shell and a data cable) once comes into the market. Now, you will get it with the best prices in this campaign and begin to use it before it appears on the market.

Do feel free to ask for any questions by send email to decentodm@gmail.com, or leave messages on our website at  www.decentodm.com, or contact us with Facebook、twitter、google+.


About us

Based on innovation and design,Decent ODMis a team which aims to improve the applicability of products to make our customers feel better on physical, mental and visual needs.

Decent ODMis an earnest, active thinking and hard-working team which mainly consists of ID designers, MD designers, hardware engineers and software engineers. Through more than eight years working experience in this industry, they are quite familiar with the whole processes of the products from design to volume production. They are in charge of many projects fromIntel, MOTO, HP, DELL, TOSHIBA, Lenovo, Huaweiand so on. Meanwhile, the team is always in collaboration with institutions of higher learning to explore new ideas and concepts and become them into reality. What’s more, the team has the professional Purchaser, logistics and other professionals to assist in the completion of the manufacture of the product.


Our belief: innovation, applicability and endow souls to products.

Ps: Through one year’s effort, we will launch five to seven electronic products in the few months. Pls pay close attention to our website at www.decentodm.com if you are interested in them.

Thanks for your support!
