paint over gold and silver case. This can also make it feels more comfortable.
In a word, "Apple Worm” will be a more durable product.

The USB data cable of “Apple Worm” can
be a phone holder

Firstly, the cable has a thickness of
3mm and the width of 12mm. We can control the hardness of high performance
polyurethane (TPU) to make it moderate.
Secondly, a locating slot is set on
the back of phone case. The data cable is required buckle in the locating slot
after bending it. With these feature, the USB cable can be used as a phone
holder.

The USB data cable support data synchronization


The cable has the
same function as the standard USB data cable, which can meet the requirements
of charging and data synchronization. What’s more, the original APPLLE
Lightning chip is used to perfect support IOS7 system. Also, we will get permission for MFI certified. Why the
fund-raising goal is USD 8,000
The concept of “Apple Worm” can indeed solve some
problems for iphone users, and we believe that is what you need. We desperately
hope deliver this love “little worm” to your hands. Total amount of USD 8K contains mold development, early stocking and production.We are doing our great effort to make “Apple Worm”
achieve mass production in the earlier time. We need your help and hope you can
join in for this excited product. Also, we hope you can share the love worm
with your family, colleagues and friends, to let more people share this information.OUR PERKS:

Note: Prepaid $ 20 and above, and share the information on one of Facebook, Twitter or G+, you will get a phone case, do remember to send us email at decentodm@gmail.com indicating your phone model and the color you want .


Note: Prepaid $ 20 and above, and share on all Facebook,Twitter and G+, you will get two cases, do remember to send us email at decentodm@gmail.com indicating your phone model and the color you want .




Production
and delivery
“Apple Worm” will be produced in
China, the world’s largest manufacturing base. We have cooperated with several
trusted manufacturers in Shenzhen for a long time, and we will choose the most
qualified one to produce this product. Pls pay attention to our Facebook,
twitter, G+ and website at www.decentodm.com for latest news.
We hereby inform you that the molding design has been finished already. As MFI authorization needs a strict verification test, We have cooperated with a member of the Apple Inc to get the permission of it. We recently will send the sample to Apple Inc laboratory in Taiwan to do the test and then send to America headquarters to get the finally check. Also because the Chinese Spring Festival holiday is approaching, the delivery date may one month later than the expected. We will push the process to get the permission in earlier time and send apple worm to you once available.Thanks for your great patient and understanding!We will try to do the best!
We have a team with rich shipment experience and they
will deliver the “Apple Worm” to your hands by courier or freight forwarding no
matter where you are in the world. The targeted retail price is USD40.00 for one set (a phone
shell and a data cable) once comes into the market. Now, you will get it with
the best prices in this campaign and begin to use it before it appears on the
market.
Do feel free to ask for any questions by send email to decentodm@gmail.com,
or leave messages on our website at  www.decentodm.com, or contact us with Facebook、twitter、google+.About
us
Based
on innovation and design,Decent
ODMis a team which aims to
improve the applicability of products to make our customers feel better on
physical, mental and visual needs.
Decent ODMis an earnest,
active thinking and hard-working team which mainly consists of ID
designers, MD designers, hardware engineers and software engineers. Through
more than eight years working experience in this industry, they are quite
familiar with the whole processes of the products from design to volume
production. They are in charge of many projects fromIntel, MOTO, HP, DELL, TOSHIBA, Lenovo, Huaweiand so on. Meanwhile, the team is always in collaboration
with institutions of higher learning to explore new ideas and concepts and
become them into reality. What’s more, the team has the professional Purchaser,
logistics and other professionals to assist in the completion of the
manufacture of the product.
Our belief: innovation, applicability and endow
souls to products.Ps: Through one year’s effort, we will launch five to seven
electronic products in the few months. Pls pay close attention to our website
at www.decentodm.com if you are interested in
them.
Thanks for your support!

story:
Manage all your fantasy sports, and view all of your leagues, any way you want, from one source!

FantasyLeagueOne is a one stop fantasy sports dashboard portal. Instead of being required to log in to multiple websites to manage your fantasy teams or monitor your scores, you simply log in to FantasyLeagueOne with a simple click and you're all set to do whatever you desire.

FantasyLeagueOne, LLC is offering you the chance to support FantasyLeagueOne through our Indiegogo program. We've got a very good baseline website developed to show you but we need your help to launch and make it a reality! Your generous pledges will further fuel the development of the website, propel it's attention to the major players in the industry, and help make FantasyLeagueOne the best it can be!

We're looking to raise $15,000 to cover advanced development of the website, marketing/advertising, and incentives for larger fantasy websites to partner with. Every single penny pledged will be put towards each of these goals. The members of our team are working diligently to make this happen and in return for your support, we are offering a variety of rewards - check out the sidebar for details. In the event that we exceed our target, all additional funds will also be invested into the project for a sleek & sexy design, smooth functionality, and an app for iPhone/Android. *Reward shipping set for US only, please contact us directly if you required shipping outside of the United States*

So what makes FLO worth your pledge? At FantasyLeagueOne, LLC. we are, first and foremost, fantasy sports players! We love the idea of having a single, truly customizable experience regardless of which site you use. Since this doesn't exist, we decided to build it ourselves.

ABOUT US : COMPANY

BACKGROUND

First, a little bit of background. We are avid sports fans and even crazier fantasy sports fans! Okay, that’s enough of the boring stuff. Let’s get onto the goodies!

GOODIES

Take a look at what our typical Sunday looks like. We have to either work in 5 tabs or 5 separate windows! What a mess.

Yes, we are crazy and manage 5 teams in 5 different leagues on 3 different sites. Logging into each of these sites every time we need to check our roster, make a trade or do whatever, it can really add up. Half the time we can’t even remember our login credentials! This hassle really rains on our football parade as we lounge on the couch football Sunday with our computers in our laps. We should quickly be able to check out how bad we're dominating people and enjoy watching the football game at the same time!

Dashboard *beta
Easily switch between leagues/sites
After switching leagues/sites with one click, notice league info changes

FUTURE

Focusing on the future, we are gearing to appeal to a broader range of audiences by adding features such as "Pick'em games, Playoff challenges, March Madness, etc."

BOOM! THERE YA HAVE IT - One site, one login, and working on your next fantasy title. All the information and tools you need are pulled in from major fantasy sites into one single "portal" if you will. Want to rearrange your dashboards? No problem, move them around as you see fit. You'll never want to use another fantasy sports site again! Now go out there and kick some ass!

ABOUT US : FOUNDERS

Mike Linquist Founder and Chief Marketing Officer

Mr. Michael is considered to be synonymous with greatness in most countries. It is for this exact reason how he thought up this idea with his computer in his lap on his couch watching football on a very sexy Sunday. Now, here is how it all went down: Cursing out the crappy touch pad on his laptop scrolling through 6 internet tabs to observe how his 6 teams were doing in 6 leagues through a few different websites, he thought to himself, "Why dafuq can I not have ONE page open where I can view the status of ALL my fantasy teams?"

Hence - the idea.

James Raines Co-Founder and Chief Financial Officer

James F'ing Raines is viewed, predominantly by most, as a nerdy nutritionist. He disguises his nutritionist career aspirations by day while he slaves away as a server administrator for meager pay. While pretending to provide server administrator support, he peruses his fantasy sports leagues where he typically boasts a less than .500 pct record. This website will become very ideal for James as he won’t need to waste much time to review his fantasy losses by traveling to a single website. 

Matt Lindahl Co-Founder and Chief Information Officer

Nerd by day and nerd by night, Matthilda Lindahl has driven the term nerd to the extreme. This is good in our case, as he has the technical aptitude that has been the backbone of our website development. If we can somehow maintain his focus on the website and not shopping for suits to mingle at drinking events as if he were James Bond, his efforts and labor should provide a very superb outcome.

LINKS

FantasyLeagueOne: https://www.fantasyleagueone.com

About the Company:  About Company

About the Founders:  About Founders

Facebook:   http://www.facebook.com/fantasyleagueone

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/FL_One

YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/fantasyleagueone

 

Risks and challenges

We foresee that Coding/Development bugs and acquiring API from other fantasy websites will be the biggest challenge, however, we will have much more leverage upon a successful Indiegogo funding, so we see this as a minor risk.

story:
Hi - I'm Sam and I develop software products that I'm extremely passionate about.

I have an idea that will make our workplaces smarter: using new iBeacon technology to bring accurate & hassle-free indoor GPS into our workplaces, at extremely modest prices.

This isn't a consumer product... it's for your workplace. But it will make your work more enjoyable and offer incredible to convenience to you and your colleagues. So please, help me make this a reality by pledging -- and if you can, talk to your employer about pledging also!

Making our workplaces smarter

Locio brings GPS indoors and into your workplace, using your smartphone. Locio lets you automatically & accurately locate colleagues at work, and provides convenient help to find and book meeting rooms near you. It’s an office-presence system that is entirely automatic: it doesn’t require human intervention to keep it up to date, so it’s always accurate!

No longer will you wander the halls searching for someone, or miss an important colleague! Locio will change our workplaces, making them smarter and more context-aware -- bringing the convenience of GPS indoors and into your workplace!

iBeacon Technology

Locio doesn’t require expensive or complex equipment – we take advantage of new low-cost iBeacon technology.

When you join Locio we’ll send you a pack of iBeacons. These are small proximity beacons that emit a low power Bluetooth signal. They have a adhesive back, and can be stuck to almost any flat surface. They run for 2 years on a single battery – and we’ll ship you a set of new beacons every 2 years, so you never have to worry...

We’re still evaluating hardware suppliers, so that we choose the right iBeacons for Locio. We will use beacons that look stylish inside a corporate/office environment, provided by a supplier who can meet our demand & shipping requirements. 

Some examples iBeacons are: Estimote & StickNFind.
We're currently in talks with several suppliers.

Automatic Location

With Locio’s app on your smartphone, your phone automatically triangulates it’s position and reports it back to Locio’s cloud service throughout the day. Your colleagues will always be able to find you, without you having to manually report your whereabouts to a presence system such as Microsoft's Lync.

Exchange & Google Calendar Integration

One of the most powerful aspects of Locio comes from deep integration with existing calendar & room booking systems such as Microsoft Exchange and Google Apps (Calendar).

Locio knows where you are, where your meeting rooms & workspaces are -- and who has booked these rooms.

Need to find a free meeting room? Locio will find the closest room that isn't already booked.

Just walked into a free room & want to book it? Locio will alert you as you enter the room, and allow you to book it with a single tap.

Do I Need To Install Anything In My Workplace?

Locio is powered by our cloud service, making it dead simple to setup – no software needs to be installed within your workplace, except the Locio app on the smartphone of each employee who wants to participate. When you first setup Locio, you’ll need to place an iBeacon in each room of your workplace, and use the Locio app to detect & register the beacon in the system.

What Will Locio Cost?

The smartphone app will be free. We’ll charge for Locio on a subscription basis. Both monthly and annual susbcriptions will be available, and will be charged per-user. We anticipate a cost of just a few dollars per user per month.

We aim to make Locio as affordable as possible to broaden it's reach & appeal. We will devise a pricing structure that facilitates smaller companies with just a few rooms and a handful of users, and larger companies with thousands of employees and multiple buildings and levels. 

What About privacy?

We understand that this could be a biggie for a lot of people.

First of all, Locio’s smartphone app comes with a “Stealth Mode” feature that allows you to turn off location reporting – indefinitely, or for a period of time – 30 minutes, 1 hour, etc.

Next, we’ll always be completely open about the information we provide a company regarding its employee’s movements. Locio is intended to show current point-in-time locations, but will never provide an analysis of a particular employee’s movements over time. Any analytics that we do provide will be plainly described on our web-site, so you can make an informed choice when joining, knowing exactly what your employee will be able to see.

It’s also against our terms and conditions to place Locio beacons inside private or sensitive areas in the office such as showers or toilets. If a company is found to breach these conditions, their service will be terminated. 

Where Are We At Now?

We have a proof of concept app built (as shown in the video). This has proven to us that the core technology works. We know we can make the tech work – we now need further funds to continue software development and build the rest of the service & ecosystem to support Locio’s core technology -- and so that we can finish the software ready for the beta in February 2014!

Who Am I?

Well, I already run an online service! I'm a co-founder of Appfail, a web-site monitoring service that runs 24/7 and monitors thousands of web sites around the globe.

I'm also a Software Engineer, and have built some incredibly large scale software systems. For years I was developer of Microsoft Windows for Microsoft in Seattle, and helped to build Windows Vista and Windows 7.

When will I get it?

We’ll go into a private beta in late February 2014. The beta service will be free (beacons will need to be purchased, unless you make a pledge that includes beacons).

If you make a pledge, you’ll be guaranteed access to the free beta! We aim to launch to the public (out of beta) in April 2014.

Please Help!

We know that Locio will make it easier for everyone to go about their day jobs, from locating colleagues to easily booking meeting rooms. We're extremely passionate about this idea, and think that the advent of iBeacons will finally allow accurate & hassle-free indoor GPS at an incredibly affordable price!
So please help to fund Locio, so that we can continue building this & get to beta in February!
Please share -- use the IndieGogo share tools to share this page to your friends on Facebook, Twitter & other social media!

I'm a co-founder of Appfail, a web-site monitoring service that runs 24/7 and monitors thousands of web sites around the globe.I'm also a Software Engineer, and have built some incredibly large scale software systems. For years I was developer of Microsoft Windows for Microsoft in Seattle, and helped to build Windows Vista and Windows 7.When will I get it?We’ll go into a private beta in late February 2014. The beta service will be free (beacons will need to be purchased, unless you make a pledge that includes beacons).If you make a pledge, you’ll be guaranteed access to the free beta! story:
Agriculture and its challenges in Ethiopia

  • 85% of Ethiopian GDP comes from agriculture
  • The agricultural sector faces both natural and man-made problems – like plant disease, flooding, deforestation and drought etc…
  • Farmers lack a means to know plant/crop and/or soil status, and environmental conditions - they simply relay on ineffective and inefficient traditional methods
  • The impact of these types of problems affects productivity of the sector and the country’s GDP
  • Being able to monitor a farm field with reliable and actual data is a key to prevent it from such problems

What we think can be done - Use of technology

Wireless Sensor Networks   

  • Efficient
  • Affordable
  • Low power consumption
  • Able to sense environment and forward sensed data using wireless or mobile communication technologies
  • Environmental friendly

Mobile phones

  • The use of mobile phone is rapidly growing in Africa
  • Many of Ethiopian farmers own a mobile phone
  • But mostly use it only to access central market to check product prices

What we have done so far:

  • A research taking the case of irrigation farms in Eastern Showa zone in Oromia region in Ethiopia
  • A prototype of the whole system using open source platforms (including a web and mobile based applications) 

What we want to do next:

Develop a working product based on the prototype:

  • Develop improved mobile application
  • Program sensor devices and package them
  • Test sensor products in real time and in different environmental conditions
  • Deploy the whole system and test with an actual user (a farmer in Ethiopia)
  • Make it ready for next phase (to mass production and market)

What we need from you:

Be part of the campaign and help us realize this project by:

  • Generously contributing
  • Spreading the news to others
  • Forwarding valuable ideas and tips to the success of the campaign 

Who we are:

We are a team of passionate Software Engineers who want to contribute our part in making farmers' life easier with the use of such technologies.

To Contact us:

Elias Edo: eliaswedajo@gmail.com

Bereket Gichamo: hibeky@gmail.com

story:
articulating distribution device + infrastructure technology = add+it

add+it is bringing to market a brilliantly designed, utilitarian device that moves power where and when you need it.  The inventor of the add+it device, Hwai Yang, an architect for technology firms, tackled the complex design dilemma of static, fixed power and made it mobile.  And he added data and video capacity to boot!

In today's world, everything is mobile - phones, computers, offices.  Why not power?  add+it does what people have longed for, taking power where and when you need it.

Did you know that slips, trips, and falls are the most frequent accidents leading to personal injury; second only to motor vehicle accidents  Slips, trips and falls have been identified by the Wisconsin Bureau of State Risk Management as one of the five top causes of Workers Compensation claims in the past six years.  The main tripping hazard is from the power cord.  Moving power where you need it, anytime you need it, while at the same time removing the hazard of trailing electrical cords was critical to the add+it design.

add+it takes power from conventional to collaborative. Research proves the human condition thrives in a collaborative, engaging environment.  In office environments, bring desk tops together to connect workers with one another; in educational environments, bring students together to discuss and engage; in healthcare, bring doctors and healthcare professionals together to treat patients.  The possibilities are endless when you bring the power to the people.  

Working environments are rapidly transforming into living spaces.  The optimal solution in today's plug and play world is to provide people with the ability to transform their work space and easily adapt to the immediate functional demands.  Studies show the success of today’s work force is in bringing together and allowing employees the space and conditions to be comfortable.  Furniture manufacturers have transformed the work cubicle and designed low-profile, team enhanced furniture.  The missing link: POWER.  

The defining feature is add+it’s articulating and rotating “arms” that connect to the vertical power pole that distributes data, phone and video.  Again, this permits complete flexibility and mobility of locating the utilities where you need when you need it.  The invention also has an adjustable leg which assists in adapting to varying ceiling height conditions.

Our story would not be complete without mentioning the love and support of our family. We would also like to thank our partners in crime; TDH Advertising in Chicago IL, Weastlake Consulting in Hong Kong, HK and  BEC Machining in St. Louis MO.  We also appreciate the opportunity Indiegogo and Philips Innovation Fellows Campaign afforded us in promoting our product and sponsoring the competition.

add+it is US and Canada patent pending.


  • Corporate office: companies seeking to create collaborative, mobile work environments can use add+it to provide the employees access to power, data, phone and video.
  • Healthcare: healthcare facilities can use add+it in hospital patient rooms to provide power, data, and video to monitoring/treatment equipment and eliminate the tripping hazards of cords on the floor in patients rooms, nurses stations and operating rooms; add+it can be used in the home for patients recovering from surgeries that require patient and/or medical equipment mobility.
  • Education: collaborative teaching environments can use add+it to transform classrooms into flex rooms all the while providing a safe, cord free environment.
  • Government Facilities: add+it will offer the government a unique solution to their facilities needs.
  • Retail: Shopping mall owners can utilize add+it to provide power, data and phone to kiosks and avoid expensive floor coring.

add+it’s core philosophy is to improve the human condition in everyday environments.  We designed add+it with these simple principles in mind:

  • improve working condition to adapt to “living” condition
  • provide a cost-effective solution and encourage adaptive reuse of space
  • commitment to the environment; add+it is a Green product in material choice (aluminum) and reuse capability
  • design a product that is safe in all environments

 

Solution

add+it

Floor Raceway

Power Poles

Core Drilling

Raised Floor

Mobility

+

 

 

 

 

Flexibility

+

+

 

 

+

Portability

+

 

+

 

 

Recyclable

+

+

+

 

 

Reuse

+

+

+

+

+
Ease of Installation

+

+

+

 

 

Cost Effective

+

+

+

 

 

  Participate in the next paradigm shift: mobile power! Power has been the stagnant obstacle in defining space.  No longer!  add+it releases the constraints and limitations of power and empowers the people who use it.

add+it will afford companies, schools, hospitals, offices and retail spaces the ability to convert a space to fit the immediate needs dictated by multiple uses.

We need your help to move our company into the next phase of development.  We are passionate about design; improving the human condition through better design.  We are asking for your support to set this all in motion.

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

add+it has worked on the initial design and development of the articulating distribution device for the past year.  We now need your help. Your support will allow us to initiate the engineering and fabrication of full size, operational prototypes required for testing with various certification agencies.  Monies raised by this campaign will be put towards the engineering and production of the full size models. and the fees required for certification.  When we surpass our goal of $25,000.00, we will proceed with beta testing the full size models in various locations.

The success of this campaign depends heavily on getting the word out. Every blog or social networking post counts, so please share. We thank you in advance for your support. 

Risk involves delayed or extended certification reviews that could impact the cost of certification.  With certification delays, the launch of add+it could be deferred.

The biggest challenge is getting the message out and reaching as many people as we can in a short period of time. We have thirty days to reach our target goal and generate interest in our product design.  Please become part of our success story and tell everyone you know. 

Another challenge is finding a U.S. manufacturer to produce the add+it device at a competitive price point.

With your support, we minimize the risks and challenges of launching add+it. Please join us and our passion for improving the human condition.   

Let's do this!!!
story_txt:
articulating distribution device + infrastructure technology = add+it
add+it is bringing to market a brilliantly designed, utilitarian device that moves power where and when you need it.  The inventor of the add+it device, Hwai Yang, an architect for technology firms, tackled the complex design dilemma of static, fixed power and made it mobile.  And he added data and video capacity to boot!
In today's world, everything is mobile - phones, computers, offices.  Why not power?  add+it does what people have longed for, taking power where and when you need it. 
Did you know that slips, trips, and falls are the most frequent accidents leading to personal injury; second only to motor vehicle accidents  Slips, trips and falls have been identified by the Wisconsin Bureau of State Risk Management as one of the five top causes of Workers Compensation claims in the past six years.  The main tripping hazard is from the power cord.  Moving power where you need it, anytime you need it, while at the same time removing the hazard of trailing electrical cords was critical to the add+it design. 
add+it takes power from conventional to collaborative. Research proves the human condition thrives in a collaborative, engaging environment.  In office environments, bring desk tops together to connect workers with one another; in educational environments, bring students together to discuss and engage; in healthcare, bring doctors and healthcare professionals together to treat patients.  The possibilities are endless when you bring the power to the people.

story:
Follow us at thecrowdfundingcentre........click here

 

We are a new startup called 'BluVapp' and we are launching our device & Smartphone application that will revolutionize the electronic cigarette and electric hub (Vape) market. 

We have developed  a screw-on Bluetooth component that fits most popular brands of existing electronic cigarette or electronic Vape devices. 

Our BluVapp device is Bluetooth enabled and communicates with any Android, Apple or Windows based smartphone. The smartphone downloadable application controls the add-on control component. 

Your funding  secures the next step of manufacture and supply worldwide.


   



After deciding to quit smoking, David looked at all the available 'STOP SMOKING' products out there, and decided on an electronic Cigarette.  He bought an entry level starter pack and 1 2 3....... He was Vaping. 

As someone who loves new Technology this was just for him. 

His only concern was the articles he kept reading, stating how people are getting too much Nicotine from these devices.  But as he was happy with his new Vaping friend so this information drifted into the smoke in the background. 

Then it dawned on David... The  analogue cigarette has an 'off' switch... When you get to the cigarette filter... That was it!!!   No more until you lit another one. Then the question was asked... How can you do this in an electronic cigarette?  And the idea was born, put a Bluetooth controlled 'unit' between the battery and the coil. Then build a powerful smartphone application to control the 'unit'. 

The idea grew for you, the user, to have much more control over your Vaping experience.  This allows for the individual to have full control.

  • 10 minutes smoking - 30 minutes break ... more / less... you decide via the settings on your smartphone BluVapp app.

The possibilities grew, and we began  adding features that make the experience so much better:

  • lost my e-cig on the first day.... Ok let's add a Bluetooth Finder then I'll never lose it again.
  • A habit tracking mechanism......lets the user see how much they have vaped in a day, a month or a year.

  • A voltage regulator allowing you to control the resistance to your atomizer, controlled by you, via your smartphone.

Now these ideas have become a reality, where everyone can bring there    e-cig into the digital age without changing there e-cigarette. 


Small, state of the art and easy to fit.  (Fits most popular brands, if it doesn't fit yours... Be sure we are working on it!!)


If you want to Quit!

  • Helps you control your smoking/Vaping by only allowing you to use your e-cig or PV at specific times that you pre set via your smartphone app.
  • Design a program to help you quit.
  • Motivates you cut down with ease.
  • Indicate how much vapour you are getting in mg/cigarette terms.
  • Show your battery available for use.
  • Lock your device. Allowing the kids to have no access.

If you want to Vape!

  • Control atomizer resistance.
  • Monitor your juice use.
  • Save your sweet spot data.
  • Indicate how much vapour you are getting in mg/cigarette terms.
  • Show your battery available for use.
  • Lock your device. Allowing the kids to have no access.

Other features

  • Built in notepad for you to keep track of your favourite flavours.
  • Tweet your own vape and e-juice mixtures for others to see.
  • Facebook, twitter and instagram connection.
  • Find vape stores and vape lounges within your location.
  • Be directed to blogs you are interested in.
  • Set up your own blog and social network within the BluVapp app.
  • A selection and update of skins for your individual taste.
  • Get updates directly through the app.
  • Future add-on downloads.

     

We have approached the design and user experience of BluVapp with the following user principles as first and foremost:

1.  SIMPLICITY                     

Easy installation and  simple to to use.  Set up right out of the box, with a             simple easy downloaded application management system.

2.  EMPOWERMENT     

Vaping means different things to different people. So we did not design a rigid one-solution-fits-everyone product.  Instead we fitted our device with the core features you would want, and put the power in your hands to decide when and how you use your BluVapp. The BluVapp device is controlled via Bluetooth and responds directly to your smartphone's application settings.      

3.  INTELLIGENCE

Traditionally e- cigarette's can be smoked all day, without knowing how much nicotine or vapour is inhaled. By designing a smart system that allows activity and rhythm to be recorded over time, you will have a safer and more effective way to monitor your juice use and enhance your experience.....

The controls within the BluVapp Device and Application, can easily monitor and track data from your e-cigarette, including battery life, moderate flow by adjusting Voltage, monitor your activity and other trends in the e-cigarette environment. 

Extra features such as 'Find my Vape' and 'Lock my Vape' add to the list of benefits of the BluVapp.

4.  DESIGN PRINCIPLES and  SERVICES OFFERED

  • Ergonomic design.
  • Seamless mobile interface.
  • Ease of use.
  • Easy and simple set up.
  • Easy management and future use.
  • Individual vape user control, directly on you smartphone.

5.  A DESIGN DRIVEN DEVICE and APPLICATION

With BluVapp, the application and primary service are free, and accessible via any Android, Apple or Windows based smartphone. That means you can download the free application, and connect directly to your device via Bluetooth to start enjoying the interactive experience. 

*Contributing to the campaign here in no way signs you up for a paid service plan. 

After the products ship, there will be additional (optional) service plans that include more options such as storing information over a longer period of time, personalizing skins and add-on's. These premium plans will have a surcharge but are optional and contract-free. 



Our Core Team comprises of:

David Barclay            Founder, Designer and CEO

Lloyd Cohen              Co-Founder, Architect and COO 

Graham Coleman    Co-Founder, Product designer and MD

Gianni Nosenza        Engineer and designer                                   

In addition to our core team, we have assembled an incredible group of engineers, app designers, lawyers and industry experts who are collaborating with us in securing the best product possible. 


BlueTooth

  • Bluetooth 4.0 (Low energy)
  • Android and iOS sample Metalwear App
  • Documentation on Github
  • Simple API calls to control peripherals and sensors
  • FCC / CE 
  • DownloadableCAD enclosures
  • Wireless software updates (OTA)
  • ANCS compatible
  • BLE range of up to 15m

                                                

                  Hardware of Device                                                                                          

                  • Nordic BLE SOC + ARM Cortex
                  • Bluetooth Low Energy stack + Metawear Firmware pre-loaded
                  • 3.7V DC (with onboard power regulator)
                  • Micro rechargeable Lithium ion battery
                  • 2 analogue/digital I/O pins + 12C for extensions
                  • 3-axis accelerometer (w/tilt, orientation, free fall detection)
                  • Ultra Bright RGB 
                  • Voltmeter
                  • Vibrator motor
                  • Simple 4Khz Buzzer
                  • Micro push-button                                                    


                  We have finalizing a working prototype and are now focused on:

                  • Finalizing the engineering schematics for the final product.
                  • Developing the user experience for the mobile app.
                  • Developing the data tools.
                  • Developing a choice of  user interactive skins and products.

                    

                      

                    We will soon begin the process of:

                  • Designing packaging.
                  • Getting product certifications.
                  • Designing the supply chain process.
                  • Tooling.
                  • Materials procurement.
                  • Production.

                  We have been working on BluVapp for the several month and we've come a long way. 

                  Your support allows us to initiate tooling and manufacturing so we can make BluVapp available to you and others.  Let's make our community safer, our Vapes smarter, and our lives more connected — together.




                  • Be the first to experience this world first application.
                  • Be the first in the world to get one with perk benefits.
                  • You’ve never had a linked in experience like this before and it’s awesome to have a simple and practical way to connect to your e cigarette .


                  If you like our concept but can’t contribute, that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

                  • Please help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
                  • Please see how to use the Indiegogo share tools!


                                          

                                      If you love to Vape, BluVapp is the way of the future. 


                  From the Team at BluVapp                                                                                              Thank you for your support.

                                                                                 

                  Shipping costs to be added at time of delivery. We will endeavour to keep these costs to an absolute minimum.

                  We will contact you to confirm the size and model of your Vape unit before delivery.

story:
Wherever you are….WhereverTV.

WhereverTV is defining a new era in television broadcasting history for subscribers (you). Our proprietary platform delivers US and International channels (the stuff you want to watch) without the need for a credit check, long term contracts, hidden price increases, or waiting all day for someone to install hardware in your home.

We’ve gone out and licensed (yes, we legally have the rights to broadcast) some of your favorite US television channels and are now busy planning our May 2013 launch. We will be launching with at least 100 US-based television and audio channels, including some names you are very, very familiar with.

And along the way, we found something else quite interesting – there is a lot of content that you want to watch from the comfort of your living room, but many content owners have been hampered by the traditional way of broadcasting directly to television sets inside the USA, let alone the rest of the world.

WhereverTV has solved that problem by developing a television viewing platform that can be used easily by subscribers (you) and content owners (the stuff you want to watch). While designing WhereverTV, we focused on creating a simple on-screen channel guide that is fully customizable by the subscriber (yeah, that’s you, too).

 

Television on your terms

12 and 24 month contracts? Not here. Power to the people!

Credit checks? Why, didn’t your credit card company already do that?

Hardware that is impossible to install without a certified company technician? What is this, 1999?

Calling off work and waiting all day for someone to arrive to complete your order? We know how disappointed you are that you won’t have to do that here. You’ll just have to use that extra vacation day to actually, hmmm….oh yeah, VACATION.

Simply sign up at www.wherever.tv & start watching what you want in minutes.

 

How does it work?

WhereverTV beams encrypted content into your home and delivers it to your television via a wireless connection (Wi-Fi) that connects to one of our supported set-top boxes and magically transforms the encrypted signals into your favorite TV channels.

A list of currently supported set-top boxes includes:

  • The WhereverTV set top box – reinvented and better than before!
  • AppleTV – via AirPlay
  • GoogleTV devices, including Vizio’s Co-Star and Netgear’s NEOTV Prime
  • Boxee devices

 

Why Contribute?

We’ve been working on transforming television delivery for over 5 years now. We already have successful Greek and Arabic subscription services that deliver live programming over the internet. 

So why do we need your help now? Well, we are EXTREMELY close to the next stage in our plan, which is launching our US service.

The content licensing process has taken a lot longer than we anticipated, but we have now agreed to terms with more than 100 US television and audio channels and are making final arrangements with a number of others so we can launch our service in May with the best possible channel line-up. We are raising money in preparation for our launch and are looking for contributions of all sizes.

With your support, we can complete the necessary scalability modifications to our delivery platform to handle the expected overwhelming increase in subscribers (like you) and to finalize the last few content licensing agreements needed to launch our service. Specifically, your contribution will help fund:

  • Scalability enhancements to the WhereverTV Platform to handle a much larger load of traffic in anticipation of our US service launch.
  • Finalizing and optimizing our WhereverTV set top box firmware.
  • The launch our new US Service featuring at least 100 television and audio channels (scheduled for May 2013).
  • Getting even more of your favorite US television channels & video content not seen anywhere else

 

Rewards

We offer rewards for consumers, advertisers and content publishers.

 

CONSUMER REWARDS

$5 – Unlocked iPhone/iPad or Droid app. Watch free to air TV from around the world

$25 – One (1) month of Arabic, Greek or US service (a supported set top box is required)

$125 – Six (6) months of Arabic, Greek or US service (a supported set top box required) – a $150 value

$200 – EARLY BIRD: 1,000 subscriptions available. One year of US Service – a $300 value (a supported set top box is required)

$250 – One year of Arabic, Greek or US service – a $300 value

$300 – BUNDLE PACK: 1,000 available. One year of US service + WhereverTV set top box – a $425 value

$1,000 – LIFETIME SPECIAL: 1,000 subscriptions available. US service for life & a WhereverTV set top box (non-transferrable).

 

ADVERTISER REWARDS

$100 – Ten (10) 30-second commercials run of network. Sell something,  promote a church or civic group or event, give a family member a truly different birthday or present your Indiegogo video. Get the word out on TVs across the country (not web spots, but real TV spots). You deliver the video, we will deliver the commercials ($250 value)

$5,000 – SILVER ADVERTISER: Five hundred (500) 30-second commercials run of network. Can be used anytime between now and January 31, 2014. You deliver the video, we will deliver the commercials ($12,500 value).

$10,000 – GOLD ADVERTISER: One-thousand (1,000) 30-second commercials run of network. Can be used anytime between now and January 31, 2014. You deliver the video, we will deliver the commercials ($25,000 value).

 

CONTENT OWNER REWARDS

These rewards will include channel access in our new US Service.

$5,000 – 24/7 Music Channel included in our US service channel line-up for one year. Great for record labels and bands.

$10,000 – Join in Progress 24/7 channel included in our US channel line-up for one year. Perfect for global brands, niche-content owners or new television channels looking for a national US footprint.

 

FAQs

Q. What channels will be part of the US Service?

A. We will be making official announcements closer to launch but we can assure you that these are channels that you, your family, and friends are familiar with and will enjoy.

+ + + 

Q. Do you have the rights to broadcast these channels or are you taking “free channels” from an antenna and recording them?

A. No, unlike other companies who have decided to broadcast first and license second, WhereverTV is doing it the right way. We are negotiating with each network, getting their approval, and signing a contract before we can turn on each channel.

+ + +

Q. How much bandwidth does WhereverTV consume?

A. International channels are broadcast at 800kbps. US channels are broadcast at 1.1.Mbps.

+ + +

Q. What kind of connection do I need to watch WhereverTV?

A. A broadband connection of at least 3Mbps is the suggested minimum speed to receive encrypted signals from WhereverTV’s proprietary platform.

+ + +

Q. Do you offer channels in HD?

A. No. Currently, all of our channels are broadcast in standard definition. Due to bandwidth caps in place today by most ISPs, you would only be able to watch a few hours of HD programming, which requires ~5Mbps, or pay excessive “overage fees”. To see WhereverTV’s CEO discussing this exact issue at a FCC hearing, please visit:http://bit.ly/W5NBvC. As our delivery infrastructure and data compression technologies continue to evolve, we do expect live streaming television in HD will be available in the future.

+ + +

Q. How much does a set top box cost?

A. Most of the boxes that support WhereverTV cost $99.

+ + +

Q. What set top boxes work with WhereverTV?

A. The new & improved WhereverTV Receiver (available at launch), the Vizio Co-Star, Netgear NEO Prime, Boxee Box, and Apple TV (via Airplay with a compatible iPhone or iPad).

+ + +

Q. Can I watch WhereverTV outside of the USA?

A. Yes, for International content. No, for US content.

+ + +

Q. Can I watch WhereverTV on a smartphone or an iPad?

A. Yes, for international content. No, for US content, today. However, we do expect this feature to be available in the future and can turn it on within minutes, once we have the necessary broadcast rights. There are already a few US channels (and many international channels) who have given us the rights to deliver their content to any mobile device.

+ + +

Q. Is a 12 or 24 month contract required?

A. No. All of our services are month to month. However, we do offer discounts for prepaid 6 or 12 month packages.

 

Risks and challenges 

The risks and challenges related to completing our project are related to both internal and external obstacles.

Internally, we develop and deploy software onto a variety of devices, so making sure our code is properly tested, debugged, and optimized prior to launch is critical. Since we have been developing software as a company for more than 5 years now, we have the necessary processes and contingency plans in place to handle any unforeseen issues that may arise.

Externally, we face a very rapidly changing landscape that includes Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) and content owners. We cannot guarantee that every platform we intend to launch on will allow us to - mainly because each OEMs corporate goals and objectives might be in conflict with what we are trying to achieve as a company. Or maybe because an OEM signed a agreement with another company that prohibits distribution of our content on their platform. That is why we are platform agnostic. We have been approved on a number of platforms and will continue to add support for new platforms as they become available to the general public.

From a content licensing perspective, we have been working on obtaining necessary distribution rights for more than 3 years now and have learned a great deal over that time. We believe even if we do not reach terms with another content owner between now and the time we launch, we have sufficient content already aggregated to release an exciting and valuable product to our customers. However, we are confident that our content acquisition strategy will continue to pay dividends and expect even more high-profile content owners to join our channel line-up between now and our anticipated launch.

Wherever you are….WhereverTV.
WhereverTV is defining a new era in television broadcasting history for subscribers (you). Our proprietary platform delivers US and International channels (the stuff you want to watch) without the need for a credit check, long term contracts, hidden price increases, or waiting all day for someone to install hardware in your home.
We’ve gone out and licensed (yes, we legally have the rights to broadcast) some of your favorite US television channels and are now busy planning our May 2013 launch. We will be launching with at least 100 US-based television and audio channels, including some names you are very, very familiar with.
And along the way, we found something else quite interesting – there is a lot of content that you want to watch from the comfort of your living room, but many content owners have been hampered by the traditional way of broadcasting directly to television sets inside the USA, let alone the rest of the world.
WhereverTV has solved that problem by developing a television viewing platform that can be used easily by subscribers (you) and content owners (the stuff you want to watch). While designing WhereverTV, we focused on creating a simple on-screen channel guide that is fully customizable by the subscriber (yeah, that’s you, too).
 
Television on your terms
12 and 24 month contracts? Not here. Power to the people!
Credit checks? Why, didn’t your credit card company already do that?
Hardware that is impossible to install without a certified company technician? What is this, 1999?
Calling off work and waiting all day for someone to arrive to complete your order? We know how disappointed you are that you won’t have to do that here. You’ll just have to use that extra vacation day to actually, hmmm….oh yeah, VACATION.
Simply sign up at www.wherever.tv & start watching what you want in minutes.
 
How does it work?
WhereverTV beams encrypted content into your home and delivers it to your television via a wireless connection (Wi-Fi) that connects to one of our supported set-top boxes and magically transforms the encrypted signals into your favorite TV channels.
A list of currently supported set-top boxes includes:

The WhereverTV set top box – reinvented and better than before!
AppleTV – via AirPlay

GoogleTV devices, including Vizio’s Co-Star and Netgear’s NEOTV Prime


Boxee devices

story:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE (Dec 12, 2014)

Three Time Purple Heart Recipient Launches Crowdfunding Campaign for Video on Demand Service to Overseas U.S. Military.

Frederick A. Taylor, Jr., former National Commander of the Military Order of the Purple Heart and Chairman of the nonprofit organization, MOPS Networks, has launched an Indiegogo campaign to raise money for their organization's "Freedom Stream" initiative. - View Full Press Release

Why Freedom Stream?

So many Americans support our men and women in uniform. What most Americans are not aware of is that when our brave men and women deploy overseas to defend your rights and freedoms, they surrender one of their most basic rights. The same news, sports and entertainment that you watch from the comfort of our home is blocked to them from viewing overseas.

At any given time, its estimated that over 800,000 U.S. soldiers and civilians are stationed overseas on behalf of the U.S. Government and Department of Defense. Maintaining an everyday connection with our U.S. Homeland is important in helping maintain morale and quality of life for these people. Access to television programming, just like that at home, is an important way to maintain this connection. MOPS Networks is a 501(c)(3) Non Profit Organization that provides Freedom Stream - a Video on Demand service dedicated to delivering U.S. broadcasts and cable television programming to our fellow citizens serving overseas in support of our National defense.

What are we wanting to raise?

We would like to raise $1 million towards providing 300,000+ U.S. service members and their families stationed overseas with free online access to high definition, premium Video on Demand and Live IPTV broadcasts. It will also go towards providing access to the 500,000+ U.S. civilians and their families living overseas in support of our troops. Our fundraising campaign is not 'all or nothing'.

Our campaign is setup for "flexible funding", so everything we raise, even if we don't reach our goal, will still go towards purchasing great content. As a non-profit, much of our content we can purchase at little to no cost through tax deductions to, and the generosity of, content owners, broadcast networks and distributors. So please, contribute what you can. The Video on Demand site is already complete, and will go online regardless of whether we reach our goal here or not in early 2015.  

What is your donation used for?

We will use your donation to acquire content and help bring FreedomStream.TV online. We have already built out our development site at www.freedomstream.tv, and your support will help MOPS Networks' take the Freedom Stream initiative from development to full operations. With our friends at iStreamPlanet, the folks that brought the entire world the 2014 Sochi Olympics, we are preparing to bring IPTV live streaming online to FreedomStream.TV in early 2015.

Your donations, our low administrative costs, non-profit discounts offered by many of our vendors, and the help of our volunteers (thank you vendors and volunteers!), enable us to provide a full month of streamed programming to our troops overseas for free.

In January, MOPS Networks will be attending the National Association of Television Producers and Executives (NATPE) conference in Miami to secure content agreements with major content and broadcast companies.

As a non-commercial, non-profit organization providing content strictly to overseas service members, we are uniquely able to secure most content at little or no cost, while providing those owning the intellectual property rights on that content with a tax deduction at the same time. Your support will provide our troops overseas with a vast library of prime time programming.

About Us

Our mission is simple: to provide video on demand of U.S. broadcasts and IPTV live streaming of special events, free of charge to all overseas uniformed U.S. service members and family. Our services will also be provided to U.S. civilians and their families living overseas in support of our troops under the authority of the U.S. Government. 

MOPS Networks, Inc. is dully recognized by the IRS and state of Florida as a registered 501(c)(3) Non Profit Organization.

Recognition

  • IRS 501(c)(3) Not for Profit Organization (Tax Deductible)

Challenge Coin

Additional Information

  • General Questions (Contact Us)
  • Media - Interviews, Press Releases, Additional Information (Contact Us)
  • Corporate Donations (Contact Us)
  • Donations exceeding $10,000 USD (Contact Us)

MOPS Networks was founded by an amazing team of dedicated patriots and professionals.

Chairman of the Board: Frederick A. Taylor Jr. has spent his life in service to wounded and disabled veterans. With over 25 years as a director and board member for some of the largest, most influential and supportive non-profit organizations, Fred brings with him a wealth of experience. Wounded 3 times in combat, Fred is one of only 3 surviving Vietnam veterans with 3 Purple Hearts to his name. Along with nearly 20 other awards for valor and service, Fred is a former national commander for the Military Order of the Purple Heart. He has helped to raise millions of dollars over the last 15 years serving on the board of directors with the Purple Heart Foundation Services in support of veterans. He is a true hero and we are blessed to have Fred at the helm!

Executive Director, Co-Founder: Patrick Bergy, was the 3rd 40 year old to successfully complete basic training at Fort Benning. He has spent nearly 7 years in service overseas, both as an enlisted soldier in the Army, as well as a strategic civilian asset in support of the Department of Defense. With nearly 20 years’ experience in the IT field, he saw the need for fixing the problem with our overseas military being denied access to U.S. broadcasts, and with his knowledge in computers, he knew how to fix it.

President: Javier Ed Benavente is one of those guys that is literally a rocket scientist. For nearly 30 years, Ed has supported space and launch systems engineering programs and missions for NASA, the U.S. Department of Defense, and National Security Agencies. His work in simulation, visualization, and virtual reality environments for NASA programs led to work supporting commercial film and digital media projects. He served as President of Dynacs Digital Studios, which produced color enhanced versions of black and white film classics, such as “The Nutty Professor”, and digital effects for feature films and broadcast television commercials. Besides his continued consulting work in the U.S. Space and Defense, industries, Ed is currently launching a digital film effects initiative using cloud-based technologies.

Director of Technology, Co-Founder Justin Losh, has spent 3 years in Iraq providing IT support for coalition and Iraqi forces. His background in development and design has provided the foundation for the Freedom Stream infrastructure. At only 25, Justin has seen more and done more than most men twice his age. He is a true inspiration to our efforts, instrumental to our mission and a true patriot!

story:
Versatile. Sleek. Compact. PowerUp isn't just a MacBook charger, it's also a USB hub and charging station for your devices.

 

 

"PowerUp" Your Life

Leave the mountain of chargers at home and charge your MacBook, phone, tablet, and other devices all in one place. PowerUp’s 60W AC power can simultaneously charge your USB-C MacBook and up to 3 USB devices.

 

A Versatile Hub For All Your USB Devices

PowerUp lets you connect and sync all your USB devices with new USB-C model MacBooks. Mix and match up to three USB devices to get the most out of your MacBook: external keyboard or mouse, external hard drive, USB thumb drive, you name it. Don’t be limited by the new USB-C port; make everything compatible with PowerUp.

 

Faster Data Transfer

Sync your documents, music, photos, and more faster than ever with PowerUp's high-speed data transfer.

 

Charge Your Phone and Tablet 2x Faster

Unlike other USB-C hubs, PowerUp can also be used as a charging station to directly charge 3 USB devices and 1 USB-C device without going through your computer. When used as a charging station, PowerUp can even charge phones and tablets 2x faster than their standard charger!

 

Grab and Go

No more carrying around tons of dongles and chargers. PowerUp is about the same size as a standard MacBook charger and makes it easier to pack up and get moving when it’s time to go. PowerUp means more bag space and less hassle!

 

Best Value Out There 

With a pledge of $69, you can get PowerUp for the exact same price as a standard Apple MacBook USB-C charger. Why waste your money on expensive hubs or cumbersome dongles and chargers? Keep everything all in one place with PowerUp. 

 

Why Did We Create PowerUp?

Let's face it: these days we're pretty bogged down by all the chargers we have to lug around with us to keep our technology juiced up and running. Then, the new generation of MacBooks introduced an entirely new port type and brought USB-C dongles into the mix! What's more, with the new MacBook Pro's short battery life, you always have to carry a charger around anyway. So we thought, why not create a better charger that can solve all of these problems in one?

PowerUp is our streamlined solution to these pesky everyday issues that we're sure others are having too. PowerUp has simplified our own lives, and now we hope it can simplify yours too!

PowerUp=Power+Hub

 

Safety Features

PowerUp was designed with maximum durability and safety in mind. That's why we used the latest technology to protect all of your devices from overcurrent, overvoltage, and short-circuiting. In addition, PowerUp is equipped with specially designed copper cooling fins to prevent it from overheating during use.

 

Free Shipping!

We will ship FREE to the U.S. and offer worldwide shipping for just $5 extra! Moreover, PowerUp supports different voltages and will ship with the correct AC power cord for your country or region.

 

Timeline

PowerUp was created through a rigorous process of design and testing, with several different prototypes in between! Our team started with this...

And made it to THIS! After months of development, we're proud to finally introduce PowerUp!

 

Tech Specs

Power Input: 1 x AC inlet

Integrated Connectors: 1 x USB-C 3.1 cable; 3 x USB-A 3.0 ports

Voltage: 72W

Data Bandwidth: 5 Gb/s

Weight: 210 grams / 7.4 oz.

Dimensions: 8.2 cm x 8.2 cm x 2.9 cm / 3.23" x 3.23" x 1.14"

Available Colors: White, Black

 

FAQ

Can PowerUp be used without being plugged into a wall socket?

Yes and no. PowerUp was conceived to replace your MacBook charger, so for most functions it needs to be plugged into a wall socket just like any charger. However, when not connected to a power source, PowerUp can still be used for data transfer to your MacBook as well as pass-through charging of any device connected through its USB ports.

 

Is PowerUp a battery pack?

PowerUp is a new and improved MacBook charger and can charge your computer and up to three devices with traditional AC power. It does not have an independent battery of its own.

 

Does PowerUp work with my computer (i.e. 15" MacBook Pro)?

PowerUp is a USB-C type charger that was designed for the latest generation MacBook (2015+) and MacBook Pro (2016+). PowerUp has been rigorously tested with these computer models, including both the 13" and 15" versions of MacBook Pro!

 

Which colors does PowerUp come in?

PowerUp is available in white and black!

 

Can I use PowerUp in my country or region?

Yes! PowerUp is compatible with different international voltage standards and will ship with the AC power cord that corresponds to your country or region.

 

How much is shipping? Can you ship to my country or region?

Your pledge includes FREE shipping! We are able to ship to most major countries and regions; please check the "Free Shipping" section of this page for details. If you don't see your country or region listed, message us for a customized shipping quote!

 

When will PowerUp ship?

PowerUp will ship in June for Early Bird backers and in July for all backers!

 

How can I select which color/ which international AC power cord for my PowerUp?

After the campaign ends, you will be able to indicate in a survey which color and AC power cord you would like.
story_txt:
Versatile. Sleek. Compact. PowerUp isn't just a MacBook charger, it's also a USB hub and charging station for your devices.




 


 


"PowerUp" Your Life

Leave the mountain of chargers at home and charge your MacBook, phone, tablet, and other devices all in one place. PowerUp’s 60W AC power can simultaneously charge your USB-C MacBook and up to 3 USB devices.


 
A Versatile Hub For All Your USB Devices

PowerUp lets you connect and sync all your USB devices with new USB-C model MacBooks. Mix and match up to three USB devices to get the most out of your MacBook: external keyboard or mouse, external hard drive, USB thumb drive, you name it. Don’t be limited by the new USB-C port; make everything compatible with PowerUp.
 
Faster Data Transfer

Sync your documents, music, photos, and more faster than ever with PowerUp's high-speed data transfer.

 
Charge Your Phone and Tablet 2x Faster

Unlike other USB-C hubs, PowerUp can also be used as a charging station to directly charge 3 USB devices and 1 USB-C device without going through your computer. When used as a charging station, PowerUp can even charge phones and tablets 2x faster than their standard charger!
 

Grab and Go

No more carrying around tons of dongles and chargers. PowerUp is about the same size as a standard MacBook charger and makes it easier to pack up and get moving when it’s time to go. PowerUp means more bag space and less hassle!

 

Best Value Out There 

With a pledge of $69, you can get PowerUp for the exact same price as a standard Apple MacBook USB-C charger. Why waste your money on expensive hubs or cumbersome dongles and chargers? Keep everything all in one place with PowerUp. 
 
Why Did We Create PowerUp?

Let's face it: these days we're pretty bogged down by all the chargers we have to lug around with us to keep our technology juiced up and running. Then, the new generation of MacBooks introduced an entirely new port type and brought USB-C dongles into the mix! What's more, with the new MacBook Pro's short battery life, you always have to carry a charger around anyway. So we thought, why not create a better charger that can solve all of these problems in one?

PowerUp is our streamlined solution to these pesky everyday issues that we're sure others are having too. PowerUp has simplified our own lives, and now we hope it can simplify yours too!

PowerUp=Power+Hub
 
Safety Features

PowerUp was designed with maximum durability and safety in mind. That's why we used the latest technology to protect all of your devices from overcurrent, overvoltage, and short-circuiting. In addition, PowerUp is equipped with specially designed copper cooling fins to prevent it from overheating during use.

story:
CuriousEye is a small optical gadget for mobile devices with built-in camera, such as smartphones, tablets and notebooks. It allows you to secretly observe, take photos or film a variety of scenes from life without attracting attention of other people.

Ideal for shooting friends and acquaintances in various situations who are unaware of the fact that they became the heroes of your video.   The field of application of the gadget is wide and includes all sorts of situations where public shooting is difficult or impossible for some reason.   Just remember the time when you had the chance to make amazing photo or film a funny video but it was very inconvenient to do so. 

Few people dare to take pictures of strangers openly, the more this may have unpredictable consequences.

Forget about that! With CuriousEye gadget  you just have to be creative in making nice photos and video masterpieces!

CuriousEye is a simple optical system of a rectangular prism working together with a mobile device camera reflecting the view at 90 degrees in either direction. The prism is made of quality optical glass BK7 used in precision lenses and designed to ensure minimal loss of the field of view and the quality of the image. CuriousEye attaches easily on any mobile device by means of its magnetic mounting and can be easily dismantled. For that the CuriousEye set comes with the metallized sticker for the plastic surface of your mobile device though some devices with metal body do not require it. Never the less our latest prototype testing in real indicated a metallized sticker is required for all smartphones with metal surface like IPhone or HTC.

CuriousEye requires no additional software to operate.

CuriousEye attached on the tablet:

…And on the notebook:

Thanks to its simple and robust design, this tiny gadget will serve for many years because it is designed as a single monolith, with no moving parts, gentle mirrors and anything that comes into disrepair as the result of operation.
The diameter of CuriousEye  - 0,9 inch (23 mm.)  height – 0,47 inch (12 mm.)

                              

The gadget prototypes are in Black and White:

We think about customizing. The gadget color scheme will be of your choice depending on the color of your mobile device. Besides, we are going to produce CuriousEye Advanced gadgets with superior optical performance and antireflection coating (optical glass BAK 4 prism) 

Especially for iPhone owners  we developed the modification of the gadget to fit the iPhone design and color scheme -  Meet CuriousEye for iPhone. This one looks very stylish and has the same performance as previous models.

                                                           

You can choose different sets of one, two, or five gadgets with normal or superior lens in blister package. Also you can choose the gadgets' color - Black/White or both.

story:
About Nerd Out

Nerd Out is your one stop shop for all nerdy events! Gone are the days of having to search the web for all your events. Now, all the information will be centrally located in one place, the Nerd Out app. It's a safe place for adults and kids alike to discover nerd inspired events in their local areas while also showcasing hundreds of events from around the world. Moved to a new area? Going on vacation? Find nerd events wherever you're located. Included is the ability to build your own schedule, set alerts for events, and connect with friends. 

Our Goal: Unite nerds around the globe.

Why Should You Help?

I know being a nerd is an essential part of my life, as I am sure it is in yours. That’s why Nerd Out is important. This app is all about you! Nerd Out will not only help you discover and keep track of events, it'll help you connect and make friends with fellow nerds. The Nerd world is always growing. With all the new and interesting events out there it's hard to keep track! I need your help to fund this!

Why is There a Need for This App?

Have you ever tried to find information on nerdy events? I'm sure you have. There's bits and bobs scattered everywhere (ie. Facebook, websites, twitter). But nothing centrally located. From the extensive research I've done, there is no other app or website like Nerd Out. This will be a one of a kind tool for you to use globally. It will also be available as a FREE app! Yep, that's right FREE!

Do You Have an Event?

Submitting your event to the app is free! Submissions will be taken by email until the app is completed. Events must be public events (ie. not your grandmother's birthday party) and be nerd related (ie. Pop culture related, comic books, TV shows, films, etc.)  

nerdoutapp@gmail.com

Nerd Out Cares About Your Security!

Did you know we have safety features build into Nerd Out? With our app there will be the ability to share your schedule with your friends. This will work by the use of codes generated by the app. If I want to share my schedule with a friend, all I have to do is select the 'add friend' option and the app will generate a code for you. Text the code to your friend and you're all set and connected! That code will only last 24 hours. 

Additionally, there will be a verification process for events submitted to the app. I'm sure some of you have heard of Dashcon, well our verification process is to weed out anything of that sort. We aim to do our best to bring you the best of nerd events.

Where is the Money Going?

The money will be used to create a beta version of the app. Funds raised will be used to pay the developers coding the app. Once a beta version is up and running, the money generated from ad revenue (ads will be placed at the bottom of the app) will be used for further versions of the app. All ads featured will be nerd related. Some of the money raised is allotted for perks such as t-shirts and other nerd-tastic souvenirs.

Would You Like to Advertise on Nerd Out?

Ads will be placed at the bottom of the app. All ads featured must be nerd related. Make sure to check out the Clone Club and Bruce Wayne Perks for deals on ad space! They are one time only deals for the campaign. First come first served.

Why 10k?

Why has the goal changed? I'm going with another company that has worked out a better deal. It's smaller company that I'm going to work one on one with. I will also now be doing some of the coding myself as I've had friends that reached out to help show me how. 

I've spoken to seasoned app developers about Nerd Out and they estimate it will take $25-27k. This includes the development, design, and marketing costs.The other $3k is to provide perks to supporters like you.

What Happens After the App is Funded?

I'll get to work with the developers building the app. It will take a few months for it to be developed, coded, and tested. I hope to have it by late fall or early winter. The beta version will be iPhone only, with android to follow. The reasoning is because iPhone apps are less expensive to code. Supporters will be invited to participate in the development process through a series of feedback surveys and questionnaires. As a supporter, your input will help to shape the development of the product after this campaign finishes. So you, as a supporter, can influence the Nerd Out experience. I'll also begin to take submissions for events at this time as well.

The Team (Me, myself, and I)

My name is Michelle Jensen, or Elle, as some of you may know me from my blog Your Friend Elle. Yes, my secret identity is out! I’m a blogger, a fangirl, a cosplayer, and, most importantly, a nerd. I am also the creator of this new app, Nerd Out. How did I come up with the idea? I was getting flustered organizing and tracking all the dates for different events, and it hit me! What I needed was a one-stop shop to help me keep organized, and Nerd Out was born! *BOOM*

My first love is and will always be Disney; I'm a Disney dork! My first official fandom was Buffy, though to be honest, in those days I don't think we even had the word 'fandom'. From there I went on to be a Whovian, Sherlockian, Oncer, Clone Club-er, and adding more all the time!

What Do You Get for Your Money?

Besides being part of creating an awesome app, there’s all kinds of great stuff! We've got party tickets, t-shirts (mens & womens), and much more! See the official artwork just below done by http://amandacorbettart.com/. Artwork available as group or separate characters.

Still not sure? I'll be making appearances at SDCC so feel free to ask me as many questions as you may have. I'll be on the Jet Set Nerd panel on Thursday, July 9th. Other appearances posted on the updates page. 

SDCC Panel Jet Set Nerds! (update)

Thursday, July 9th, I was honored to be a part of the Jet Set Nerds panel were I was able to share with the Comic Con community the Nerd Out App! If any of you have attended Comic Con you've probably used their app to navigate the many marvelous panels they have to showcase. Nerd Out will be similar in design, however we'll be focusing on events 365 days a year worldwide! So no matter where you are, you can find events near you! As a note, the app will not feature panels already listed in the Comic Con app, or other convention's panels. We will be bringing you localized events instead.

Please note that Nerd Out is not affiliated with San Diego Comic Con International.

Other Ways to Support

Everyone is nerdy about something, so please tweet, post, reddit, and email to get the word out and help produce the greatest nerd app ever!

Share the campaign URL, http://igg.me/at/nerdoutapp

Tweet your support on Twitter, post your support on Facebook, use Instagram, Google Plus, Reddit, raven, TARDIS phone, owl, bat signal....

Follow @nerdoutapp for updates.

Please use the #NerdOutApp hashtag in your tweets to create awareness and to generate buzz around the campaign.

Please use all the sharing options Indiegogo has to offer. Let's Nerd Out together.

https://twitter.com/nerdoutapp

https://www.facebook.com/Nerdoutapp
https://instagram.com/nerdoutapp

Questions? Feel free to email me at nerdoutapp@gmail.com

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Video Credits

Directed & Written by: Michelle Jensen
Cinematography by: Michaela Dehning & Breanna Sheridan
Sound Mixed by: Cory Yee

Cast

(in order of appearance)
Chris Seeling                          http://seelingcat.tumblr.com
Amber Gatsby                       https://instagram.com/ambgatsby
Flux Capacitors                     http://www.thefluxcapacitors.com
                                                   https://www.facebook.com/fluxcapacitorsband
Julie Ann                                 https://twitter.com/xfsista
                                                   https://instagram.com/xfsista
Nathaniel J. Peinado           https://www.facebook.com/docintheboxcosplay
                                                  https://instagram.com/doc_in_the_box
                                                   https://twitter.com/doc_in_the_box1
Michelle Jensen                   http://www.yourfriendelle.com
Anastasia Washington      http://www.anastasiawashington.com
Curiousjoi                              https://twitter.com/curiousjoi
                                                   https://instagram.com/curiousjoi
