story:
Hello IndieGoGo! 

We are a small team from the National University of Singapore (NUS).  After spending half a year in Shenzhen designing, refining our idea, and fixing botched prototypes, we are very excited to finally introduce to you the Signature Pro right here on Indiegogo!

Stretch Goal

To our dearest backers, thank you for your support thus far! We believe that there is always room for improvement, and so, we are introducing our stretch goals as our next milestones!

S$ 50,000 - 2m HDMI Cable

S$ 70,000 - 2m HDMI Cable + USB Type C to 4 Ports USB 3.0 Adaptor Hub

Testimonial

Who's talking about the Signature Pro:

"The Flujo Signature Pro is the world’s first USB-C multifunctional docking with SSD enclosure for Windows and Mac systems" - Geeky Gadgets

"The built quality of the Signature Pro seems to be on par with the best USB-C hubs on the market" - Beebom

"If you need access to all your data wherever you are, the Signature Pro SSD Enclosure USB-C Hub by Flujo will give it to you" - Gadget Flow

"The Flujo Signature Pro is remarkably thin at just 10.45mm wide, which means its ideal for traveling light" - Ideaing

 

Red Dot Award 2020

Our Flujo Signature Pro has been awarded Red Dot Award for Product Design 2020! he Red Dot Design Award is a prestigious international product design award given by the Design Zentrum Nordrhein Westfalen in Essen, Germany. Since 1955, this prestigious award has been conferred upon many great products and is regarded as a seal of quality for good design. The Signature Pro has won the jury over with its innovative concept and high design quality, prevailing against thousands of submitted products. We are honored to have been chosen!

 

 

Who is the Signature Pro for?

When designing this product, we had a few target users in mind. From corporate individuals, entrepreneurs and photographers to gamers, YouTubers and students, the Signature Pro is simply for anyone who owns a USB-C powered laptop and are looking to store and access large and valuable data anytime and anywhere, without having to carry around messy dongles.

 

M.2 SSD Enclosure

 

With so many dongles already available in the market, you wonder if it's necessary to add another dongle into your repertoire of computer accessories. That's why we have decided to take it up a notch, and create something that has not been seen yet in computer accessories: an SSD enclosure together with your favorite ports. Compatible with the NVMe M.2 SSD, there will definitely be more space to store big files. 

 

 7-in-1 USB C Docking Hub

 

In addition to the SSD enclosure, we have selected popular output ports (USB-C, USB-A, HDMI, MicroSD, SD), for all your USB-C-powered laptops (e.g. Apple Macbooks, Lenovo ThinkPads, HP Elitebooks, Dell Latitudes, etc.).  

 

With the Signature Pro, effortlessly connect your laptop to a HDMI display during presentations at work or in school, read and retrieve photos/videos/files from USB-C, USB-A drives and SD/microSD memory cards, while keeping your laptop charging through the USB-C power delivery.

 

 

⚡️ Output:

  •  HDMI Version 2.0: 4K@60Hz 
  •  SD/TF: Transfer rate of 5Gbps (Support SD and Micro SD simultaneously)
  •  USB-A: 2 X USB3.1 Gen 2 10Gbps and 1 X USB2.0, 480Mbps 
  •  M.2 NVMe SSD Enclosure: M Key, B&M Key (Compatible with 2230, 2242, 2260, 2280 M.2 NVMe SSD) 

⚡️ Input: USB-C PD@100W

⚡️ Enclosure Material: Aluminium 

⚡️ Colour: Space Grey / Silver / Midnight Green 

 

Available Colors

All backers will get to choose not just Space Grey, but Midnight Green (think iPhone 11 Pro Max!) and Silver as well.

Large storage and faster data access speeds with M.2 NVMe SSD

 

Enjoy the benefits of an SSD,  such as more storage space for important files and faster data access speed for less waiting time. And instead of splurging on a separate dongle for your SSD, now you can have it all-in-one with other essential ports.

 

Power Delivery to your devices

 

Gone are the days of disconnecting your laptop charger so that the USB-C port can be freed up to access files on other devices. The Signature Pro expands your laptop potential, allowing you to simultaneously connect your devices while keeping your laptop charging through the UCB-C power delivery. 

 

Connect your laptop to the big screen with HDMI 2.0

 

Connect your laptop to the big screen via the HDMI port to deliver engaging presentations, enjoy an enhanced gaming experience, and stream your favorite Netflix shows with your family and friends. No more interruptions in-between to run off and charge your device, as the Signature Pro keeps your laptop at full power.

 

 

SD/MicroSD card readers for easy access to photos on-the-go

 

Read SD/MicroSD cards as fast as up to 5Gbps. Instantly drag and drop photos from your SD/MicroSD card to your devices in a matter of seconds.

 

Access external drives with USB 3.1

 

With 2 USB 3.1 ports, transfer data quickly between your USB drives.

 

Connect your portable accessories with USB 2.0 

 

Connect peripherals like mouse devices, webcams, and keyboards, without having to disconnect your laptop from charging.

 

Cost-Saving Functionalities

Owning multiple dongles could potentially eat your wallet out, not to mention how much of a chore to carry them on the go. The Signature Pro combines most ports that you'll need to give you a product that's undoubtedly worth your money.

 

 

Design Concept

 

 

Innovation forms the core of the product while maintaining the qualities of simplicity, durability and fuss-free experience. We seek out the most suitable materials for the Signature Pro with ergonomic designs.

 

Chic and Portable

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

One of the design considerations was for Signature Pro's portability. Its passport size frame fits easily into your palm and back jeans pocket.  

 

 

Behind-the-Scenes

 

 

 

 

Here's what you will receive in the mail. For every order of the Signature Pro, we will throw in a complementary stylish black pouch, designed to help you organize your Signature Pro, your cables, and any miscellaneous items. The exterior of each pouch has a smooth black matte surface to match your professional image. Each unit also comes with a 2 year warranty period that we will honor on every Signature Pro sold worldwide.

 

 

Timeline

After the campaign ends, we will immediately ship the units out. The Signature Pro will reach your doorsteps around June, With the current COVID-19 situation, many are staying indoors and working from home. The Flujo Signature Pro will be the perfect companion to up your efficiency during stay-in days. Save yourself, and your company mates all the hassle. Considering this, please understand that there might be some delay in shipment reaching your destination.

 

About Us

 

 

This is us. The A-team consists of Aaron, Fatim, Helen and Karyn. We have been very fortunate to be supported by an excellent team of engineers in Flujo. Prior to the Signature Pro, Flujo has developed a range of electronics that have received a great response. Now, with the Signature Pro, join us on our journey as we contribute our part in developing a new range of innovative products to be enjoyed by today's tech-savvy society! Your support would make our day, really.

 

Why Indiegogo?

We're not here to earn money, We are here to join a fantastic community of like-minded individuals that values innovation and efficiency while maintaining simplicity. Indiegogo is a supportive community that actively seeks to bring exciting ideas to life. That's why we chose to campaign on Indiegogo. Look forward to more interesting projects with us, as this is only the first of many projects that we will be embarking on!

 

Join Our Community

Follow us @flujo_technology (Instagram, Facebook, & website) to stay in touch about new events & products.

 

Thank youuuuu <3 

A million thank yous for supporting our first Indiegogo campaign! We treasure every single one of your pledges and we will do our utmost to ensure that the Signature Pro reaches your hand in tip-top condition.

story:
You have the right to protect your privacy. We're creating the technology to put you back in control.

At Make It Private, we've developed the most secure online communication tool ever invented. We use tokenization – the same core technology that banks use to protect your credit cards online – but adapted for two-way and multi-party communication in the cloud. 

Three simple steps:

   1. Right-click any message or field in Facebook, Gmail, or other websites. 

   2. Select Make It Private. 

   3. Relax. 

Only your authorized readers will have access to your sensitive data.

We don’t collect or track your personal information. If anyone comes asking about you, we’ll have nothing to offer but randomized bits of data.

The less we know about you, the better we can serve you.


Everyone has a reason for privacy in the cloud. Listen to what some of our "every day" fans are saying! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jN82Gy4PyrA Or watch the videos in our Gallery. 


For more details, go to Make It Private.


Our Campaign: we've been developing this patented product for more than two years. In the past six months, the stakes have been raised. Businesses violate your privacy every day because collecting, using and sharing your information is a justifiable way to make more money. And as Edward Snowden has shown, government agencies like the NSA routinely cross the line with their data collection practices.

At Make It Private, we've stepped up the urgency of bringing our revolutionary product to market. We've decided to release it to consumers, rather than exclusively to companies or agencies, as a way to level the playing field. We're on track to release a fully tested beta version to you in December.

We're conducting this campaign for three reasons: (1) to give you the chance to be an early user; (2) to raise awareness and grass roots support in the event that we encounter opposition; and (3) to finance our final testing and put us on a firmer financial footing so that we're prepared for any contingency when we launch.


What You Get: your support is vital to us, but it's also great for you. Check out the rewards we have for contributors!


Maximize Our Impact: if you like what you see here and on our website, we have one more request: Help us get the word out! Use the IndieGoGo share tools! Make some noise! Help us restore the Internet to a trusted environment!

Take Back Control.

story:
Smoovie is a video stabiliser that fits in your pocket, is easy to use for all abilities and the most affordable option for recording smooth video on the go!

Take it anywhere and everywhere, and when inspiration strikes you'll have it to record great video to keep and share forever. Use Smoovie at home, on the go or on your next adventure!

Here's how using Smoovie compares to handheld.

Traditional video stabilisers are much bigger and heavier, with tricky and time consuming set up. Instead of relying on weight and friction Smoovie cleverly uses magnetic force, allowing anyone to record smooth video without all that bulk.

We've made Smoovie really simple easy to set up. Just pull out the telescopic counterweight balance to the marker for your smartphone or GoPro, and Smoovie calibrates itself! Aaand action!

Be more creative with your shots! The handle is adjustable so you can get the shots you want. Get up high or go down low!

Plus with a more natural handgrip there's no more holding your smartphone at odd angles so no more wrist ache!

 

The patent-pending gimbal design uses two lightweight but super strong neodymium magnets. This magnetic attraction is what keeps shots steady by reducing the shaking created when you walk or move. Go where you like and record fantastic looking smooth videos!

 

Compact size 19cm x 4cm x 3.5cm (and extends up to 11cm).

Weight 125 grams (4.4 oz), that's less than a Big Mac!

Holds All popular Apple, Android and Windows smartphones up to 86mm in width and 225 grams in weight. Plus all GoPro models with Smoovie Plus.

Materials Two strong neodymium N42 magnets, durable ABS and acetal plastic body, protective TPE rubber pads and long-lasting stainless steel telescopic tubes.

 

It's not quite as good as the large, heavy and expensive equipment that professionals use. But we're excited about Smoovie because it's affordable, easy for everyone and can be taken everywhere. When inspiration strikes, you'll have it! 

For GoPro users you can capture all of the action with Smoovie Plus. With the Smoovie Plus option you'll get Smoovie for smartphones with an additional interchangeable adapter to use with your GoPro tripod mount.

 

Back us today and get your Smoovie in June. To say thanks you'll get Smoovie and Smoovie Plus at our special preorder prices. 

Estimated RRP is £19.99 for Smoovie and £21.99 for Smoovie Plus. 

 

After five months of development and four rounds of rapid prototyping using 3d printing, machining and duplication techniques, our design has been tested in different scenarios and we’re really pleased with the outcome. Currently the design is going through a final iteration to refine the aesthetics so that Smoovie looks and feels great too. 

In January this year Alex travelled to China to discuss the manufacture of the Smoovie project with factories the team had long term relationships with already. After comparing the quality of prototypes produced and manufacturing processes, a selection was made.

We are confident that the manufacturer we have chosen is best suited to help us get Smoovie ready for mass production so that we can deliver a product that satisfies our requirements and more importantly that you'll be happy with.

We are an experienced team based in London and HK who have designed, developed and delivered products  on a global scale. We know how to bring innovative ideas to life and take them to market. 

Our product designer Alex Kalogroulis has worked on many innovational designs. In his early years he worked alongside British Inventor Sir Clive Sinclair on the award-winning A-Bike which is displayed in London’s Design Museum. Alex has also led design on other products like Sea Scooters and Smart Touch kitchen gadgets. He also teaches future designers on the Innovation Design Engineering master’s course at London’s Royal College of Art. 

We're so excited to see what you'll do with Smoovie. Let's keep in touch, join us on Twitter and Facebook. 

If you like us and want to share about Smoovie here's our press kit. We like you too!

Need anything else or just want to chat? Please email sales@pocketsmoovie.com

SHIPPING NOW

We're excited to have made Smoovie and ship them all over the world! If you've already got yours please take a look a the videos we made to help you get started with Smoovie.

story:
Intro...

Welcome to our CleO project. Our mission ( should you accept it )  is to create a family of smart TFT display controllers that can be easily programmed by almost anyone to give professional looking HMI / GUI's with no prior knowledge of complex graphics programming or mathematics. Mission impossible? No, we don't think so...

With extensive tutorials ( 20 Chapters covering over 80 topics ) + 20 DIY projects included to show you how, CleO35 ( the 3.5in display version ) allows both hobbyists and professionals alike to add a HVGA ( 320x480 pixel ) resistive touch TFT display GUI to their Arduino UNO projects. We are delighted to offer our backers a very special price of  US$49 (+ US$10 postage )  - around 25% discount on the retail price and similar discounts on the accessories.

After meeting and exceeding our target funding we are pleased to announce that the following extra incentives have been awarded as a result -

1. A free 8GB micro SD card pre-loaded with tutorials and utilities now included with every CleO for our campaign backers.

2. A free resistive stylus pen for all - you know you'll need it!

3. We've upgraded the Camera sensor from a 2M pixel unit to a 5M pixel unit at no extra charge to our backers who have included one in their Perks selection.

Please see our updates for more details...

Why Arduino?

Well, it's fine developing a great display solution, but in real life you often need to connect the display to the outside world with sensors, switches, communications etc. Arduino is a great choice to bridge a display as there is a huge amount of peripherals ( shields in Arduino parlance ), tutorials and help already available for that platform. so, why re-invent the wheel? If you combine it with a FCC/CE certified UNO or compatible ( like our NerO for example ) well there is no reason it cannot be used for commercial projects as well as hobbyist ( Maker ) projects or **both**. One advantage of NerO over UNO is that NerO has an efficient on-board switcher PSU which can deliver 5V at >1A current, great for when you are using the onboard audio and camera as well as the display. NerO can be supplied with long pins ( like an Arduino Shield ) so that CleO sits underneath NerO leaving the Shield IO connectors free for further expansion. Take a look at the photo below.

Why UNO?

Easy choice actually, most common Arduino Shields today are UNO (5V ) compatible. Some alternatives offer greater computing power but at the expense of backward compatibility or are restricted to 3V Shields only. We offload most of the extreme computational tasks, not only GUI but file system, camera, sound etc to the 310 DMIPs FT903 MCU , so the firmware footprint on the UNO is low, leaving it free to do what it is best suited for.

What's Special?

  • Anti-Aliased graphics throughout for much finer image quality with no "jaggies".
  • Smooth animations at up to 60 frames/second.
  • Portrait and Landscape modes supported
  • Inbuilt PWM Audio and speaker amplifier.
  • File system supports up to 8 simultaneous file operations.
  • Easy to use Resistive touch.
  • Fast direct file transfers between micro-SD/eFlash and the Graphics subsystem without using Arduino UNO resources. 
  • Panel Mount Bezel Included.

CleO35 - Architecture

CleO35 - Hardware Features

FRONT VIEW

CleO35 with NerO Installed

Look at that - what a great fit and with the Arduino Shield connectors readily accessible. 

CleO Tutorials

The CleO tutorials consist of 20 chapters covering over 80 topics in detail. No specialist graphics language of mathematics knowledge is required to program CleO. The tutorials should be complete around mid-May by the time first shipments begin. They will be published on the internet and as a free pdf e-book download. Here are the chapters and some photos & screen shots - we will update these during the campaign and beyond. Tutorials and Projects require an NerO or other UNO compatible board to be added to CleO. 

CHAPTER 1 - CLEO INSTALLATION 
CHAPTER 2 - DRAWING STRINGS 
CHAPTER 3 - DISPLAYING BITMAPS AND ICONS 
CHAPTER 4 - DRAWING LINES 
CHAPTER 5 - PLOTTING POINTS 
CHAPTER 6 - DRAWING CIRCLES 
CHAPTER 7 - DRAWING RECTANGLES 
CHAPTER 8 - DRAWING NEEDLES 
CHAPTER 9 - SETTING GRAPHICS CONTEXT 
CHAPTER 10 - SCREEN CONTROL 
CHAPTER 11 - AUDIO PRIMITIVES 
CHAPTER 12 - VIDEO PRIMITIVES 
CHAPTER 13 - TOUCH PRIMITIVES 
CHAPTER 14 - CleO UTILITY WIDGETS 
CHAPTER 15 - DEVICE CONTROL 
CHAPTER 16 - CleO CAMERA 
CHAPTER 17 - CleO FILE SYSTEM 
CHAPTER 18 - BUILT-IN FT81X WIDGETS 
CHAPTER 19 - MISC COMMANDS 
CHAPTER 20 - CLEO RESOURCE UTILITY

CleO Projects

Over 20 Fun DIY Projects included - with more planned for after the campaign. Like the tutorials, these projects should be complete around mid-May by the time first shipments begin and will be made available for all on the internet. Here is the current Project list and some photos & screen shots - again we will update these during the campaign and beyond. Projects usually require some extra hardware ( not included ) but are commonly available in the Arduino community. 

PROJECT 1 - BASIC AUDIO SOUNDS DEMO [ Uses : Speaker]
PROJECT 2 - A DTMF DIALLER [ Uses : Speaker ]
PROJECT 3 - AN ANALOG THERMOMETER [ Uses : DS18B20 ]
PROJECT 4 - RETRO DIGITAL CLOCK ( NIXIE TYPE ) [ Uses :DS3231 RTC ]
PROJECT 5 - DIGITAL CLOCK - 7 SEGMENT STYLE DISPLAY [ Uses : DS3231 RTC ]
PROJECT 6 - A TRADITIONAL ANALOG CLOCK  [ Uses : DS3231 RTC ]
PROJECT 7 - A MODERN STYLE ANALOG CLOCK [ Uses : DS3231 RTC ]
PROJECT 8 - AN ANALOG STOP WATCH [ Uses : None ]
PROJECT 9 - AN ANALOG TIMER [ Uses : Speaker ]
PROJECT 10 - A DIGITAL VOLTMETER [ Uses : Potentiometer ]
PROJECT 11 - AN ANALOG VOLTMETER [ Uses : Potentiometer ]
PROJECT 12 - A SPEEDOMETER DISPLAY [ Uses : Potentiometer ]
PROJECT 13 - TEMPERATURE, HUMIDITY AND LIGHT DATA LOGGER [ Uses : DT22 + LDR ]
PROJECT 14 - POST-IT-NOTE LIKE SCRIBBLE MESSAGE PAD [ Uses : SD Card ]
PROJECT 15 - A SPECTRUM ANALYZER DISPLAY [ Uses : Electret Microphone Amplifier - MAX9814 ]
PROJECT 16 - AN ECG ( HEART RATE ) DISPLAY [ Uses : MAX30100 Heart rate click, Speaker ]
PROJECT 17 - A DIGITAL FM RADIO [ Uses : FM Tuner Breakout - Si4703, Speaker]
PROJECT 18 - A STILL PHOTO CAMERA
[ Uses : Camera, SD Card ]
PROJECT 19 - VIDEO RECORDER/PLAYBACK
[ Uses : Camera, SD Card]
PROJECT 20 - A VOICE MESSAGE RECORDER [ Uses :Electret Microphone Amplifier - MAX9814, Speaker, SD Card ]

** AND MORE TO COME**

CleO UTILITY WIDGETS  

CleO comes complete with a set of professional utility widgets which are use for data entry and can automate common tasks with just a couple of lines of code. These are - 
1. Color Picker 
2. Set DateTime 
3. AlphaNumeric Keyboard Input 
4. Numeric KeyPad Input 
5. Sketch Pad Input

Tutorial and Project Excerpts 

A selection of what we are working on ...

PhotoGraphs

Videos

Animated Circles Short


CleO Accessories

1. NerO - the Energy Efficient Arduino UNO Compatible

Our energy efficient enhanced Arduino Compatible board delivers >1A current at 5V without overheating. The long pin version supplied allows CleO to be discretely mounted beneath NerO, leaving the Shield headers fully exposed for IO expansion.

 https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1218034479/nero-an-energy-efficient-arduino-uno-compatible-de/description

2. CleO Speaker
Adding a baffle/enclosure to a speaker greatly improves the sound/volume of the product. We couldn't find one we liked so we made our own! Features a 56mm,8ohm 0.5W(RMS )/1W(Peak ) internal speaker in an attractive enclosure. Includes 12in matching cable for CleO speaker out.

3. CleO Camera
A 2M pixel CMOS camera add-on for your CleO projects.

4. CleO 9V-1A DC Power Adapter
This little beauty satisfies the various UK/EU/USA regulations including the latest energy saving standards. With interchangeable plug tops you can take these anywhere.

After Indiegogo - what happens next ?

After shipping the Indiegogo perks, we plan to move the product into retail ( at a different price of course ), so yes it will be available post-Indiegogo as well. 
We are planning to add more tutorials and fun projects over the coming year ( and beyond ) so your early investment in CleO is well worthwhile. There may be some firmware upgrades required to update CleO to the latest capabilities but they will be backward compatible with earlier releases and easy to upgrade via our USB DFU ( Device Firmware Upgrade ) port. Further tutorials, projects, utilities and firmware upgrades will all be downloadable from our dedicated CleO site.

Risks and Challenges

We are a well known technology company with a good reputation to uphold. We are very experienced with product design, we've built and thoroughly tested the prototype so we are confident in the design. The development and tooling costs are paid for, the funding required is purely to cover the costs of the production runs. We've chosen a top quality manufacturer who has successfully delivered on other crowdfunded projects such as FlowPaw and with whom we work very closely, so we do not anticipate any production issues. The components we use are readily available in bulk so we don't anticipate any supply issues. In summary, we believe the risk in backing this project is extremely low.

There is a huge amount of ( Arduino ) software and ( FT903 ) firmware development required  to provide the projects and tutorials required for this project and it's an ongoing task. However, software updates can easily be provided over the internet and the firmware can easily be upgraded over the USB DFU interface using the supplied utility software.
story_txt:
Intro...





Welcome to our CleO project. Our mission ( should you accept it )  is to create a family of smart TFT display controllers that can be easily programmed by almost anyone to give professional looking HMI / GUI's with no prior knowledge of complex graphics programming or mathematics. Mission impossible? No, we don't think so...
With extensive tutorials ( 20 Chapters covering over 80 topics ) + 20 DIY projects included to show you how, CleO35 ( the 3.5in display version ) allows both hobbyists and professionals alike to add a HVGA ( 320x480 pixel ) resistive touch TFT display GUI to their Arduino UNO projects. We are delighted to offer our backers a very special price of  US$49 (+ US$10 postage )  - around 25% discount on the retail price and similar discounts on the accessories.
After meeting and exceeding our target funding we are pleased to announce that the following extra incentives have been awarded as a result -
1. A free 8GB micro SD card pre-loaded with tutorials and utilities now included with every CleO for our campaign backers.
2. A free resistive stylus pen for all - you know you'll need it!
3. We've upgraded the Camera sensor from a 2M pixel unit to a 5M pixel unit at no extra charge to our backers who have included one in their Perks selection.
Please see our updates for more details...
Why Arduino?
Well, it's fine developing a great display solution, but in real life you often need to connect the display to the outside world with sensors, switches, communications etc. Arduino is a great choice to bridge a display as there is a huge amount of peripherals ( shields in Arduino parlance ), tutorials and help already available for that platform. so, why re-invent the wheel? If you combine it with a FCC/CE certified UNO or compatible ( like our NerO for example ) well there is no reason it cannot be used for commercial projects as well as hobbyist ( Maker ) projects or **both**. One advantage of NerO over UNO is that NerO has an efficient on-board switcher PSU which can deliver 5V at >1A current, great for when you are using the onboard audio and camera as well as the display. NerO can be supplied with long pins ( like an Arduino Shield ) so that CleO sits underneath NerO leaving the Shield IO connectors free for further expansion. Take a look at the photo below.
Why UNO?
Easy choice actually, most common Arduino Shields today are UNO (5V ) compatible. Some alternatives offer greater computing power but at the expense of backward compatibility or are restricted to 3V Shields only. We offload most of the extreme computational tasks, not only GUI but file system, camera, sound etc to the 310 DMIPs FT903 MCU , so the firmware footprint on the UNO is low, leaving it free to do what it is best suited for.
What's Special?

Anti-Aliased graphics throughout for much finer image quality with no "jaggies".
Smooth animations at up to 60 frames/second.
Portrait and Landscape modes supported
Inbuilt PWM Audio and speaker amplifier.
File system supports up to 8 simultaneous file operations.
Easy to use Resistive touch.
Fast direct file transfers between micro-SD/eFlash and the Graphics subsystem without using Arduino UNO resources. 
Panel Mount Bezel Included.

CleO35 - Architecture

CleO35 - Hardware Features



FRONT VIEW

CleO35 with NerO Installed

Look at that - what a great fit and with the Arduino Shield connectors readily accessible.

story:
Short Summary

We want to educate people about the differences between Dolry and Bluetooth wireless music adapters and what makes Dolry better! 

Money is needed to increase production to keep up with demand and also increase the cloud player and internet radio capabilities! That's where you the contributor can help to make the difference! 

Product Description

Dolry – 30-pin adapter compatible with AirPlay, DLNA, Wi-Fi and Wi-Fi Direct

Transform your 30-pin dock speaker into a wireless HiFi System with the Dolry 30-pin adapter, compatible with AirPlay, DLNA and Miracast.

Dolry is a brand new generation of wireless music receivers – no more pairing issues, low operation range, poor sound quality or limited compatibility with the most popular music docks – both digital and analog.

Dolry is a small gadget, not wider than an iPhone, that you connect to the 30-pin connector of your HiFi Stereo. Once connected, Dolry sets up an WiFi Direct network – no router needed. Simply connect your f.e. iPhone to this network and stream music via WiFi in full music quality with AirPlay and an operation range of 30 meters.

You can also connect Dolry to your home WiFi network router. All devices running on iOS, Android and Windows connected to the same network will then be able to stream music to the Dolry unit via AirPlay, DLNA and Miracast while connected to the Internet at the same time. Steam music from your favorite cloud music vendor, such as Spotify, or you favorite Internet Radio App.

Dolry also supports the multi room functionality. This means that you can stream music to several Dolry units at the same time. Using iTunes on a Mac or PC you can stream to all your docks simultaneously.

Dolry stream music with lossless quality unlike competing Bluetooth devices which compress and thus lower the sound quality up to 3 times. Dolry’s technology also has a much greater range than Bluetooth. Bluetooth only offers a range of 10 meters, while Dolry has the range of 30 meters on WiFi Direct and when Dolry is connected to your home WiFi network, the range expands to the same range that your router can handle.

After Apple’s removal of the 30-pin connector from the iPhone 5 and future products, all docking stations with the 30-pin connector have suddenly become obsolete. The Apple lightning adapter is one solution, but it is visually unattractive and clumsy to use. Dolry is designed to solve this problem, and also adds the tremendous feature to make your HiFi Stereo wireless.

Thanks to Dolry’s WiFi Direct and WiFi technology, you can both use Dolry in your home, in your car or at the beach.

Dolry also supports playback of Internet radio stations, using our iOS and Android App. From the App, you can choose a list of Internet radio stations. The Dolry unit will then start streaming music from your chosen station. The streaming is not dependent on the iOS device, so once playback has started you can leave your home or take a call without playback interruptions. Dolry will support a wider range of radio stations soon throughout the world.

Dolry® has been designed with the premise in mind that sound is all about simplicity, It is simple and seamless to setup Dolry®.

Just connect Dolry® to the WiFi network and follow the straightforward instructions on the Dolry® control App. The process of setup is only necessary the first time – once done just go ahead and play music from all compatible devices. No more headaches of pairing your devices as required in Bluetooth devices.

And there is no cumbersome power supply needed to charge your Dolry®. The device simply uses the power supply of the docking station.

Download the free Dolry® Control App. There are a few simple steps to connect Dolry® to your WiFi network, and choose and manage your settings, all wirelessly. No more messing about with cables or flicking through complicated manuals.

No 30-pin music Dock?

Don’t have a 30-pin on your favorite speaker system but still want to enjoy the freedom of wireless audio streaming?

Simply connect the optional 30-pin to AUX 3.5mm + USB gold plated cable and use Dolry with any 3.5mm AUX input. Power is supplied via USB and audio delivered through 3.5mm AUX jack.

THE PURPOSE OF INDIEGOGO:

What the money is needed for is to increase production to keep up with demand and also to increase the cloud player and internet radio capability. Plus we’d like to educate even more people about the superior technology with this product which uses AirPlay and DLNA compared to less superior products that work with Bluetooth technology, by increasing advertising! This all costs plenty of money, and this too will increase production! One other thing the money would be used for is to continue to improve the product, the “Dolry Hi-Fi Stone”

For more information please go to the

Dolry website http://www.Dolry.com

Or

Dolry, a product by C4 Electronics http://c4e.se/

                                      

Special thanks to the Los Angeles based Rock band “Revolver” for the use of their songs “Had it With You” and “Courageous Minds”


The Impact

The Dolry is a better choice of a wireless receiver because it runs on DLNA, AirPlay & Miracast! So it's Wi-Fi not bluetooth which cuts down sound quality while Wi-Fi is lossless sound quality! 

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn't mean you can’t help:

  • Please help us to get the word out about our campaign.
  • Another way you can help is to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

MAK-Corp is a developer of simulation-racing mods, games, hardware, software and driver training simulations. Having many years of experience within the industry the company aims to support artists via an independent software that will allow artists to sell their payware products in the category of cars, tracks and full blown mods.

The software can be considered similar to that of STEAM which the community is aware of. The software whose name is yet to be determined will allow players to create an account, purchase mods and easilly run them in their games further allowing players to manage their mods easier.

Contributions will help with the development of the software which will have a number of levels of development processes which will be listed further down.

You can visit our website at www.mak-corp.net

Visit our facebook studio page at https://www.facebook.com/MakCorp3dStudios

About the Software

The Software will be a hub for all artists to join in and include their work as well as allow players to join up and purchase various products. This will support the artists behind the work as well as provide the community with more quality content for their favourite games. Below is a run down on the stages the software will take which will be done with the contributions made by all of you.

Software Stage 1

Features

  • Independent Software downloadable and installable similar to STEAM.
  • Registration and Account Management through the software.
  • Ability to purchase products (cars,tracks,mods) for rF1 and rF2.
  • Purchased Product Management.
  • Ability to Trial a product.
  • Encryption and Security system for stopping cracks, cheats and sharing.
  • Ability to add custom skins easily through the software.

Stage 1 roll out is estimated within 3-4 months from acquiring funding goal. The first roll out will be the basic software with the important features to allow players to purchase and enjoy their products.

Funds Spent on Stage 1 = 2600 EUR - Development shall begin when this sum is reached.

Software Stage 2

Features

  • Addition of Friends system.
  • Addition of Private Messaging system between friends.
  • Ability to Customize & Manage mods purchased to your liking (add teams, skins, change physics, sounds, etc).
  • League Support System (providing an easier interface for leagues wanting to use any products).
  • Addition of RACE07/GTR EVO compatibility (this will be tested in Stage 1 but might have to wait for stage 2 rollout).

Stage 2 will provide the features listed above and will advance the system to allow more customizing options to the user. The roll out timeframe is unknown until stage 1 is complete.

Funds Spent on Stage 2 = 2600 EUR - Development shall begin when we reach 5200 EUR contributed to the project and Stage 1 is completed and released.

Software Stage 3

Features

  • Hotlaps system recording your best laps with the rest of the world on played tracks using the system.
  • Events system allowing players to take part in events for various prizes.
  • Player social page for chatting, sharing setups with other players, screenshots, videos embedding via youtube links and skins.
  • Reviews and mod voting system.
  • Forum integration from web to software.
  • Development and possible deployment (Depending on if it works) compatibility for Richard Burns Rally, GTR 2, Test Drive Unlimited 1 & 2, Need for Speed Shift series.
  • Pre-work structure to ready compatibility for GTR 3 and Asserto Corsa.
  • (Depending on agreements and moddability) Pre-work structure to ready compatibility with pCARS.

Stage 3 will provide a mass update to the software bringing in a large number of changes to enhance the interactive abilities between the software and the player. The roll out timeframe is unknown until Stages 1 and 2 are complete.

Funds Spent on Stage 3 = 3500 EUR - Development shall begin when full funds are reached and Stages 1 and 2 are completed and released.

Hiring Artists and Licenses

After acquiring the initial costs for the software as listed above, any further contributions will go towards acquiring more industry talented staff as well as various car licenses.

Funds Spent on Artists and Licenses = 40,000 EUR

Any contributions made will receive an equal amount of credit in the software upon release. Extra contributions will go towards paying artists and acquiring licenses.

What We Need & What You Get

In all we are looking for 10,000 euro which will pay for the programming work for the software as well as the fee taken by Indiegogo. The funding will be used solely for the software development by the programmers. The full amount will help develop all three stages of the software.

All contributions above the 10,000 euro will go to pay to support artists as well as hiring more industry standard artists and acquire licenses.

Contributors will receive everything stated in the perks description of each Contribution amount. Such perks shall become available once the software is released.

The Impact

The development of this software is intended to bring a new light to the sim-racing community by providing gamers with an easy to use application to manage all their gaming add ons. At first the desire is to develop the software for Sim-Racing but if the funding goes well and we continue to acquire support, we do plan on looking at supporting other genre's of modding such as the Flight Sim community and other such moddable games.
 
The objective is to help such communities grow and provide artists, modders and developers a base to be able to showcase their work and for those that choose to and are able to, to sell their artistic work.
 
By helping us develop this product, you will be helping the community grow with much more quality content then what exists today.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

We thank you for taking the time to read our campaign info. We hope you will contribute to this software that should help change the way of modding to be more secure, user and modder friendly and help strengthen the community to higher levels.

Contribution Perks (extra info for higher contributions)

As there is a character limit in the contribution description, the contributions listed below have the additional perks as listed below as well as the ones listed in their perks section.

Medium Supporter (50 EUR)

+ Be a part of beta testing the software.

+ Access to private development forum for software to see progress with your own eyes.

Major Supporter (100 EUR)

+ News and updates of your company/website/products listed in our news page and email newsletters and facebook pages.

+ Be a part of beta testing the software.

+ Access to private development forum for software to see progress with your own eyes.

Minor Sponsor (250 EUR)

+ News and updates of your company/website/products listed in our news page and email newsletters and facebook pages.

+ Your logos on tracks and cars developed by the hired artists.

+ Be a part of beta testing the software.

+ Access to private development forum for software to see progress with your own eyes.

Medium Sponsor (500 EUR)

+ News and updates of your company/website/products listed in our news page and email newsletters and facebook pages.

+ Your logos on tracks and cars developed by the hired artists.

+ Be a part of beta testing the software.

+ Access to private development forum for software to see progress with your own eyes.

Major Sponsor (1000 EUR)

+ News and updates of your company/website/products listed in our news page and email newsletters and facebook pages.

+ Your logos on tracks and cars developed by the hired artists.

+ Be a part of beta testing the software.

+ Access to private development forum for software to see progress with your own eyes.
story_txt:
Short Summary
MAK-Corp is a developer of simulation-racing mods, games, hardware, software and driver training simulations. Having many years of experience within the industry the company aims to support artists via an independent software that will allow artists to sell their payware products in the category of cars, tracks and full blown mods.
The software can be considered similar to that of STEAM which the community is aware of. The software whose name is yet to be determined will allow players to create an account, purchase mods and easilly run them in their games further allowing players to manage their mods easier.
Contributions will help with the development of the software which will have a number of levels of development processes which will be listed further down.
You can visit our website at www.mak-corp.net
Visit our facebook studio page at https://www.facebook.com/MakCorp3dStudios


About the Software
The Software will be a hub for all artists to join in and include their work as well as allow players to join up and purchase various products. This will support the artists behind the work as well as provide the community with more quality content for their favourite games. Below is a run down on the stages the software will take which will be done with the contributions made by all of you.
Software Stage 1
Features

Independent Software downloadable and installable similar to STEAM.
Registration and Account Management through the software.
Ability to purchase products (cars,tracks,mods) for rF1 and rF2.
Purchased Product Management.
Ability to Trial a product.
Encryption and Security system for stopping cracks, cheats and sharing.
Ability to add custom skins easily through the software.

Stage 1 roll out is estimated within 3-4 months from acquiring funding goal. The first roll out will be the basic software with the important features to allow players to purchase and enjoy their products.
Funds Spent on Stage 1 = 2600 EUR - Development shall begin when this sum is reached.
Software Stage 2
Features

Addition of Friends system.
Addition of Private Messaging system between friends.
Ability to Customize & Manage mods purchased to your liking (add teams, skins, change physics, sounds, etc).
League Support System (providing an easier interface for leagues wanting to use any products).
Addition of RACE07/GTR EVO compatibility (this will be tested in Stage 1 but might have to wait for stage 2 rollout).

Stage 2 will provide the features listed above and will advance the system to allow more customizing options to the user. The roll out timeframe is unknown until stage 1 is complete.
Funds Spent on Stage 2 = 2600 EUR - Development shall begin when we reach 5200 EUR contributed to the project and Stage 1 is completed and released.
Software Stage 3
Features

Hotlaps system recording your best laps with the rest of the world on played tracks using the system.
Events system allowing players to take part in events for various prizes.
Player social page for chatting, sharing setups with other players, screenshots, videos embedding via youtube links and skins.
Reviews and mod voting system.
Forum integration from web to software.
Development and possible deployment (Depending on if it works) compatibility for Richard Burns Rally, GTR 2, Test Drive Unlimited 1 & 2, Need for Speed Shift series.
Pre-work structure to ready compatibility for GTR 3 and Asserto Corsa.
(Depending on agreements and moddability) Pre-work structure to ready compatibility with pCARS.

Stage 3 will provide a mass update to the software bringing in a large number of changes to enhance the interactive abilities between the software and the player. The roll out timeframe is unknown until Stages 1 and 2 are complete.
Funds Spent on Stage 3 = 3500 EUR - Development shall begin when full funds are reached and Stages 1 and 2 are completed and released.
Hiring Artists and Licenses
After acquiring the initial costs for the software as listed above, any further contributions will go towards acquiring more industry talented staff as well as various car licenses.
Funds Spent on Artists and Licenses = 40,000 EUR
Any contributions made will receive an equal amount of credit in the software upon release. Extra contributions will go towards paying artists and acquiring licenses.
What We Need & What You Get
In all we are looking for 10,000 euro which will pay for the programming work for the software as well as the fee taken by Indiegogo. The funding will be used solely for the software development by the programmers. The full amount will help develop all three stages of the software.
All contributions above the 10,000 euro will go to pay to support artists as well as hiring more industry standard artists and acquire licenses.
Contributors will receive everything stated in the perks description of each Contribution amount. Such perks shall become available once the software is released.


The Impact
The development of this software is intended to bring a new light to the sim-racing community by providing gamers with an easy to use application to manage all their gaming add ons. story:
Shipping Now:

Available on Chargerito.com!

 

Wallet, keys, phone, Chargerito... Never leave home without them.
 
 

 

Big Power in a Little Package

Chargerito is the World's Smallest Mobile Device Charger. It plugs into the wall and fits easily in your pocket, so you always have a charger on hand for your phone, tablet or wearable.

Secures device while charging

Prongs fold flush for travel

 

Chargerito is NOT just another battery pack you have to charge separately.

And it's NOT just another USB cable that has to plug into another device to charge.

How does it stack up against other charging alternatives?

 

Which One is Right for You

The Micro-USB Chargerito is compatible with the Samsung Galaxy S7/Edge, Motorola Moto G5 Plus, Samsung Galaxy J7 2016, Huawei Honor 6X, Sony Xperia X, and more. Choose the Earlybird perk to get guaranteed delivery by December 20, 2017!

The iPhone Chargerito is compatible with iPhone 5 and above: 5/c/s, 6/+/s/s+, SE, 7/+, 8/+, X. Choose the Earlybird perk to get guaranteed delivery by December 20, 2017!

The USB-C Chargerito is compatible with the Google Pixel, Huawei Nexus 6P, LG Nexus 5X, OnePlus 2, Gionee S6, Meizu PRO 5, Xiaomi Mi 4c, Microsoft Lumia 950 & 950 XL, LeEco Le 1s/Eco, Xiaomi Mi 5, Gionee Marathon M5 Plus, LeEco Le 2/Max/Pro, and more.

Every time you leave the house, you make sure you have your phone, wallet, and keys. Now with Chargerito on your keychain you'll also always have a charger. Everyone already has a charger in their home, workplace, and car, but what about all those unexpected scenarios where you find yourself with low battery and no easy way to charge your phone? Since Chargerito is always with you, never worry about running out of battery.

 

Shipping for the 2017 Holidays

If you order from the limited quantity Early Bird Special perk, we guarantee you will receive your Chargeritos by December 20, 2017. Other perks will be delivered soon after that.

We've already manufactured and shipped thousands of Chargeritos to happy customers from our San Francisco office!

 

Press

Frequently Asked Questions

Will Chargerito work if my device is in a case?

Yes for the vast majority of cases. We built the connectors to stick up enough that Chargerito will not interfere with any cases. We abide by Apple's guidelines so as long as your case does too (most do), it will work with Chargerito.

What types of electrical outlets does Chargerito work with?

Right now it only works with U.S. standard electrical outlest (NEMA 110V AC outlets). Soon we plan to offer the chargerito for other types of electrical outlets found throughout the world.

How long does it take Chargerito to charge a device?

In short, about twice as fast as an external battery or USB cable connected to another device like a laptop. It varies significantly according to the device being charged, room temperature, age of the battery, etc., but Chargerito charges as quickly as the leading in-wall chargers out there. It takes about one hour to charge an iPhone 7 from 0 to 100%.

Why does the Apple version have a backstop arm on it?

As part of our MFi (made for iPhone) certification, Apple requires dock accessories like ours to have a backstop to support your iPhone as it charges. Even though there will be a wall supporting your phone in the vast majority of cases, this provides and added level of protection.

How is my device held securely as it charges?

Chargerito fits firmly into the wall outlet and can support a lot of weight. We're so confident in it, we put our own laptop, tablet and phone at stake in this demo video. Even something as heavy as an iPad will charge safely on it. That said, if something were to knock into the side of your device forcefully, such as a toddler, cat, or oblivious person, that could knock it off its perch. Chargerito is actually designed to break before your device does, so it's a much less expensive fix.

What are the electrical specifications?

In: 100 - 240VAC 50 - 60Hz 200mA

Out: 5 VDC 1A 7.5W

What certifications does this product have?

Chargerito has several certifications that hold it to high international standards.

story:
We are going to build a Sales and Customer Relationship Management app for small and medium sized businesses. The design of our app allows for product and customer management and can even create an invoice for services or products sold. It will be built to be used on mobile phones and tablets (which are widely available and used in Africa) initially targeted at IOS devices and with time (and funding) we will make the application available on Android too. 

The big difference between other apps and our awesome app is that we will be building fun into the application. We have recognised that there is an ocean full of boring systems and applications available that people hate to use. They are not engaging, they are not fun to use and there is very little reward for using them. In addition we believe that the users should have the opportunity to give feedback easily about those things that work for them, those that don't and make requests for additions to the application so that we continually improve it in the ways that the users actually want.

At this moment we have designed the app, defined the spec and registered the company so all we need now is your help to allow us to buy some additional equipment that we can use for building and testing the app as well as to pay the developers for their work. 

Important to note: The founders are going to stay poor while this application is being developed. This is not about earning a salary for ourselves at the outset, it is about building and growing app development in Johannesburg.

 

This app is going to be FUN to use! 

Somewhere as we grew up adults forgot that in order to really achieve, we should actually be having fun. We should enjoy the work we do, we should enjoy the people we interact with and we should avoid (wherever possible) the dreaded spreadsheet. Getting new deals, generating new sales and onboarding new customers should not only be easy but we should be rewarded for our success. Immediately.

As we reach targets or goals that we set, the app will award points, when we update our customers details we should get points and when we sign new deals, we should get a crown for the day on our avatar for everyone to see. Enough points gets you to level up, 'buy' upgrades for your avatar and a whole lot of other fun rewards that we have planned. Having fun for doing the things that we should be doing anyway should be part of our lives and this app is going to get us closer to that.  

 

The simple concept is:

1. Reward people for the right behavior, which will encourage more of the right behavior

2. More of the right behavior creates additional opportunity for growth 

3. More opportunities for growth means a greater probability of converting opportunities into sales

 


With your help (of course).

We have the knowledge and the know-how. We have the specifications and the diagrams and we have the technical ability to create the app but we need more developers to get it finished in as short a time as possible. With your help we will be able to bring on board more developers to get this project finished!

 

 

In the environment we have in Africa, affordable tools to enable growth are few and far between and we want to change that. We are creating an app that helps people to enjoy the sales and CRM processes and supports their business growth by making the process engaging and easy to use. By building an app that encourages the right behaviors we know we can be part of helping Africans to help themselves.

Supporting this campaign means you are helping small businesses grow which means real impact into our communities.

 

 

Pure and simple, you will be helping others to help themselves. 

While we are not arrogant enough to claim that this app will be the driver for an African economic turnaround, we do believe that it will be part of a change that needs to happen. In this project, you have an opportunity to be part of that change and know that you are supporting a massively beneficial project.

Also:

You will be able to download this app from anywhere! This is not going to be exclusive to African countries though, we want all small businesses to be using this app and will make it available wherever we can! Quite shamelessly in fact.

 

Johannesburg is a wonderful city and is populated by the most fantastic people you can imagine. Warm and friendly and from all over Africa, it is the people that makes the city so special. We do however have a problem that is going to become more and more apparent as the years go by as the gold that is being mined underneath our feet is running out. We are going to have no choice but to grow alternative industries to support and sustain our people. 

Apple, Google and Microsoft have been kind enough to show us the way to change our lives by providing us with platforms to create and distribute applications that can be useful to many. Our intention is therefore to create and distribute, to African countries (actually any emerging market), applications that can be used to support businesses.

In developing and growing the mobile application development skills in Johannesburg we can employ people immediately and within a few short months have an application available that can be used in local African markets to grow their own businesses. With time we will improve our application offerings, helping to grow more businesses and at the same time employ and grow our own local application development industry.

We firmly believe that in working for a model that specifically enables growth across the value chain we can fuel the creation of a new sustainable growth path for Johannesburg.

Also, we are going to have the most fun along the way because we should enjoy our lives!

 

Our target for funding is currently set at $50000. This will allow us to purchase additional hardware (servers, computers and additional tablets) to be used by the development team for the creation and testing of the application. Probably most importantly it will allow us to pay the developers for the work that they do. 

If we manage to get sufficiently beyond our initial funding goal then we will be making the application available for free to anyone who wants it. Our primary goal is to enable growth and we would hate for a price tag to get in the way of that so if we get beyond $60000, we wouldn’t charge for the core SalesX application we create, it would be FREE to download from the App Store.

If we are able to raise more than $70000 (ambitious, I know), we will purchase 5 iPad mini's, load up the application and get out to the people that count. We will work with the local communities to find 5 worthy businesses that would benefit from the application to load onto SalesX and give them the app and the iPad for free. For every additional $5000 that we raise beyond this, we will add another 5  iPad mini's to the shopping cart and really make a difference where it counts!

 

 

26:28 is a Johannesburg, South Africa, based company created to develop mobile applications for the corporate and personal markets in Africa. We are driven to not only create tools that can be used to enable business growth but also to grow the technical skills required to develop mobile applications. We believe in the potential of Johannesburg to become a centre for African innovation in mobile application development and are driven to see that become a reality.

In the same way that the gold of Johannesburg has driven economic growth and development in South Africa for the last (almost) 130 years, mobile application development must be entrenched in the culture of Johannesburg to drive the next wave of growth, not just for Johannesburg but for the African continent. With the explosion of the use of mobile technologies, primarily by individuals for their own personal use, we wish to expand that same pioneering spirit of making every-day life simpler through the entrenchment of application use into the business world. 

Given the penetration of smartphones and tablets in South Africa and their increasing use throughout the rest of Africa, there is massive opportunity for the development of business tools by Africans for Africans. Our vision is to provide a platform from promising South Africans to excel and educate Business that outsourcing to other countries is not necessary when the expertise is available here in South Africa.

 

Dawie Botes:

Most importantly, he has awesome hair. With hair like that, you know you have a winner on your hands. With over 10 years’ experience in technology, in various roles spanning Systems Administration, Channel Delivery Ownership and Business Architecture, Dawie incubated the passion for intuitive, simple and value-add applications to customers. The majority of his career was spent in Financial business areas, where he would understand the fundamental requirements a user needs to fulfill their role. Applying financial principles in business allows the mindset of clear integrity in both business practice as well as data. As an avid Gadget enthusiast Dawie is excited about applying his knowledge and skill in building leading edge applications, spanning a wide customer base.

Anthony Poplett:

With different (but no less awesome) hair, Anthony is clearly a winner. How could you not want to support this guy? Seriously though, Anthony has been working with systems development teams within the Financial services sector to build applications on various platforms for the last 12 years. With a focus on delivering solutions he is highly motivated to make SalesX a reality and deliver the app as a solution to an African need for lower cost and portable business solutions.

We firmly believe that in working for a model that specifically enables growth across the value chain we can fuel the creation of a new sustainable growth path for Johannesburg.
Also, we are going to have the most fun along the way because we should enjoy our lives!
 

Our target for funding is currently set at $50000. This will allow us to purchase additional hardware (servers, computers and additional tablets) to be used by the development team for the creation and testing of the application. Probably most importantly it will allow us to pay the developers for the work that they do. 
If we manage to get sufficiently beyond our initial funding goal then we will be making the application available for free to anyone who wants it. Our primary goal is to enable growth and we would hate for a price tag to get in the way of that so if we get beyond $60000, we wouldn’t charge for the core SalesX application we create, it would be FREE to download from the App Store.
If we are able to raise more than $70000 (ambitious, I know), we will purchase 5 iPad mini's, load up the application and get out to the people that count. We will work with the local communities to find 5 worthy businesses that would benefit from the application to load onto SalesX and give them the app and the iPad for free. For every additional $5000 that we raise beyond this, we will add another 5  iPad mini's to the shopping cart and really make a difference where it counts!
 
 
26:28 is a Johannesburg, South Africa, based company created to develop mobile applications for the corporate and personal markets in Africa. We are driven to not only create tools that can be used to enable business growth but also to grow the technical skills required to develop mobile applications. We believe in the potential of Johannesburg to become a centre for African innovation in mobile application development and are driven to see that become a reality.

In the same way that the gold of Johannesburg has driven economic growth and development in South Africa for the last (almost) 130 years, mobile application development must be entrenched in the culture of Johannesburg to drive the next wave of growth, not just for Johannesburg but for the African continent. With the explosion of the use of mobile technologies, primarily by individuals for their own personal use, we wish to expand that same pioneering spirit of making every-day life simpler through the entrenchment of application use into the business world. 
Given the penetration of smartphones and tablets in South Africa and their increasing use throughout the rest of Africa, there is massive opportunity for the development of business tools by Africans for Africans. Our vision is to provide a platform from promising South Africans to excel and educate Business that outsourcing to other countries is not necessary when the expertise is available here in South Africa.
 

Dawie Botes:
Most importantly, he has awesome hair. With hair like that, you know you have a winner on your hands. With over 10 years’ experience in technology, in various roles spanning Systems Administration, Channel Delivery Ownership and Business Architecture, Dawie incubated the passion for intuitive, simple and value-add applications to customers. The majority of his career was spent in Financial business areas, where he would understand the fundamental requirements a user needs to fulfill their role. Applying financial principles in business allows the mindset of clear integrity in both business practice as well as data. As an avid Gadget enthusiast Dawie is excited about applying his knowledge and skill in building leading edge applications, spanning a wide customer base.
Anthony Poplett:
With different (but no less awesome) hair, Anthony is clearly a winner. How could you not want to support this guy? Seriously though, Anthony has been working with systems development teams within the Financial services sector to build applications on various platforms for the last 12 years. With a focus on delivering solutions he is highly motivated to make SalesX a reality and deliver the app as a solution to an African need for lower cost and portable business solutions.

story:
Welcome to Gopha, a revolutionary app that connects people who need everyday tasks doing, with those who want to do them!

A simple concept:

In its most basic sense, Gopha is an app that enables people to get paid for completing other people's everyday errands, or 'gigs'.

The app is completely free to download and anyone with a PayPal account can post and complete gigs, enabling other people to fulfil your tasks whilst you get on with life.

The finer points:

After many months of research, we have created a unique template system that operates around 9 gig categories:

Once you have selected a category from the above, creating your gig takes just three simple steps:

Tracking gig progress with real time updates:

We wanted to make Gopha as interactive as possible whilst looking after both the person creating the gig and the person undertaking the gig. Our intuitive proofing system enables the gig creator to keep an eye on the gig status in real time.

Proofing system:

Each gig category has its own template to collect and display information about the gig. A 'courier' gig for instance will require information about the location of the item to courier, what the item is, and where to deliver it to.

In this instance, the person doing the gig will see a screen like this:

As the person reaches the address, they swipe this item off the screen. Gopha then uses location services to discover if the person is within an acceptable distance of the collection location. If this is deemed the case, the item is instantly blocked out and the gig creator notified of the progress, giving real time updates.

The person doing the gig may then be required to take a photo of the item - upon swiping 'pick up the crown jewels' from the screen, the phone camera automatically switches on ready for a photo of the item to be taken. This picture is then instantly sent to the gig creator to approve, ensuring the right crown jewels are about to be couriered!

This unique proofing system not only keeps everyone up to date with the gig but ensures the correct item is being collected, the correct location reached and so forth.


Who we are

We are two friends who have worked tirelessly self-funding and building Gopha from the ground up over the last six months. Having initially conceived the idea when needing to be in two places at once wishing we had a 'gopher', half a year later we have a prototype that is undergoing a few final tweaks and tests before we officially launch. 

With your help

We think we have a pretty awesome app that not only makes people's lives easier, but helps other people make a bit of money, however we need a few final pushes to get it out there.

Marketing:

The app requires vast numbers of people to be using it in order for it to work, so marketing will be one of our biggest expenses. Thankfully, we know an incredible PR team who has launched numerous apps in the past and has excellent connections in the technology press world. These guys can help us make a big splash with Gopha, we already have some exciting PR stunts and marketing campaigns planned, we just need to fund them.

Technology:

Our in-house server (ahem, old laptop) won't support the thousands of users and millions of data requests we expect to be supporting on a daily basis and so we need to purchase a number of flexible cloud servers to ensure we can offer a reliable and fast service.

Development:

We have a development backlog of app enhancements as long as our arms that we would love to get to work on immediately. These added features will make the app even more powerful without complicating anything, and whilst we don't want to let the cat out of the bag too early, you can expect to see lots of gamification and rewards added to the system, alongside more basic functional developments.


Don't you really want one of these?


Other ways you can help

We know that not everyone can provide funding for this project, but there are loads of ways you can still help to get Gopha off the ground:

  • Join our mailing list for beta access to Gopha!
  • Share this page with your friends and family!
  • Share our YouTube channel!
  • Follow us on Twitter!


Finally...

Thank you for checking out our Indiegogo page. If nothing else, we hope to have whetted your appetite and excited you just a touch about what the future holds for Gopha.

story:
What is CoffeeConnect?

CoffeeConnect, or CoCo for short, answers a question that many of us have previously asked ourselves- how do I meet people in this crazy, busy, buzzing town?!

 Some of us are new to where we live, others just want to meet new and interesting people.  We know that there are tons of great people right nearby that we could become fast friends with, that can help us in our career or we can hit it off with romantically.  But, and it's a big BUT, we are often too busy, too over-worked or too shy to actually start a conversation.

This is the problem that CoCo aims to solve.  CoCo is a location based mobile application that allows you to see others near you, wherever you happen to be, and connect with them over a coffee, face to face.  It's simple, it's fast and it's approachable. 

So whether you are a busy professional who has no time to date, or a student who just moved to the city and looking to make new friends, you now have the tool to see others nearby who also want to meet new people and connect with them over a coffee. Easy. 

We purposely don't include the Facebook Connect functionality because we want you to meet new people.  You already know your Facebook friends, now go out and make new ones!

Why Coffee?

Coffee has been connecting people for centuries; we are just giving it a little boost with today’s technology.

Coffee is an invitation for conversation, a chance to meet face to face, but is still quick enough to fit into our busy lives.

Coffee is professional, approachable and directs people to meet in public places, taking the 'sleaze factor' that many platforms attract.  We think that 'SexyGuy69' is not likely to use the platform based on its professional direction and of course, the security settings.  

The objective of the platform is for people to meet and form meaningful relationships. 

What better way to do so than over a cup of coffee? 

CoCo is being released on the iPhone in April 2012.

Why do we need funding?

We hope you are excited about CoCo and encourage you to help us raise funds for the expansion onto the Android platform, as well as the implementation of new features that will allow coffee retailers to provide promotions to loyal CoCo users.  It makes perfect sense that cafes should reward CoCo users for choosing their establishments and we want to see offers such as these distributed to CoCo users:

We've started conversation with local retailers and they are excited to be able to reward CoCo users for choosing their establishments. 

The Bottom Line

We need your help to expand CoCo onto the Android and to enhance the current features and spread the word about CoCo.

Please share this project with your friends, family, colleagues and anyone else who'd enjoy a coffee and a chat!

We can all benefit from more relationships in our lives.  After all, ask anyone, anywhere, what makes them happy, and people will always choose people.

Help us connect people, one cup of coffee at a time.

You can also tweet us out at @GoCoffeeConnect

Thank you for your support!

Luba and the CoCo Team

story:
With our lives moving so fast, we tend to forget our valuable things – whether it be our keys, our phones, or our purses. This leads us to being unhappy and forces us to find a replacement if we cannot retrieve back our lost item.

ChipStore Keyper solves this challenge.

Just attach it with your valuables and keep track of them with the smartphone app.

Features:  

Built-in rechargeable battery:

         This feature really makes this product the most reliable compared to similar products in the market. With a long-lasting rechargeable battery, you can be sure you will never run out of power. A single charge would last between 6-12 months. More importantly, with the rechargeable battery you never have to worry about the replacement procedure or carrying a spare. Keyper comes with a standard micro USB charging port as used in many smartphones.

Latest Bluetooth Technology:  

          With the latest Bluetooth technology incorporated, this friendly device is compatible with all latest smartphones and tablets. This product will help prevent you from losing any of your valuables again. We believe this will keep us comfortable as there will be less of a need to constantly monitoring our valuables, especially knowing that it will alert you when you move away from its range, or when it moves away from you (when two way tracking is enabled).

So what are the specific features:

  • Single tap on the app enables to locate your lost keys or other valuables.
  • Keep track of your pet using GPS map position. 
  • Locate your purses/bags.
  • Enable two-way tracker alert, so whenever both smartphone and Keyper tracker go out of range both start reminder beep sound.
  • Locate your phone with press of a button on the tracker. 
  • Locate the position of your car with app maps showing GPS position.
  • Take a group photo or video with Keyper controlling your phone camera.
  • long range (~30m) with our design.

Free smartphone app:  

Keyper comes with a smartphone app, currently supporting Apple iOS and Android devices. 

                 Keyper app UI design

Beautiful design:

Compact, circular design makes Keyper stand out. Our minds (and eyes) appreciate the simple shapes we see in our lives.

Match colors with your valuables. With our research, we chose 11 different colors tracker, which will cover most of the colors we have our valuables in. This allows Keyper to match with your valuables however you choose so.

Stylish magnetic micro USB charging cables: 

We are offering stylish magnetic USB cable for charging the ChipStore Keyper. This is the standard Micro USB port cable with magnet, and it can be stored in small spaces, can be kept in the pocket easily, or stored in handbags. It can also recharge your phones/devices, which have standard micro USB ports (e.g., Samsung smartphone, LG, Motorola and most tablets in the market).  

Advantages over other available products:

  • Built-in long-lasting rechargeable battery which makes Keyper very reliable. 
  • Single time charge lasts between 6-12 months depending on the usage.
  • No need to replace battery, just plug in the USB cable and recharge it. 
  • No hassle of getting a new battery or following confusing procedures to install it. 
  • Beautiful design with choice of many different colors for the tracker.
  • Comes with colorful magnet Micro USB cable, which charges phones as well.

All of this with your smartphone app and Keyper!

Our Product Development & Timeline

*Apple and Android logos shown here are just for reference purpose. They are owned by their respective owners.

Our Team:

John L

John is involved with his family business operations with primary focus in the food and beverage industry within NYC.  Among a broad range of interests, innovative technologies and product trends are among his top favorites.         

Shivam Sikroria

Shivam is a graduate of Stony Brook University, NY with a degree in Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics and Statistics; he also has a very strong background in Computer Science. He has been focusing on green automotive technologies, aerodynamics, artificial intelligence, electronic board design and web programming technologies.

Divyam Sikroria

Divyam is currently an undergrad at Stony Brook University, NY with primary focus in Applied Mathematics and Statistics. He is part of strategy team helping us in making design decisions and coming up with features for the products we offer.

Note: Our campaign was successfully funded on another funding website. We launched this campaign to take pre-orders. We appreciate your time taking a look at our campaign.

story:
We began refining and researching materials for a high quality look with durable specifications. Once this was accomplished, we then narrowed our material choices to a specific blend that is strong enough to absorb repetitive impact, the rigors of harsh environments, while protecting the watch and remaining comfortable.

FEATURED ON:

Easy assembly and cleaning.

 Rhino band seamlessly and quickly assembles without any tools or excessive parts, protecting all of the sensitive areas of your Apple Watch while simultaneously providing more functionality and usability. Rhino Band also locks into place inside the watch to safely secure your watch to your wrist. Since our initial design, we have gone through multiple revisions to improve the quality of Rhino Band.

 

 Standard- Every box includes 1 black Rhino Band as well as instructions of how to put on the Rhino Band and cleaning/care instructions.

Protection package- includes 1 black Rhino Band, 1 Rhino Glass Apple Watch protections cover, as well as instructions of how to put on the Rhino Band and cleaning/care instructions.

                                  Packaging designed specifically for Rhino Band

 

 

                                                           Protection Package seem above

 

                                                                    Prototype seen above

 

Concept, design, and creation were all major hurdles and obstacles along the way of finally producing a functional sample of the Rhino Band. Although there seemed to be endless headaches at times, persistence and a relentless desire to make this dream a reality was all the fuel we needed to see this project to its current stage. Currently ready for production, we now ask the Indiegogo community along with the Apple product supporters, to assist us in raising the necessary capital to create the molds needed to mass produce this product and make it available and affordable to those of us who love the outdoors, fitness and the look of a rugged yet stylish accessory.
