story:
We want to provide a service which you can trust and we also wish to build a tool that really works in the sense that there's absolutely no way a third party has access to your files.

  • A ordinary citizen that wants to protect his files from unauthorized access; 
  • A business with critical information that should not be available for the public or for other companies;
  • Any (US or non-US)governmental entity that has some valuable data and want to protect it from hackers;

Basically to cover server costs, to pay programmers and keep the project going. We do want to expand the project and hire the best people around, that's why we need your help.




    What is the Wallbit's mural?

    The mural will be a part of our website dedicated to all the people that have supported us to make the Wallbit a reality. At the end of the campaign, we will ask you to email us your signature, then we will collect them all and design a web page with them.

    Will Wallbit be free? 

    We eventually want to have free accounts, but since we are self-funded there's no way to start the service offering free storage. However, we will charge( non-supporters ) a reasonable amount, in fact, the necessary to pay server cost + programmers.

    Where's the T-shirt design?I live outside US, can I still get my shirt?

    We will release it in a couple days. Yes, we will ship it worldwide, but depending on where you live additional shipping charges may apply.

    What is the Wallbit for business?

    Wallbit for business will be a file encryption service designed for business, with many additional features that regular accounts don't have.

    Will I be able to upload everything I want?

    If it's not a copyrighted material nor something against the (US)law, then you are good to go. However, initially(beta release) we might restrict a little bit some file types.

    I'm a programmer and I'm very interested in this project... Are you hiring?

    If we reach our goal the answer is definitely yes, please contact us at support@thewallbitinitiative.com

is

 




What is KIUSO ?

KIUSO is a top level encryption software provided in a USB key.

For the moment, it has two functions.

  • you can protect data stored on your PC in an unbreakable way.
  • you can send encrypted e-mails to other KIUSO contacts without being intercepted by anyone.

You can find further information on www.kiuso.eu.

*Due to continuous product improvements screen shots may differ slightly from actual product.




What is Kryptovoice ?

With this campaign, we'd like to add a new important function: Kryptovoice.

Using Kryptovoice, you can make a Skype call in total privacy, without being intercepted by anyone.

Once Kryptovoice will be ready, we will ask Microsoft to certify the quality of our software, as we did for KIUSO. This is for to guarantee our customers we did a good job.


What is NoCodePost ?

NoCodePost is our encrypted email service. Based on KIUSO algorithm, it assure text and files exchange in total privacy. You can use it for free (short messages) and for long messages and attached files (20 EUR per year). More info at http://www.nocodepost.com/IT/HomeData/MainPage.aspx  .

Is KIUSO encryption efficient ?

Our fractal-based algorithm encode files using an extremely complex double-blind cross system of 2048 byte (16384 bit). This means the encryption is delivered using a matrix of 2048x2048 cell all factorial raised to 256, representing the highest encoding level available on the market. Following chart shows a simplified view of the encryption levels.

Home banking systems and credit cards circuits uses a 128 bit encryption. This is enough safe, however it is possible to attack and brake the key.

Military levels (RSA and AES) are much more secure, but for us it is not enough, because skilled military people can intercept you.

KIUSO is an incredible improvement in encoding processes. With KIUSO, there's no way that someone can open your files or read your e-mails.

Your data are not stored in our servers. They exist only on your PC.

With this campaign, we will apply KIUSO security level to Skype calls. This means you will be able to skype with another KIUSO owner in a totally safe and secure way, completely avoiding the risk of being intercepted.

Our headquarters are in Munchen, Germany, in the middle of Europe. And we have a secondary office in Piacenza, Italy.


Timeline


The Company

With the cooperation of Mymucca software engineering (devolping software) and  Microsoft (testing and certifications), we are able to obtain our goals.

KIUSO website:


NoCodePost website:


Included items:


Kiuso Master key



Kiuso Recovery Key

*Due to continuous product improvements screen shots may differ slightly from actual product.


Buying after the end of this campaign

We don't keep copies of your key(s), and it is not possible to make copies after we create the original key. So be careful to take care of your KIUSO key.

You can buy now at www.kiuso.eu:

KIUSO Master key  EUR 700.- (+ VAT 19%) - promotional price EUR 350.- (+ VAT 19%) until September 30th. Standard shipment included.

KIUSO Master key + Recovery key EUR 900.- (+ VAT 19%) - promotional price EUR 450.- (+ VAT 19%) until September 30th. Standard shipment included.

From January 2015 you can also buy at www.kiuso.eu:

KIUSO Master key with Kryptovoice function enabled EUR 1000.- (+ VAT 19%), Luxury LaCie Usb key included. FedEx shipment included.

KIUSO Master key with Kryptovoice function enabled + Recovery key EUR 1200.- (+ VAT 19%). Luxury LaCie Usb key included. FedEx shipment included.

Both international and domestic shipping are included in the prices. However International orders may subject to certain import customs, duties and/or taxes imposed by your country upon delivery. These charges are NOT included in the Perks. We recommend that you contact your local customs office for an estimate of any applicable taxes and duties you may be charged upon delivery.

Risks and challenges

The risks and challenges faced by the team are minimal. We have already planned and developed the fundamental code of Kryptovoice that allows the voice encoding. However, the link between KIUSO software and Skype still needs to be developed. This could prove to be more challenging and time-consuming than originally anticipated. Our team is experienced with encountering and defeating obstacles and we take each challenge on with vigor, with the cooperation of Mymucca software engineering and Microsoft.

Fulfillment: as we'll be ready, we will send out notifications to each backer so that they will know exactly when they will receive KIUSO key(s) with Kryptovoice function enabled.

Here is where the money will go:


What if you will not raise the total amount?

We'll do all we can for develop Kryptovoice in any case. If this will really not be possible, we will send each backer a KIUSO Master Key + Recovery key, fully functioning, but without the Kryptovoice function. It will be possible to protect files and exchange emails in total privacy, and you save a lot of money. Further details on www.kiuso.eu.


Thank you again, to our wonderful Indiegogo supporters!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Anton, I'm 35. I have an experience in programming C++ since 1996. I’m an author and developer of the following open source projects: tsdemuxer, ps3muxer, pshare and luasp.

Since 2011, I have been developing an extendable DLNA media server for home routers with multicast IPTV support. The program is distributed by GPL2 license in the original scripts and is included in the official repository of OpenWRT.

Project page: http://xupnpd.org

GitHub: https://github.com/clark15b/xupnpd

With a hope to make the world a better place, using the accumulated knowledge and taking into consideration the current needs of my program users, for several months I have been developing a next-generation home media server - xupnpd2.

Xupnpd2 is a complete cross-platform media server with the ability to broadcast multicast IPTV into local network, as well as video, photos and music from the home archive to any a DLNA-compatible device.

Key features:

1. The online TV and video playback on the game consoles PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, SmartTV and other DLNA-compatible devices.

2. HLS (HTTP Live Streaming), multicast over UDP or RTP, HTTP and more.

3. Multiple platforms support: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10, Mac OS X 10.5.8 or higher (Intel / PPC), different installation packages of GNU Linux, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD, embedded systems based on OpenWRT and DD-WRT.

4. Low system requirements. Software code is written entirely in C++, and there is almost no dependence on the external libraries. This, in turn, led to a record small size of the program with high functionality, performance, and portability.

5. Intuitively understandable user interface. At this time there is no need to search answers on the Internet since the new version will have an intuitively-understandable, user-friendly interface, and the preparation for the work will take only few minutes. The user doesn’t need to have any special computer skills, all the user needs to do is to relax and enjoy watching favorite television programs in the original quality.


What is already available

At this stage, there is already a working version for Microsoft Windows, GNU Linux, FreeBSD and OpenWRT with online streaming, and it has the functionality of a full-rate media server that supports Lua scripts and the extensions.

I carried on the testing of Windows, Linux and OpenWRT versions on: the LG TV, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, media player Iconbit, Windows Media Player and VLC.

The process of implementing in Mac OS X is in progress.

At this point the software package for GNU Linux takes only 270K, for Microsoft Windows - 1.5M, and for OpenWRT - 300K.


What We Need & What You Get

During the first month after the project starts the investors will receive early access to the current version of the program.

For $ 1 you will receive from me “Thank you very much for supporting the project.”

For $ 5 you will receive early access to the program, an unlimited ability to watch your media files and multicast IPTV.

For $ 10 you will receive early access to the program, and also all official additions that will appear during the year, including HLS.

For $ 25 you will receive early access to the program, and also all official additions that will appear the following two years, including HLS.

For $ 50 you will receive early access to all the existing software packages, all its possible capabilities and you will receive all official additions for free for the life term.

For $ 100 you will receive the program with all the additions for all supported platforms and, if you wish, your name will be mentioned on the project official web site. Also you will receive a postcard from Russia with author’s gratitude.

For $ 250 in addition to the program and its plugins you will receive: the support in a VIP forum group and the possibility to participate in surveys concerning the feature request.

After collecting all charges, license fees will be reviewed!

The next planned stage is the implementation of the support for OMDB for skins downloading and video titles from home collection, multicast support, HLS, possibly BitTorrent, SoundCloud, and so on. There will be a possibility for FTP access to the collection and user-friendly Web-based interface with a minimal set of settings for a device control, the possibility to watch video in browser with a help of HTML5 tools on the compatible devices, including the Nintendo Wii U. There will be Android and iOS apps to control the watching process, and also the media -server version for Mac OS X. In the future prospect, we want to achieve compatibility with the Chromecast and Apple TV. And this is not the limit, the structure of the program allows to extend easily its functionality and to add new sources of media content, and I have a lot more ideas.

For further project development there is a need for community financial aid because many years of personal experience in open source development projects showed that all the costs are solely on the author’s shoulders, and the advertisement can’t cover expenses. For this reason the usability of the product is suffering because everything has to be done by my own efforts, combining social activities with the main work, and as a result there is no time even to prepare documentation.

Taking into consideration the growing public interest to the open source version of the program and the emergence of newer requirements, the project must exist and it must develop further. For this reason we need your help, not necessarily material. I am ready to listen to any suggestions and accept any possible assistance.

People all over the world, especially not in very prosperous regions, want to have access to the information.

The purpose of this project is to give people the ability to watch movies and TV in high quality using network and with no additional cost, using the equipment they already have. Thanks to xupnpd2 they don’t have to buy a satellite dish and set-top boxes (Set-Top Box), they are free to choose any provider the will pay to for the access to the content or not to pay at all, limiting themselves with the free network broadcasts.

Investors, depending on the size of the contribution, will receive early access to the stable build of the program for all supported platforms, as well as a full access to all functions of the program for the entire duration of the product support and they will be able to participate in the project development.

Help to make the world better!


A little bit more about myself and my plans

I am fond of programming from the early childhood. I began to study architecture of ZX Spectrum and programming for it on Basic. I know such programming languages as: C / C++, Lua, Assembler, Pascal and Java. I have programming experience in C++ since 1996. Professionally I have been developing software since 2001. From about 2003 I’m working with network technologies and participating in the software development for highly loaded distributed systems controlled by GNU Linux and FreeBSD.

The first open source project started in 2009 as a program for personal use, but I felt sorry for hiding the results of the work from the world and I decided to share them for free.

The current project is xupnpd. I have been working on it alone since 2011 to the present. It is a home media server with support for multicast IPTV, and the system of extensions in Lua language, that is included into official repository of the operating system for OpenWRT routers.

My program works on most routers, NAS-es, directly on some SmartTV, the DreamBox satellite receivers, computers running under GNU Linux and FreeBSD, and even on the Raspberry PI.

It is compatible with many UPnP / DLNA-compatible devices, such as: SmartTV of different manufacturers, PlayStation 3/4, Xbox One, smartphones, Microsoft Windows Media Player and VideoLAN.

With the help of xupnpd it is possible to playback directly from your TV or high-definition IPTV game console of your ISP without turning on your computer or any other content providers on the nework.

If you wish you could watch your own video from home archive or through the use of system extensions you could turn to online resources such as YouTube, Vimeo, GameTrailers, Giant Bomb, IVI and Vkontakte.

With a help of xupnpd it became possible to discard the lease or purchase of set-top box in order to watch digital TV at home. The program is written in C++ and the Lua, it takes up little space, and it is able to work on many Posix systems.

Taking into consideration the current trends, I have decided to review the functionality and get rid of the old code. I also designed xupnpd2 on the basis of the mandatory requirements of its native version on Microsoft Windows 7/8/10 (without Cygwin), Mac OS X 10.5.8 or higher (Intel / PPC) , different GNU Linux packages, FreeBSD and NetBSD and possibly OpenBSD. The embedded systems won’t be neglected based on OpenWRT and DD-WRT.

In order to improve the performance, almost all of the program core code was written in C++, the ability to write custom Lua-scripts was retained, SQLite support appeared and the possibility to build extensions (filters) in the chain for multistep conversion of online video was added. Due to these facts the optional transcoding or another stream modification in real time can appear in future, and for example, the organization of the home surveillance video system can appear as well.

Now xupnpd2 is a complete cross-platform media server with the ability to broadcast to the local network without transcoding video, photos and music from your home archive to any DLNA-compatible device.

At this time, many players’ features were taken into account and now it supports: rewind, pause, move to any moment and resume watching on SmartTV, gaming consoles, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.

The user manual will appear in different languages, as well as the FAQ on the program website. Advanced users, as before, will be able to create their own extensions to tune the behavior of the program when broadcasting the digital television to the home network.

There is a record small size of the program with its high functionality, portability, absence of the need for the program mandatory installation on the computer's hard drive as well as the absence of a mandatory subscription for investors for the program usage.

After xupnpd2 release it will retain the possibility of basic functions free use with some restrictions but unlike its predecessor it will stop being an open source project and it will become proprietary software.


Previous projects

luasp (2011) is Web programming language with support of MySQL, CURL and JSON on Lua-based for embedded systems. It was created for personal needs, with the following publication of original scripts under the BSD license.

GitHub: https://github.com/clark15b/luasp

pshare (2010) is the first attempt to develop a miniature DLNA compatible media server for personal use, which allowed me to watch the Extreme Sports Channel in high quality on the Sony PlayStation 3 without having to turn on the computer. Later I published the original program codes and provided the community with ready binaries for several models of home WiFi router running under OpenWRT or DD-WRT. The program was notable for minimal consumption of resources and worked without any problems on weak D-Link DIR-320.

The program became a prototype for more functional open source xupnpd product creation. Distributed by GPL2 license.

GitHub: https://github.com/clark15b/pshare

PS3muxer (2010 - 2011 gg.) is a free program for MS Windows, Mac OS X and GNU Linux with a lot of downloads. The program quickly convert MKV video to fit the Sony PlayStation 3 watching format without loss of quality, taking into account the original features. Also it is very useful if your player or TV set does not know about the MKV container or DTS sound. License GPL2.

Website: http://ps3muxer.org

GitHub: https://github.com/clark15b/ps3muxer

tsdemuxer (2009) is my first open source project for MS Windows and GNU Linux. The main purpose of this tool is a quick video conversion from AVCHD camcorders to MKV without losing quality. MIT License.

GitHub: https://github.com/clark15b/tsdemuxer

original features. Also it is very useful if your player or TV set
does not know about the MKV container or DTS sound. License GPL2.

Website: http://ps3muxer.org

GitHub: https://github.com/clark15b/ps3muxer


tsdemuxer (2009) is my first open source project
for MS Windows and GNU Linux. The main purpose of this tool is a
quick video conversion from AVCHD camcorders to MKV without losing
quality. MIT License.

GitHub: https://github.com/clark15b/tsdemuxer

story:
1st & ONLY designer leather RFID wallet with built-in battery and cable to charge BOTH Apple + Android phones and tablets.

4 vertical card / ID slots with an inside cash compartment.

All credit cards and most ID cards will have embedded RFID chips which store your personal information. Unfortunately they are easy to steal by thieves walking around with scanners. Wallgers have lightweight German designed RFID firewalls to keep your information shielded and protected.  

Wallgers are the 1st and ONLY to have thin lithium ion battery packs with a built-in charging cable for both Android and Apple phones and tablets. They can easily add hours of use, and be recharged without opening up the Wallger.  

One built-in cable pulls out to charge both micro USB and Lightning port devices.  The Lightning adapter for iPhone iPad stores inside an onboard compartment.

Wallgers low profile and small footprint fits in any pocket.

We could have used a much less powerful 1,000 mAh unit, but it would make very little difference in the thickness. This battery pack is the largest capacity (2,200 mAh) that we could fit inside the Wallger AND have a built-in charging cable for convenience. It has been tested to recharge smartphones 50 to 80% - adding hours of use.

As it is USA is focused on handcrafted fashion accessories with the best materials and craftsmanship.  Our lines of designer fashion bags can be found in premier boutiques in Asia, Europe, USA; even the Hong Kong Airport!  They are also online at opensky.com and our own website. 

Wallgers is our new line of fashionable and functional wallets and will have the same detail and focus on craftsmanship, design, and quality materials. Each will be handcrafted for us by a small shop so we can keep tight quality control.

That’s what makes Wallgers look and perform better than other “RFID wallets with phone chargers”. We designed the wallet and battery pack at the same time so they fit without looking like they were thrown together by a charger manufacturer.

We are not in the business of making cheaper products with lower quality materials just for the sake of volume sales.  Our philosophy is to use the best materials and hire the best shops to produce (not manufacture) accessories that look good, perform better, and last longer. 

Should your Wallger need repair or replacement within the first year, it will be taken care of at no charge.

Perks for your support

We have some in stock and expect to have more to ship in July 2016.

Single Wallgers Wallet with Battery Pack and Built-in Cable

  • $48 USA
  • $56 ($48 + $8) Outside USA

Two Wallgers Pack

  • $98
  • $110 ($98 + $12) Outside USA

Five Wallgers Pack

  • $248
  • $278 ($248 + $30) Outside USA

What we will use the funds for 

The leather wallets will be handcrafted for us by a small shop in Asia and hand fitted with RFID and heat shields.  We have already completed the design and testing process so the funds raised here will go straight into materials and production costs, along with the shipping to you guys.

Risks and challenges

As it is USA is focused on handcrafted fashion accessories with the best materials and craftsmanship. Our lines of designer fashion bags can be found in premier boutiques in Asia, Europe, USA; even the Hong Kong Airport! They are also online at opensky.com and our own website.

Wallgers is our new line of fashionable and functional wallets and will have the same detail and focus on craftsmanship, design, and quality materials.

story:
Thinking about getting a Bluetooth or GPS tracker to protect your valuables and even your kids?  Trak Taag works with your phone to do what we want:

 

 

 

  • Trak Taag flashes & beeps when separated from your phone  
  • Phone Alarm - reminds you when separated from Trak Taag
  • 1 Touch Button to Find Lost Trak Taag or Phone
  • Group Find -Other allowed phones can Find your Trak Taag
  • Crowd GPS Locator - network of other Trak Taag owners will ping the GPS location of your Trak Taag when nearby *late 2016
  • Battery recharges in 1 hour - lasts 2 months
  • 1 Touch SOS Calling to any phone number
  • Programmable Remote Button - Secretly turn on your phone's Video, Camera, or Audio Recorder

Afterwards, we were asked to come up with a low cost Bluetooth tracker that did not need mobile service, but still has a SOS button.  So we are upgrading the Track Taag and apps to be the smartest Bluetooth tracker available to keep your valuables and loved ones safe.

This summer, like every summer before, there were numerous incidents of kids being left inside cars with tragic results.  We tweaked the buzzer in the Trak Taag so it will be louder, and the phone alarm tone is customizable too.

 

 

Advanced Features

 

Trak Taag Anything - keys, bags, kids

 

 

even on a carseat to remind you to leave no child behind.

Separation Alarm with Adjustable Range

Whenever they are separated, such as being left behind, or running away:

 

  • Your Trak Taag will flash and beep loudly
  • The preset alarm will go off on your Phone

 

 

Find Trak Taag Near or Far

 

If Trak Taag is out of the adjustable range of your iPhone or Android (up to 100 feet), the app will show the last GPS locations on Google Map and directions to get there. 

 

 

Even where you last parked your car

 

Group Find - Other allowed phones* can Find your Trak Taag if it's within range. *Each Trak Taag has a PIN code so other phones can be allowed to link with it, and help locate it.  Example is when 2 parents go shopping with their kid and he runs away.  Both parents can split up and use their own phone to make it Beep and flash when within range.

Crowd GPS Locator will use the network of Trak Taag owners to help locate Trak Taags that are declared lost.No PIN code or private information is released or needed.  The GPS coordinates will be sent to you if their phone comes within range of it.  *Late 2016.

Find Your Phone - 1 touch on Trak Taag

Programmable Remote Button

Remotely control your iPhone or Android Phones.  What makes Trak Taag better than the rest is that the same Find and SOS Call button can secretly activate your smartphone to take videos, pictures, and record audio without you touching it.

 

 

Dashcam Video

Take dashcam videos with one press of the Trak Taag button out of sight. 

 

 

During an emergency or a dangerous situation, if your phone is inside a pocket or on your armband, Trak Taag can make it dial a preset phone number without you having to take it out.

 

 

Save Money

Best of all, the 80 year rechargeable battery life saves you money and hassle of replacing batteries-like for other trackers.  They all use a $3 battery that lasts 2-3 months, so 6 x $3 = $18 per year; $180 over 10 years.   Trak Taag recharges with any USB charger in 1 hour, and lasts 2 to 3 months.

 

Compared to Other Trackers

The one on the left is one of the smallest trackers available.  Trak Taag is on the right.  The rechargeable Lithium ion battery reduced the size and lasts 500 cycles - good for at least 80 years.

 

 

 

 

You can choose from 4 colors before shipping January 2017.  Retail $38.

S & H Charges for Perks are the same worldwide because we did not want to add it to the Perk and call it "FREE S & H".  In fact, the postage is more than what we charge you because it will be in a Retail Box. 

FREEBIES AND BONUSES

Get a FREE $10 Key Fob just for sharing our campaign.  Please use the share buttons located around the video or to your own circle.  And then just leave "FREE Key fob" in the COMMENTS area so we can track it.

 

Leave No Kids Behind - Stop Kids in Hot Cars

Each summer, we are reminded by horrible news of kids in carseats being unintentionally left inside cars.  A Trak Taag attached to the carseat can help by setting off alarms on itself & also on the phone when they get separated.   We have decided to offer 100 Trak Taags free for parent(s) with kids in carseats * +$3 S & H.  To keep it fair, we have a few requirements:

 

  1. Click on "Back It" to pay $3
  2. Like our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/AngelNetUS/
  3. Post a picture of your kid, and the Order number as a Comment on our Facebook Offer: 100 FREE Trak Taags giveaway on our Indiegogo Campaign.
  4. We will review and confirm it.  Otherwise, we will refund your $3.
  5. Limited to 1 per family please.

Who Are We?

AngelNet's main product is the Red Alert GPS that helps you watch over loved ones afflicted with Autism or Alzheimer's. SOS & Fall Alerts with GPS let you know where & how they are.  It will provide peace of mind over senior citizens and youngsters who are vulnerable to getting lost.  We were in the news when we gave away 1,000 units in support of Autism Awareness month in April 2016.

Afterwards, we were asked to come up with a low cost Bluetooth tracker that did not need mobile service, but still has a SOS button.  So we are upgrading the Track Taag and apps to be the smartest Bluetooth tracker available to keep your valuables and loved ones safe.

 

Use of Funds

We started selling Trak Taag since 2015 under other OEM brands.  Now we are updating the firmware and want to add Crowd GPS function in 2016.  The hardware redesign is already completed.  The funds raised here will go towards app integration and server setup.

Rather than charging users for this, we chose to offer the Trak Taag devices at huge discounts as Perks and use the small profits to pay for the costs involved.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

We are updating the firmware and want to add Crowd GPS function in 2016.  The hardware redesign is already completed.  The funds raised here will go towards app integration and server setup.  There will be no delay in the manufacturing part, and we will ship in January because the app can still be updated after the server and Crowd GPS functions are ready to use.

story:
Hi, I am Josh Entner and I am excited to share the story of AvaTwist with you!  A quick background on me is that I am extremely outgoing and will talk, comment, or share on any topic-- no matter how taboo.  I often share my professional experiences and other stories about my life, however, when it comes to my personal information and family, I am VERY private.  Like most people, I use the web all the time for both work and fun.  One day I was looking for some sports stuff and noticed the advertisements were following me everywhere.

 

I thought to myself: no big deal it is advertising, but when they started recommending places in my town and surrounding towns I began to wonder  “how do they know that”,  not even knowing for sure who “THEY” are...LOL

 

After talking with a few people who understand the web and technology, I realized that it was actually something that I had NO control over.  I was not happy for being such a fool and completely in the dark about how the internet operates. 

Bottom line, I decided that I disagreed with this and wanted to figure out what to do to protect my privacy.  I had no idea where to begin, but I knew that if I was this upset, others would be too when they realize how vulnerable their personal information and privacy is in their daily web use.  I asked around and quickly realized that many others share my concerns about our information being saved FOREVER on a server somewhere, with a connection back to us and all of our personal information.

 

I used my contacts and other resources to arrange a few lunches to present to them and about 500 additional people the concept and logic behind AvaTwist; the response was amazing, and as a matter of fact, many of them including several law and accounting firms are working for almost nothing to help get this off the ground.  I figured that is a great start, and proceeded to ask a few talented people whom I am connected with to join me on this venture, and that is how AvaTwist began!  I have pretty good contacts with a vast array of skills, and have been able to accomplish quite a bit with my own money and their expertise.   

 

I had this really cool idea for a name; AvaTwist. This means Avatar with a twist-- Avatar meaning your alter ego, and Twist meaning changing your IP address. I had lawyers trademark three things to help us maintain our tag lines and company name. We trademarked “AvaTwist”, our marketing slogan: “Who do U want to be today", and our pitch phrase which includes our new word “ForNEVER” (meaning it never happened).

 

This all happened before the summer, and I was afraid to tell anyone that I didn't know about my idea because I thought someone might steal it. Finally, in August after we built the first version of our website, I realized I have no reason to be afraid. I just need to put it out there. I am a big believer in the power of intention. Anyone not familiar with it; the basic premise is you put yourself out there openly and the things you need will come to you. That is exactly what has happened. I connected with a few people who joined the team and they have given me incredible insight into the technology and a much better understanding of the Internet.

 

We were in the process of getting the website and desktop version of AvaTwist built when we had a discussion about how the world is going wireless and mobile. We determined that in order to cover all our bases we needed to have a mobile App available as soon as possible after our desktop version. That brings us to where we are today. I had known about Indiegogo but again was afraid of telling too many people, but I quickly realized it is a perfect fit for my project, building the App for AvaTwist. I do not mind competition because it just validates our concept even more. Additionally, we are working on other ideas for the future that should keep us ahead of any potential competitors.

 

The end result of this tracking is that now I have lost some of my personal freedoms, because now the advertisers bombard me with the information that they think I am interested in. I get the feeling sometimes that my internet surfing becomes one big infomercial for some product a marketer thinks I want. I figured out how to answer my question of “How can I prevent them from knowing who I am AND where I am”. Once I found that answer I came up with the idea for AvaTwist.

 

Ok so that is how I started AvaTwist . Now let us talk about what AvaTwist is all about. The Internet used to be a one way communication where we would go to a site and get information, but things have changed big time. Now the sites we visit are now connecting to us and building a profile and SAVING EVERYTHING!!!  To me, being tracked is not something I want or think is very ethical. The two things that I really do not like are when my PERSONAL INFORMATION is sold, and that EVERYTHING IS SAVED FOREVER!! Even if you think you deleted something, it is saved somewhere on the web and tied back to U!! Think of what it will be like in 20 years if we continue giving away all of our information online and our whole life story is there for the WORLD to see.

So here are some general things I have learned about the Internet: I learned every Internet connection has a specific IP address that allows your Internet Service Provider (ISP) and anyone else with the right software to know your exact location. They then cross check this information with other records to find out the names of the individuals in the house or the name of the business. There are many other ways we are being tracked on the internet, anytime you put in your email address, every time you click on the “I agree” button or answer a question about your hair color, eye color, street address etc. With this information your service provider or any marketer now knows you and where you surf; and they keep track of it. If that isn't bad enough, here is where it gets scarier, the number of entities that are tracking you by the time you have gone to 4 or 5 different websites is now somewhere between 100 and 150. Then they take all the information that they have gathered from your searching habits and turn around and sell it to anyone who is interested in buying it. Worse, there are companies that combine the information from many marketers to get a better picture of you, which is then sold for more money. This is all LEGAL; never mind the companies and people that are illegally stealing your personal information!!

We have patent pending technology that combines two things we believe no one else has ever done before. We “twist” you, changing your IP address (where you are physically) and then mask the real U using Avatars. This also makes it fun because you can be someone else, and deep down we all want to be someone or something we are not.

 

You can have as many Avatars as you want.  In early beta testing my friend Brittni uses three Avatars; one for her friends and family to connect with her to share pictures and other things she doesn't want to share with the rest of the WORLD as Brittni.   The second one is for her to be whomever she wants to be and NO ONE knows who she is.   The third one is an Avatar of herself…. Brittni, so she can use Social Media and other types of Online services to stay connected with her business contacts and to reconnect with people from her past. 

The big key to our success is ease of use. Our user interface is simple and easy to use, if it was complex like our back-end software, then no one would use it. We have developed a simple two step process to get “Twisted” and choose your “Avatar”. To me, this will be a big difference in how successful we are. We really think there is a need for our product but if it is hard to use people will just continue business as usual.

 

If you have read this far then I recommend watching our really cool video for more on AvaTwist, or checking out our website www.avatwist.com .  I am really enthusiastic about this project and am willing to talk with anyone who has any questions or wants to learn more. I can be reached via email or by phone Here.   I hope you consider participating in our project and look forward to seeing what you think of AVATWIST!!

Reasons someone would use AvaTwist:

1) Tracking Prevention: 

It is a fact that everywhere you go on the internet is being tracked, saved and sold!!!!   Are you sick of it? I know we are!!!!

2) Private Surfing: 

We have all visited websites privately that we don’t want to share with others; Avatwist makes sure it stays private.

3) Identity Protection: 

When you want to protect your identity from predators and identity thieves.

4) On-Line Dating: 

You want to try out on-line dating, but you are a little nervous about it, no worries here, visit the sites you want and they won’t know it’s you.

5) Job Search: 

Searching for a new job when you are currently employed. What would your boss do if he/she found out you were searching for a new job on your lunch hour?

6) Personal Issues:

To investigate items of an extremely personal nature that you do not wish to share with others.

7) Famous People: 

Are you a Celebrity? A Politician? Or a Professional Athlete? Either way you have a following!!   You just want to access the internet in private without worrying that someone is watching every site you visit and every product you look at.

8) Personal Beliefs:

 Do you want to express your political or religious beliefs to the world without offending your close family ties? Use your Avatar and have at it, no one will know it is you!

9) Business Applications:

 You want to price shop the competition, without the competition knowing it’s you!

10) Competitive Analysis:

 When you are in business you want to make sure you are always at the top of your game. You can do that by comparing many things about your organization with the information you can find out about your competitors on their websites. You just want to do it privately.

11) Anonymous Browsing:

You went shopping for a new car, bicycle, or a motorcycle (insert product here), and now every site you visit has a Pop Up ad for new cars, bicycles, and motorcycles (or whatever products you were looking at). We can fix that!!!!

12) Enjoyment:

Because I want to and it’s fun!!!

13) Gaming: 

Have your gaming Avatar coincide with your AvaTwist Avatar and be the Goblin of the virtual and online worlds!!!

14) Good Parenting: 

We all want to protect our child’s online identity and location from would be predators.

15) Secret Shopping:

 Have you ever visited sites that you don’t want others to know you visited (shopping for a surprise birthday present for a loved one)?

16) Anonymous Window Shopping: 

17) Freedom to be You:

 When you don’t want your usage characteristics sold to other companies.

18) Speak Your Mind: 

There are many things going on in the world today that you want to blog about, but you want to do it anonymously. We can help with that.

I thought to myself: no big deal it is advertising, but when they started recommending places in my town and surrounding towns I began to wonder  “how do they know that”,  not even knowing for sure who “THEY” are...LOL
 
After talking with a few people who understand the web and technology, I realized that it was actually something that I had NO control over.  I was not happy for being such a fool and completely in the dark about how the internet operates. 
Bottom line, I decided that I disagreed with this and wanted to figure out what to do to protect my privacy.  I had no idea where to begin, but I knew that if I was this upset, others would be too when they realize how vulnerable their personal information and privacy is in their daily web use.  I asked around and quickly realized that many others share my concerns about our information being saved FOREVER on a server somewhere, with a connection back to us and all of our personal information.
 
I used my contacts and other resources to arrange a few lunches to present to them and about 500 additional people the concept and logic behind AvaTwist; the response was amazing, and as a matter of fact, many of them including several law and accounting firms are working for almost nothing to help get this off the ground.  I figured that is a great start, and proceeded to ask a few talented people whom I am connected with to join me on this venture, and that is how AvaTwist began!  I have pretty good contacts with a vast array of skills, and have been able to accomplish quite a bit with my own money and their expertise.   
 
I had this really cool idea for a name; AvaTwist. This means Avatar with a twist-- Avatar meaning your alter ego, and Twist meaning changing your IP address. I had lawyers trademark three things to help us maintain our tag lines and company name. We trademarked “AvaTwist”, our marketing slogan: “Who do U want to be today", and our pitch phrase which includes our new word “ForNEVER” (meaning it never happened).
 
This all happened before the summer, and I was afraid to tell anyone that I didn't know about my idea because I thought someone might steal it. Finally, in August after we built the first version of our website, I realized I have no reason to be afraid. I just need to put it out there. I am a big believer in the power of intention. Anyone not familiar with it; the basic premise is you put yourself out there openly and the things you need will come to you. That is exactly what has happened. I connected with a few people who joined the team and they have given me incredible insight into the technology and a much better understanding of the Internet.
 
We were in the process of getting the website and desktop version of AvaTwist built when we had a discussion about how the world is going wireless and mobile. We determined that in order to cover all our bases we needed to have a mobile App available as soon as possible after our desktop version. That brings us to where we are today. I had known about Indiegogo but again was afraid of telling too many people, but I quickly realized it is a perfect fit for my project, building the App for AvaTwist. I do not mind competition because it just validates our concept even more. Additionally, we are working on other ideas for the future that should keep us ahead of any potential competitors.
 
The end result of this tracking is that now I have lost some of my personal freedoms, because now the advertisers bombard me with the information that they think I am interested in. I get the feeling sometimes that my internet surfing becomes one big infomercial for some product a marketer thinks I want. I figured out how to answer my question of “How can I prevent them from knowing who I am AND where I am”. Once I found that answer I came up with the idea for AvaTwist.
 

Ok so that is how I started AvaTwist . Now let us talk about what AvaTwist is all about. The Internet used to be a one way communication where we would go to a site and get information, but things have changed big time. Now the sites we visit are now connecting to us and building a profile and SAVING EVERYTHING!!!  To me, being tracked is not something I want or think is very ethical. The two things that I really do not like are when my PERSONAL INFORMATION is sold, and that EVERYTHING IS SAVED FOREVER!! Even if you think you deleted something, it is saved somewhere on the web and tied back to U!! Think of what it will be like in 20 years if we continue giving away all of our information online and our whole life story is there for the WORLD to see.

So here are some general things I have learned about the Internet: I learned every Internet connection has a specific IP address that allows your Internet Service Provider (ISP) and anyone else with the right software to know your exact location. They then cross check this information with other records to find out the names of the individuals in the house or the name of the business. There are many other ways we are being tracked on the internet, anytime you put in your email address, every time you click on the “I agree” button or answer a question about your hair color, eye color, street address etc. With this information your service provider or any marketer now knows you and where you surf; and they keep track of it. If that isn't bad enough, here is where it gets scarier, the number of entities that are tracking you by the time you have gone to 4 or 5 different websites is now somewhere between 100 and 150. Then they take all the information that they have gathered from your searching habits and turn around and sell it to anyone who is interested in buying it. Worse, there are companies that combine the information from many marketers to get a better picture of you, which is then sold for more money. This is all LEGAL; never mind the companies and people that are illegally stealing your personal information!!
We have patent pending technology that combines two things we believe no one else has ever done before. We “twist” you, changing your IP address (where you are physically) and then mask the real U using Avatars. This also makes it fun because you can be someone else, and deep down we all want to be someone or something we are not.
 
You can have as many Avatars as you want.  In early beta testing my friend Brittni uses three Avatars; one for her friends and family to connect with her to share pictures and other things she doesn't want to share with the rest of the WORLD as Brittni.   The second one is for her to be whomever she wants to be and NO ONE knows who she is.   The third one is an Avatar of herself…. Brittni, so she can use Social Media and other types of Online services to stay connected with her business contacts and to reconnect with people from her past. 

The big key to our success is ease of use. Our user interface is simple and easy to use, if it was complex like our back-end software, then no one would use it. We have developed a simple two step process to get “Twisted” and choose your “Avatar”. To me, this will be a big difference in how successful we are. We really think there is a need for our product but if it is hard to use people will just continue business as usual.
 
If you have read this far then I recommend watching our really cool video for more on AvaTwist, or checking out our website www.avatwist.com .  I am really enthusiastic about this project and am willing to talk with anyone who has any questions or wants to learn more. I can be reached via email or by phone Here.   I hope you consider participating in our project and look forward to seeing what you think of AVATWIST!!
Reasons someone would use AvaTwist:
1) Tracking Prevention: 
It is a fact that everywhere you go on the internet is being tracked, saved and sold!!!!   Are you sick of it? I know we are!!!!
2) Private Surfing: 
We have all visited websites privately that we don’t want to share with others; Avatwist makes sure it stays private.
3) Identity Protection: 
When you want to protect your identity from predators and identity thieves.
4) On-Line Dating: 
You want to try out on-line dating, but you are a little nervous about it, no worries here, visit the sites you want and they won’t know it’s you.
5) Job Search: 
Searching for a new job when you are currently employed. What would your boss do if he/she found out you were searching for a new job on your lunch hour?
6) Personal Issues:
To investigate items of an extremely personal nature that you do not wish to share with others.
7) Famous People: 
Are you a Celebrity? A Politician? Or a Professional Athlete? Either way you have a following!!   You just want to access the internet in private without worrying that someone is watching every site you visit and every product you look at.
8) Personal Beliefs:
 Do you want to express your political or religious beliefs to the world without offending your close family ties? Use your Avatar and have at it, no one will know it is you!
9) Business Applications:
 You want to price shop the competition, without the competition knowing it’s you!
10) Competitive Analysis:
 When you are in business you want to make sure you are always at the top of your game. You can do that by comparing many things about your organization with the information you can find out about your competitors on their websites. You just want to do it privately.
11) Anonymous Browsing:
You went shopping for a new car, bicycle, or a motorcycle (insert product here), and now every site you visit has a Pop Up ad for new cars, bicycles, and motorcycles (or whatever products you were looking at). We can fix that!!!!
12) Enjoyment:
Because I want to and it’s fun!!!
13) Gaming: 
Have your gaming Avatar coincide with your AvaTwist Avatar and be the Goblin of the virtual and online worlds!!!
14) Good Parenting: 
We all want to protect our child’s online identity and location from would be predators.
15) Secret Shopping:
 Have you ever visited sites that you don’t want others to know you visited (shopping for a surprise birthday present for a loved one)?
16) Anonymous Window Shopping: 
17) Freedom to be You:
 When you don’t want your usage characteristics sold to other companies.
18) Speak Your Mind: 
There are many things going on in the world today that you want to blog about, but you want to do it anonymously. We can help with that.

story:
In modern life, you spend an average 3-5 hours per day on mobile devices, you love to take your entertainment around with you outdoors, but you’re not getting the full experience without strong power. Power banks become the must-have companions you need to carry almost every day, but they are not all made equal. 

 

The Outxe W20 is designed to be the best outdoor power bank for modern travelers. Imagine if you can get IP67 rating 20000mAh portable power, wireless charging, quick charging & recharging, unlimited solar power backup that fit in your pocket or hang on your backpack. 

 

OUTXE is a creative and courageous brand aiming at providing you with specifically designed products for outdoors. With OUTXE, you will have great assistants on the go, and every single moment of your journey during the adventure will be unforgettable. 

 

You always used to be worrying about a running out of battery of your devices, in the outdoors, in the mountains, or even on the planes. With W20 power bank, your worry will be reduced to nothing. The capacity of 20000mAh/74Wh can charge your devices for several times with one recharge and it is also the largest capacity that you can take with your luggage onto a plane. 

 

 

What if all of your devices send out warnings of low battery at the same time? And there is only one output on your power bank? It might drive you mad at shifting the charging of those devices from time to time. But now, you can retreat to a reassuring state of mind with Outxe W20. Two quick charging outputs and one wireless charging pad for wireless charging enabled devices, W20 can charge 3 of your devices in a flash at the same time. 

 

For those, just like you,  who like outdoor activities, waiting means wasting time. But now, you don’t have to wait for a century before your power bank is fully charged. Recharge with both inputs on W20, and the needing time will be minimized down to 6.5 Hrs. 

 

This power bank is designed with IP67, the rating that gives a full range safeguard to the power bank against any water and dust threats. You won’t be stopped by any bad days when exploring outdoors. Being crushproof and dustproof, you can also take it with you in the mountains, in the desert or on the sea, using it as a backup, to take you back home safely.

 

The most obvious feature in our futuristic utopia is that people do not have to fumble with a cable to plug into the phone or other devices anymore. We are not there yet. But now, we have the prototype of such a magic device on our power bank. With a wireless charging pad in the center of the power bank, a simple placing of your devices on it will get them fully powered in the next morning. 

 

There is a solar panel on the backside of W20, acting as an emergency backup once your power bank is running out of battery. Under direct sunlight, the solar panel will charge the power bank automatically. Hold it on your hand or hang it on your backpack, then a trickle of power will flow into it. 

 

W20 is equipped with 3 LED lighting modes including strong, weak and SOS, bring you a  beam of bright light in the darkness when walking in the jungle, camping in the forest, or sailing on the sea. Longer than usual using time of 70 hours keeps your outdoor adventure always going on. 

 

To achieve a best secured capability, we designed it with many protective internal structures, including 3mm 4-corner cushion, over 2.5mm rugged casing, unibody water-tight ring, soft rubber lid with 3-layer groove pattern, 0.7mm foam pad and protective panel under the solar panel. Rugged enough for any outdoor challenge.

 

Camo always stands in the frontier of trend all the time, an everlasting symbol of outdoor activities and adventures. W20 has a Camo appearance to fit your taste in fashion,  a well integration of outdoor experience and fashion spirit.

 

We have prepared all the accessories you need or may need in future in our combo. You do not have to fumble around to get a right one.

 

The following video demonstrated a fully functional pre-production OUTXE W20 combo with all functions working. 

 

OUTXE W20 TEST VIDEO

 

 OUTXE is a professional team aimed at facilitating your outdoor adventures and activities, hoping to make every of your outdoor experience the most unforgettable moment in your life. OUTXE products are widely welcomed and appreciated as they always make a big difference in the users’ experience. The ratings are very high among customers. 

 

 

In February of 2019, the prototype of W20 power bank came out. After ended with the round 3 trial production, we launched here our Kickstarter campaign, Outxe W20 - The ultimate wireless solar power bank with IP67 rating in August of 2019, which is specially designed for outdoor trips, and we always carefully consider the quality of the materials we use, their cost, the environment – and ultimately, your satisfaction. 

We have spent months in developing, testing and prototyping, even completed the molding before the campaign started. We need your support to start the mass production and make it come to life.
