story:
A few months ago, we were running this successful project with over 1700% achievement within 30 days. Thanks to our Kickstarter Angels, our project folded up with great applauses. It was fantastic experience and unforgettable! But we never ended up there though. We have been constantly receiving messages from a lot of people showing their interests in qualMeter series, thus, we decided to re launch qualMeter series as Pre-Sale project on Indiegogo In-Demand to serve more of our fans!
 

QooPow™ qualMeter in the News:

 

http://www.geeky-gadgets.com/qoometer-smart-usb-charger-hits-kickstarter-10-02-2016/

 

http://www.kicktraq.com/projects/1187836018/qoometer-finally-a-smart-usb-cable-charger-tester/

 

http://www.trendhunter.com/trends/charger-tester

 

http://www.omicrono.com/2016/02/protege-tus-dispositivos-de-cables-usb-baratos-con-este-aparato/ (Spanish)

 

http://www.shenzhenware.com/articles/10614 (Chinese-中文)

 
http://www.eefocus.com/test-measurement/358677/r0 (Chinese-中文)
 

 

Introducing the QooPow™ qualMeter series

 

 

 

QooPow™ qualMeter series are revolutionary, smart and cost-efficient DIY devices, which can simply help you to diagnostic and get to know the quality of your USB cables and chargers in a glance without any technical background. 

With a qualMeter product around, you will never need to worry about on getting wrong cables and chargers for your precious smartphone or tablet.

qualMeter series handle wide range of mainstream USB charging cables. It also tests loading capability of the 5v chargers to roughly define their quality.

 

 

 

Why We Make qualMeter products?

Our motivation for creating the QooPow™ qualMeter was from the observation that there are too many low quality and compromised charging products in the market, especially 3rd-party charging cables and chargers. There is lacking of an easy and simple way to measure the quality of charging cables and chargers for people.

In our daily life, USB cables and chargers are playing big role of mobile device charging, therefore their quality is critical for the charging. Low quality charging cables and chargers could cause serious damage on your mobile devices or might even burn down your house. You can easily find tons of images, videos and stories by simply search Google and YouTube with keywords like charging cable burning, charger on fire etc. 

Well, a burning or something on fire is very obvious to us to catch. The question is how can we find it out before it burns? or even before we buy it?

Furthermore, there are also other important but hidden impacts that most of people wouldn’t know in a easy way such as slow charging, strange behaviors on smart phone when charging, dropping data transfer and so on. The following Tip would give you some ideas about how a low quality charging cable will cause slow charging.

Tech Tips:

Wondering why is your charging so slow? A non-qualified charging cable could have a dramatic voltage drop. For example, if your charging cable's impedance is 500mΩ, which many low quality cables do. It will have 0.5v drop @1A charging current, that means you will only get 4.5v at the phone end when your charger provides 5v for charging. Most of smart phones won't even charge in this case. That explains a lot of charging issues we have.

A Low Quality Cable at Charging

In addition, the charging current is now getting higher and higher due to massive application of smart devices. Many devices are charged at 2A or above such as pads and tablets etc. The quality of charging cable has become critical nowadays. Take the given example above, it will have 1v dropping if you are charging at 2A current which leads to only 4v to the device end. Beside the safety issue you may have, there will be certainly no charging at this low voltage for smart devices.

FYI, Check out this USB charging cable review video from YouTube: （in case if you are not able to watch here, here is the link: https://youtu.be/doMHmGatyYc）

Unfortunately, like the above video, to evaluate the performance of the charging cable and charger is not really an easy task for most of non-tech people or even sometimes for tech people. It requires not only some electronic knowledge but also needs expensive testing equipment. People find it's very hard to deal with all different kind of massive charging products.

 

QualMeter is the easiest and smart way for you to rule the charging.

QooPow™ qualMeter series was initially made for our own lab demanding as we are developing smart and fast charging products for mobile devices. The purpose of making such tool was based on the situation that we needed to roughly measure the different qualities of the cables/chargers and their impact on our products’ performance. 

With qualMeter series, we are able to easily category the pile of cables and chargers without complicated reading and analyzing. When some of our friends were showing their great interests in this little device, we started to realize that it could benefit others. That's why we decided to take it to Indiegogo In-Demand project and to share with you.

One of our friends, Rebecca, was suspecting on one of her new bought charging cables, which always felt hot when charging. We gave Rebecca one of our qualMeter prototypes for testing. By using the qualMeter, she was able to find out this cable was in a bad condition before the wire burns on fire. She then checked rest of her cables and chargers, and was able to eliminate 2 other bad cables and 1 bad charger. The next day, Rebecca went shopping. With a little help from qualMeter she bought 3 good cables in a decent price. The businessman was shocked to see her using qualMeter and even asked her where to get one. Lol~ Rebecca was extremely happy with qualMeter, because she's smarter. 

What makes the qualMeter so unique is that it comes along with a simple idea that everyone can measure the quality of random cable/charger in a simple way, an affordable way. It intends to provide an easy and simple solution in a fairly low cost. 

qualMeter series is designed for non-tech people but can certainly be used by tech-savvies for roughly testing as well.

 

Who would need QooPow™ qualMeter series?

If you…

  • Are unsure about the quality of your USB cable & charger;
  • Are looking for safe and faster charging; 
  • Don’t want to be cheated by those unscrupulous businessmen; 
  • Are tired with poor quality of charging cables and chargers; 
  • Have ever been in dilemma of choosing right USB cable/charger; 
  • Are dealing with USB cables/chargers as a business; 
  • Wanted to have easier and simpler solution to rank the pile of cables/chargers; 

More...

 

The Features of QooPow™ qualMeter series

Despite that versions vary slightly based on their functionalities, qualMeter is basically made for testing USB charging cables and chargers. It has two major functions:

Cable Test Mode - Simply connect both ends of your USB charging cable with qualMeter and plug it into any 5v USB charging port. You can read the LED indicators to have an idea about the quality of your charging cable.

Charger Test Mode - Simply plug qualMeter into any 5v USB charging port. You can read the LED indicators to have an idea about the quality of your USB Charger.

QualMeter has embedded an ultra low power Micro-Processor, a brain, to provide the ability of being smart. Beside its main Cable Test and Charger Test features, it also comes with the following highlighted features:

Cable Shielded Test – A shielded cable usually has better quality. It’s not only good for charging but also a benefit for data transferring.

Cable Short Circuit Test - When you plug qualMeter at Cable Test Mode, the red LED indicator will start flashing If your cable is shorted. You should stop using this cable immediately!

Reversible USB plug – With the reversible USB plug design, you don’t have to worried about the direction of plugging into a USB charging port. 

 

 

 

Plug n Play – qualMeter comes with no switch or any control button. There is no manual operation needed to be done. It works automatically according to the status it detects.

 

How does QooPow™ qualMeter work?

qualMeter is designed to provide a simple and straightforward way to test cable and charger without any technical background. That means with qualMeter in hand, everyone is able to distinguish the quality of a cable or a charger.

Simply connect the cable you want to test into corresponding ports as following diagram

QooPow™ qualMeter has two main testing modes, cable test and charger test. It automatically switches between two modes.

 

Charger Test Mode: Without cable plugged in, Charger test mode is enabled right away when qualMeter has been plugged into an USB power source. The orange charger test indicator lights up and it also confirms the testing current is 1A. You can find out the quality of this charger at 1A output by reading the Quality Indicators on the left.

 

Cable Test Mode: Cable test mode will be enabled when both ends of a cable have been connected with qualMeter. Then plug qualMeter into an USB power source. The blue cable test indicator (the left one) will be turned on. You can find out the quality of this cable by reading the Quality Indicators on the left.

 

 

Shielded Indication: At the Cable Test mode, if the blue Shielded Indicator (the right one) lights up, it means this cable is shielded.

 

 

Cable Short Circuit Test - is as simple as other functions. Just plug both ends of the cable into qualMeter as usual, then plug qualMeter into any 5v USB port. The red LED indicator will start flashing If your cable is shorted. Otherwise, if the cable is not shorted, the qualMeter will automatically start the Cable Test mode to tell you how good is this cable. That’s it ! :)

 

 

 

How to read the testing results?

Unlike regular testing devices, there are no numbers bother to read, no buttons, no extra operations, no calculations and no technical background are needed. All you need to know is just colors, the Green, Yellow and Red, which correspond to Good, Fair(OK) and Bad. That’s it! 

You see colors; you see the quality of your cable and charger.

 

QooPow™ qualMeter is suitable for wide range of mainstream cables and is compatible with most of major 5v USB chargers.

Specifications

  • Main Material：Raw PCB (CCL FR-4) Pb free
  • Dimension: 47.8mm x 23.8mm x 11mm (the length of the USB plug is not included)
  • Power Input: USB Type A reversible Male Connector
  • Input Voltage: 4.5~5.5v
  • Cable Test Connectors: USB Type A Female Connector, 4 types of mainstream charging connectors such as Micro-USB, Mini-USB and others.
  • Charger Test Current: @1A
  • LED Indicators: Green x2, Yellow x2, Red x2, Blue x2 and Orange x1  
 

 

The more advanced version - qualMeter X

 

In response to many requests from our angel backers of our previous campaign, we brought up qualMeter X version into our QooPow™ qualMeter product series. It comes with more advanced features than basic version.

 

 

It provides more advanced Charger Test function by allowing 1A/1.5A/2A/2.5A/3A output testing and an Output Compensation indicator, which can cover almost all major USB chargers

 

 

Here are the list of the functions on qualMeter X:

 
  • All functions from qualMeter basic version; 
  • 2x USB Type-C ports are now added (which you are all asking for :)); 
  • Advanced Cable Test Mode, @1A/2A; 
  • Advanced Charger Test Mode, Full range 1~3.1A (100mA step) Current testing; 
  • Adjustable Electronic Load;
  • Output Compensation Indication;
  • 32-bit 48MHz MCU;
  • Flash memory for saving the last testing result;
  • Specially made transparent enclosure;
  • Extension for Future Functions.
 

The qualMeter X is about 1/3 bigger compare to qualMeter basic version.

 

 

More information please visit our website www.qoopow.com

How does qualMeter X work?

Same as qualMeter basic, the X version is also simple to use. 

 

 

The Enclosure for qualMeter X

 

As we have promised during Kickstarter Campaign, a transparent enclosure has been designed and will be shipped together with qualMeter X. As the result, The original idea of RAW-PCBA looking qualMeter X is no longer available.

 

However, since the enclosure is still in the molding stage we don't have the real product picture yet. It will be updated as soon as we have the final product in hand.

 

Accessory for qualMeter - miniLoad

 

 

 

 

miniLoad is the complement to qualMeter basic version providing wider range of charger testing functionality. Due to the infrastructure of qualMeter, it's not possible to directly add the charger testing load on the mainboard since we also wanted to keep the simplicity of the qualMeter.

QooPow miniLoad is specially designed to extend charger testing range for qualMeter basic version. It provides the ability to allow qualMeter basic tests 2.1/2.4/3A output of the charger. Simply use the switch to switch among 2.1A, 2.4A and 3A.

 

 

MiniLoad is very simple to use. When inserted the rear socket of qualMeter basic version, it connects as extension.

QualMeter basic version with miniLoad is not duplicate to X version. Different from qualMeter X, the combination of the "qualMeter basic & miniLoad" is aiming to simple and rough testing for non-tech people. It only has 4 stops 1A, 2.1A, 2.4A and 3A for most of the common chargers in the market. While qualMeter X can measure more detailed current output from 1A to 3.1A with 100mA each step.

Notice: miniLoad can only work with qualMeter basic version. It doesn't work as an individual load, neither work for qualMeter X.

 

 

The Perks

 

Currently, we only offer qualMeter X version due to the strategic adjustment on our products line. The perks with qualMeter Basic version are not available any more.

Note: All pre-ordered qualMeter X will be shipped with an enclosure.

 

The Schedule for Pre Order Delivery

For Indiegogo InDemand Pre-Sale project, the nearest delivery time will be on May 2017.

Notice: This schedule is subjected to change. It may delay if our pre-sale order doesn't meet the manufactures' minimum order requirement. Or it may be pre-dated if we can meet the manufactures' minimum order requirement earlier.

If you don't want to wait and wanted to get the qualMeters as soon as possible, you can visit our online store and get qualMeters at regular retail price.  We reserve small amount of inventory for web sale after our first mass production.

 

Who we are

 

Intelliplus is a creative tech start-up formed in 2013, who is focusing on Smart-Ware development. Our vision is to Make Life Easier & Simpler. Currently our main development team is based in Chengdu, China. Chengdu is one of the biggest cities in western china. With her over 2,500 years of historical and humanistic culture, Chengdu is also well known as the cradle of China IT industry. And our manufacturing partners are mainly located in Shenzhen, China, where is the world's IT manufacturing center.

 

We have been contracting and working with one of the top Internet Companies in China and helping them to build fast charging products under their own brand since 2014. By going deeper and gaining more knowledge on the fast charging technologies, we think it’s time to launch our own smart charging products and brand - The QooPow™ series.

 

On our mind, charging is one of the things that should be peaceful and joyful like art. It should be a part of our quality life. Despite there are plenty of charging related products in the market, few of them can stand out. In fact, there are too many low quality and compromised products. People deserve better charging products!

 

We believe we can do better! And here we go.

 

By launching the QooPow™ qualMeter as pre-sale project with the excitement, we are proud that we have made it and will continue to do so. Other QooPow™ series smart charging products are in the line of development, more to come.

 

The core team

 

 

What you can help us? 

 

Our efforts over the past two years on smart and fast charging technologies have helped to bring qualMeter series onto Indiegogo In-Demand stage where you are connected to participate. A journey we have started to Make Life Easier and Simpler, and to free our mind to make our world a better place! 

 

qualMeter series is our ice breaker to the world. And now, we are heading to mass production and turn our idea into real market! 

 

Thank you! qualMeter lovers and Viewers, with your help and support we can: 

 
  • Purchase all materials for production;
  • Build up global Distribution; 
  • Setup customer service team;
  • Continue to develop, to optimize and to upgrade products;
  • Increase our unit shipment;
  • Make us stronger;
  • Others
 

 

Big thank you & Stay in touch!

Big thank you to everyone who stops by here. Our team is fully committed to support not only our backers, buyers but all our community.
 

 

Register on our QooPow™ Smart & Fast Charging forum and subscribe to our Newsletter in receiving the rewards, exclusive offer for backers, specials, discounts and latest news updates and in answering all the issues and concerns in time!

 

Below are more ways to stay connected with us. Please join us and be part of our happy journey!

 

 

https://www.facebook.com/qoopower/

 

https://twitter.com/qoopow
https://plus.google.com/107882179424471324735

Risks and challenges

 

Mass Production:
Production is jumping on the stage at the moment as we are rolling the schedule down towards fruition. We have fully understanding that production plays big role in the project and also we are also aware that there might always be some unforeseen troubles in the way to mass production. We will further leverage our resources and try all the angles to ensure our expectations are met. Our manufacturing partners we’ve been working with are the tops in the industry with decades of experiences. We have locked down high quality and schedule with agreement to ensure the orders are fulfilled as promised.

Product updates:
As all our community know that most of pictures showing above are not final version. The product details may be slightly different over the manufacturing process. Optimization is what it takes and more to lock off highest quality possible. The updates will be regularly sent out to our community.

Delivery:
Since all the manufacturing will be done in China, the rewards will be sent from China as well. We are aware that there may be issues that are unexpected when it comes to international shipping. Our solution is to set up second backup in logistics to avoid delivery failure. This way the shipping risk will be truly minimized. The issues such as on route delay and other unexpected things may happen that we are willing to do our best to avoid and to help solving them if it happened. However, we are not able to take the responsibility on the import duties you may be charged by the custom.

You want to use your office phone hands-free. You could buy an expensive unit that comes with its own headset OR you could use this!

With iConnect - you have way more hands-free choices AND save LOTS of money.

Works with ANY telephone AND ANY Bluetooth or Wired hands-free ear/head-set!

iConnect is an elegant solution to the dilemma 83% of the population of the world has: the convenience of a clear land line but no mobility. iConnect Hands-Free allows you to move away from your phone while receiving great reception up to 60-90 feet. It is as small as a two packs of gum and allows you to use the same headset or bluetooth that you already use for your mobile phone with a push of a button. If you use a landline for better reception at home, it turns it into a mobile unit that allows you to cook, clean or use the computer while on the phone. If you are at a desk that uses a landline, you can avoid the sore neck syndrome and move around the office without losing the quality of the sound. If you are in a hotel room, you can use the hotel's phone and move around the room for longer business and personal calls.

It's cheaper than other products out there that do similar tasks so you will save money and get a better quality of sound than what is on the market presently. If your mobile phone came with a wired ear set you can save even more money by using that!


It works with any conventional telephone even if it’s a modern VoIP (Voice over IP) phone. It can be used with a single or multiple line telephone – the phone just has to have a cord between the base and its handset. The iConnect Hands-Free device connects easily in-line with that cord - anywhere. After plugging it in, the telephone operates normally and turns into a hands-free phone.

It is the size of two packs of gum and uses an internal rechargeable battery 1.5” W x 3” L x 0.75” H without a case or shell

Note The picture – the little blue squares show where iConnect HF attaches.

 

A picture of the proposed case (a two piece- click together shell) - it's in the Gallery.

 

You ask -

What makes this device different than what's out there already??!!

1) ALL other products that are similar make you buy THEIR Bluetooth ear-set and is 'married' only to that unit they sell. If it fails, you have to buy that unique model's part at an inflated cost. With iC HF, you can use ANY Bluetooth ear-set of ANY style.


2) NO other product gives you the option to use wireless OR wired. In fact, there are very few that have a wired unit that allows you to use YOUR wired headset.

3) The closest competitive offerings are anywhere from 5 to 10 times more expensive! iC HF does ALL the same things for up to a 10th the cost. Remember you don't have to buy the ear-set, you already OWN IT!

4) iC HF is truly portable! It is much smaller than the competitive offerings. Easily fits in your pocket and can be used ANYWHERE in the world!

 

 

iConnect HF – the Basic info

When you purchased your mobile/cell phone, it came with a wired plug-in ear piece with a microphone in the cord. With iConnect HF, you can use this wired ear-set! Or, you purchased a separate wireless Bluetooth earpiece so you could be hands-free with your mobile phone. With iConnect HF, you can use this wireless ear-set! This device can be used world-wide. Any standard or VoIP telephone can be made hands-free with iConnect utilizing the hands-free device you already own! Using a speaker phone is hands-free but think of a more private conversation using iConnect.

 

Where it is now …

It exists as a working prototype that just needs a few tweaks. 

I have invested a lot of personal funds already and am just at the point to being able to fully patent and market it. With your help, I can finish the engineering and provide samples to those who have already expressed an interest in marketing it, including major electronic resellers and TV product selling channels.  With your help I can aim for a world-wide market and have my dream of creating an invention that makes life easier for thousands of people around the world. 

It has one bug (the wireless Bluetooth works fine; but with the plug-in wired head-set - you can hear the caller, but they can’t hear you). That means it has a fix as the wireless portion works just fine. The other is that the power supply charger portion needs to be updated from Nokia-type to the more ubiquitous mini 1A 5VDC USB type. The 3 LEDs are just not bright enough and need to be changed to more efficient ones. Last, a better battery solution needs to fit between the device’s two RJ9 jacks.

What I Need & What You Get

The good news is, it works and it's mostly functional. I built up three prototypes that need to be demonstrated to the major electronic stores as soon as I can get it to the 100% level. They have been contacted and are considering carrying it as a telephone and mobile phone accessory. From these royalties, I can pay off the remaining debt and finish the patent application. Or, with enough contributions; I can go directly into production and build both Asia versions for world-wide sales and US Built versions too from the same manufacturer that is based both here in the Silicon Valley with additional manufacturing capabilities in China. Also, any extra funding will be to get the extra wireless approvals (the BT chip is approved FCC and ETSI, but not the finished device). Any more funding and I can streamline its introduction and be able to patent iConnect worldwide.

I now need to move to the next phase of development which is the tooling for full production and making case molds. The investment in Marketing, Patenting, R&D and bench testing has taken over 1 year so I know that the design is sound and all that remains is funding the final phase of our project.

By backing this project you will enable me to bring iConnect Hands-Free to the world and a dream to reality. You will also be enabling me to hire and bring on talented people to continue the work to bring other ideas for products that extend the use of things you already own and other re-use designs for the future.

What's in it for you?

As a backer of our project you will be one of the first to get a brand new fully functional iConnect HF in your hand for use at the office, home or when you travel. By being a part of the project in its infancy, you will receive your very own signed (by me, the inventor) device and the knowledge that you were a part of something big that created something very small.

Where will your funding go?

First - Complete the initial product with the software fix, brighter LEDs and power supply. If I get more, I will get the PCB re-laid out so all components are on the top so it’s easier and much less costly to manufacture in higher quantities. If the funding I receive is SUPER, I will be able to complete the patent applications to the USPTO and build the better version for direct sales! I have already invested heavily in the development of this project. Your funding is the critical link to the completion of our project and will be used to realize a dream!

I have working prototypes and a supply chain that's ready to go. I need your help to take the next step(s).

What is iConnect HF (Hands-Free)?

It is a small dual capability (wired AND wireless) device to make a typical telephone hands-free when you want it to be.

How does iConnect HF work?

It’s very simple to use. If you’re going to use the wireless Bluetooth option, you just have to one-time pair it within an inch (security feature so will not pair with devices you don’t want it to) on the iC HF with your ear-set or other BT enabled wireless device. After that, it works up to 60 feet or so away per the Bluetooth standard. If you want to use your wired hands-free ear-set, push the button twice. The second push will disable and turn off the wireless Bluetooth and enable both ear set jacks on the device (great for those who don’t want wireless near their body and want the extra security too).

Thank you so very very much !!!!!

About Roundcube webmail: Site, Wikipedia;

 About Spritely: Site;

 Letter info: Harry Potter wikia;

 How to contact someone: Indiegogo support page.

Henshin Justice Unlimited is beyond a dream come true. I started like most of us - just a guy watching Power Rangers and more often than not being mocked for it. My closest friends watched it with me, but it was pretty much only me that stuck with it.

Then the Internet happened. I found that I wasn't the only one in to this kinda stuff.  I found sites that sold fansubbed tapes, I found online communities and just a wealth of fans that actually wanted to discuss the lore of these silly/awesome shows. And through meeting and befriending incredibly heroic people that are now my geek family, HJU was born and we all got to hang together.  

Literally hundreds of thousands of individuals have graced our humble halls of justice. Old fans, new born fans, and I know of one couple even that met on our boards and married. I can't thank you enough and now I ask for your help. 

 

I give you, the Power Up Justice Indigogo Campaign for HenshinJustice.Com. We've pulled together in the past to raise money for worthy causes.... and this time the fight... is for you. I have a lot of friends and connections that can help kick HJU in to overdrive, but coding, licenses, and some custom reprogramming is needed, and that will cost us some money. 

 

If we hit the goal of $1,200 we get our own dedicated server for a year. That means no more slowdowns and a lot more security.   

 

But I want to do a full-on overhaul. Fully customized HJU Store, gallery, podcasting, combining the blog and forum completely and several other cool ideas to make HJU all that it possibly can be. It will cost around $4,500 for all the improvements we need and the work needed to do it. Anything over that goes back into the site and related projects to make your experience more fun, interactive, enjoyable and what I hope will become the vehicle that continues to grow our fandom for many years to come. 

 

We've friends from ToonZone.Net willing to help with the redesign, our friends from Toku Access are helping supply the t-shirt rewards, Hypercats Network is working on some custom toys, and as time rolls on we'll see what else we can do to make this donation drive fun and in a show of thanks... see if we can't give you something in return for all of your help. 

 

So, that's it. Together we have made this dream of our fandom a reality and now let's work together to make an even greater dream for all of us that are a part of the HJU family and those that are still to come. 

 

$1,200 - Dedicated Server 

 

$4,500 - Site Redesign and Overhaul: Fully integrated blog, forum, gallery, mobile app and we will have our very own HJU Store.

 

$5,000 - I will watch all of Kamen Rider Den-O.

story:
Missed the campaign but still want a DashIT?  DashIT is now available on Amazon.com!  You can also like us on facebook to follow our progress into traditional retail outlets!

*** Exciting Updates ****

1. We just got a mention on the iPhoneLife blog!  Check it out here! and we were Gadget of the Week on Retrevo!  See the write up and Stephanie talking about DashIT at our CES booth here.

2. DashIT and Nic and Steph were highlighted by the Washington Business Journal!  Check it out here!

3. The CEA blog ran a buest blog by our own Rebecca Geraghty about DashIT!  

4. DashIT was highlighted & Stephanie quoted in a press release to the entire southern region of the country about CES 2013!  It's really happening!!

*****************************

We invented DashIT so drivers can get their smartphones out of their laps & cupholders and their eyes back on the road!
 
It's a great time to be a driver.  With smartphones and maps apps, we can get anywhere in the world.  Drivers are embracing this technology, and relying on smartphones as their preferred navigation tool.  However, far too often drivers stash phones in the car cupholder, and turn away from the road to check their next turn.  We believe that drivers deserve better, and set out to invent a convenient and safe way to navigate on the road.
 
We came up with DashIT, a simple way for drivers to keep smartphone maps within sight while driving.  We looked at all the methods available on the market, from the suction cup, to the sticky adhesive, and nothing did the trick.  So we designed, engineered and are producing the first run of this car accessory that rests on the car dashboard propping the phone up at an angle so the driver can navigate with ease.  It's quite simple really: a mount that works with most any phone in just about any car, that keeps your maps within sight.  
 
 
This means no more:
  • Craning your neck to peek at the cell phone stashed in your cupholder
  • Left hand vice grip on the steering wheel while right hand flashes the phone in front of your eyes to catch that exit number
  • Suction cup face attacks
  • Permanent structure on your dashboard
  • Unsafe cell phone navigation
  • Attracting thieves by telling them you have something valuable with the tell-tale suction cup ring on your windshield
  • Bulky non-portable mounts  

Why is DashIT unique?

There are hundreds of phone holder accessories out there.  Yet dashboard accessories fall into two categories.  They either rely on the suction cup, which flies off too easily and requires effort to reach OR they lie the phone flush against the dashboard, so that you can't see it from the driver's seat.  This renders the phone navigation system useless since it is out of view.  
Instead, DashIT's patent pending design adheres to the dashboard for only as long as you need it, and places the phone at the ideal angle for viewing.  
 
It is as simple as it gets... it lays on a flat surface and provides a gripping support element that displays the phone at optimal viewing angle!

What We Need & What You Get

We need funding to get a production mold crafted and to order our first production run.  We are looking for help from folks like you to take this idea and push it out to the marketplace.  We've funded the prototyping all on our own and intend to use this production run to prove the concept and then begin to market the idea at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in January.  We've put on our creative thinking caps about perks, but we figure what most of you want is either to try out a DashIT or to be a part of something that is going to succeed, so we've structured our perks so you can do both.
 
 

The Impact

This project could literally save lives.  Handsfree laws are popping up around the world because fiddling with your phone while driving is dangerous.  But the best, most up-to-date GPS navigation is available on your smartphone.  Device specific windshield mounted suction cup holders are cumbersome and often difficult to reach.  As a result, even if you have one it may not be in the right car, or fit the device you have with you.  With DashIT it's easy to dash into your car with any device and just drop it in, no levers, no suction cups, no hassle!  It's as easy as dropping it into your cup holder (which, admit it, is where most of us stow our phone while driving!)
 
Stop craning your neck to view your next turn, stop paying costly map updates to a traditional GPS, and stop worrying about the suction cup flying across the car in rush hour. DashIT means you have one less thing to worry about on the road.

Please buy yours and help us spread the word today!

Please add $5 for shipping outside of the Contiguous United States.
story_txt:
Missed the campaign but still want a DashIT?  DashIT is now available on Amazon.com!  You can also like us on facebook to follow our progress into traditional retail outlets!
*** Exciting Updates ****
1. We just got a mention on the iPhoneLife blog!  Check it out here! and we were Gadget of the Week on Retrevo!  See the write up and Stephanie talking about DashIT at our CES booth here.
2. DashIT and Nic and Steph were highlighted by the Washington Business Journal!  Check it out here!
3. The CEA blog ran a buest blog by our own Rebecca Geraghty about DashIT!  
4. DashIT was highlighted & Stephanie quoted in a press release to the entire southern region of the country about CES 2013!  It's really happening!!
*****************************
We invented DashIT so drivers can get their smartphones out of their laps & cupholders and their eyes back on the road!
 
It's a great time to be a driver.  With smartphones and maps apps, we can get anywhere in the world.  Drivers are embracing this technology, and relying on smartphones as their preferred navigation tool.  However, far too often drivers stash phones in the car cupholder, and turn away from the road to check their next turn.  We believe that drivers deserve better, and set out to invent a convenient and safe way to navigate on the road.

 
We came up with DashIT, a simple way for drivers to keep smartphone maps within sight while driving.  We looked at all the methods available on the market, from the suction cup, to the sticky adhesive, and nothing did the trick.  So we designed, engineered and are producing the first run of this car accessory that rests on the car dashboard propping the phone up at an angle so the driver can navigate with ease.  It's quite simple really: a mount that works with most any phone in just about any car, that keeps your maps within sight.  

 

 
This means no more:


Craning your neck to peek at the cell phone stashed in your cupholder
Left hand vice grip on the steering wheel while right hand flashes the phone in front of your eyes to catch that exit number
Suction cup face attacks
Permanent structure on your dashboard
Unsafe cell phone navigation
Attracting thieves by telling them you have something valuable with the tell-tale suction cup ring on your windshield
Bulky non-portable mounts  





Why is DashIT unique?
There are hundreds of phone holder accessories out there.  Yet dashboard accessories fall into two categories.  They either rely on the suction cup, which flies off too easily and requires effort to reach OR they lie the phone flush against the dashboard, so that you can't see it from the driver's seat.  This renders the phone navigation system useless since it is out of view.  
Instead, DashIT's patent pending design adheres to the dashboard for only as long as you need it, and places the phone at the ideal angle for viewing.  
 
It is as simple as it gets... it lays on a flat surface and provides a gripping support element that displays the phone at optimal viewing angle!


What We Need & What You Get
We need funding to get a production mold crafted and to order our first production run.  We are looking for help from folks like you to take this idea and push it out to the marketplace.  We've funded the prototyping all on our own and intend to use this production run to prove the concept and then begin to market the idea at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in January.  We've put on our creative thinking caps about perks, but we figure what most of you want is either to try out a DashIT or to be a part of something that is going to succeed, so we've structured our perks so you can do both.
 

 
The Impact


This project could literally save lives.  Handsfree laws are popping up around the world because fiddling with your phone while driving is dangerous.  But the best, most up-to-date GPS navigation is available on your smartphone.  Device specific windshield mounted suction cup holders are cumbersome and often difficult to reach.  As a result, even if you have one it may not be in the right car, or fit the device you have with you.  With DashIT it's easy to dash into your car with any device and just drop it in, no levers, no suction cups, no hassle!  It's as easy as dropping it into your cup holder (which, admit it, is where most of us stow our phone while driving!)


 
Stop craning your neck to view your next turn, stop paying costly map updates to a traditional GPS, and stop worrying about the suction cup flying across the car in rush hour. DashIT means you have one less thing to worry about on the road.Please buy yours and help us spread the word today!


Please add $5 for shipping outside of the Contiguous United States.

story:
Redefining Online Communication:

*Try Japkin for yourself, sign up here: http://www.japkin.com

Japkin is a revolutionary new communication software that has been 6 months in the making. This type of software is the first of its kind and unlike anything on the market.

Imagine receiving video messages and voice messages from your website visitors and/or Facebook Fans and then being able to reply to them in the same way! And without anyone having to download an app!

Well imagine no more because that is exactly what Japkin does.

Now your visitors can have ability to leave you a testimonial, product review or feedback, instantly!

Do you want to increase the engagement rate with your website visitors by letting them leave you a video or voice message (which is a great non-threatening way for them to reach out to you) use Japkin.

Japkin On Desktop & Laptop Internet Browsers

When you install Japkin on your website, visitors will see this widget in the bottom left corner. 

Once the visitor clicks on the widget installed on your website, a popup will appear prompting them to make a selection to either leave you a voice message or video message.

Japkin On Cell Phone & Tablet Internet Browsers

Also, with mobile and tablet usage increasing at a rapid pace, Japkin was developed to work on all mobile and table internet browsers. Your visitors do NOT need to install an app to leave a message on your website! They can do it straight from their internet browsers.

Once the visitor clicks on the widget, a popup will appear prompting them to make a selection to either send a voice message or video message.

Japkin On Facebook Fan Pages & Personal Profiles

This is perfect for not only website owners but all Facebook users who want more intimate communication with their closer friends and family. Want to leave your best friend, spouse or boyfriend/girlfriend a private video message without having to download an app? Use Japkin for that.

Account Holders Back Office

Once you receive messages from your visitors, you can reply, download, bookmark, share and delete them in the back office. 

You can also install Japkin on multiple websites and Facebook pages. And the Back Office organizes everything for you.

Japkin already has users in its beta program and the widget is already working on all desktop internet browsers, cell phone and tablet internet browsers! But to finish out the next phase of making it Facebook compatible we need to hire two more full time programmers.

Our head programmer (see my video to hear his amazing story) already confirmed that it can be done on Facebook, but if he does it by himself it will take 5-6 months. But with two more programmers we can have it completed in under 60 days!

We also want to develop a mobile app for iOS and Android so you can check and reply to your messages from the Japkin app.  

And finally we want to advertise Japkin to acquire 1,000 beta users which will provide us feedback, helping us work out any bugs.

So in short, here's what the funds would be used for:

1. Hire 2 more developers to program Japkin for Facebook, Joomla and HTML.

2. Build an app for iOS and Andriod.

3. Acquire 1000 beta users to make sure the software runs smoothly on all platforms, working out any bugs. 

We have been called Skype on steroids and Dropbox gone wild. But we are so much more than all of those because there is no app to download!

In fact we are so confident you will be blown away with Japkin that if you aren't just send us an email and we will send your donation back.

See our amazing perks and join today so you can also start using Japkin today while you help us change the world of communication.

*Try Japkin for yourself, sign up here: http://www.japkin.com

story:
1. GLBrain – A Global Brain - The Basic Idea

GLBrain, a new concept of a social network, using the possibilities of the internet to form a global brain - informative, communicative, creative, focusing on sustainability, social responsibility and creating civic value, made to change our lives, the internet and this world for the better.

The basic idea was derived from the following knowledge of how today's social networks are structured:

The big social networks, have attracted a huge user base, offering communication based services, creating user profiles by watching and storing their behavior and interest. This profile data combined with a totally identified user is sold and built the basis of their business model. Sometimes such data is further used by governmental institutions for their own purposes. They are not interested in anything but their own business without respect to privacy or any specific interest to make the internet work for the better of society.

Content based webpages and networks, focus on sustainability, social responsibility and civic values. They want to spread their ideas but lack the user base to do so.

We in GLBrain wanted use the internet to form a Global Brain and make change happen. For this we needed to develop a platform attracting a big user base by offering all well known functions of social networks but based on our principles of privacy and data control by our users. On such basis we offer new functionalities and a new business model allowing and helping our users to follow our core values of sustainability, social responsibility and creating civic value.

Watching this video animation will help you understand the basic thoughts which lead to create GLBrain.


Please also read our About Us in GLBrain.

This and all further links marked in blue down in this campaign, will lead to the relevant content in GLBrain and can be followed in 18 languages by using the language select option up right.


2. Who created GLBrain

Dr. Wolfgang Pinegger

Austrian citizen who initially developed GLBrain. 

Over the last 35 years and untill today he has traveled the world for numerous jobs in various industries which has ultimately given him the chance to develop a good understanding of today's world.

Dr.Walter Schwimmer

Austrian citizen and former Secretary General of the Council of Europe, today still holding many well reputed functions  like: Chairman of the International Coordination Committee, Co-Chairman of the World Public Forum - Dialogue of Civilizations and Co.Founder and Vicepresident of the Center for Global Dialogue and Cooperation.

The Team 

All holding one or more university degrees in computer science, programming, mathematics, economy or graphic design.

Most of them coming from Megatrend University having helped in the early stage of the project.


3. What we did and how GLBrain looks today

Programming and launching today's version of GLBrain has been a massive task, as it needed to combine all known functions in the internet ranging from a powerful search engine to social network communication and creation tools, and a business model, all based on anonymous statistics to guarantee our principles of privacy and data control by our users. 

All technical basis of GLBrain, the database, our own cloud and dedicated servers are implemented. Today GLBrain runs on PC's, all known tablet computers as well as IOS and Android mobile devices. The Chromecast technology allows us to run also via TV and there can be remote controlled by our phones or computers.

How GLBrain looks today is presented here by one of the team members.

Carolin Pinegger 

Carolin got her degree in Business Administration in UCF Orlando Florida in May 2013 and has been successful in College Golf for this University. 

Since then she made it to become a professional Golfer in USA. She helped in designing important features of GLBrain and today is our window to the young generation especially in USA. 

Let her give you a short introduction and explain the basic functions and layout of today's version of GLBrain.


To learn more, please log in and register under www.glbrain.com, or simply follow the link to our short tutorial here.


4. The tasks ahead

For GLBrain to finally become a global brain we need to:

4.1. Complete our communication and social network function 

(Time to finish: Q02/2014)

To increase our user base we plan to create a new and unique communication function covering the most used functions of well known social networks but based on our principals of user protection with respect to privacy and self control of his data.

Amongst them a special personal profile with possibilities to post and uploaded content, posting, chatting, newsfeed, searching, administrating and communicating with friends.

4.2. Improve our user profiles  

(Time to finish: End 2013)

Our standard profiles will also be updated with new functions enabling them to interact with the new communication functions as well as to show and measure their actions in regard to sustainability and civic value, enabling the normal user to show his interest and be actively involved in sustainability and creating civic value.

Our profiles for professional use will allow better presentation and get new functions such as:

- creating and embedding direct access to their internet shops

- selecting and showing categories and product ranges for their activities

- easy advertising and communication with anonymous users

- classification as CSR certified ISO 26000

- similar GLBrain CSR Classification by self declaration

- special search engine for organizations and companies by geographics, category,  product and attributes like Social responsible, sustainable and more

- a system of posting advertisement to all content of a category which can be focused by country, city, sex and age group. Such advertising will open via a thumbnail its own content and lead to the profile page, and online shop. A sample can be seen already by advertising for this campaign on every GLBrain page.

4.3. The “Sustainability, Social Responsibility and Civic Value Mode” 

(Time to finish: Q01/2014)

The main focus of GLBrain is to promote sustainability, social responsibility and create civic value through day by day usage of the internet.

All  present or future services and functions shown above are made to motivate our users to make GLBrain the internet platform of their choice and to generate the user base and traffic necessary to create positive effects by changing their own behavior to promote these principles on all levels.

This is a massive task but GLBrain has been specifically designed for this and most of the main functions like the categories, Global, Local and the MyBrain levels and possibilities for movements and voting ballots are already implemented.

Some of the new functions have been mentioned above in the new user profiles. Some more are:

- creating a non public "suggest and report" function that allows control of such declarations by the users

- creating special search functions to browse by attributes like "Socially Responsible Company" or "Sustainable Product" and then showing only users, companies, stores, products and GLBrain content matching such attributes

- this being linked to the embedded internet shops will help users to make their decisions and buying sustainable products from socially responsible companies

- we will also create tools and statistics to easily show the effective change of behavior in millions of our users

- and many more.

The interaction between the user's MyBrain and general content on all countries Local and all Global Levels makes GLBrain become the place where the individual user can take control of society and is provided a better way to act socially responsible, change their behavior and share their ideas.

4.4. Some additional technical issues

To follow and promote our planned growth we need to:

Expand our server capacity to match our increasing demand  (Time:  as needed)

Add many more languages.   (We plan 5-7 per month)

Our final goal is to cover all languages natively spoken by more than 10 Million people. 

Having already translated GLBrain into 18 languages we reach about 35 % of the world population in their native language. To reach this goal we have to add about 40 more languages.

Quite a challenging and costly task, but absolutely necessary. In addition we will implement a professional tool managing all changes in so many languages.

Implement a translation tool also enabling direct translation of all content between all languages available in GLBrain.

4.5.  Summary of what we already have and what we will do

Completing this tasks will make GLBrain to be a fully integrated internet platform and social network, offering many known functions in a unique and new way. All based on our principles with regard to privacy and data control by our users, and promoting sustainability, social responsibility and civic value.

This picture shows, what we already offer today and how GLBrain will look like, when the tasks described here will be completed in about 6-9 months time.

4.6. Marketing Campaigns 

 (Time: All year 2014)

We also need to run marketing campaigns on a global and local level to further attract NGOs and Companies who would use GLBrain and thus help us reach our goal of using the internet only in the best interest of its users and to make this world a better place. We will spread out our system of appointing local partners ( now active in 10 countries) to many more countries.


5. What We Need & What You Get

5.1. We Need from you

To cover all these tasks and costs necessary beyond our todays expense and to reach a state of being self financed we would need to generate 50,000 Dollars through this campaign. Our normal operating expenses 

We know that at this point we could go on the market to attract well known players in the internet business to invest in GLBrain, yet this may not allow us to stay independent and follow our goal of being a platform designed for the people and run it the way we and the users want to.

Any money we receive will help us to reach our goals. Reaching our target of 50,000 $ will allow us to perform all mentioned technical and programming actions within the next 6-9 months as well as enabling us to start a basic marketing campaign helping us to be a finished and fully independent user controlled network at the end of 2014.

Any money we receive in excess to our target will help us to run bigger marketing campaigns and to faster expand GLBrain to many more countries.

5.2. You Get from us

We wanted to start this campaign only after having launched GLBrain and secured basic financing until the end of 2014, to be able to better gain your trust and to be able to offer already existing paid functions available on GLBrain in return for your sponsoring. This way you get real value for your money and can use such functions of GLBrain already at this early stage for much discounted rates.

5.2.1. Just donating

For those who are not interested in such benefits but still find our idea attractive to support we also offer a Perk for just supporting us.

If they wish they also will be named in the list of sponsors in the footer of GLBrain and published in a Glopinion of thanks at the end of the campaign.

5.2.2. All other Perks consist of a combination of Customized Profile, Detailed Statistics and Advertising packages on all levels

As a benefit we offer two versions of Customized Profiles (in new version as under 4.2 above by Jan. 1st 2014) on their own or combined with the Statistic Tool  normally to be purchased as well as a great and more focused Advertising Function (GLAD) which already today can be purchased in GLBrain. We offer this for different time periods being aware of the fact that the value of these functions will increase with the expansion of our user base. Please check in GLBrain or see here again the relevant information.

Our perks for commercial users offer profile, statistic information and advertising for different time periods in a very cost effective way.

They also can be used byOrganizations and NGO’s to spread their ideas along with our  content and are available in various versions and include the following:

- full customized profile (New version as from 1.1.2014)  for 1, 2 or 3 years

- full access to all detailed statistics for 1, 2 or 3 years

- posting of GLADS (GLobalADvertising) for 1 year 12 Glads, 2 years 24 Glads or 3 years 36 Glads.

The Glads can be posted for 30 days maximum for the content of one of the 36 categories for all users of one country, or focused further by city, sex and age group by the detailed statistic tool. Such Glads will be shown on every Tool (Glopinion, Lopinion, Article…) such selected users open in GLBrain. 

These perks will be available as from January 1st 2014.

Those using our perks to also receive a customize profile will receive and show a medal of honor in 3 different versions, Gold, Silver and Bronze identifying them as early contributors on their customized profile. 

    

Further, all participants will be listed in the list of sponsors structured by country, alphabet and level of support they have been awarded. This list will always be kept in the footer of GLBrain and published in a Glopinion of thanks at the end of the campaign.

5.2.3. Just helping GLBrain and our movement and idea

For those who cannot contribute but still like to help us it is easy and well appreciated:

- just register and use GLBrain as your internet platform and social network

- spread and share our idea

- spread and share this campaign to make others contribute or help as described here.

5.3. Constant reporting of what we do with the money we got

Civic Value starts with honesty and transparency. With a special Glopinion and Lopinion active for all countries we will inform our sponsors on a monthly basis about the progress of our actions and how we spent the money.


6. FAQ

Q: How can you improve privacy knowing that almost all Internet and servers belong to big companies influenced by powerful governments?

A: It is difficult but possible. We do not ask to use your actual name and address, your email is only used for safe registration, then never again unless you forget your password.

The infrastructure was a major issue, as we could not use a standard cloud and server infrastructure available on the market. We had to build our own cloud system with the help of Twinstar and operate on dedicated servers only used forGLBrain.

Q: Is it legal to allow registration without the correct name?

A: In many countries like Germany, it is illegal to force a user to use his real name or to delete his account for this reason. Facebook, for example, can only behave like this as they are not operating under such countries' laws.

Q: How do you prevent illegal actions on GLBrain?

A: Our principles of creating civic value will not allow illegal actions on our network. All content of our terms of use and privacy policy are based on German law, the so far best and most user protective Internet law. This goes along with a powerful “Suggest and Report Tool” also matching German law standards and allowing interaction with anonymous users or about content created anonymously. We only allow embedding and linking to safe internet content.

Q: Why is your headquarter located in Dubai?

A: Globra FZ LLC, the mother company is located in Dubai Internet City, a Free Zone specially created for these kinds of business and home to offices of almost all internet companies and social networks like Facebook, Microsoft, Yahoo, Linked in, Oracle and 500 more. Dubai Internet City hosts the biggest agglomeration of Internet Companies in the world.

Q: Who is the real owner of GLBrain?

A: Dr. Wolfgang Pinegger and Dr. Walter Schwimmer.

Q: What Banks and Payment Providers do you use?

A: Our Bank accounts are with Deutsche Bank AG and we are accepted by all major credit card and payment service companies, as can be seen in our own payment system.
For internet credit card payments we use our Austrian Subsidiary Globra GmbH and the Austrian Payment Provider mPay 24.


We had a dream and invested a lot of time and money to create GLBrain.

With your help we all can continue to make the internet and this world a better place.

*

GLBrain - using the internet to form

A Global Brain

become the place where the individual user can take control of society and is
provided a better way to act socially responsible, change their behavior and
share their ideas.
4.4. Some
additional technical issues
To follow and promote our planned growth we
need to:
Expand
our server capacity to match our increasing demand  (Time: 
as needed)
Add many
more languages.   (We plan 5-7
per month)


Our final goal is
to cover all languages natively spoken by more than 10 Million people. 



Having already
translated GLBrain into 18 languages we reach about 35 % of the world population
in their native language. To reach this goal we have to add about 40 more
languages.

Quite a challenging and costly task, but
absolutely necessary. In addition we will implement a professional tool
managing all changes in so many languages.
Implement
a translation tool also enabling direct translation of all content between all
languages available in GLBrain.
4.5.  Summary of what we already have and what we will do
Completing this tasks will make GLBrain to be a fully integrated internet platform and social network, offering many known functions in a unique and new way. All based on our principles with regard to privacy and data control by our users, and promoting sustainability, social responsibility and civic value.
This picture shows, what we already offer today and how GLBrain will look like, when the tasks described here will be completed in about 6-9 months time.



4.6.
Marketing Campaigns 

 (Time: All year 2014)
We also need to run marketing campaigns on a
global and local level to further attract NGOs and Companies who would use
GLBrain and thus help us reach our goal of using the internet only in the best
interest of its users and to make this world a better place. We will spread out
our system of appointing local partners ( now active in 10 countries) to many more
countries.

5.
What We Need & What You Get
5.1.
We Need from you

To
cover all these tasks and costs necessary beyond our todays expense and to reach
a state of being self financed we would need to
generate 50,000 Dollars through this campaign. Our normal operating expenses 
We know that at this point we could go on the
market to attract well known players in the internet business to invest in GLBrain,
yet this may not allow us to stay independent and follow our goal of being a
platform designed for the people and run it the way we and the users want to.
Any
money we receive will help us to reach our goals. Reaching
our target of 50,000 $ will allow us to perform all mentioned
technical and programming actions within the next 6-9 months as well as
enabling us to start a basic marketing campaign helping us to be a finished and
fully independent user controlled network at the end of 2014.
Any
money we receive in excess to our target will help us to run bigger
marketing campaigns and to faster expand GLBrain to many more countries. 

5.2.
You Get from usWe wanted to start
this campaign only after having launched GLBrain and secured basic financing
until the end of 2014, to be able to better gain your trust and to be able to
offer already existing paid functions available on GLBrain in return for your sponsoring.
This way you get real value for your money and can use such functions of
GLBrain already at this early stage for much discounted rates.

5.2.1. Just
donating
For those who are not interested in such
benefits but still find our idea attractive to support we also offer a Perk for
just supporting us.
If they wish they also will be named in the
list of sponsors in the footer of GLBrain and published in a Glopinion of
thanks at the end of the campaign.
5.2.2. All other Perks consist of a combination of Customized Profile, Detailed
Statistics and Advertising packages on all levels
As a benefit we offer two versions of Customized Profiles 
(in new version as under 4.2 above by Jan. 1st 2014) on their own or
combined with the Statistic Tool  normally to be purchased as well as a great and more focused Advertising Function (GLAD) which already today can
be purchased in GLBrain. We offer this for different time periods being aware
of the fact that the value of these functions will increase with the expansion
of our user base. Please check in GLBrain or see here again the relevant
information.

Our perks for commercial users offer profile, statistic information and advertising
for different time periods in a very cost effective way. 

They also can be
used byOrganizations and NGO’s to spread their ideas along with our  content and are available in various versions
and include the following:

- full customized profile (New version as from 1.1.2014)  for 1, 2 or 3 years
- full access to all detailed statistics for 1, 2 or 3 years


- posting of GLADS
(GLobalADvertising) for 1 year 12 Glads, 2 years 24 Glads or 3 years 36 Glads.
The Glads can be
posted for 30 days maximum for the content of one of the 36 categories for all
users of one country, or focused further by city, sex and age group by the
detailed statistic tool. Such Glads will be shown on every Tool (Glopinion,
Lopinion, Article…) such selected users open in GLBrain. 

These perks will be available as from January 1st
2014.
Those using our perks to also receive a
customize profile will receive and show a medal of honor in 3 different
versions, Gold, Silver and Bronze identifying them as early contributors on
their customized profile. 
    
Further,
all participants will be listed in the list of sponsors structured by country,
alphabet and level of support they have been awarded. This list will always be
kept in the footer of GLBrain and published in a Glopinion of thanks at the end
of the campaign.
5.2.3. Just
helping GLBrain and our movement and idea
For those who cannot contribute but still like
to help us it is easy and well appreciated:
- just register and use GLBrain as your
internet platform and social network
- spread and share our idea
- spread and share this campaign to make
others contribute or help as described here.
5.3. Constant
reporting of what we do with the money we got
Civic Value starts with honesty and
transparency. With a special Glopinion and Lopinion active for all countries we
will inform our sponsors on a monthly basis about the progress of our actions
and how we spent the money.




6. FAQ
Q: How can you improve
privacy knowing that almost all Internet and servers belong to big companies
influenced by powerful governments?
A: It is difficult but
possible. We do not ask to use your actual name and address, your email is only
used for safe registration, then never again unless you forget your password.
The infrastructure was a major issue, as we could not use a
standard cloud and server infrastructure available on the market. We had to
build our own cloud system with the help of Twinstar and operate on dedicated servers only used forGLBrain.
Q: Is it legal to allow
registration without the correct name?
A: In many
countries like Germany, it is illegal to force a user to use his real name or to
delete his account for this reason. Facebook, for example, can only behave like
this as they are not operating under such countries' laws.
Q: How do you prevent
illegal actions on GLBrain?
A: Our principles of
creating civic value will not allow illegal actions on our network. All content
of our terms of use and
privacy policy are based on German law, the so far best and most user protective
Internet law. This goes along with a powerful “Suggest and Report Tool” also matching German
law standards and allowing interaction with anonymous users or about content created
anonymously. We only allow embedding and linking to safe internet content.
Q: Why is your headquarter located in
Dubai?
A: Globra FZ LLC, the
mother company is located in Dubai Internet City, a Free Zone specially
created for these kinds of business and home to offices of almost all internet
companies and social networks like Facebook, Microsoft, Yahoo, Linked in,
Oracle and 500 more. Dubai Internet City hosts the biggest agglomeration of
Internet Companies in the world. 
Q: Who is the real owner
of GLBrain?
A: Dr. Wolfgang Pinegger
and Dr. Walter Schwimmer.
Q: What Banks and
Payment Providers do you use?
A: Our Bank accounts are
with Deutsche Bank AG and we are accepted by all major credit card and payment
service companies, as can be seen in our own payment system. For internet credit
card payments we use our Austrian Subsidiary Globra GmbH and the Austrian
Payment Provider mPay 24.

We had a
dream and invested a lot of time and money to create GLBrain.
With your
help we all can continue to make the internet and this world a better
place.
*
GLBrain - using the
internet to form 

A Global Brain

story:
Hi! We're Populace, and we're building text message-based tools that enable businesses and non-profits to reach the right people with the right information at the right time.


The Team

We're three seasoned technologists and we've just completed the Blue Ridge Labs fellowship, designed to use technology to solve problems that affect low-income New Yorkers.

Through the fellowship, we've:

  • Conducted 100+ interviews in all five boroughs.
  • Tested prototypes with 10 NYC non-profits representing 60,000 people
  • Eaten a LOT of Kifta Wraps at Darna Falafel.

Our prototype feedback is in and we have a lot of work to do. With the fellowship over we are in need of funding to continue building, testing, and eating with the goal of launching a full product in January 2016.


What is Populace?

Populace is a lightweight text message communications tool designed to make it easy for businesses and non-profits to reach and engage with users.
With Populace, you can:
  • Access the right audience through simple registration hooks
  • Communicate with your audience privately & as a group
  • Keep your audience organized as they move through the funnel.

We know how hard it is for small businesses and community organizations to reach the right people. We also know that interested people are out there, but very few make it in the door. We know that the solution is to meet people where they are using technology they already use.


How does it work?

We issue your business a unique phone number. You advertise that number anywhere your audience goes. When someone is interested, it's as simple as sending a text, which you receive through email or our web interface. 

Features include:

  1. Registration - An interested person simply texts a phone number and they're opted in to your group. You receive a notification that someone has joined, making it easy to gauge interest.
  2. 2-Way Communication - Anyone can text you, and you can respond privately. Or, send an update to the whole group. 
  3. Automated Messages  - Schedule messages to be sent at the right time, or auto-reply to common questions.
  4. Funnel Management - Tagging, logic branching, and other light CRM tools for keeping your audience organized.

For a demo, text "START" to +1 (917) 791-6010. You can opt out at any time by texting "STOP."

What We Need

Building software is expensive and takes time. We've validated the need for our product through our prototype testing, and we need funding for the following efforts in order to cross the finish line in January 2016:
  • $5,000: Testing Expansion - We will continue pilots with our existing testers and expand testing to include various other organizations as we get closer to launch. The more feedback we can get, the better! This will be ongoing.
  • $5,000: Web Interface Design - Our designer Joel has initial wireframes and is ready to start building out the interface. This is likely to take 2 months to get right.
  • $5,000: Launch Marketing - We intend to be making revenue on day 1, and to ensure that we'll be doing quite a bit of launch marketing, including direct outreach to new partners and printing physical fliers to place all over the city. It's going to be great!

STRETCH GOALS:

We'd love to have money for these things! Help us surpass our goal and we'll add these to our agenda!
  • $5,000: More Testing - Yep! The more testing we can do, the better suited we'll be at launch. This money will go towards more pilot tests.
  • $10,000: Open API - We really want to give back to the community, and opening an API for developers is an important milestone on that path. 
  • $10,000: Development Time  - Our engineer Dylan has the challenging task of building out a scalable SaaS architecture as well as keep feature development on track. He will be working on this throughout the months leading up to launch and may even hire some help.

Each of these figures represents the cost of development and any material costs, including enough of a stipend to make sure we don't starve. 


The Impact

Non-profits and small businesses tend to be small and resource-constrained and are in need of help accessing customers. In fact, 78.5% of all small businesses in America do not employ anyone other than the business owner. And while it's been measured that individuals who complete technology-related jobs training stand to triple his or her current savings, these classes only assist 25,000 of the 300,000 New Yorkers looking for jobs annually.

Businesses and non-profits have another thing in common: they're experts at providing great services to the right people. With Populace, businesses can expect to:

  • Reach more people: SMS is used by over 99% of Americans, and opt-in advertising captures significantly more attention than other strategies
  • Meet People Where They Are: Allowing opt ins at the moment when someone shows motivation means you'll have a larger pool of interested individuals.
  • Engage People for Longer: SMS gets opened 98% of the time in an average of 4 seconds. Your audience is much more likely to respond to your thoughtful communications through SMS than through email.
  • Focus on Services: Lightweight tools mean less time spent reaching people and more time spent building great services. 

Risks & Challenges

We've made a lot of progress, but we're only halfway there. Software development typically takes longer and costs more than anyone expects, and we're trying to hedge against that by asking for enough money now. However, we know that continued development and eventual success rests on dealing with the following challenges:

  • First Paying Customers - We have people using our service, but getting paid customers will prove the value of what we're offering. We'll spend significant time over the next months building marketing tools to ensure a solid launch.
  • Post-Indiegogo Scaling - We love your support, but it won't be enough to grow and scale. We'll need a true seed round, which we're attacking by first making the right relationships so we can be ready to raise money in the spring.
  • Telling The Story  - Populace has a large set of potential applications. Because of this, focusing on specific verticals will be key. Our current focus is on classes and education opportunities, and staying focused on this will be key.
Luckily, our team knows how to do this: we've worked on big software projects before and we know how important it is to anticipate and plan for these inflection points. Execution is always a details game, but our high-level vision is sound!


After The Campaign

A successful campaign will get us to launch, at which point revenue will help propel us forward into the spring. We expect that with modest user acquisition we can be earning $5,000 MRR (monthly recurring revenue) by March 2016. That will be enough to sustain our current size, but not to grow (or get paid). We'll start raising a seed round in the spring to help us kick it into high gear and build out our class/program vertical while exploring other markets, such as professional services and medical/dental practices.
