story:
*** Attention to all contributors ***

  Once you have selected your perk, please email us right away with your delivery address, along with the type of phone battery you would like to receive, and color of case

 So far we only have these types of phones available, but feel free to email us to find out when your smart phone will be accessible 

  •  Galaxy S5 
  •  Galaxy S4
  •   Galaxy S4 mini 
  •  Galaxy S3 
  •  Galaxy S2
  •   Galaxy Avant 
  •  Galaxy Note 3 
  •  Galaxy Light  Nexus 5  
  •    LG G vista 
  •  LG G2
  •   LG G Flex
  •   LG G3 
  •  LG OPTIMUS L90  
  • LG Enact  
  • HTC One M8 
  •  Droid MAXX  
  • Droid Ultra 
  •  Droid Razer 
  •  Droid Mini  

Once you contribute, you're guaranteed your perk! 


What will happen if you don't receive the needed funds for the indiegogo? 
When we receive adequate funding, and at the rate it’s going its looking very promising, we will start a full running production line, in which it would be possible to deliver to the contributor as well as the market, but would have to be approved for the market first after we receive proper patents.  
.

*The user with the most referrals will receive the War Ready package! *

Follow Our Twitter!  https://twitter.com/TheJuicerBatter

----------------------

The official Facebook page!

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Thejuicerbattery/724587734266915

----------------------


We are updating our Indiegogo daily! Videos to come and more information!

We are almost done with more videos! 

----------------------


Visit our website! 

http://www.thejuicerbattery.com

We have fixed our paypal and now taking contributions! 

Featured Q-A:

----------------------


Q)  What countries is this available for, and do i pay for shipping?

A) We will ship to all countries and offer free shipping with the slowest and lowest priority available.


We are excited to announce we have received a 25,000 dollar start-up contribution donation to begin production for the Juicer Battery. During the meeting with our investor, we revealed some confidential information about the engineering behind our product, along with a working model, and they were impressed enough to offer 25000 to help fund production of the Juicer battery. This money will help us to begin manufacturing the parts from China, which are needed to allow a faster and higher rate of production for the Juicer battery. Due to this contribution, the Juicer battery is on a faster track of reaching the market for sale. However, more funding cant do any harm, and will help us by helping you by receiving our one-of-a-kind  “Juicer” battery.    







By using cunning edge technology being developed by our engineers, The Juicer , will be a one of a kind battery that is influenced from previous batteries, but with a reconstructed and innovative twist, which potentially could allow our battery to charge faster and last longer than anything available on the market. A special casing aluminum frame cover for the back of the phone is also being developed to make it more environmentally friendly, allowing it to be charged by any light source; all thanks to technology found on larger solar panels but on a micro scaled level. The Juicer will be a revolutionary battery that finally uses all of the technology available in today’s world. 



          The Juicer Battery-

                                       

                                           

                                                     




  • The Juicer is a small two person company influenced by the needs of our customer. We recognized how some people would carry chargers with them all the time. We also recognized how battery power is a huge consideration when buying a new cell phone. As a project for college, our lead German engineer, Vandal Schnizel, designed a micro prototype battery, which vastly exceeded his expectations. By modifying existing battery topologies to be more power efficient, he was able to record an astonishing power density that is 1900 times greater than other lithium ion batteries. Teaming up with me, Paul Bednard, lead business and marketing for The Juicer, we had a dream to use the technology Schnizel found on a macro scale to essentially create the worlds longest lasting cell phone battery. High on dreams but short on money, we came to indiegogo to help fund our revolutionary battery.





FASTER CHARING and longer battery-

  • The world's highest capacity battery @ 13440mAh. More than 4 times than the original capacity & slimmer than other extended battery.  We estimate on heavy use, this battery can handle up to 40+ hours of internet browsing, 48 hours of HD movie watching, or 84 hours of 3g talk time. This can manage around 30 hours of screen-on time in a battery endurance run.    
  • We estimate that this battery charges around 20-40% faster than the original factory one. Testing is still not complete, and may change after time.
  • A fiber optic USB 3.1 cable is also included. This USB cable will become the standard in the future.










   

  About the battery -                  

     

  • The Juicer uses the most innovative, groundbreaking lithium-ion battery available. 
  • Our battery reinvents typical electrode structure from standard li-ion batteries by adding a three-dimensional anode and cathode, replacing the modern two-dimensional anode and cathode, by doing so it increases the surface area; therefore, resulting in more chemical reactions to take place in the same amount of space, theoretically causing more discharge speed and charging. 
  •  Along with other groundbreaking things we can’t discuss, this would make our battery the best out there allowing it to last an estimated 25-70 percent longer than your generic smart phone battery. 



FLEXIBILITY-





Faster Charging -


Flexibility was one of our main concerns, which is why we designed multiple batterys to be able to fit into today’s most popular smart phones. 

So far we only have tested it in the Samsung Galaxy; however, we are in the process of making batteries that are able to fit in other popular smart phones on the market. So far, we have only thought about adding the phones listed below, but could consider expanding more. 

  • LG Phones
  • HTC One
  • Samsung Galaxys 
  • Sony phones  

 A new laser fiber optic USB cable is also being included.  

Fiber Optic USB 3.1 Cable Specs-    

                                                                                                                                                                                        

  1. More Durable than standard cables. 
  2. More Bendable than standard cables.              
  3. Bi Direction and dual channel. 
  4. 50 percent thinner than standard cables
  5. 75 percent lighter than standard cables. 
  6. The Type-C 3.1 connector become the new standard of usb cables which will out-date full-sized USB and micro USB.
  7.  7.9 GBPS download Speeds. USB 2.0 supports 480 mbs/sec
  8. Current range 2A-5A. Voltage range 5- 15V. Devices which consume alot of energy will be able to receive more power.
------

With breaking new technologically, we are developing new and very fast chargers but we are facing major challenges on how to shrink it to fit in other smartphones. It is only a matter of time before we relase updated bette chargers!

  • This cable, which is still being developed, is the future of USB.


Charging in the sunlight!

Since we know how inconvenient it can be to have your phone die. A new solar panel case was designed to not only keep your phone secured, but to charge your phone from any light source. 

  • We separate ourselves from the competitors by using an aluminum frame instead of a cheap plastic frame.  Our solar panels have technology found in larger solar panels, but to a nano-scaled degree, which gives us an unlimited range of motion to charge your phone, compared to other solar panels cases that must be at a 90 degree angle to the sun.
  •  The best aspect of this technology is its spectrum range of light; enabling it to be charged in the shade. Testing is still being done to a larger scale; however, we estimate that it takes an hour to charge completely in the light, and it takes two hours when cloudy.  

   The battery comes with a solar panel charging case available in different            colors and styles to appeal to the consumer.        

Goals-





-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q)  What countries is this available for, and do i pay for shipping?

A) We will ship to all countries and offer free shipping with the slowest and lowest priority available.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------


What phones will the battery be available for? 

Hopefully we will make it for all of the top end smart phones but so far we have plans for LG phones , HTC phones, Samsung Galaxys, and Sony phones.  

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) How  long will it take for it to be manufactured?

A) Testing is still being done to ensure this product is safe under all weather conditions. Once it passes testing and enough money is raised, the Juicer begin manufacturing for a large. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) How is your battery the fastest on the market?

 A) By changing what we know about how the battery works, our engineers reinvented the wheel, by creating a more efficient powerful battery by alternating its cathode and anode structures, and other secrets we can’t give out yet.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q)  How long does your battery last? 

 A) We estimate up to 50-75 percent increase to your phones battery power compared with the stock battery.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) How long is the fiber optic USB cable?

A) The fiber optic cable is up to 3 meters long.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 Q)Will the fiber optic cable be compatible with usb 3.0 and 2.0? 

 A) Yes. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) Will the cable help it charge faster?  

A) Yes the cable will help the battery charge faster

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) How fast will the battery charge? 

A)  Due to emerging advances in electrical engineering, our battery charges up to 50 percent faster than standard batteries.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 Q) Will there be more color cases?

 A)  Yes, we offer the colors available above and expanding. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

  Q) How does the solar panel case work?  

  A) Nanotechnology which is influenced on how larger solar panels worked, inspired our engineer to create the most effective solar charging case that is available on the market?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) 'Is the battery the same size as the original factory one?

A) Yes, The Juicer Battery keeps the same dimensions as the  Galaxy S5 battery.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

More FAQ Questions to Come!



Special Deal! 


Get the most referrals and we will offer you the War Ready for free! 

  •  The ultimate goal is to provide the maximum amount of convenience for our customer. By adding another battery, you now could potentially have up to a week of power for your mobile device. Helpful for business men and women who constantly travel will now never have to worry about missing a call.
story_txt:
*** Attention to all contributors ***  Once you have selected your perk, please email us right away with your delivery address, along with the type of phone battery you would like to receive, and color of case So far we only have these types of phones available, but feel free to email us to find out when your smart phone will be accessible 
 Galaxy S5 
 Galaxy S4
  Galaxy S4 mini 
 Galaxy S3 
 Galaxy S2
  Galaxy Avant 
 Galaxy Note 3 
 Galaxy Light  Nexus 5  
   LG G vista 
 LG G2
  LG G Flex
  LG G3 
 LG OPTIMUS L90  
LG Enact  
HTC One M8 
 Droid MAXX  
Droid Ultra 
 Droid Razer 

 Droid Mini  

Once you contribute, you're guaranteed your perk! What will happen if you don't receive the needed funds for the indiegogo? When we receive adequate funding, and at the rate it’s going its looking very promising, we will start a full running production line, in which it would be possible to deliver to the contributor as well as the market, but would have to be approved for the market first after we receive proper patents.  
.*The user with the most referrals will receive the War Ready package! *Follow Our Twitter!  https://twitter.com/TheJuicerBatter
----------------------The official Facebook page!https://www.facebook.com/pages/Thejuicerbattery/724587734266915----------------------We are updating our Indiegogo daily! Videos to come and more information!We are almost done with more videos! ----------------------Visit our website! http://www.thejuicerbattery.comWe have fixed our paypal and now taking contributions! Featured Q-A:----------------------Q)  What countries is this available for, and do i pay for shipping?A) We will ship to all countries and offer free shipping with the slowest and lowest priority available.We are excited to announce we have received a 25,000 dollar start-up contribution donation to begin production for the Juicer Battery. During the meeting with our investor, we revealed some confidential information about the engineering behind our product, along with a working model, and they were impressed enough to offer 25000 to help fund production of the Juicer battery. This money will help us to begin manufacturing the parts from China, which are needed to allow a faster and higher rate of production for the Juicer battery. Due to this contribution, the Juicer battery is on a faster track of reaching the market for sale. However, more funding cant do any harm, and will help us by helping you by receiving our one-of-a-kind  “Juicer” battery.    


By using cunning edge technology being developed by our engineers, The Juicer , will be a one of a kind battery that is influenced from previous batteries, but with a reconstructed and innovative twist, which potentially could allow our battery to charge faster and last longer than anything available on the market. A special casing aluminum frame cover for the back of the phone is also being developed to make it more environmentally friendly, allowing it to be charged by any light source; all thanks to technology found on larger solar panels but on a micro scaled level. The Juicer will be a revolutionary battery that finally uses all of the technology available in today’s world. 


          The Juicer Battery-
                                       
                                           
                                                     



The Juicer is a small two person company influenced by the needs of our customer. We recognized how some people would carry chargers with them all the time. We also recognized how battery power is a huge consideration when buying a new cell phone. As a project for college, our lead German engineer, Vandal Schnizel, designed a micro prototype battery, which vastly exceeded his expectations. By modifying existing battery topologies to be more power efficient, he was able to record an astonishing power density that is 1900 times greater than other lithium ion batteries. Teaming up with me, Paul Bednard, lead business and marketing for The Juicer, we had a dream to use the technology Schnizel found on a macro scale to essentially create the worlds longest lasting cell phone battery. High on dreams but short on money, we came to indiegogo to help fund our revolutionary battery.




FASTER CHARING and longer battery-

The world's highest capacity battery @ 13440mAh. More than 4 times than the original capacity & slimmer than other extended battery.  We estimate on heavy use, this battery can handle up to 40+ hours of internet browsing, 48 hours of HD movie watching, or 84 hours of 3g talk time. This can manage around 30 hours of screen-on time in a battery endurance run.    
We estimate that this battery charges around 20-40% faster than the original factory one. Testing is still not complete, and may change after time.
A fiber optic USB 3.1 cable is also included. This USB cable will become the standard in the future.












     About the battery -                  
     

The Juicer uses the most innovative, groundbreaking lithium-ion battery available. 
Our battery reinvents typical electrode structure from standard li-ion batteries by adding a three-dimensional anode and cathode, replacing the modern two-dimensional anode and cathode, by doing so it increases the surface area; therefore, resulting in more chemical reactions to take place in the same amount of space, theoretically causing more discharge speed and charging. 
 Along with other groundbreaking things we can’t discuss, this would make our battery the best out there allowing it to last an estimated 25-70 percent longer than your generic smart phone battery. 



FLEXIBILITY-






Faster Charging -

Flexibility was one of our main concerns, which is why we designed multiple batterys to be able to fit into today’s most popular smart phones. 
So far we only have tested it in the Samsung Galaxy; however, we are in the process of making batteries that are able to fit in other popular smart phones on the market. So far, we have only thought about adding the phones listed below, but could consider expanding more. 

LG Phones
HTC One
Samsung Galaxys 
Sony phones  

 A new laser fiber optic USB cable is also being included.  
Fiber Optic USB 3.1 Cable Specs-    
                                                                                                                                                                                        

More Durable than standard cables. 
More Bendable than standard cables.              
Bi Direction and dual channel. 
50 percent thinner than standard cables
75 percent lighter than standard cables. 
The Type-C 3.1 connector become the new standard of usb cables which will out-date full-sized USB and micro USB.
 7.9 GBPS download Speeds. USB 2.0 supports 480 mbs/sec
Current range 2A-5A. Voltage range 5- 15V. Devices which consume alot of energy will be able to receive more power.

------With breaking new technologically, we are developing new and very fast chargers but we are facing major challenges on how to shrink it to fit in other smartphones. It is only a matter of time before we relase updated bette chargers!
This cable, which is still being developed, is the future of USB.


Charging in the sunlight!

Since we know how inconvenient it can be to have your phone die. A new solar panel case was designed to not only keep your phone secured, but to charge your phone from any light source. 
We separate ourselves from the competitors by using an aluminum frame instead of a cheap plastic frame.  Our solar panels have technology found in larger solar panels, but to a nano-scaled degree, which gives us an unlimited range of motion to charge your phone, compared to other solar panels cases that must be at a 90 degree angle to the sun.
 The best aspect of this technology is its spectrum range of light; enabling it to be charged in the shade. Testing is still being done to a larger scale; however, we estimate that it takes an hour to charge completely in the light, and it takes two hours when cloudy.  
   The battery comes with a solar panel charging case available in different            colors and styles to appeal to the consumer.        

Goals-














-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Q)  What countries is this available for, and do i pay for shipping?
A) We will ship to all countries and offer free shipping with the slowest and lowest priority available.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
What phones will the battery be available for? Hopefully we will make it for all of the top end smart phones but so far we have plans for LG phones , HTC phones, Samsung Galaxys, and Sony phones.  
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Q) How  long will it take for it to be manufactured?
A) Testing is still being done to ensure this product is safe under all weather conditions. Once it passes testing and enough money is raised, the Juicer begin manufacturing for a large. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Q) How is your battery the fastest on the market?
 A) By changing what we know about how the battery works, our engineers reinvented the wheel, by creating a more efficient powerful battery by alternating its cathode and anode structures, and other secrets we can’t give out yet.  
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Q)  How long does your battery last? 
 A) We estimate up to 50-75 percent increase to your phones battery power compared with the stock battery.  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
Q) How long is the fiber optic USB cable?
A) The fiber optic cable is up to 3 meters long.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 Q)Will the fiber optic cable be compatible with usb 3.0 and 2.0? 
 A) Yes. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Q) Will the cable help it charge faster?  
A) Yes the cable will help the battery charge faster
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Q) How fast will the battery charge? 
A)  Due to emerging advances in electrical engineering, our battery charges up to 50 percent faster than standard batteries.  
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 Q) Will there be more color cases? A)  Yes, we offer the colors available above and expanding. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
  Q) How does the solar panel case work?  
  A) Nanotechnology which is influenced on how larger solar panels worked, inspired our engineer to create the most effective solar charging case that is available on the market?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Q) 'Is the battery the same size as the original factory one?
A) Yes, The Juicer Battery keeps the same dimensions as the  Galaxy S5 battery.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
More FAQ Questions to Come!



Special Deal! 

Get the most referrals and we will offer you the War Ready for free! 
 The ultimate goal is to provide the maximum amount of convenience for our customer. By adding another battery, you now could potentially have up to a week of power for your mobile device. Helpful for business men and women who constantly travel will now never have to worry about missing a call.

story:
Our original Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign ended on 16 August 2014. Thanks to Indiegogo's "Funding Forever" program we continue to accept pledges here. You can also place pre-orders on www.creopop.com.

CreoPopTM (www.creopop.com) is the world’s first 3D pen with cool ink. In contrast to other 3D pens, there are no hot parts, no melting plastic and no unpleasant smell. Instead, CreoPopTM uses photopolymers that are solidified using LED diodes to let users create amazing 3D designs. Since no heating is required, CreoPopTM is safe in a home environment. The most innovative feature of CreoPopTM  is the large selection of cool inks available including different colors, elastic ink, magnetic ink, glow-in-the-dark ink, temperature sensitive ink and body paint ink.

CreoPopTM,completed its crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo in August 2014 raising USD 185,690 (464% funded). CreoPopTM is now part of Indiegogo’s “Funding Forever” scheme which allows us to continue to accept pledges on Indiegogo. You can pledge for pens right here and then order additional ink on www.creopop.com.

The possibilities are endless. Let your imagination flow.


We have Cool Inks:


Infinite Creativity

With CreoPop you can create amazing 3D designs at home. Check out some of the objects made by CreoPop below:

Unlike other 3D pens there are no hot parts, no melting plastics and no unpleasant smell. Instead, CreoPopTM uses photopolymers that are solidified using LED lights to let you focus on creating designs rather than being worried about burning your fingers.

We have an experienced team already in place to bring you CreoPopTM, with over 20 company launches between us. Now you can join us in bringing the ultra-safe and cordless CreoPopTM to the market.




CreoPopTM packs the full power of 3D printing with light-sensitive photopolymers into the small size of a portable pen. In contrast, other 3D pens on the market, melt ABS or PLA plastic to around 250 degrees Celsius (482 Fahrenheit). In other words, when using another 3D Pen you’re holding a tiny little device at nearly the maximum temperature of a home oven. No wonder that Engadget referred to one of the leading 3D pens as “sort of like a hot glue gun that melts plastic”. While such pens might be fine for use in a garage or in a lab, for home use this seems dangerous.

By supporting CreoPopTM you will help make the next generation 3D pen a reality. This is beyond tech bluster – unlike the rest of the market, CreoPopTM has no hot parts, no melting plastic and no unpleasant plastic smell. Instead you can focus on the creative applications and possibilities of what a 3D pen can do.




We will continue to make further improvements to CreoPop, both in terms of design and functionality, until the pen is ready to be shipped. We are now working on our fourth generation prototype and talking to contract manufacturing, logistics and product safety providers.

We did not take CreoPopTM to Indiegogo to just raise funds. We want to engage with and learn from our early adopters and community so that we can make CreoPopTM even better. We want to introduce new features and new types of inks after we finish the campaign, and we want to understand what you as a customer and a CreoPopTM owner would want. During and after the campaign we will send surveys to those who pledge to help guide our development. Joining us now makes you more than a simple contributor – you’re a partner in helping us making the world’s greatest 3D pen.

Our team has launched over 20 companies in 3D printing, consumer electronics, mobile communications, medical devices, vending machines and internet services. We’re not a bunch of kids with a vague idea – we’re used to getting things to the market. And we’re ready to do it again.


Each ink cartridge can print a 14 meter line with the standard nozzle.


Yes. Our logistics partner is able to ship to most locations around the world.


Yes. The CreoPopTM pen is charged using a simple USB connection, and so it can be used anywhere in the world as long as you have access to USB charging through a computer or an adapter.


Firstly, CreoPopTM uses light-sensitive photopolymers instead of heating and melting plastic at a high temperature. This makes the pen safe to use. Secondly, CreoPopTM works with an amazing selection of inks. Thirdly, CreoPopTM is totally cordless – nothing to knock your hand or pull the pen as you’re using it.


Yes – safer than any other pen on the market. Our innovative photopolymer technology means that neither the pen nor the ink becomes warm. Other 3D pens heat to nearly 500 degrees Fahrenheit – nearly enough to break down a non- stick cooking pan. To give you some context hot water at 156 degrees Fahrenheit will cause a burn in just one second.

As well as making the safest pen on the market, we also make the safest ink. It does not contain any toxic material and does not emit any unpleasant or dangerous odors.



Legal Disclaimer

Delivery of rewards/perks listed on this page is subject to the best efforts of the team and similar to other crowdfunding campaigns not guaranteed. This disclaimer has been added to set reasonable expectations for our contributors/funders.

Please note that any crowdfunding contributions are considered final; we do not offer refunds or product returns.

 

© 2014 CreoPop Pte Ltd. ("CreoPop"). All rights reserved. The information published herein is provided "as is" and is subject to change without prior notice. CreoPopTM makes no representations or warranties of any kind with respect to the information and specifically disclaims implied warranties of merchantability or fitness for particular purpose. CreoPopTM and the CreoPopTM logo are trademarks of CreoPopTM and will remain at all times the sole property of CreoPopTM.

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Butterflies bezeichnet das Projekt des Gründers Andreas Mali. Andreas Mali ist seit 14 Jahren im Bereich der Entwicklung von Enterprise Architecture Software tätig. Nach seinem Studium der Wirtschaftsinformatik war er in verschiedenen Unternehmen der Softwareentwicklung mit Personal- und Budgetverantwortung tätig.

Mit butterflies wird nun die Gründung und Herausbildung eines eigenen Softwarehauses realisiert. Dabei liegt der Fokus nicht auf der Schaffung einer starren Softwareschmiede, sondern im Aufbau eines hoch dynamisch agierenden Teams von IT-Experten, welches nach agilen Entwicklungsmethoden und unter Verwendung modernster Technologien und Architektur-Pattern echte Lösungen schafft. 


UnsereLösungen werden priorisiert als SaaS (Software as a Service) angeboten, was gerade auch jungen Unternehmen und StartUps einen riesigen Vorteil verschafft! Und genau hier liegt der Fokus von butterflies: StartUps können bei butterflies verschiedenste Software als Service nutzen. Dies bedeutet, das butterflies die Software (falls noch nicht im Pool vorhanden) entwickelt, customized und anschließend das auf den jeweiligen Kunden zu 100% zugeschnittene Produkt hostet und mit modernen Web-Frontend zur Verfügung stellt. Somit erhalten unsere Kunden nach kürzester Zeit individualisierte Software aus der Cloud und zahlen dafür ein Nutzungs-abhängiges Entgelt, ohne Risiko. 


Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

Die hier erhaltenen Finanzmittel werden komplett in den weiteren Ausbau von butterflies investiert. Dazu zählen insbesondere die Erweiterung des Experten-Teams, der Ausbau der internen Infrastruktur, der Aufbau neuer Vertriebskanäle und vor allem die Umsetzung weiterer Kernprojekte. Das erste bereits realisierte Großprojekt befindet sich gerade im Personalisierungsprozess für ein Berliner StartUp!

Alle unsere Projekte, egal ob vermeintlich simple Firmen-Homepage, CRM oder umfangreiche Singlebörsenlösung, werden als Enterprise Architecture Software umgesetzt und können somit jederzeit mit jeglichen modernen anderen Programmen oder Modulen über entsprechende Schnittstellen, wie beispielsweise Web- oder REST-Services, integriert werden! Dies bedeutet auch, dass unsere Kunden je nach aktuellem Bedarf ihre Lösungen entsprechend der Anforderungen aufstocken können, ohne einem Berg riesiger Investitionskosten gegenüber zu stehen. Somit können auch und vor allem StartUps und junge Unternehmen hoch qualitative und konkret auf sie zugeschnittene Softwarelösungen bereits zu Beginn ihrer Existenz nutzen. Ihr Hauptaugenmerk kann dann auf die Herausbildung eines schlagkräftigen und Konkurrenz-fähigen Unternehmens gerichtet werden, ohne sich mit komplexen IT-Strukturen und Monate langen Entwicklungsprozessen beschäftigen zu müssen!

Mit einer Investition in butterflies investieren Sie nicht nur in unsere Firma, Konzept und Philosophie, sondern Sie unterstützen damit auch zahlreiche zukünftige andere StartUps, Unternehmerinnen und Unternehmer.

Es handelt sich bei allen Zahlungen um echte Investitionen! Warum? Vom Jahresgewinn werden jährlich 50 % anteilig nach Investitionssumme auf alle Investoren umgelegt, solange bis 150 % der Investitionssumme erreicht sind! Natürlich nur, wenn Sie dies möchten..


    Die Folgen

    Was benötigen StartUps, junge Unternehmerinnen und Unternehmer, aber auch gestandene und bereits am Markt agierende Firmen? Bunte Hochglanzbroschüren in denen mit Hype-Words um sich geworfen wird? Schicke und völlig überteuerte Fassaden hinter denen sich technologisch völlig veraltete monolytische Software-"Lösungen" mit keinerlei Integrationsmöglichkeiten verbergen? 

    Nein! Es wird Software benötigt, welche die Lösung existierender realer konkreter Probleme darstellt und für deren Anschaffung nicht ein komplettes Jahresbudget aufgebracht werden muss! Software, welche leicht und ohne großen Integrationsaufwand schnellstmöglich genutzt werden kann und dabei den konkreten jeweiligen Anforderungen gerecht wird! 


    Diese Lösungen schaffen wir, mit unserer IT-Expertise, moderner Softwarearchitektur, ausschließlich agilen Entwicklungsmethoden, fairen Vertriebsmodellen und Ihren Investitionen! 


    Risiken & Herausforderungen

    Der Markt dem wir gegenüber stehen ist riesig, Die Philosophie und das Verständnis von Softwarelösungen verändert sich momentan sehr stark und befindet sich in einem Umbruch. 

    Weg von den immer noch monolytischen großen Programmklötzen welche umfangreiche Installationen auf den Client-Rechnern und enorme Anforderungen an die Firmen Infrastruktur und Hardware stellen und dadurch enorme, teilweise unvorstellbare Summen an Geldern verschlingen,

    Hin zu  schlanken und auf den konkreten Use-Case zugeschnittenen Lösungen, welche zeitnah und ohne großen Aufwand genutzt werden können und nach flexiblen Modellen leistungsbezogen bezahlt werden können.

    Die Risiken und Herausforderungen bestehen damit nicht im Finden möglicher Kunden, sondern eher darin, den konkreten individuellen Anforderungen der verschiedenen Kunden zeitnah mit höchster Qualität entsprechen zu können. 

    Um dies sicher zu stellen setzen wir technisch auf moderne aber zugleich bewährte Technologien, Enterprise Architektur- und Entwicklungs-Pattern, ausschließlich agile Entwicklungsmethoden, ständigen direktem Kundenkontakt und unsere eigene IT-Expertise. Dadurch erreichen wir ein Höchstmaß an Stabilität, Qualität und Skalierbarkeit. Auch fachlich bestehen alle Lösungen aus einzelnen autarken Modulen. Diese Module können beliebig je nach Anforderungen und Bedarf miteinander integriert werden. 




    Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

    Neben den finanziellen Investitionen ist jedes Like, jeder Tweet über uns und diese Kampagne, jedes Gespräch, Mail, SMS, Beitrag, Blog, Artikel usw. ein Hilfe! 




    Vielen Dank für jede Unterstützung!

Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst
 Die hier erhaltenen Finanzmittel werden komplett in den weiteren Ausbau von butterflies investiert. Dazu zählen insbesondere die Erweiterung des Experten-Teams, der Ausbau der internen Infrastruktur, der Aufbau neuer Vertriebskanäle und vor allem die Umsetzung weiterer Kernprojekte. Das erste bereits realisierte Großprojekt befindet sich gerade im Personalisierungsprozess für ein Berliner StartUp!
Alle unsere Projekte, egal ob vermeintlich simple Firmen-Homepage, CRM oder umfangreiche Singlebörsenlösung, werden als Enterprise Architecture Software umgesetzt und können somit jederzeit mit jeglichen modernen anderen Programmen oder Modulen über entsprechende Schnittstellen, wie beispielsweise Web- oder REST-Services, integriert werden! Dies bedeutet auch, dass unsere Kunden je nach aktuellem Bedarf ihre Lösungen entsprechend der Anforderungen aufstocken können, ohne einem Berg riesiger Investitionskosten gegenüber zu stehen. Somit können auch und vor allem StartUps und junge Unternehmen hoch qualitative und konkret auf sie zugeschnittene Softwarelösungen bereits zu Beginn ihrer Existenz nutzen. Ihr Hauptaugenmerk kann dann auf die Herausbildung eines schlagkräftigen und Konkurrenz-fähigen Unternehmens gerichtet werden, ohne sich mit komplexen IT-Strukturen und Monate langen Entwicklungsprozessen beschäftigen zu müssen!
Mit einer Investition in butterflies investieren Sie nicht nur in unsere Firma, Konzept und Philosophie, sondern Sie unterstützen damit auch zahlreiche zukünftige andere StartUps, Unternehmerinnen und Unternehmer.


Es handelt sich bei allen Zahlungen um echte Investitionen! Warum? Vom Jahresgewinn werden jährlich 50 % anteilig nach Investitionssumme auf alle Investoren umgelegt, solange bis 150 % der Investitionssumme erreicht sind! Natürlich nur, wenn Sie dies möchten..

  

Die Folgen Was benötigen StartUps, junge Unternehmerinnen und Unternehmer, aber auch gestandene und bereits am Markt agierende Firmen? Bunte Hochglanzbroschüren in denen mit Hype-Words um sich geworfen wird? Schicke und völlig überteuerte Fassaden hinter denen sich technologisch völlig veraltete monolytische Software-"Lösungen" mit keinerlei Integrationsmöglichkeiten verbergen? 
Nein! Es wird Software benötigt, welche die Lösung existierender realer konkreter Probleme darstellt und für deren Anschaffung nicht ein komplettes Jahresbudget aufgebracht werden muss! Software, welche leicht und ohne großen Integrationsaufwand schnellstmöglich genutzt werden kann und dabei den konkreten jeweiligen Anforderungen gerecht wird! 


Diese Lösungen schaffen wir, mit unserer IT-Expertise, moderner Softwarearchitektur, ausschließlich agilen Entwicklungsmethoden, fairen Vertriebsmodellen und Ihren Investitionen! 

Risiken & Herausforderungen
 Der Markt dem wir gegenüber stehen ist riesig, Die Philosophie und das Verständnis von Softwarelösungen verändert sich momentan sehr stark und befindet sich in einem Umbruch. 
Weg von den immer noch monolytischen großen Programmklötzen welche umfangreiche Installationen auf den Client-Rechnern und enorme Anforderungen an die Firmen Infrastruktur und Hardware stellen und dadurch enorme, teilweise unvorstellbare Summen an Geldern verschlingen,
Hin zu  schlanken und auf den konkreten Use-Case zugeschnittenen Lösungen, welche zeitnah und ohne großen Aufwand genutzt werden können und nach flexiblen Modellen leistungsbezogen bezahlt werden können.
Die Risiken und Herausforderungen bestehen damit nicht im Finden möglicher Kunden, sondern eher darin, den konkreten individuellen Anforderungen der verschiedenen Kunden zeitnah mit höchster Qualität entsprechen zu können. 
Um dies sicher zu stellen setzen wir technisch auf moderne aber zugleich bewährte Technologien, Enterprise Architektur- und Entwicklungs-Pattern, ausschließlich agile Entwicklungsmethoden, ständigen direktem Kundenkontakt und unsere eigene IT-Expertise. Dadurch erreichen wir ein Höchstmaß an Stabilität, Qualität und Skalierbarkeit. Auch fachlich bestehen alle Lösungen aus einzelnen autarken Modulen. Diese Module können beliebig je nach Anforderungen und Bedarf miteinander integriert werden. 






Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann
 Neben den finanziellen Investitionen ist jedes Like, jeder Tweet über uns und diese Kampagne, jedes Gespräch, Mail, SMS, Beitrag, Blog, Artikel usw. ein Hilfe! 




Vielen Dank für jede Unterstützung!

story:
It’s a simple device with the power to turn any television or standalone monitor into a fully operational Android computer in seconds. The Xplate computer processor is housed inside a full-sized QWERTY keyboard, giving you comfort while you browse or write. The Xplate connects to the internet through either WIFI or its Ethernet port, and comes with 8GB standard internal flash and extra optional 32GB storage.

The aesthetics and design of Xplate are superb. We chose a modern chiclet style keyboard with a natural ergonomic shape for the best typing experience available. This is a major improvement over the awkward, slow and heavy keyboards of most budget laptops, and a key attracting factor for people who use the computer primarily for writing. 


Videos downloaded or streamed from the internet can be played on a large screen of your choice via HDMI connection or AV port, effectively turning your regular TV into a smart TV with the functionality of a computer. Xplate is simply one of the easiest and most affordable ways for anyone to have full access to the many benefits of home internet access, without sacrificing visual display or keyboard interaction. Xplate offers the ability to increase the value and functionality of the limited entertainment devices you already own.

Full Specifications:

•OS: Android 4.4

•CPU: Rockchip 3188, quad-core Cortex-A9, up to 1.6GHz

•Graphics card: Eight Core Mali-400 with up to 600MHz

•Memory: 2GB

•Flash storage: 8GB

•Extra build-in storage: 32GB(optional)  

•Output: HDMI, AV/CVBS

•Network: Wifi and Ethernet

•Interface: RJ45 x1,USB x 2,micro USB x1 

•Adaptor: 5V 2A

•Keyboard: QWERTY standard 104 keys


Optional accessories:

•Wireless mouse

•HDMI cable

•HDMI to VGA converter


Who We Are:

We are BlueGeeks, a team of designers who specialize in creating innovations which simplify and enhance the quality of life for our customers. We are constantly brainstorming new creative ideas that combine the functionality and features of existing concepts, or branch out into entirely new territory in technology. Our team consists of two product managers, three ID designers, two structural engineers, one electronics engineer, one testing engineer, and other professionals. We have the knowledge and experience to make the Xplate a commercial success.

Risks & Challenges

We’ve been planning, sketching, prototyping, and testing Xplate for months, and we are finally ready to begin mass production on a version we are proud to call complete. The product works spectacularly, and is lightweight and convenient. 

The only risks we face at this time are finding the right market and setting a new trend in motion. There has never been a combination keyboard/computer device before, so there may be some friction in introducing it to the market. 

However, we remain confident and initial market testing confirms that there is a place for an inexpensive simple device like Xplate in homes which already have a TV or other monitor, and do not want to shell out the money for a bulky desktop machine, or even a laptop or tablet. We will proceed with production even if the full goal of the campaign is not reached. We are ready to get Xplate out there and see the product grow.

Join us!

We are highly grateful for your support!

Not in the US?We ship to 220 countries worldwide.

If you can not contribute the dollar,but you are willing to help us to make some noise on facebook,twitter,google+ or any other SNS websites,we would aslo be very grateful for your help.


General FAQ's

Q: What kind of shiping you use?

To provide the best service and make sure you get the perks with no worries, we use DHL/UPS/FEDEX to ship the perks,and it takes 3-4 days to get it to your hands.

Q: Can I buy the accessory perk separately?

Yes.But before you buy the accessory perk, make sure you already purchased the Xplate perk,since we only ship the accessory along with the Xplate computer.

Q: When you ship, will you please declare a lesser value on the customs form?

Yes,we can do this.

Q: I forgot to pay for international shipping. What should I do?

No problem. All you have to do is make another contribution to cover your shipping. 

Q: Do I need to pay more shipping if I purchased Xplate with some accessories?

No need, since these accessories are small items, can be shipped together with Xplate machine.

Q: I’ve changed my mind. Can I get a refund?

Sorry, Indiegogo’s policy is No Refunds. Unfortunately, there’s nothing we can do about this. When your contribution is deposited into our PayPal account, it comes from Indiegogo, not from you. So if we were to refund your contribution, it wouldn’t make it back to you. 

Q: What's the warranty?

The Xplate and its related accessory come with a 1 year limited liability warranty that protects you against manufacturing defects.

story:
Not : Türkçe açıklamalar İngilizce metnin altında bulunmaktadır. (Turkish explanation is at the bottom of the English explanation.)


(Alternative Video)


Smart Chair

People wants to live freely. If you can move whatever you want, communicate with people whenever you like, become socialized and use social possibilities You are free! What if you have many obstacles? You can be in the pink of condition but you do not know what will happen tomorrow. For these reasons you should support our project to develop our "Smart Chair" more, reach people who needs, provide more free life for disabled persons and of course for your future!

 Smart Chair;

 - Can move,

 - Can provide its own safety with the sensors autonomically,

 - Send and receive sms capability,

 - Phone calls capability,

 - Surf on the internet capability,

 - And! Smart Chair enables to control all of these functions by voice command or touch screen!

for detail please visit www.akillisandalye.com


What We Need & What You Get

Our company is built with government R&D support. We built a prototype and our contract is over. Now our targets are following;

- Prepare the prototype for industry and production.

- Add new features to our prototype (watch movie, listen music, social platfoms connections, alternative accelerometer based control)

- Add more language support for voice control (English , Deutsch and more)

So we need financial support.

If you will support to us, you can chose a perk what you want.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.


Türkçe

____________________________________________________________________

Akıllı Sandalye

İnsanlar özgürce yaşamak ister. İstediğiniz gibi hareket edebiliyorsanız, istediğiniz zaman istediğiniz kişiyle iletişim kurabiliyorsanız, sosyalleşebiliyor ve sosyal imkânları kullanabiliyorsanız özgürsünüz demektir. Peki ya önünde engeller varsa? Bu gün sağlıklı olabilirsiniz, yarın ne olacağını nereden bilebilirsiniz ki? İşte bu nedenle ürünümüzü daha çok geliştirebilmemiz için, ürünümüzün ihtiyacı olan insanlara ulaşabilmesi için, engelli bireylerin daha özgür yaşayabilmesi için, kendi geleceğiniz için destek olmalısınız!

Akıllı Sandalye;

-  Hareket edebilir,

-  Sensörler ile kendi güvenliğini otonom olarak sağlayabilir,

-  Sms mesajları gönderip alabilir,

-  Cep telefonu arama işlemleri gerçekleştirebilir,

-  İnternete girebilir,

-  Ve tüm bu fonksiyonları hem ses ile komut vererek hem de dokunmatik ekran ile gerçekleştirebilirsiniz!

Detaylı bilgi için www.akillisandalye.com adresini ziyaret edebilirsiniz.


Neye İhtiyacımız Var ve Ne Elde Edeceksiniz?

Şirketimiz devlet hibe desteği ile kurulmuştur ve prototip süreciyle birlikte devlet ile olan sözleşmemiz de bitmiştir. Şimdiki hedeflerimiz ise;

-  Prototipimizi sanayiye ve üretime hazırlamak,

-  Prototipimize yeni özellikler (film izleme, müzik dinleme, sosyal platformlarla bağlantı, alternatif olarak akselerometre tabanlı kontrol mekanizması) eklemek,

-  Sesli kontrol mekanizmasına yeni dil(İngilizce, Almanca ve daha fazlası) destekleri eklemektir.

Bu yüzden finans desteğine ihtiyacımız var.

Bizi desteklerseniz kampanyamızın sunduğu size uygun olan seçeneklerden istediğinizi seçebilirsiniz.


Bize Yardım Edebileceğiniz Diğer Yollar

Herkes finans yoluyla katkıda bulunamayabilir ama bu bize yardım edemeyeceğiniz anlamına gelmez.

  • Kampanyamız hakkında çevrenizdekileri bilgilendirebilir, haberdar olmalarını sağlayabilirsiniz.
  • Sosyal ağlarınızda Indiegogo’nun Paylaş butonunu kullanabilir, arkadaşlarınızın da kampanyamızı paylaşmasını sağlayabilirsiniz.

Destek olmak işte bu kadar kolay!

story:
Once inside the password protected App, you can enable other features, depending on what you would like to enable on the phone when it is locked. 

The password is double-entry too. Not only do you need a password to get into the settings, you also need to enter it to save any changes… just in case. 

 

SafeRide can be set to send you text alerts if the SafeRide system is disabled or not used as expected. 

If you are a parent or employer, you can select how closely you want to monitor each SafeRide.  It can be as simple as checking to see it’s working every day, week or month. 

However, if you would like more oversight, you can set up a schedule specific to the user, so SafeRide can look for activity as it is expected and report if something is wrong.

 

If you receive a text message while your phone is locked, SafeRide will automatically respond, letting the other person know that you’re driving.  SafeRide can also be set to have a text sent to someone who calls you while driving, as long as they call from a phone that can receive your text.

 

We realize that there are a select group of apps that are designed to be used in the car.  The most obvious are your maps for navigation and internet radio.  If you use your phone as a GPS, you can enable that and up to 2 more Apps, which you feel are useful in the car.

 

You can also allow for the use of a hands-free system (in-dash sync or headset), while the phone itself remains locked.  In this mode, the phone itself will not ring, but it will ring through your dash or earpiece. 

 

If you may be in your car as a passenger from time to time, you can enable Passenger Mode.  This mode allows you to use your phone one time (the audio stays on mute as a courtesy to the driver).  The next time you get in the car, the phone will lock again, just as it should.

You can also set a temporary PIN for Passenger mode that automatically expires after a specific date.

 

Of course, if there’s an emergency you can always call 9-1-1!  Our innovative approach allows you to call for help easily when in distress, however, it cannot be done accidentally.

 

We are working with a variety of insurance companies to offer you a discount if you are using SafeRide. In order to do this, we need to show hard data that proves that SafeRide works.  Your help now could help us get you a discount very soon!

SafeRide is not just for teen drivers either.  Possibly you just need a little help to remove the temptation, or if you want to set a good example for your kids.  Whether they are driving now or will be soon, SafeRide is a great way to show them that this is important for you too!

 

SafeRide is great for business owners too!  Whether you have a fleet of 500 trucks, or team of 5 sales people on the road every day, make sure they are not using their phone while driving a car for which you are responsible.

 

 

SafeRide is great for anyone who needs a little help resisting the temptation to use their phone while they drive their car!

  

SafeRide works with nearly all Android phones.  Since Android makes up roughly 60% of the current US smartphone market by OS, we felt it made the most sense to start there. 

However, we are working diligently to develop an iPhone version of the SafeRide App, and expect to release it in the Spring of 2014.  At the same time, we are also developing solutions for Blackberry & Windows devices, as well as non-smart phones.  With your help we can get there even faster.

 

We are just about ready to begin production on 1,000 units right now.  The design is complete - we have our FCC Certification and have been officially recognized by the Bluetooth SIG.  We need to finish our mechanical tooling and flip the switch. 

However, the only way will be able to truly test our technology and make improvements is by having it used in the real world.  We have tested it as thoroughly as we can on our own, now we need you to be one of our Beta Testers.  If you’re willing to beta test SafeRide, you'll be one of the first to get a SafeRide delivered to your door.  As soon as the first 1,000 are made (we are targeting January of 2014), we will send it to you, along with a Car Magnet to tell everyone that your ride is a SafeRide. 

We'll want to know how it goes, so we will need to communicate with you for at least the first month that you have your SafeRide.  We're looking for feedback on usability; we want to know of any issues you have, and any improvements you feel we should make.  

The SafeRide App is set up to be beta tested through the Google Play Store.  You'll be able to download, install and provide feedback, all from your phone - as long as you're not driving! 

As we make updates and improvements to the App, you'll have them sent to your phone. That way you will continually benefit from all of the data we collect from the entire group of Beta Testers.

After that, the SafeRide is your to keep.  We will even list your name in the App Credits as an official Beta Tester (unless, of course, you wish to remain anonymous).

Once we have gotten all of our Beta test results, we will need about one month to refine the App and complete our first official production run.  For everyone who contributes but would prefer not to be a Beta Tester, we expect to deliver your production SafeRide to you in February of 2014. 

Our customer & technical support are already available to answer any questions you have.  Whether you have questions about SafeRide or the Indiegogo campaign itself, call us at (855) 4-SafeRide today!

 

The best way to help us get SafeRide out in to the world is by making a contribution today.  For those that can contribute, we'll send you one of our great Perks!

I created SafeRide, not only for my family, but for everyone's... To make our roads a safer place to drive.  With your help, we can make this a reality.

Even if you can't support us through the perks, please help us spread our message - Share this campaign on Facebook and Twitter. 

You contribution can help us make the roads safer for you and your family! Help us reach our goal so we can begin saving lives!!!

 

SafeRide is a Registered Trademark of SafeRide, LLC.  Apple, Android, Blackberry, Bluetooth, iPhone, Google & Windows are Registered Trademarks of their respective owners.

The password is double-entry too. Not only do you need a password to get into the settings, you also need to enter it to save any changes… just in case.  


 

SafeRide can be set to send you text alerts if the SafeRide system is disabled or not used as expected. 
If you are a parent or employer, you can select how closely you want to monitor each SafeRide.  It can be as simple as checking to see it’s working every day, week or month.  
However, if you would like more oversight, you can set up a schedule specific to the user, so SafeRide can look for activity as it is expected and report if something is wrong.
 

If you receive a text message while your phone is locked, SafeRide will automatically respond, letting the other person know that you’re driving.  SafeRide can also be set to have a text sent to someone who calls you while driving, as long as they call from a phone that can receive your text.
 

We realize that there are a select group of apps that are designed to be used in the car.  The most obvious are your maps for navigation and internet radio.  If you use your phone as a GPS, you can enable that and up to 2 more Apps, which you feel are useful in the car.
 

You can also allow for the use of a hands-free system (in-dash sync or headset), while the phone itself remains locked.  In this mode, the phone itself will not ring, but it will ring through your dash or earpiece.  
 

If you may be in your car as a passenger from time to time, you can enable Passenger Mode.  This mode allows you to use your phone one time (the audio stays on mute as a courtesy to the driver).  The next time you get in the car, the phone will lock again, just as it should.
You can also set a temporary PIN for Passenger mode that automatically expires after a specific date.
 

Of course, if there’s an emergency you can always call 9-1-1!  Our innovative approach allows you to call for help easily when in distress, however, it cannot be done accidentally.
 

We are working with a variety of insurance companies to offer you a discount if you are using SafeRide. In order to do this, we need to show hard data that proves that SafeRide works.  Your help now could help us get you a discount very soon!
SafeRide is not just for teen drivers either.  Possibly you just need a little help to remove the temptation, or if you want to set a good example for your kids.  Whether they are driving now or will be soon, SafeRide is a great way to show them that this is important for you too!
 

SafeRide is great for business owners too!  Whether you have a fleet of 500 trucks, or team of 5 sales people on the road every day, make sure they are not using their phone while driving a car for which you are responsible.
 
 
SafeRide is great for anyone who needs a little help resisting the temptation to use their phone while they drive their car!
  


SafeRide works with nearly all Android phones.  Since Android makes up roughly 60% of the current US smartphone market by OS, we felt it made the most sense to start there.  
However, we are working diligently to develop an iPhone version of the SafeRide App, and expect to release it in the Spring of 2014.  At the same time, we are also developing solutions for Blackberry & Windows devices, as well as non-smart phones.  With your help we can get there even faster.
 




We are just about ready to begin production on 1,000 units right now.  The design is complete - we have our FCC Certification and have been officially recognized by the Bluetooth SIG.  We need to finish our mechanical tooling and flip the switch.  
However, the only way will be able to truly test our technology and make improvements is by having it used in the real world.  We have tested it as thoroughly as we can on our own, now we need you to be one of our Beta Testers.  If you’re willing to beta test SafeRide, you'll be one of the first to get a SafeRide delivered to your door.  As soon as the first 1,000 are made (we are targeting January of 2014), we will send it to you, along with a Car Magnet to tell everyone that your ride is a SafeRide.  
We'll want to know how it goes, so we will need to communicate with you for at least the first month that you have your SafeRide.  We're looking for feedback on usability; we want to know of any issues you have, and any improvements you feel we should make.  
The SafeRide App is set up to be beta tested through the Google Play Store.  You'll be able to download, install and provide feedback, all from your phone - as long as you're not driving!  
As we make updates and improvements to the App, you'll have them sent to your phone. That way you will continually benefit from all of the data we collect from the entire group of Beta Testers.
After that, the SafeRide is your to keep.  We will even list your name in the App Credits as an official Beta Tester (unless, of course, you wish to remain anonymous).

Once we have gotten all of our Beta test results, we will need about one month to refine the App and complete our first official production run.  For everyone who contributes but would prefer not to be a Beta Tester, we expect to deliver your production SafeRide to you in February of 2014.  
Our customer & technical support are already available to answer any questions you have.  Whether you have questions about SafeRide or the Indiegogo campaign itself, call us at (855) 4-SafeRide today!
 


The best way to help us get SafeRide out in to the world is by making a contribution today.  For those that can contribute, we'll send you one of our great Perks!


I created SafeRide, not only for my family, but for everyone's... To make our roads a safer place to drive.  With your help, we can make this a reality.
Even if you can't support us through the perks, please help us spread our message - Share this campaign on Facebook and Twitter.  
You contribution can help us make the roads safer for you and your family! Help us reach our goal so we can begin saving lives!!!
 

SafeRide is a Registered Trademark of SafeRide, LLC.  Apple, Android, Blackberry, Bluetooth, iPhone, Google & Windows are Registered Trademarks of their respective owners.

story:
Hi, I'm Arun Sagar.

I have invented software technology – I call it magiXcan™ (pronounced ‘magic scan’) – that can decode media files, like digital photos, extremely fast using parallel processing. Prior to its invention, this may have been considered an extremely hard, if not impossible, problem to solve. This technology is showcased in our free Aros Magic Viewer 3.0 beta application and you can download it right now to experience its ultra-high speeds for yourself:


(Windows XP or higher)

We need about $50K to conduct a one-year beta test run for Aros Magic Viewer with magiXcan. If we are able to attract more funding it will be possible to do much, much more – we can broaden the scope of the underlying magiXcan technology, get it into more devices, and indeed utterly revolutionize consumer computing – going way, way beyond the simple speeding up of photo viewing that Aros Magic Viewer 3.0 showcases. I will explain why and how below, but do start by giving Aros Magic Viewer 3.0 a twirl. Seeing is believing.


(magiXcan makes Aros Magic Viewer 3.0 the fastest photo viewer in the world by an order of magnitude!)

THE SHORT STORY

  • magiXcan is currently implemented for JPEG photo viewing speedup on Microsoft Windows only. This you can use today: simply download Aros Magic Viewer 3.0 beta and you're off. The $50K we're seeking here will help turn this beta into a finished/polished product.
  • magiXcan needs to be implemented for other file formats – photos, documents, audio, video, etc. It also needs to be ported to MacOS and Android. This requires substantially more funding. The more formats magiXcan supports, the faster your computer will become. This will enable the production of way faster, cheaper and lower-energy computers. We are hoping your support will go well beyond the basic $50K we’re asking for – the greater your support, the more we can do.
  • magiXcan needs to be deep inside an operating system for it to yield maximum performance. This requires even more engineering, thus funding. After your initial support, we intend to raise the funds we need by licensing magiXcan to 3rd parties in due course.
  • For your support, we are offering, among other cool items, unique high-resolution print T-shirts featuring the colorful magiXcan monkey. Check out the designs on www.magiXcan.com. You can also license our technology or rent our brains.
  • If you can’t fund us, you can still help simply by using Aros Magic Viewer 3.0 and recommending it your friends. Just the fact that you personally can vouch for our claims of having made a major breakthrough helps us enormously. Our credibility to you is our greatest asset.

THE PERKS

Some say that in the simple equation Zn+1 = Zn2 + C you can find any shape your heart may desire. To capture the soul of magiXcan, I went looking for a magic monkey using a fractal generating program that I built long ago (it’s free) – and found it! The magiXcan monkey image is built from an infinite number of smaller monkeys like itself – symbolizing parallelism in Space conquering Time.

If we already had magiXcan-enabled massively parallel computers available, this would have been a relatively quick task, but sadly we don’t (yet). It took many computers working simultaneously several weeks to number-crunch billions upon billions pixels to create the unique fractal that is the magiXcan monkey. Finding the right shape was only the first step, though. For its coloring, I devised novel formulas that, when wielded like an artist's toolbox, yield a vast range of colorful magiXcan monkeys that have never before been created in the history of the Universe! Now, these delightful monkeys will adorn the prints being offered to you as perks for your support.

The perks being offered (see opposite for details) are:

  • Acknowledgement on www.magiXcan.com.
  • Activation codes for all games on www.arosmagic.com.
  • Mouse-pad printed with a magiXcan monkey
  • High quality 100% cotton T-shirts printed with a magiXcan monkey
  • High resolution prints of the magiXcan monkey on art-paper/canvas
  • Test licenses for the magiXcan library for use with your photo application
  • Candid consultancy from our senior-most engineers to improve your own software project

(More designs on magiXcan.com)

That is our campaign in a nutshell, but if you want to know more about magiXcan and our plans for it, please read on.

THE LONG STORY

Here is the general trend with CPU speeds, display resolutions and digital photo sizes:

1990: 0.05GHz CPU, 0.5MP display, 0.5MP photos.
2000: 2GHz CPU, 2MP display, 2MP photos.
2010: 4GHz CPU, 3MP display, 16MP photos.
2020:  (6GHz CPU, 8MP display, 50MP photos)???

Notice a clear pattern – your CPU hasn’t been getting appreciably faster for over a decade now, but picture sizes have been getting a whole lot bigger. Moore’s Law famously states that the transistor-count on chips will double every couple of years – and this has certainly happened, in part explaining why the pixel count of your pictures has increased so dramatically. But CPUs have hit a clock frequency ceiling with manufacturers unable to crank up clock speeds in the way they have in the past, largely because of thermal limitations resulting from increased power consumption when clock speeds are raised further. So the increased transistor count we are getting as per Moore’s Law is essentially going into the ever-increasing number of cores in CPUs, while their clock speeds have stagnated.

Unfortunately, when it comes to the using of these many cores with parallel algorithms, we run into Amdahl’s Law. This roughly says that there are limits to how fast you can process data if certain parts of it are serial. Because clock speeds have languished and photo (and other media) files are largely decompressed sequentially, we have reached a limit in terms of how fast we can decompress, i.e. consume, them. Even if we had 32 MP displays available today, our present (and foreseeable) CPUs simply wouldn’t be able to decompress and feed images of that size to those displays fast enough, because conventional methods aren’t fast enough. The increased core counts that are available these days are of no help in this situation (and wouldn’t be even if we had 100-core CPUs).

When I excitedly took the iPad for a spin at an Apple store upon its launch, the very first thing I did was download a bunch of photos taken on a typical digital camera (at the time ~12 MP each). Besides them loading slowly, my attempt to view them full-size crashed the machine in no time at all. I suspect it ran out of memory and panicked. More recently, when I tried out a newer iPad, I noticed that upon using its compulsory iTunes photo transfer utility, it automatically reduced the size of stored images. I think the iPad is incapable of loading today's normal-sized photos without compromising speed and memory usage. I daresay photo display is a major reason tablet/phone processors need to run at high clock frequency with excess RAM and thus consume so much battery power.

THE BREAKTHROUGH – MAGIXCAN™


(more on magiXcan.com)

I have succeeded in parallelizing a major subclass of these problems of decompression, calling my solution magiXcan. You can read technical details in its patent filing. MagiXcan is the secret sauce that makes Aros Magic Viewer3 so very fast. But faster photo viewing is only the tip of the iceberg. Ultimately magiXcan is technology that may enable your N-core computer to run N-fold faster for all the stuff that really matters than it currently does. If you are like most consumers, the single most taxing task your CPU does is digital media processing, which is fundamentally just decompression. A lot of the rest of the time your CPU is just idling. Thus, decompressing data N-times faster is, practically speaking, the same as speeding up your machine N-fold.

MagiXcan is a significant breakthrough, and it is not just sheer speed that is revolutionized. Say we have a 100-core machine and have effectively achieved all the speed improvement we care for – then this capacity for faster processing can be directly translated into reduced energy consumption – in other words we can trade off speed against energy consumed. So instead of processing photos 100X faster on this 100-core machine, we could process them merely 10X faster, but at the same time using up only a tenth of the original power required – by lowering the clock frequency by the same factor. You can see the disruptive potential of this breakthrough even if you aren’t a speed freak.

Besides the obvious ecological benefits of reduced energy consumption, consider that consumer computing is increasingly shifting towards portable computing platforms (phones, tablets, laptops, etc.) that run on batteries. The battery life of your mobile computing device is determined by how much energy it consumes. Less energy consumption directly translates into longer battery life (or smaller, thus less polluting, batteries). With a judicious application of magiXcan, one can conceive of portable computers that last weeks on a single charge – and all without sacrificing great performance. Check out this white paper from nVidia that goes into details about these tradeoffs.

Just as the easy availability of a quad-core processor enabled a code-monkey like me to invent magiXcan, the greater availability of cheap massively parallel computers (imagine million+ core tiny computers available for pennies) will fuel the invention of hitherto fringe technologies like TRUE Artificial Intelligence, holo-physicians, nano-robots, full cybernetic augmentation, personalized genomic synthesizers and who knows what else. But that will not happen soon enough if we don’t find uses for processors with core-counts in the 10-1000 range. MagiXcan gives you a valid reason to purchase the highest core-count you can afford, thus accelerating the future availability of stuff that is merely fantasized about in Science Fiction today. Before magiXcan, the utility of massively parallel CPU-cores appeared marginal (how often do you do video transcoding?). Not any longer, making technology like Intel’s Larrabee usable in every-day applications. After all, compressed media consumption is what most of us use computers for, most of the time.

The implications of pervasive magiXcan are such that our entire computing landscape could be turned upside down – subject to a good start from you, of course. End result: faster, cheaper and cooler computers. (And maybe a cylon of your own in this lifetime!)


(Aros Magic Viewer3 breaks the speed limit!)

THE SUPPORT NEEDED

Our hope is that millions will download and use Aros Magic Viewer 3.0 to browse their ever-larger collections of ever-bigger photos. However, supporting such a large number of users is costly, starting with high-speed servers and bandwidth in pricey data centers. So this is, in the first instance, an appeal to raise $50K to deliver Aros Magic Viewer 3.0 beta to users and support them for a year. To repeat, Aros Magic Viewer 3.0 is already built and ready for you to download and use – we don’t need funding to build a prototype, I have done that on my own steam. What we don’t have, and are asking you to help fund, is the capacity to handle what we believe will be a HUGELY popular FREE product, as there are many logistical and technical issues to be addressed to successfully operate a worldwide program of beta testing capable of handling hundreds of thousands of users, and to respond to their feedback and suggestions. The result will be a tested and refined product that will be adopted by millions more. Even if you don’t want to or can’t give monetary support, it helps if you simply download and use Aros Magic software and recommend it to others.

This is how I envisage the logical evolution of magiXcan (and the rough costs and timeframes required for implementing the respective stages, the first three of which can potentially be enabled by Indiegogo alone):

  1. $50K / 12 months: Run online beta test cycle for Aros Magic Viewer 3.0 for Windows. Enhance back-end online services. Stabilize existing feature set.  Provide basic online support for beta users.
  2. $250K / 12 months: Support a user-base of 10+ million, providing wider online support. Add more online services and features to Aros Magic Viewer 3.0(e.g., special-effects, image-processing filters). Enhancements for touch enabled devices.
  3. $1M / 18 months:  Add more image file formats (e.g. TIFF, PNG, GIF, etc.). Develop a standardized high-performance media processing library usable by 3rd parties. We hope to reach this level at Indiegogo.
  4. $5M / 24 months:  Develop Photo (and other digital media) Management/Editing/Consumption software. Port the technology to MacOS and Android(x86).
  5. $15M / 36 months: Extend to other, non-video file formats. Web browser plugins, iOS and Android(ARM), embedded systems(e.g, cameras, TVs, digital frames) effectively making magiXcan available across multiple devices and platforms.
  6. $50M/60 months: Video codecs. Create system modules so that an existing OS {BSD, Linux, Windows} can be turbocharged into becoming a scalable, extensible platform for massively parallel computers. This may form the basis of most future computing; at least until we get usable quantum/optical computers out of the labs.

Note that Aros Magic Viewer 3.0 is just the first licensee of magiXcan. We will license magiXcan to other 3rd parties like OS vendors, device manufacturers/OEMs and app developers as the platform matures.

THE SOFTWARE, THE COMPANY, ITS MAGIC-USERS & THEIR PRIME DIRECTIVE

When I decided to launch my own venture to build and publish software, it took me a long time to choose an appropriate name for it. It always seems that the good ones are already taken. I sat down and deeply thought about my core values and what my activities were really about. I enjoy building AND sharing cool stuff. I am also grateful that countless mathematicians, scientists and engineers have provided me the necessary means so that I can do these magical things. I wish to give back in whichever way I can. This desire for wanting feelings of joy and happiness in others is my definition of Love.

So I founded Aros Magic. It’s all about “Love & Magic”. Its mission is to lovingly create technology so magical that its primary effect is joy and happiness, i.e:

♥ → ∞

A successful Indiegogo launch will enable us to assemble a like-minded/hearted team of talented engineers and designers driven by the desire to build extremely fast, beautiful and fun magical technologies the likes of which have never been experienced before, but will make you extremely happy.

Movers, Shakers and Dreamers are encouraged to apply at http://www.arosmagic.com/Jobs. We are open to relocating magiXcan development to where most of you want to reside; though it is most likely going to be Seattle or the Bay Area.

BTW…

If you have a 48-core (or higher) computer, please let us know how much faster images load on it. 100X?


(If we hit 10K T-shirts, we may offer allover print T-shirts for perks)
