$15M / 36 months: Extend to other, non-video file formats. Web browser plugins, iOS and Android(ARM), embedded systems(e.g, cameras, TVs, digital frames) effectively making magiXcan available across multiple devices and platforms.
$50M/60 months: Video codecs. Create system modules so that an existing OS {BSD, Linux, Windows} can be turbocharged into becoming a scalable, extensible platform for massively parallel computers. This may form the basis of most future computing; at least until we get usable quantum/optical computers out of the labs.
Note that Aros Magic Viewer 3.0 is just the first licensee of magiXcan. We will license magiXcan to other 3rd parties like OS vendors, device manufacturers/OEMs and app developers as the platform matures.
THE SOFTWARE, THE COMPANY, ITS MAGIC-USERS & THEIR PRIME DIRECTIVE

When I decided to launch my own venture to build and publish software, it took me a long time to choose an appropriate name for it. It always seems that the good ones are already taken. I sat down and deeply thought about my core values and what my activities were really about. I enjoy building AND sharing cool stuff. I am also grateful that countless mathematicians, scientists and engineers have provided me the necessary means so that I can do these magical things. I wish to give back in whichever way I can. This desire for wanting feelings of joy and happiness in others is my definition of Love.
So I founded Aros Magic. It’s all about “Love & Magic”. Its mission is to lovingly create technology so magical that its primary effect is joy and happiness, i.e:
♥ → ∞
A successful Indiegogo launch will enable us to assemble a like-minded/hearted team of talented engineers and designers driven by the desire to build extremely fast, beautiful and fun magical technologies the likes of which have never been experienced before, but will make you extremely happy.
Movers, Shakers and Dreamers are encouraged to apply at http://www.arosmagic.com/Jobs. We are open to relocating magiXcan development to where most of you want to reside; though it is most likely going to be Seattle or the Bay Area.
BTW…
If you have a 48-core (or higher) computer, please let us know how much faster images load on it. 100X?

(If we hit 10K T-shirts, we may offer allover print T-shirts for perks)

story:
Do you know how much distance you actually cover every day?

Imagine your everyday activities, as they are right now. Although you may think you're not working out much, you are actually doing a lot—walking to work, cycling, going to the gym, taking a swim, walking your dog or mopping the floor every Sunday. It’s very likely that you don't even know how much distance you actually cover in a day and what you accomplish!

You may already be using some „running app“ or other fancy equipment to track your runs, count your calories and measure your heart rate.

But what if you put the miles you’ve covered doing ordinary tasks on a world map? You could leisurely walk your dog to Paris, or vacuum from London to Hogwarts castle, to see if that qualifies as magic. Figure out how many downward dogs it takes to get to your yoga class or even how many tango steps it takes to get to your beloveds front door!!

This is all possible. Every physical effort you make—running, walking, cycling, jogging, swimming, working out in the gym—can be tracked and put on a route of your choice. You'll be surprised where you can get, if you put the effort in! 

 

We let you chart your real mileage on virtual routes

We have developed a unique iPhone app, MileKeeper, that transforms your real miles or kilometers in to virtual travels the world over. Using GPS, MileKeeper app will keep track of your distances and time. Afterwards, your effort will be shown on the map of the world in any route—either designed by you, or already pre-set by us.

This is your unique opportunity to travel the world without stepping off your local track, jogging in your favorite park and never leaving the comfortable surroundings of the place you call home.

 

We need your support to complete it!

The experts who were introduced to MileKeeper app have acknowledged that:

  1. the idea of the MileKeeper is truly unique—it's the only app that not only gives a different motivation to move and stay active, but also serves as educational material about history and geography;
  2. there is a need for this app to be easily linked to the social networks to invite friends to participate in your virtual tours within the app.

Since we want MileKeeper to be a living, welcomed and exciting application not only "a cool idea" or "unique concept", we need to implement following important functionality into it:

1. A new and powerful directions and routing engine

The new and powerful directions and routing engine makes it possible to create new, more sophisticated routes and precise maps that let you immerse yourself in famous, historical and fictional journeys. For instance, hike the silk route through Central Asia, follow the footsteps of Marco Polo, cycle the Tour de France route, run along with Forrest Gump, and cross the La Manche and get to Paris along with the famous three musketeers! At every point, you can check your position on the map.

2. Integration with Facebook

Integration with Facebook makes it possible for you to challenge your friends right from your mobile device and see their progress right on your iPhone. All these (and more) routes can be completed with your friends—as a challenge or as a friendly group effort.

-----------------

To introduce these functions, we need to put in quite a bit of programming effort, which we have evaluated at $11,520. Thus far, we have funded the development of MileKeeper from our own savings, but to make it really shine and become one of the most interesting Health & Fitness apps ever developed, we need your support!

 

What will you get in return for your support

We'll be happy to give you something back as a thank you for your support:

  • First of all, each and every backer will receive a free of charge and ad-free  MileKeeper app.

  • Second, we will organize the world’s first ever MileKeeper Virtual World Relay route around the globe that each and every supporter will have a chance to participate in and receive a certificate that proves that you have become a part of the history!
  • There will always be free routes in the MileKeeper app, but the most interesting routes will be available for a fee. Support us with $25 and get the first year's routes for free! That's approximately $50 worth of routes! 
  • Add a bit more, and you'll get all our paid routes for free for ever!
  • The most generous supporters will have a chance to have their own route! That's right—suggest a route idea, we will make it and give it a name of your choice. This is your chance to have your “five–minutes of fame” or dedicate a route to a worthy sport loving friend!!

With luck and your help, we hope to “see” y’all at the MileKeeper Virtual World Relay!

 

What we will do with any extra funds

If we get more funding than necessary, we hope to make a MileKeeper app for Android, and, if we don't run out of funds, we will integrate the MileKeeper with the most popular Health & Fitness data storage apps.

 

----------------

Who are we?

We are Aldis Bokmelders, Karlis Celms, Martins Vavere and Didzis Nelke, and together we make the MileKeeper team.

Karlis (you may recognize him from the project video) is an American with Latvian roots now living in Riga, Latvia, and the others are Latvian Latvians. We come from a small country but we have a global vision about the mobile app we're all involved in creating - MileKeeper - the app that can make both the world smaller and you at least 1% healthier.

By the way, you may wonder where Latvia is and what it is known for. Heres some rather random, yet slightly important facts about our country:

  • We are located in Europe not far from Sweden and bordering Russia..... people may say we are eastern european, but geographically speaking, we are smack in the middle of Europe!!!
  • Our capital city is Riga and is home to about just under half of our tiny population of 2.2 million people with charming old world accents....
  • Mark Rothko (he's a painter) & Mikhail Baryshnikov (that Russian dancer dude who dated S.J.P. on Sex and the city...) were both born in Latvia.
  • Our national sports are Hockey (we beat the US national team 3:2 in 1998....BOOM!) and mushroom picking (mostly chanterelles and porcinis)....
  • Warren Buffet's wife is Latvian, and lots of other men wish their's were too.... :)

That's Latvia in a nutshell...... 

 

Thanks to Prince and Crosby for the background music in the project video!

story:
Our Story
We're a group of golfers who started out with a website dedicated to providing quality golf equipment at prices ordinary golfers could afford. As we heard from thousands of our customers, it became apparent that what they really needed (and was completely absent) was a way to rate golf courses that ordinary golfers could use and make smart decisions, unlike current guides (the Hacker's Guide).

With the mobile revolution, we realized we could provide both equipment retailing and ratings, as well as many more tools, in a unique and intuitive fashion through the smartphone. With this "secret weapon" we could make golf more accessible to amateur golfers by taking all of the time & hassle - and more than a little of the expense - out of finding a course, making a tee time and enjoying golf! That was the intellectual birth of the Mobile Golfer.

The Problem
You’d think with over 650,000 apps in the Apple App Store and almost as many for the Android, you’d have already found the perfect app for a golfer. Yes, there are a number of apps out there, but most perform only one or two functions and then not very intuitively. Rather than making the golf experience better, they are inelegant and don't efficiently do the things you want them to do. They get downloaded once and then never used again. Ugh! Mobile devices are designed to empower users, not just put a screen and virtual buttons where paper, pencil and phone used to be.

Today, in order to get golfing, the typical golfer often has six or more apps open and none of the information is shared between them. Something as simple as taking the name of the golf course and dropping it into a scorecard automatically doesn’t happen. Can you say 'integration'? And where is the ability to send a simple invitation to friends? It doesn't exist in current apps.

Our Solution
So we asked the question “can we make an app that combines all of these golf functions into one golf tool?”  Our tech team said “h*ll yeah!” so we decided to build the Mobile Golfer – the app that does everything for a golfer except swing the club.

Here’s How it Works
Simplicity of design is essential, just as Steve Jobs envisioned. The very best features in the Mobile Golfer are the services performed in the background, enabling the golfer to spend time golfing instead of ordering, organizing and administering. Ever try to put together a simple foursome and match everyone's schedule to available tee times? It's nearly impossible and way too time consuming.

Remember we talked about simplicity? One click fires up the Mobile Golfer. Right in front of you are a series of functions…directory, scorecard, online tee time booking, etc. Each is integrated with the other. A course selected from the directory is used to make a tee time, populate the score card, register a USGA handicap and so on. The same data is shared across functions. You only have to launch one app.

View the Functions Chart in the gallery.

Donation Levels
Our development team wants you to be involved from the beginning and help us create a great app. We also want to provide you with golf stuff that you can use right away as you are waiting for the beta and subsequently, Version 1.0. We've created a chart that shows what you should expect dependent upon what level you decide to participate. It corresponds to the level listed on the right column (see Contributors Chart in the gallery).

Why We Need You
We can't do this alone. We've been planning, designing and specifying this app for much of the year. We've been talking to third parties getting them to agree to integrate their functions into our app. We've been building our database of golf course information and ratings to make it the best out there, but we can't begin to code without you and your support.

If you are a golfer, a techie, a philanthropist or you just like cool ideas, we think you'll appreciate what we are doing.

Thank you in advance for your support!

Bruce Stasch, Publisher & Founder

FAQs

What is the Hacker’s Guide?
The Hacker’s Guide (www.hackersguides.com) was started in 2007 to rate golf courses for the typical golfer (the ‘hacker’) who shoots over 90 on eighteen holes (that’s actually 78% of us according to the National Golf Foundation). In 2008 we rated 87 courses in the Twin Cities with our first book (the Hacker’s Guide to Twin Cities Golf Courses), in 2009 we expanded our footprint by rating 283 public courses in Minnesota and western Wisconsin (the Hacker's Guide to Minnesota & Western Wisconsin Golf Courses) and in our third season rated over 500 courses in the 5-state Upper Midwest region (MN, WI, IA, ND & SD). Now we have over 600 rated courses and are expanding our ratings into markets like Chicago, Indianapolis, St. Louis, Las Vegas, Palm Springs and Phoenix.

What is Hacker’s Central?
To create a more unified presence as well as establish a community of like-minded golfers, we launched a community-based website called Hacker’s Central (www.hackerscentralonline.com) in 2010. This website brings together our golf course directory, ratings, reviews, photos, coupons, a contributor’s network, and storefront. We expect our directory to have over 4,500 courses, over 800 reviews and expect to more than double our website traffic in 2012.

What is the Mobile Golfer?
This is going to be our way to combine everything we’ve done to date by leveraging the power of mobile. In addition to everything that Hacker’s Guide currently brings to the table, we intend to build a suite of cool golf apps under the Mobile Golfer umbrella. A directory, review site, scorecard, tee time reservation, social media integration, USGA handicap tracker, 3rd party GPS and more – it will do everything for a golfer except swing the club (see Functions Chart in the gallery).

Who is Bruce Stasch?
He is the founder and publisher of the Hacker’s Guide. He has been a blogger, a podcaster, an e-commerce website entrepreneur, a web advertising agency owner and he is also what he writes about…a hacker (golf that is).

What will we use the money for?
We intend to use the proceeds from this funding effort to build and launch Version 1.0 of the Mobile Golfer. We have established a relationship with a mobile developer who will help us complete the beta-test version for both the iPhone and Android platforms. We expect to have a mobile version of our course directory, the course reviews and ratings, the ability to have golfers add their ratings and reviews, USGA handicap tracking, social media integration and our dynamic scorecard built within version 1.0 when it launches January, 2013.

Why we need your help?
Although we’ve been in the golf industry building websites and rating courses since 2007, we have not moved into the mobile space….yet. For those of you who are golfers, techies, mobile geeks or just like to support a cool idea, we need you. We can’t do it alone.

It is true that we need your contribution, but we also need you to provide feedback. We want you to contribute so that you can be part of our beta-testing team and help us put our mobile app through its paces. We won’t launch anything that is second-rate and we want our testers to be active users of our technology.  You don’t have to be a golfer to appreciate and comment on good design.

What's this about custom-built golf clubs?
For certain donation levels we will make you a custom-built golf club. We are able to do that because we have had relationships with wholesale suppliers of golf components for the last decade and we are able to assemble golf clubs based on how a contributor would want them. They can be almost anything you'd want in your bag from a putter to a full set of irons. What we would build for you is dependent upon what level your decide to participate. After you've decided to donate, we will contact you to get your specifications for the club you want. It typically takes 7-10 days for delivery. Additional international delivery charges are noted in the right column.

Who is in your video?
We shot our video at Stonebrooke Golf Club, in Shakopee, Minnesota. It is a public golf course located in the southwestern part of the Twin Cities and they generously allowed us to run around their course, terrorizing their staff and thoroughly making a pest of ourselves all in the interest of our “art”.  Bob was played by Josh Will, a local actor and certified golf hacker. Nick Sweeney, Jeremy Doyle and Mary Doody were his golfing buddies. The man behind the camera was Aaron Gelperin, from Wide Angle Studios. He’s a great video producer attested by the fact that he made even me look good on camera (I think).

story:
Please Note

This campaign has been cancelled, and none of the perks will be available. Please do not send any contributions to this campaign.

 

Why has this campaign been cancelled?

I am grateful for my friends who I can always count on to support me, but after I pre-announced the campaign and cross-promoted it in multiple networks, I really needed to see some response on the first day to know that it was worth continuing the work on these Bethesda fan projects. The core audience of the campaign is visitors to my site, and if not even 1 person shows up from the 2,000+ daily visitors (1,000+ are new visitors, and 1,000+ are return visitors), then clearly there's not enough demand for what I wanted to do or willingness to support the work financially, despite survey respondents indicating 30-50% interest and 25-45% willingness to donate to the various goals of the campaign.

The primary reason to create any type of fan project is of course a love for the subject matter. If you're spending time doing something, you should first do it for your own satisfaction, and not for any financial motivation. But I wish that being a professional fan could be a day job. I've worked on a lot of fan projects, I've always wanted to do more, and response to my professional quality work has always been overwhelmingly positive. But there comes a point when one does need support to continue pouring a lot of time and effort into these projects that are obviously enjoyed.

So until someone has a job opening for a professional fan, I guess it's time to move onto something else.
story_txt:
Please Note
This campaign has been cancelled, and none of the perks will be available. Please do not send any contributions to this campaign.
 
Why has this campaign been cancelled?
I am grateful for my friends who I can always count on to support me, but after I pre-announced the campaign and cross-promoted it in multiple networks, I really needed to see some response on the first day to know that it was worth continuing the work on these Bethesda fan projects. The core audience of the campaign is visitors to my site, and if not even 1 person shows up from the 2,000+ daily visitors (1,000+ are new visitors, and 1,000+ are return visitors), then clearly there's not enough demand for what I wanted to do or willingness to support the work financially, despite survey respondents indicating 30-50% interest and 25-45% willingness to donate to the various goals of the campaign.
The primary reason to create any type of fan project is of course a love for the subject matter. If you're spending time doing something, you should first do it for your own satisfaction, and not for any financial motivation. But I wish that being a professional fan could be a day job. I've worked on a lot of fan projects, I've always wanted to do more, and response to my professional quality work has always been overwhelmingly positive. But there comes a point when one does need support to continue pouring a lot of time and effort into these projects that are obviously enjoyed.
So until someone has a job opening for a professional fan, I guess it's time to move onto something else.

story:
My Mom: "I really don't know what this is...!?

gizmodo: "Simple Idee mit nicht zu verachtendem Mehrwert (simple idea with a value you should not underestimate)"

 

 

BUY IT HERE


 

 

Tech Spec.

Material: Carbon Fibre 

3,4" long 

2,2" wide

0,25 ounces (!!)

So it just fits perfectly in your wallet or you can use it as a money clip! 

 

 

Why a CARD STAND?

It really drives me nuts. Everytime I want to watch a movie on my iPhone I need to hold it in my hand for a freakin' long time. So I tried what eveybody tried once: Put it in front of your wallet, or a glass behind it. But nothing works like it should. So the Idea was born.... and after a couple of prototypes (thank you Anna) made out of plastic I ordered a prototype made out of carbon fibre. And it worked perfectly right from the start. (BTW the carbon fibre is so light that you are not going to notice it at all in your wallet). Thanks to CNC machining. 

 

Why do I need your support?

After the Idea was born a lot of my friends asked me If I could make them one, too. But if I order only one sample the costs are pretty high. In order to achieve a lower price it is necessary to order at least a few hundred samples. So it is up to you.

 

 

Please help me to make this funding a success!

 

 

 

enjoy....

story:
The reasons we’re doing this fundraising program are pretty straightforward:

1) Our Screen Structure is 17 Years Old and Needs an Upgrade. Father Time and those awesome windstorms we have in Boulder do a lot of damage to the overall screen frame, most especially to the joints, and while we've been vigilant about getting it repaired every season, there's a better way to do this.

2) The Smartest Way for Us to Upgrade is to Get an Inflatable Screen. The inflatable screen doesn't require a large metal frame, it only needs spots to be tethered to. Plus, if we can tear down the current structure, the area will look nicer, benefitting the entire neighborhood. 

3) An Inflatable Screen Protects Boulder Outdoor Cinema's Future. If our current space ever goes away, we can simply move the BOC to a park or somewhere else in town. This also gives us the option of growing the BOC. We could take that new screen lots of places: community parks, company picnics, fundraising events, you name it. That kind of mobility will keep us vital for the NEXT 17 years.

4) Quality Inflatable Screens are Expensive. Because we are and have always been a donation-based business serving the community of Boulder, we don’t make the kind of money necessary for this upgrade. We have worked with inflatable screens before, we know what kind we need to get and all the accessories to pull it off, such as tethers, a generator, a trailer, etc. We’ve been doing everything we can to raise the money ourselves: saving donations, digging through our couches, cleaning out our savings, squirreling away day-job paychecks and we’re about a third of the way there. We need your help to get this accomplished. 

Here're Jeanine and Liz -- and a big inflatable screen and growing crowd in the background!

5) It Will Be Worth It for YOU. You may have been to the Boulder Outdoor Cinema. You've probably had a swell time. Boulder Outdoor Cinema is a tradition in Boulder, it's one of those things that shows up on a Bucket List of Things to Do in Boulder in the Summer. We want to keep it going just as badly as you want it to keep being there. We believe the inflatable screen is the key to our future in Boulder - the key to generating enough revenue on our own in future years to upgrade our AV gear. Yes, we're asking you to chip in some money now. You work hard for your money (so hard for it, honey!) so we better treat you right! (Oh, that's right!) So we researched which outdoor cinema fundraising programs around the country were successful. We learned from them. And then we talked to our friends around town and learned from them. And now we have this fundraising program all planned out, with a lot of pretty awesome rewards for our backers: some of them include us taking this new inflatable screen to you so you can show a movie to 900 of your best friends. Check out the rewards and if there's nothing listed that you're into, let us know. We're pretty sure you're gonna like what you see!

Risks and challenges

After our project is successfully funded, some of the challenges we expect to face include tearing down the current structure (it's been there for almost 2 decades and we don't know what it'll take to remove it), and setting up anchors for tethering the new inflatable screen. Hopefully, those two issues can be addressed simultaneously.

Another challenge will be figuring out where to store the new screen. Our current screen rolls up nicely and fits in our little basement room on top of our other gear. The new screen will need to be stored on a large rolling dolly and won't fit in our current space, so we'll have to find an appropriate place to keep it as well as figure out how to transport it back and forth to the BOC. These problems are not insurmountable and we're feeling confident we'll overcome them.

Our biggest concern is not getting funded. Our current business model keeps the BOC on the edge of financed, but there is no income for upgrading our gear. If we get the screen and can do a few off-site shows a year, that income will make the BOC safer financially and may mean we can stop throwing our paychecks at the business to keep it afloat. 

If we don't succeed with this plan, we'll keep doing our best producing shows for the Boulder community this summer and come up with another plan to rebuild. But we're sticking with one of Walter Sobchak's most inspirational quotes (that he ripped off from Theodore Herzl): IF YOU WILL IT, DUDE, IT IS NO DREAM

story:
Short Summary

Wencoglobal has been in the electronics business for over 15 years.  This is a personal project of mine that I believe will be relevant to many people that use the iPhone or Android smartphones just like me.  Imagine being in your car and you are playing your music through your iPhone or Android smartphone: how do you change songs? How do you play/pause? How do you activate Siri to help you find something?  Unless your car is new and has the bluetooth functions built-in, it's not easy to power on the screen, swipe to unlock (or enter a password), and do these things.

If you play your music from your smartphone and you don't have bluetooth connectivity in your car, this is the best way to control your smartphone.  You will never settle for anything less.

What We Need & What You Get

$7000 will go towards tooling up the plastic shell and buttons

$15000 will go towards buying components such as battery and pcba and bluetooth modules.

$8000 will go towards assembly, packaging, and shipping.

There is no bluetooth remote this small that can fit your pocket, car, or home.

If the goal is not reached by the target date, I will contribute the remainder myself to make sure each backer gets a remote.

For each supporter, you will get 1 remote in full packaging delivered to your address.

The Impact

By helping with this campaign, we can show the major electronics brands that we, the consumers, can come up with innovative products and not pay outrageous prices for it.  We can change our own lives.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please let me know if you are willing to be a beta tester for any of our upcoming products.  If you can do design, perhaps you can even help create the packaging and manuals.

story:
Sammy Screamer is a movement sensor that connects to the BleepBleeps smartphone app.

Stick Sammy on the stuff you want to keep an eye on - like a door, a bag, a kid’s buggy or your fridge. Use the BleepBleeps app to set Sammy’s sensitivity and volume. Then if your stuff gets moved Sammy screams and sends a notification to your smartphone!

  • Movement sensor with audible alarm
  • Magnetised back and loop fixing
  • Push notification to your smartphone 
  • Bluetooth LE - up to 30 meter range 
  • Adjustable settings on the BleepBleeps app

Where would you use Sammy?  

Where would you use Sammy Screamer? Click to tweet or share on Facebook.

The Smartphone App

Use the BleepBleeps app to activate Sammy and control her settings. Select how loud you want her to scream and choose how sensitive to movement she is.

 Super-simple user experience:


Rewards for backers

Now we need your help :) We are raising funds to launch BleepBleeps and make our products a reality.

Making hardware is hard! First of all we have to design the product and build the smartphone app. Then we have to source and pay for all the different components inside Sammy like the accelerometer and Bluetooth unit, the battery, the speaker. And we have to design and make our own unique printed circuit board to connect all the components. Then we have to work with a manufacturer to produce the very expensive tooling to make the plastic case. Then everything has to be assembled, shipped to BleepBleeps, tested and finally shipped to you. A complicated and expensive business. We've tried to be as fair as we can with rewards below. It's important to us that our backers pay a reasonable price.

We've included free worldwide shipping on all rewards!

BleepBleeps are a family of little friends that make parenting easier. 

A bunch of cute, connected devices that help you get pregnant, give birth, look after your baby and raise your child. 

Each of the BleepBleeps characters has a face, a name, and a unique bleep bleep sound when activated, hence the name BleepBleeps!

Meet the whole line up in this video or check out our website.

Our design language is inspired by the simple geometric shapes of kid’s building blocks with a sprinkling of Japanese vinyl toys and hat tip to the Alessi brand. 

Then we started showing people! Here’s Tom demoing Sammy Screamer to His Royal Highness Prince Andrew, Duke of York at the World Innovation Summit for Health in Doha :)

Who is BleepBleeps?

We are a small (but talented) multidisciplinary team that straddles innovation, branding, communications, new product development, digital, software/hardware development and user experience. We have extensive experience running creative businesses that build brands and ship world-class products that consumers love.

Here’s the cast, in order of appearance:

 

 

BleepBleeps friends and extended team

A huge amount of people have helped us along the way - and continue to! Here’s our list of hackers, hipsters, hustlers (and His Royal Highness):

Jessi Baker, BERG cloud, Michelle Bower, Peter Buckley, Matt Burniston, Linda Byrne, Diana Caplinska, Mark Cridge, Peter Hames, HRH The Duke of York, Greg Jarrett, Owen Lloyd, Felix Manley, Vibol Moeung, Cathy Olmedillas, Ronnie Renton, Shane Richmond, Tom Rogers, Al Scott, Jenny Scott, Lee Stickler, Amanda Thirsk, Emma Vanstone, Matt Webb. (Did we miss you? Gutted! Email us: smile@bleepbleeps.com)

Thank You!

Thanks so much for taking the time to find out about BleepBleeps. Please back us and help make our brand and products a reality :)

Much love,

Team BleepBleeps x

story:
You’re on the road, off the grid, searching for that next great adventure. Everything is perfect, Blue Bird Powder, 6 to 8 foot Glassy Barrels, about to capture that perfect Sunset to share with you friends and all of a sudden…flashing red light…curses! You’re out of power and there’s no power outlet in sight, and the moment slips away…

NOT ANYMORE! We’ve created the solution to your power problems. Introducing the Savior, the world's first complete waterproof solar charger for outdoor enthusiasts who depend on their tech while out of bounds. A combination of power and durability make the Savior the only solar charger you’ll ever need!

OPEN FOR PRE-ORDERS AGAIN!

We’re back! We are now accepting pre-orders for a March/April production of Savior, world's first complete waterproof solar charger solar panel system!

If you think weekends really aren’t long enough, tell that to your battery-powered equipment...

When you don’t have a way to recharge, you’re truly in the wild - but not out of luck with a Savior. Continue to take pictures, jam on your portable speaker, film with your GoPro, post to Instagram.

The Savior solar charging system from Arc Effect will keep your devices charged and ready. Stay out all weekend without worrying about finding a power outlet. This waterproof system is one of a kind. It uses solar power to quickly charge multiple devices simultaneously. 

Arc Effect has leveraged the latest, lightest, most efficient solar panels to give you the most juice per square inch, at a reasonable price. All Savior solar charging systems have been upgraded to the best and most efficient solar panel technology on the market, designed to power consumer electronics, in addition, your new Savior solar system will be 21 Watts (that’s a 6 Watt upgrade) without increasing the product size. Due to the new power upgrades, the daisy function is no longer needed.

Using the system is simple – just plug your device’s charging cable into the dual smart charging USB ports and watch it juice up. 

The Savior is a self-contained, waterproof protection, collapsible 21 Watt solar power panel system.

story:
L.U.C.Y. - your digital butler.

L.U.C.Y. connects all your smart home gadgets (works with Nest, SmartThings, Hue, Belkin, DropCam, Geneva, tado, Wink, Washio, etc and has almost 3,000 skills thanks to the Alexa Voice services).

L.U.C.Y. offers you messaging, reminders, to-do lists, connects to your calendars, notes, art, a photo display, video messaging, shopping lists, video tutorials and much more.

L.U.C.Y. serves you and your family as a digital butler, a communication and central hub for everything a household needs.

L.U.C.Y. comes in 2 different versions - with and without touch screen. You can choose the setup you want.

L.U.C.Y. listens
Our engineering team is building Alexa Voice Services (AVS) into L.U.C.Y., using Amazon’s Alexa Skill Kit (ASK). ASK makes up the tools developers use to expand what Alexa-enabled devices can do, from controlling smart home devices to telling you funny jokes. L.U.C.Y. has it all. 

Visit our website www.welcomehome-lucy.com for more information about L.U.C.Y. and the team. On the website you will also find more videos of our prototypes and first installations.

Thanks for supporting us!

story:
ASOME, A Bluetooth Audio Receiver Redesigned

ASOME is a simple, high performing, truly werable bluetooth audio receiver that turns your ordinary headset into bluetooth headset. 

Simply plug it into your audio device, control your sound with a button, and enjoy up to 10 hours of quality sound. 


ASOME In The News



Features

We wanted to bring a product that people use in daily life and is faithful to the basics. We designed ASOME, a bluetooth engine, to be simple, high performance, and truly wearable. 


  • Simple and Easy to Use

ASOME is easy to use. 

Simply plug in,

One click,

And then enjoy your music.




  • High Performance


ASOME is only 14.1 gram but still guarantees high performance. 

While designing the product with minimal elements, we built a product that does not compromise quality over design. 

ASOME includes a Qualcomm aptX chipset and a 210mAh battery, which delivers high quality sound for 10 hours of battery life.

ASOME also has a multi-pairing feature via Bluetooth 4.1, so you can connect two devices simultaneously.


  • Truly Wearable


ASOME can be worn just about anywhere.

Wear ASOME with various accessories and coordinate your fashion.

You can wear ASOME as a necklace, clip it on your shirt, armband, or pocket, or hook it on your bag or belt loop.


ASOME in your daily life

  • In the gym 


  • In the office 


  • At house parties


Specifications


We need your help

Different from other hardware projects on Indiegogo, we’ve solved all the development and manufacturing issues with ASOME.  We only have two tasks to solve at this point:

1. Successfully finish the campaign with your support 

2. Begin manufacturing with Indiegogo funds and deliver ASOME to you right after the campaign ends.


Timeline

 

Perks




Meet Our Team!

ASOME Team in Visionscape

Visionscape specializes in IoT and wearables and covers the whole spectrum of product development from product planning, design, to development, manufacturing. 

Started with Misfit in 2012, Visionscape built partnership with various wearable brands for the past year - Eone, Hush, Zikto, Way, etc.

With accumulated experience and know-how in building wearable devices, Visionscape is finally launching its first in-house product that will be the steppingstone for many more products to come.

Recognizing the importance of design, Visionscape worked with a design studio, JOONGHO CHOI STUDIO, to plan ASOME. 


Risk & Challenges

We are finished building and testing the product, and are now waiting for your support to begin manufacturing. 

Our real challenge lies in the next step we plan to take. Starting with ASOME, we are ambitious to build many more products that are devoted to fundamentals and will help the consumer electronics market segue into "everything-wireless" world.” Support us and be part of our journey!


Interested in collaborating with ASOME?

We are looking for partners and collaboration opportunities. 

Hey Outdoor sports brands! ASOME is a perfect way to present music to your consumers during outdoor exercises. 

Hey Audio device brands! ASOME's acoustic impedance can be tuned  just right for your timber, so the users can enjoy your unique sound via Bluetooth! 

And any other potential partners out there! Feel free to reach out to us with any fun collaboration ideas. 


Help Us Spread the Word!

Share your support with your friends via Indiegogo share tools!

Help us reach more potential backers by spreading the word about ASOME. 


FAQs

Q: My earphone does not have an embedded microphone. Can I still make a phone call after plugging my earbud cable into the device

A. You are unable to make phone calls if you connect ASOME to an earbud with no Bluetooth receiver with microphone. This case your smartphone will ring when receiving incoming phone call.


Q. Does ASOME have a built-in microphone?

A. Bluetooth receiver does not have an embedded microphone but earbud included in our product package does. In order to make phone call, you need to use earbud with embedded microphone.


Q. How long is the device warranty period?

A. We offer one year warranty ONLY covering manufacturing defect and workmanship 


Q. I want to plug my smartphone earbud into ASOME. Is my ASOME compatible with the inline remote?

A. ASOME is compatible with some Android earbuds (Ex. LG Quadbeat, Samsung). However, only the call button works with the Apple EarPod.  


Q. Is the product waterproof?

A. Unfortunately ASOME is neither waterproof nor water-resistant. So please be careful with water and if the product gets wet: 

1) wipe the product out with linen 2) turn the power off 3) restart the product. 

Please be aware of using handdryer because the heat over 60 degrees can cause damage to the the exterior material of the Product.


Q. Is ASOME compatible with other device?

A. Any device with latest bluetooth 4.1 standard is compatible with Asome


Q. Howcome I hear a white noise when I play music with low volume?

A. impedance varies with the type of earbud you use and can cause the white noise. ASOME bluetooth receiver has passed qualification assurance tests with smarphone makers such as Apple, Samsung, and LG to optimize sound quality. The sound is not guarenteed and could be differnet from the original sound when playing other maker's earbuds. 


Q. What color options are available?

A. Dark gray, White are available. If total funds raised exceed $100,000, Khaki can be  available.
story_txt:
ASOME, A Bluetooth Audio Receiver Redesigned





ASOME is a simple, high performing, truly werable bluetooth audio receiver that turns your ordinary headset into bluetooth headset. 
Simply plug it into your audio device, control your sound with a button, and enjoy up to 10 hours of quality sound. 


ASOME In The News



Features

We wanted to bring a product that people use in daily
life and is faithful to the basics. We designed ASOME, a bluetooth engine, to be simple, high performance, and truly wearable. 



Simple and Easy to Use









ASOME is easy to use. 
Simply plug in,




One click,

And then enjoy your music.


High Performance








ASOME is only 14.1 gram but still guarantees high performance. 

While designing the product with minimal elements, we built a product that does not compromise quality over design. 

ASOME includes a Qualcomm aptX chipset and a 210mAh battery, which delivers high quality sound for 10 hours of battery life.
ASOME also has a multi-pairing feature via Bluetooth 4.1, so you can connect two devices simultaneously.


Truly Wearable





ASOME can be worn just about anywhere.

Wear ASOME with various accessories and coordinate your
fashion.
You can wear ASOME as a necklace, clip it on your shirt, armband, or
pocket, or hook it on your bag or belt loop.


ASOME in your daily life
In the gym 




In the office 





At house parties

story:
INTRODUCING.. 

The HyperCharger X & HyperCharger PRO

 

CES 2018 Innovation Winner

Both the HyperCharger X and HyperCharger PRO are built-in upon exclusive LinearFlux HyperCharging Technology which earned them the Best of Innovation Awards at this year's 2018 Consumer Electronics Show.

Place your pledge NOW to get your own HyperCharger of the Year!

 

HYPERCHARGER X - Wireless Ultra-Thin HyperCharger 

✅Ultra-thin Wireless Powerbank 
✅Wireless Charging Pad 
✅Universal Powerbank 

 

The world’s most powerful wireless charging powerbank for its class. 

Packing in 7.5 Watts of Qi-Compatible wireless charging power and 6,000mAh of capacity. It's maintains about the same size as an iPhone X, so it's ultra-thin as well as being lightweight!

Doubles as a 7.5 Watt, High Power, Qi Compaitble Wireless Charging Pad.
 
1.    Connect the HyperCharger X to the wall charger via the microUSB charging cable 
2.    Place your phone on the HyperCharger X 
3.    Easy! You are now simultaneously charging the HyperCharger X and wirelessly charging your phone, ALL at the same time! 

 *We recommend using a 2.4 Amp or 12 Watt USB wall charger to obtain optimal charging results.  

We have your non-Qi compatible devices covered too. 

As more smartphones are enabled with wireless charging capabilities, many of our devices still use prevailing connector standards. The HyperCharger X includes a 12-Watt universal USB charging port enabled with HyperCharging technology for Android, Apple, and other USB devices.

 

Features/Accessories

  • Super Soft-Touch Ultra-Black finish 
  • 7.5W Qi-Compatible HyperCharging Wireless Technology
  • 15Watt, 3.0Amp, USB HyperCharging Port
  • microUSB Recharging Port
  • Power-ON button
  • 4 color LED Battery Capacity Meter
  • Hardware and Firmware Protection Circuitry 
  • microUSB Recharging Cable
  • NanoStik PRO reuseable sticky pad
  • Instruction manual

Product Dimensions: 5.6" x 2.75" x 0.43" (142mm x 70mm x 11mm)

Product Weight: 5.5oz (156g)

 

HYPERCHARGER PRO - All-In-One Charger


✅3 Built-in Connectors/Cables 
✅Charge Up to 3 Devices 
✅Compact Yet Powerful

 

 
Inclusive Apple Lightning, USB Type-C, and microUSB connectors. 

The HyperCharger PRO includes all prevailing charging connectors used today. It's like the Swiss Army knife of powerbanks! Allowing you to charge many of today's mobile devices.


 
With the two built-in cables and an additional USB port, you can charge up to three devices at once. Such as a smartphone, bluetooth headphones, and even a drone, ALL at once! 

(Rest assured, your HyperCharging speed does not get throttled down like other powerbanks in the market when charging power is being shared among multiple devices. Always staying HyperCharged!)

HyperCharger PRO’s ultra-high density and efficiency can deliver up to 25 Watts of charging power and 8,000mAh of battery capacity. The pocket-sized HyperCharger PRO is the best HyperCharger in its class.

 

Features/Accessories  

  • Super Soft-Touch Ultra-Black finish 
  • 25W Best-in-Class HyperCharging Power 
  • 15Watt, 3.0Amp, USB HyperCharging Port 
  • microUSB Recharging Port 
  • Power-ON button 
  • 4 color LED Battery Capacity Meter
  • Hardware and Firmware Protection Circuitry 
  • microUSB Recharging Cable 
  • NanoStik PRO reuseable sticky pad 
  • Instruction manual

 

Product Dimensions: 5.47" x 2.4" x 0.51" (139mm x 61mm x 13mm)

Product Weight: 7.2oz (205g)

story:
Welcome to Tergus Skins

Devices become reflection of ourselves, and if you are like us, you always want to find that perfect accessory! Then you are in the right place at the right time. We have combined our knowledge of leather, style and high quality materials of execution to introduce you Tergus Skins.

Here, at Tergus, we have developed products which will flesh out your device and reflect your personality. We have handcrafted finest exotic cases for the Apple devices.

More than 50 prototypes were made during the last year, to provide the best quality and nail down the production process. Our main idea is that anyone should afford it. We do not support the pricing of many brands, regarding to exotic skins - it is overstated in many times. Tergus offers high quality leathers for the absolute lowest price.

All of our products are handmade and individually checked, meaning that our production processes take up a lot of time and a lot of resources. As a quality measurement, every skin that we make is individually placed in order to keep the structure aligned and centered. We make our skins with only the finest leather:  King Cobra and Python.

 

Colors palette

 

Natural Python

Brown Python

 

 

Black and Brown Cobras

 

Red and Violet Cobras

 

Natural and Orange Cobras

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Be one of early Backers and get your case with 5$ off!

Limited up to 40 cases only

 

We are beginners, but we have manufactured more then 50 prototypes to make sure that we nailed down the technology. Of course there are many things that can happen and we promise to solve them as quickly as possible and to keep you informed.

Thanks for all the support! Do not hesitate to ask any questions. We are always available and happy to help!

story:
Wait, what? Explain, please...

Our information is neither safe nor private, especially considering identity theft, corporate espionage, government surveillance, etc. Unfortunately, as individuals, there is very little we can do about it; politically or technologically.


Welcome to privacy, welcome to INCO.GNI.TO !

As the video illustrates, we are currently developing an encrypted Wi-Fi application for making peer-to-peer calls on smartphones (and, eventually, a standalone device). In addition, our code will be 100% open source for community inspection and auditing.


How in the world is this possible?

For the most part, the same technology used to secure important governmental secrets or corporate trade secrets is very much available to the average person. However, the average individual lacks the time, knowledge, expertise, resources, etc., to apply this information security technology to our personal or professional lives. It's all there already, we just need to put it together correctly.


How are you different than others?

Almost all present secure communications systems were designed prior to the recent disclosures that have revealed intrusion at levels not previously considered (except by the most paranoid). Incognito aims to make the most secure communications platform, without making any assumptions on the security of any part of the ecosystem in which it operates including the hardware, firmware, operating system and the network infrastructure. Compare us:

  • Encrypted Application Comparison
  • Identification and Information Leakage
  • Other Vulnerabilities


If the technology is “there already”, what exactly are you doing?

We certainly are not recreating the wheel, we're putting together the pieces so you have a chance to use the wheel... currently, you don't. Encrypted VoIP services popped up over a decade ago, including both commercial and open source services. Some of the encrypted VoIP services had some flaws and none of them provided the ease of use demanded by the general public... that's what we're doing! We are smashing together the relevant technology, adapting to your way of life and at the same time providing the mechanisms for the secure communication you deserve.


How could you actually secure communication when the NSA's budget is larger than the GDP of other Countries?

It's a good point, but you'd be surprised how effective encryption is. If you want the real "techy" stuff, check the bottom of this page. If you want the basics, search the internet for articles about how frustrated spy agencies have become with the rising use of encryption. Why do you think they resorted to mass collection techniques pressuring telecommunication companies into compliance?

 

How is my donation going to be spent?

This project will be managed by the INCO.GNI.TO trust and all funds will be held and managed by the law firm of Joshua F. Porter, P.A. Before a penny can be released by the firm, an invoice for a specific project scope under each iteration must be received and the trustee must certify that the funds are required and reasonable for that specific invoice. We've gone to great lengths to ensure money is spent wisely and efficiently, as to achieve our goal is the highest priority.

 

I want to ask you questions, directly. How do I do that?

You can visit our site http://inco.gni.to/faqs and submit your questions there.

 

I want to speak with you, just not on a public forum. How do I do that?

You can email us at info@inco.gni.to


Okay, but can I have just some techy stuff, please?

Sure, I will discuss some security and networking features of incognito, along with a basic diagram of an incognito session. In addition, we've uploaded some comparison charts here.

Every contact as well as every peer in the Incognito network will have a strong identity based on an Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (EC-DSA) identity, and will be validated before communication begins.

All data pertaining to your communication (voice/video/text) will be encrypted both at the session level as well as at the transport layer. The transport layer between each peer pair will use TLS encryption. The communications sessions will be encrypted with full 256 bit Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) Encryption and Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (EC-DH) will be used for secure key exchange.

Further, we will use various other security techniques including padding messages into larger packets inter-mixed with noise, prior to encryption.

Incognito will use Wi-Fi to connect to the internetwork. It will never use GSM/CDMA/telephony networks as these networks can easily track the identity and location of a device. Where multiple Wi-Fi networks are available, Incognito can scatter session packets across multiple networks so that it is difficult to capture the sequence of session data packets at an infrastructure routing point.

Incognito will use a purely peer to peer network with no centralized servers, whatsoever. We will use a modified, highly secure adaptation of the DHT (Distributed Hash Table) peering technology for building its data communications network.

We will also introduce novel, advanced routing and tunneling technology that would make it statistically impossible for recording the session (already encrypted ) at a router or intermediary peer. Some of these techniques include breaking encrypted data buffers into smaller packets and scattering the packets across multiple networks and peer tunnels where available. This means collecting and assembling packets of your communications by a third party for carrying out brute force attacks later, will be made very difficult if not impossible. Optional facility to tunnel communications through random peers will enable masking of the originating peer.

 

 

Recent Blog Posts:

  • But, there’s already an app for that. Right?
  • Domestic surveillance; does it make sense?
  • I’m not doing anything wrong, therefore I don’t need privacy.
  • Lavabit.com has suspended operations.

Optional facility to tunnel communications through random peers will enable masking of the originating peer.

 
 
Recent Blog Posts:



But, there’s already an app for that. Right?


Domestic surveillance; does it make sense?


I’m not doing anything wrong, therefore I don’t need privacy.

Lavabit.com has suspended operations.

story:
Hollywood Drops Bombshell On Cell Phone Industry

World Health Organization classifies the cell phone as a possible carcinogen

Recent Swiss study shows cell phone usage increases the risk of brain cancer between 70%-300%

Special Report links breast cancer to cell phone placement in bras

Children face higher health risk from cell phones

New evidence cell phones cause cancer

story:
The World's First Cell Phone Case to Store and Charge an Electronic Cigarette/Personal Vaporizer!

ELITE DAILY

BEST CROWDFUNDING-WEBSITES

As mankind leaves tobacco behind, they are looking for an alternative to turn to that can help them kick their nicotine addiction, but give them the same sensation that cigarettes do. E-Cigarettes/Personal Vaporizers have become the new/best alternative to smoking. 

One of the biggest problems with current E-Cigarettes/Personal Vaporizers is that they have become another device to have to carry around that are not as easy to come across as a conventional cigarette.

They may also die on you without a warning, leaving you craving just one more puff.

 Worst of all if you lose an E-Cigarette/Personal Vaporizer its a major expense you may not want to afford and may turn you back to cigarettes.

Our competitors seem to only be creating heavier and bulkier E-Cigarette/Personal Vaporizers to be able to store bigger batteries to ensure it lasts the entire day.

We hope to be the solution to all of these problems with The VQase.


    It is our mission to provide the most convenient vaping experience. We will provide you with the new flagship E-Cigarette/Personal Vaporizer that will put an end to having to carry around an extra bulky device. This will change the way anyone thinks about E-Cigarettes/Personal Vaporizers .

    This case provides a one of a kind experience that allows the user to always have their E-Cigarette/Personal Vaporizer on them and to have it fully charged, best of all you never have to even take it out of the case, unless of course you want to.

    Never again will you lose it, forget to charge it, or simply be without it.

    This device even allows you to use our one of a kind E-Cigarette/Personal Vaporizer while in the case AS IT RECHARGES, so you will never have to miss a puff.








    What We Have Been Up To!

    The VQase has been in development for the last 8 months. 

    We have successfully created our first prototype, but we felt the world deserved something even better!

    After experimenting with different models and variants we have finally reached our ultimate design with our new




    Patent

    We have filed our patent to ensure our product's development and success.

    How Will Your Funds Be Used to Change Lives?

    With your help we hope to give the world a better solution to their desire to quit smoking but are being prevented by the difficulty and extreme size of our competitors' products.

    We stride to deliver the most superior E-Cigarette/Personal Vaporizer product to our consumers and to be able to stand behind it.

    We have contracted a team of designers and engineers to develop our final product that we hope to be able to provide, with your help by January 2015. We are currently securing manufacturing in the USA for full quality control to be able to provide the ultimate E-Cigarette/Personal Vaporizer experience. 


    Perks and Rewards

    How Will We Do It?

    Prototypes: 

    The VQase is based on only the best technology. We will do our best to achieve this by creating more working prototypes to ensure only the best product for our consumers . You will be able to monitor and even control all production stages and give your suggestions to the first working prototypes.

    Production: 

    We use only the most advanced technology of the highest quality that has already been tested and developed. With manufacturing in the USA securing only the best quality control for the best/fastest production of the VQase.

    Delivery time: 

    We can understand anyone's anxiety to have a VQase so we are doing our best to have this in production as soon as possible.  Delivery is estimated for January or before as long as we can secure the funding we need to start production. Our success relies on your help making our vision the reality we know the world deserves.  We hope you will support us in making the world a better place for us all. Thank you!


    Extended Goals

    The VQase Currently Comes in Black and is made for iPhone 5, 5S, and 6!

    With Your Help We Hope to Achieve Our Stretch Goals to be Able to Make The VQase in the variety of colors you see here and for Samsung Galaxy Phones and other popular Android Phones as well.




    Development Time!



    Where The Funds Are Going!


    FAQ

    1. What if Our Goal is Not Reached?

    We at Vaportronix are extremely committed to making our vision of The VQase a reality. Even if we are not successfully funded we will still do everything we can to ensure our backers receive their orders. The only thing it will effect is the delivery date.

    However, we hope we meet our goal!

    2. What Phone Models Will The VQase Support?

    Currently we are planning manufacturing for the iPhone 5, 5S, and 6, but if our stretch goal is met we will be able to guarantee manufacturing for Samsung Galaxy Phones as well as other popular Android phones

    3. How Can I Choose What Color/Model I Want?

    We will be sending out a survey at the end of our campaign and you will be able to choose from there.

        Warranty Period  

    1 Year!

    In case of any problems, send your VQase back to us for repair or replacement. 

        Upon successful completion of the campaign, follow the updates section on this page and on our website. In addition, we will contact you to clarify all issues, including delivery, model and colors of the VQase you desire after the campaign.


    THANK YOU!

    We would like to thank every single backer and contributor for helping us bring our dream product into reality! Please follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram and any help spreading the word would be highly appreciated!

    Special Thanks

    Special Thanks to Diamond Snake Productions without whom this would not be possible!

    Special Thanks to Alex Arabov & Jonathan Haft for helping us make our vision a reality

    Questions? Concerns! Suggestions?

    Please feel free to contact us with any questions or concerns you may have, even any suggestions on how you think we can provide you the ultimate vapeing experience.

    info@VaportronixLLC.COM

    WWW.VQase.COM

    WWW.VaportronixLLC.COM

story:
Make sure to check the gallery!

 

We are Multiple Score-Gasm!

Don't let the silly name fool you, most the members of MS-G are actually young degreed engineers. Hailing from various engineering disciplines and with trained/untrained professionals we WILL qualify for the Red Bull Creation contest. We are looking for residents of Long Island and NYC that want to see a group of highly motivated Long Islanders take home the trophy and bring a fun, innovative, and interactive light display to Long Island and NYC..... Take that New Jersey!

Founding Team Members:

Philip Haasnoot - Team Captain (BSME)
Michael Palazzolo - Twin 1 (BSME)
Chris Palazzolo - Twin 2 (Aircraft Mechanic, HVAC Expert)
Craig Morgan - Muscle Car Maniac (BSME)
William Davis - Resident Hipster (BSME)

Supporting Team Members:

Anthony Tricarichi - Team Pirate (BSEE)
Vin Calandrino - Drops the Bass (BSME)

The list is growing!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need funding, we only have a few short weeks to get this project off the ground and we need YOUR help to make this possible. We are looking for funds to break even on one events that will be held on LI (Location TBD). The events will be recorded and turned into a short film for submission to the Red Bull Creation contest committee. 

We are builing an interactive light display that will accomodate 32 players, players will compete in three 5 minute games of intense light-displaying action; after which 32 more players will rotate in so we can accomodate everyone. We are planning to have a introductory BBQ and explain the game, as well as test the equipment and get everyone suited up; once the sun goes down the real fun begins!

What you get depends on what you give, most of the donors will be invited to take part in the food and drink portion of the festivities, higher level donors will get the chance to actually get into a suit and participate in a once-in-a-lifetime interactive display of lights and sweat.

Anyone who donates at the spectator level will have a chance to participate in the installation after all the higher tiers have had their chance; however due to time and venue restrictions we cannot make promises for this tier.

The Impact

I'm going to keep this short, we want to win.... the more funding this project recieves the more successful it will be. We aren't looking to make a profit, we are looking to get enough funding to get our ideas into reality and really steal the show. Success in this competition will mean a lot for the future of our group, as I am sure this wont be our last competition together. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share with all your friends and also help us find sponsors!! If you know of anyone who you think can be of assistance please feel free to call our team captain Philip Haasnoot (516.528.8517). Equipment loans, discounts, anything and everything helps so please feel free to reach out. 


PLEASE NOTE: 2400 is just a base amount to get this off the ground, we truly need closer to 5000 to make this an epic installment. Please consider funding us even after the goal is reached!

story:
Mejuba.com - Worlds Best File Sharing Site and Application

Imagine all your photos, videos and files stored at a single place - for free - with the ability to share, stream and edit all your files being videos, photos or documents.

Mejuba.com is a three year old photo and video hosting, sharing and management application that has already become one of the leading services.

Mejuba is the only photo and video sharing application worldwide that offers unlimited uploads (storage) and traffic - for free. There is no upper limit for video play length, file size or resolution for photos or number of uploads.

Others claim to be free - we are!

We will increase the value of using Mejuba.com by transforming Mejuba into one of the leading FILE sharing application allowing uploads and sharing of ALL types of files while retaining the emphasis on the photo and video part as well as the social media aspect. On top of that we will add state-of-the-art photo- and video-editing tools and later to come also online editing of documents.

We melt Flickr, Youtube, Instagram, Facebook and Dropbox into one single application.

Mejuba is the the only single place to store, share, view, stream and edit all your files. Regardless of these being photos, videos or documents - for free. No other service offers this.

Vision

Mejuba was our attempt to make a free, better and more compelling online photo and video hosting service than the existing services.

Sure there were others out there, but all with annoying limitations - even for sites you actually had to pay for! Call it David against Goliath - us against giants like Google (Youtube, Picasa), Yahoo (Flickr) and Facebook (Instagram).

Our revenue would come from advertising, payment services such as backup, streaming services, printing services,  - as well as many other services.

Mission

We want to transform Mejuba into one of the leading FILE sharing application allowing uploads and sharing of ALL types of files while retaining the emphasis on the photo and video part as well as the social media aspect. On top of that we will add state-of-the-art photo- and video-editing tools and later to come also online editing of documents.

We have already invested $350.000 and need a further $200.000 to develop and launch our vision.

Mejuba is not open source but open features. Make a request for a feature and we will most likely implement it. We are a user driven company and every comment, suggestion, improvement or critique is important to us. So don't hold back!.

Marked

The market for online digital photo and video sharing is increasing rapidly, in part because traditional analogue film and video is on its way out, but also because of the explosive growth in handheld devices that allow both photos and videos to be posted and shared on the internet.

The number of people using the ten largest photo and video sites is over 1.8 billion, and it is estimated that this number will grow by 300-500 million new users within the next three years, and exceed 2.5 billion by the end of the decade. Mejuba is already a part of this marked and pared with the ability to also upload, store and share all types of files our marked is even larger. It's HUGE.

Features

In short:
  • Completely free
  • Unmetered traffic
  • Unlimited storage
  • State of the are security
  • File size 1GB per upload (for bigger uploads we have several payment options)
  • No scaling of photos
  • No time limit on videos
  • Download of originals (both photos and videos)
  • Upload entire folder structures
  • Transfer your Flickr account
  • Transfer your PhotoBucket account
  • Transfer your Picasa account
  • Transfer your Facebook account
  • Transfer your ... more to come
  • Desktop application for synchronization
  • OIS, iPhone and Android app
  • Share your uploads to your favorite social networks
  • Fantastic and powerful photo and video editing tools 
  • Upload of all types of files
  • Photo printing services

Why Indiegogo

The most important thing for Mejuba right now is to find all the people out there who are as excited as we are about Mejuba and to make sure we are building the right service for them. Our Indiegogo campaign is aimed at like-minded people and with the help and feedback of our early adopters Mejuba will be able to tailor the feature set to make Mejuba the best it can be. And hopefully revolutionize the way we interact online.

We have brought Mejuba as far as we could on our own resources and effort. To make it as awesome as we want it to be, we now need to professionally focus on it full time. The funding target set in this campaign will allow us to begin doing that. It will also allow us to bring more people on board.

To some of you the set target may seem too much, to others it may seem too little. We've done the estimates and that's what the numbers add up to for creating the worlds best file sharing application.

We are on Indiegogo because it gives us the chance to keep the project fully independent. We do not want corporate investors to take control and jack up prices for the home version  because 'Marketing thinks people would pay more'

Right now we don't have any stakeholders pressuring us for large returns on investment, we don't have to maximize our profits. We just want to develop things that many will enjoy, in a sustainable manner (and to be able to pay all our contracts and bills).

How You Can Help

Back our campaign!

By backing our campaign you’re telling us that you’re as excited as we are about this project and you’ll help us get closer to our goal.

Share our campaign!

It may seem like a small thing, but sharing our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Email etc, will allow us to see the response of our intended audience and hopefully get us closer to getting the project funded.

The more people know about it, the more feedback we get and the better Mejuba will be.

Help us develop Mejuba! The end goal of Mejuba is to be something you want to use so please comment, email us, join the forum and send us your ideas.

story:
One tiny device with the ultimate capability to work in 3-Ways; Lightning, Micro USB & USB 3.0 Flash Drive!


  • Storage is almost Full.
  • Requirement of connector.
  • Requirement of Internet.

In W stick we have taken care all above listed problems .Data accessibility is never be that much easy and fast. No compatibility issues, we made it compatible with Macs and PCs, iOS products and devices that run on Android. Its wireless and ease to use.  WStick can help you in all ways. We built it to solve common issues we are facing.


 
It has a inbuilt wireless adapter that translates the data into radio signals, the same signals transmitted via built-in antenna and decoded. Since it has its own router,No Internet connectivity required.










 W-stick's Wireless solution makes you free to carry wire devices to share/transfer data with your friends or to any devices. It is aptly called Mastermind W Stick OTG (On The Go) that works not just with Apple devices but also with those running on Android. 
It features three different plugs on its two sides (a standard USB plug, a Micro-USB plug and a Lightning connector) that allow the device to work with Macs and PCs, iOS products and devices that run on Android. The device is capable to synchronize with any device.


More Possibilities to expand device memory:We are happy to develop W Stick that have capability to provide you more memory at a cheaper cost.
Users will be able to play different kinds of media straight from W Stick including music, movies and images.


Fit for all devices: The current iOS flash drive only works with Apple devices. In contrast, W Stick works with Apple devices, Type C devices, and Android devices, GPS, Drones, Gopro, Cameras, TVs, Speakers, Projectors…



Data protection: You can protect your data with its password protection feature.
Smarter & Powerful App: Our developed iOS & android app is showing the user; the details of battery, including all elements.

W Stick comes in four different storage capacities: 32GB, 64GB, 128GB and 256GB.

Don't miss this amazing opportunity!!

The W Stick system is a combination of the W Stick and a mobile app. These two components work together to allow users to transfer, sync and convert files quickly and easily between iOS and Android devices as well as Macs and PCs. Access movies in air or in a remote area and never needing a network or Internet. 





  • View photos, documents, playback music, TV series, videos and movies, backup and manage files directly from W Stick.
  • Upgrade your device storage up to 256 GB with world’s fastest read/write speed .
  • Use it to Take Pictures
  • Use it to play, pause or skip music on your Smartphone
  • Use it as Flash Memory
  • Upgrade your device storage up to 256 GB
  • Safe & Secure as your data is never sent through 3rd party servers.
  • No Battery Required for Flash Drive.
  • 1080p HD movie streaming, direct playback from W Stick.
  • Read/write speed: Lightning: 16/10 MB/s | Micro USB: 20/16 MB/s
  • USB 3.0: 140/20 MB/s.
  • The lowest power consumption
  • Fast Data Transfer USB 3 interface
  • Apple Certified MFi Lightning interface
  • Micro USB interface
  • Smart Detection of connected devices
  • Highly compact & Light weight design
  • Compatible with Windows, Mac, iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch & Android devices
  • Super portable size with an ultra-slim design
  •  W Stick comes in a small in size, big in features, easy to use, durable and compact. The original design combines both form and function.
  • Cross platform, fully integrated external flash drive memory expansion for PC, Mac, iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch as well as Android devices.
  • One convenient place to fully manage your files such as Music, Video, Photos and Documents. 
  • Use it instead of a cable to sync
  • Conveniently exchange files between iOS and Android devices, iPhones & iPads, and computers on the fly, without being shackled by a cord, translator or lack of network.
  • Together with the Mobile App, an auto file management, backup and security, you will have the most powerful, must have device available for your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch as well as Android powered phones and tablets ever.
  • Direct File Transfer
  • Free App for iOS and Android File Management
  • Zip and Unzip File Support
  • Secured File encryption and secure Access to App and files
  • Backup essential files such as Contacts/Calendar, Music & Videos
  • Playback Videos and Music directly or stream to your TV
  • Document viewer for all major file formats
  • View, Create, Copy, move, delete, rename, open, encrypt and Manage all your data directly on your iOS or Android Devices.

Our Story

Innovation can come from anyone, anywhere. Fueled by creativity, connectivity and collaboration, new ways of thinking are shaping the future and all it takes is a bit of imagination and it all comes down to how you look at things.

We are inspired by extraordinary technology. We are dreaming up for anything that makes our daily lives better. Let's together make this dream a reality.














Join Us!

When you support us, you will receive :

  • 18-months warranty on W Stick.
  • For $39 you can easily expand your device to 32GB.
  • If 128GB isn’t enough, maybe you would be interested in expanding your device to 128GB for $65 or even 256GB for only $85.

Risks & Challenges

W Stick is designed to be simple and useful. We’ve worked hard over the last year to get it to this point and we successfully completed critical milestones. We also used reputable electronics manufacturers who offer great engineering support and development tools. What remains is completing the manufacturing phase and that’s where our training and experience comes in. We are confident that manufacturing risk is at a minimum.  

When we started this project, our goal was to bring a product that is useful for all and at minimum cost. We believe W Stick is just that! We had a great time working on transforming the concept to reality. We cannot wait to finalize W Stick and put it in your hands. All we need now is your help and support to cover the cost of what remains. We are well versed in the challenges involved in delivery, so we hope our experience in delivering products will help us to make sure that your perks arrive on time and in mint condition.

Thank you for reading this far - let's make this happen!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't make a pledge, you can still help up by spreading the word about our campaign. Just click any of the share links at the top left of this page and share our campaign with your friends and family, or anyone you know who can benefit from W Stick. Thank you SO MUCH for supporting US!    

Does W Stick work with my own cable?
Yes. It will work with your existing data cable to Recharging,Reading & Writing.

What color of W Stick are available?
There are 3 basic colors: Black,White & Gold. 
You have a great idea about color? We are happy to hear from you.

I contributed but have no idea where to change the color choice?
Thanks for your great contribution. You can send us a mail regarding your color choice with your order id, when the campaign ended.

Where can I get the App.?
The App. Is available on Apple Store and Google Play in free.

What is the life cycle for the rechargeable battery?
The battery cell will last for at least 800 full cycles. Each cycle means from 0 to full. For example, it will be 0.4 cycle if you only use it from 100% to 60%.

story:
We have started selling on Amazon!

http://www.amazon.com/dp/B07HBRJXN3

 

 

We use too many bad phone holders, some are cheap but of poor quality, some are very good but expensive, and the traditional products are placed in the vents of the instrument panel, which is very inconvenient to operate.

This self-balancing magnetic and suspension feature makes it easy to install your phone in the car, and its unique design improves the driver's experience!

 

 

 

 

 

The inspiration of designing this product is that I saw a video about the screen in the middle of the steering wheel .This screen is the closest screen to the driver , so that he could use it to navigate and make the other setting conveniently .

When I played the video ,I found that the screen will not be rotated with the rotation of the steering wheel ,which is convenient for the driver.

It occurred to me that there is no screen in the middle of the steering wheel for most of cars selling in the market. And we usually get the information from mobile phone ,the screen of the mobile phone is the one we could put on the steering wheel .In order to make this idea come true, we design something specially to make the steering wheel rotate as usual while the mobile phone will not be rotated with the steering wheel if we install the mobile phone on the middle of the steering wheel ,which is good for the driver to navigate and answer the phone easily when he is driving.
