story:
The Only USB Drive on the Market

That Fits EVERTHING!


LIMITED TIME

BLOWOUT SALE

64GB - ONLY $79

32GB - ONLY $49

16GB - ONLY $39


Fits All iPhone, Android & Windows Cell Phones. Also iPads, Tablets, PC & MAC.


With New 8-Pin & Micro USB Adapters!

The iPocket™ Drive Now Works for iPhone, Android & Windows

Our past supports spoke, so we created it. With the newly released iPocket™ Drive Adapters, the drive can now connect to any Android, and Windows smartphones and tablets, in addition to Apple iPhones & iPads with the Lightning Connector. So now you can copy, move, & store files, pictures, and videos to/from any device to any device. The 3-inch long cable also allows the iPocket™ Drive to connect to your device no matter what type of case you use to protect your smartphone, iPad, or Tablet. All iPocket™ Drive purchases will come with the 2 additional adapters! Currently the 8, 16, 32, & 64GB plastic iPocket™ Drives are in stock. The 128GB and all Metal iPocket™ Drives ship end of September.


iPOCKET™ DRIVE FEATURES

  • Apple 8-Pin Lightning connector, and 2.0 USB connector. 
  • Additional 3-inch Lightning and Micro USB Connector. 
  • Free universal App for iPhone/iPad and Android.
  • Stream Music directly from the iPocket Drive to your iPhone, iPad or Android.
  • Stream Movies directly from the iPocket Drive to your iPhone, iPad or Android.
  • Open files directly from the iPocket™ Drive.
  • Copy/Move files between a PC or MAC and the iPocket™ Drive.
  • File Management (Copy/Cut/Paste/Delete/Rename/Create Folder).
  • Backup Photos/Videos from a MAC or PC. 
  • Charge any Apple iPhone/iPad/iTouch/Android device 100% directly from your computer without a charging cable. 


WHAT IS THE iPOCKET™ DRIVE (iPD)?

The iPocket™ Drive (iPD) allows you to quickly and safely move all your movies, music, documents, and files between all your devices (computers, iPhones, iPads, iTouches, Android, and Windows) with ease. No need for cellular data, Internet, wireless networks, or Cloud access when using the iPD.

CONVENIENCE AND FUNCTIONALITY RIGHT OUT OF YOUR POCKET 

Many users use a USB flash drive to transfer files from computer to computer; it’s easy, fast, and convenient. Other phones can transfer data through memory cards, but the iPhone has never had this feature since its release in 2007. Until now. At last a drive that fits all models of iPhone, iPad, iTouch, PC, MAC, Android, and Windows. What more do you need?

INTRODUCING...THE iPOCKET™ DRIVE

Apple iPhone users can now enjoy all the benefits of a USB hard drive with their Apple iPhone, iPad, iTouch, PC, MAC, Android, and Windows. The iPD supports most Apple iOS file types and all common file types in use today, storing everything in its fast all-flash memory. The iPD comes with everything you need to get started: An integrated Apple Lightning connector and a regular USB connector.

WHAT EXACTLY CAN IT DO?

With the iPD, users can move and add photos, videos, music, and other files to and from any device to their iPD. The iPD allows you to conserve space on your smartphone while also saving you money! iPhones with more storage space cost hundreds of dollars, external hard drives don't fit the iPhone, but the iPD can instantly double or triple the storage on your Apple or Android device for as little as $65.

WORKS WITH MAC & PC: 

The iPD works with any Mac or PC models. With the 64GB, 128GB, and 256GB models, you can backup your entire desktop computer hard drive for easy access. Free up space on your iPhone or Android by backing up all of your photos, videos, and files to the iPD. No need to pay for recurring online Cloud storage subscriptions.



STREAM MOVIES:

For frequent travelers, the iPD streaming capabilities will make it an invaluable accessory. Movie files stored on it can be streamed directly for viewing on your iPhone, iPad, iTouch, Android and Windows. Now you can watch movies INSTANTLY anywhere, anytime!

STREAM MUSIC:

Stop with the hassle of fitting your entire music library on your phone. The iPocket™ Drive can directly stream music for INSTANT playback on your Apple and Android devices without the lengthy process of syncing to iTunes. 

CHARGE YOUR iPHONE, iPAD, OR ANDROID PHONE

If all that functionality isn’t enough for you, the iPD also has the added convenience of being able to charge your iPhone, iPad, Android, or Tablet battery 100% directly from any USB outlet. Stop carrying compatible wires and chargers around— you can charge your iPhone, iPad, or iTouch directly from any USB port using the iPD.
 


FAST, POWERFUL, EASY-TO-USE APP

The first time you plug in your iPD you will be prompted to download our free app. The app requires no set-up, and you will immediately see four options:
Contact Backup: Backs up all of your contacts
Local Storage: Accesses files on your iOS, Android, and Windows devices 
External Storage: Accesses your iPocket™ Drive storage
Dropbox: Accesses Dropbox

ONE CLICK CONTACT BACKUP

Press the Backup button and all your personal contact information is transferred immediately to the iPocket™ Drive. Not just names and phones numbers but all your complete contact information. You can then transfer them between any new device, iPhone, Android, Windows, PC, or MAC. There are no restrictions between operating systems.

 

SAFE AND SECURE

 In this day and age, data breaches seem normal. Every week we see news stories of hackers breaking into our credit cards, personal information, and Cloud storage. With the iPD, you can eliminate that concern. The drive is safe and secure since zero information is sent through a third party service, transferred through the internet, or sent to the Cloud. This makes our drive perfect for conducting all matters private, personal or business related. iPD is always by your side, all your personal and private data, safe and secure, whenever you need it.

It also comes in Metal!


THE TEAM

 The team behind The Power Company spans five countries, four languages and has more than 34 years of experience. Headed by Gene Aikens, product designer, and president. The Power Company focuses on producing smart electronics that simplify daily technology use, all while fitting neatly in our pockets. The company’s premier product is the Smart Card, a wallet-sized iPhone and Android charger, released on Indiegogo in early 2014. Smart Card was successfully funded raising more than $63,000 and is now a part of Indiegogo’s Forever Funding program and still available for contributions.


WHERE WE ARE AT

 If you check our timeline below we started this project back in April of 2014. Currently the  original 8GB, 16GB, 32GB & 64GB models are completed, every order shipped in February 2015, and are Instock. The 128GB & 256GB models ship end of May. All the colored metal models ship in May.
 
Technical Specs:
Capacity: 8GB, 16GB, 32GB, 64GB, 128GB (depending on unit purchased)
Connectors: Standard USB 2.0, Apple Lightning Connector, and Micro USB*
iPocket™ Drive-to-USB Speed: 12MB/s (Read), 7.5MB/s (Write)
iPocket™ Drive-to-iDevice Speed: 2.5MB/s (Read), 1.9MB/s (Write)
Construction: ABS Plastic
Dimensions:  30.6mm x 51.8mm x 9.8mm
Weight: 8.5g
Compatibility: iPhone 6plus/6/5/5s/5c, iPad (4th Generation), iPad mini, iPad mini with Retina display, iPad Air, iPod touch (5th Generation), Android, Windows smartphone and tablets.
Supported File Formats:
  • Video: .mp4, .m4v, .mpv, .mov, .mpg, .mkv, .avi, .wmv, .rmvb, .flv, .3gp, .gif
  • Audio: .wav, .aac, .aif, .aiff, .caf, .m4a, .mp3
  • Images: jpg, tiff, gif
  • Documents: .doc and .docx (Microsoft Word); .htm and .html (web pages); .key (Keynote); .numbers (Numbers); .pages (Pages); .pdf (Preview and Adobe Acrobat); .ppt and .pptx (Microsoft PowerPoint); .txt (text); .rtf (rich text format); .vcf (contact information); .xls and .xlsx (Microsoft Excel); .zip; .ics
Additional Connectors: 3-inch Lightning 8-pin and Micro USB Connectors

story:
Media Coverage

SportTechie 

CBS

Reuters

USA Today


Our Story

After watching my son sustain a head injury in 2010, I felt compelled to do something about it. I asked myself, if there was one product that could add protection against head injuries that could work in any sport or activity, what would it look like?


Doing Nothing is NOT an Option

According to the CDC, every year there are between 1.6 and 3.8 million head injuries (including concussions) in the United States. While sports like football and hockey are top of mind, the reality is that head injuries are common across many other sports like soccer, baseball, skateboarding, basketball, BMX, etc. The bottom line is that kids and athletes are exposed to the risk throughout the year as they typically play or practice multiple sports or activities throughout the year.

Recent research from the Cleveland Clinic indicates that even hits that do not result in a concussion can also lead to long term health issues. Ignoring or not doing anything to protect our kids and athletes is not an option. 


2nd Skull® Brand

In order to make the coolest protective headgear in the market, we needed a strong brand identity that was memorable, descriptive, cool and elevated the overall experience for the athlete. The 2nd Skull® brand brings to life a great looking protective experience that athletes can be proud to wear.


2nd Skull® Products 



The 2nd Skull® CAP can be worn under any sport helmet like football, hockey, baseball, BMX, skateboarding, skiing, etc.
The 2nd Skull® BAND is perfect standalone protection for sports and activities where a helmet is not utilized, like soccer, basketball, volleyball, etc.

Key Features



Impact Testing Adhering to Industry Standards


2nd Skull® products were tested at Independent Third Party Laboratories adhering to industry (NOCSAE and ASTM) standards.


2nd Skull adds up to 35% more Impact Protection




Impact Absorption Technology

2nd Skull® products feature a thin  layer of lightweight XRD®, an extreme impact protection material made from special urethane molecules that are soft and flexible at rest but can momentarily harden under sudden pressure.  2nd Skull® thin protect outperforms thick and traditional foams found in many helmets and protective headgear.  



Versatility & Protection for Entire Year


2nd Skull® products were designed to work in multiple sports, providing athletes protection across the seasons, delivering great value.


Warning, Claims & Transparency

Our products add protection and cannot prevent a concussion. After all, a concussion occurs when the brain moves inside the skull - like an egg yolk does inside an egg. Just like athletes wear knee pads, elbow pads, shin guards or like padding in field goal posts and bicycle handlebars, 2nd Skull® adds protection. Below is our warning and standard claims:

WARNING: No helmet or protective headgear can prevent neck, head or brain injuries, including concussions.

CLAIM: 2nd Skull® adds up to 35% more impact protection.


Making Protection Fashionable

The design challenge in creating 2nd Skull® protective headgear was quite the journey. Before getting into the testing lab, we evaluated countless materials to find the right attributes for comfort for the athlete; a product that was soft, light and not bulky or thick. 

Instincitvely, when it comes to protection one might think that more protection is better, but not when you look like Super Mario Brothers. We don't need bulletproof materials that are hard, thick and heavy as these will slow athletes down. We needed a solution that would absorb the impact while providing great comfort; but most importantly, looks great! 
When we designed our Beta products two years ago, we had a good product but not a great one. These products were a but bulky. As we evaluated the products with athletes in different sports at the College and High School level, we uncovered opportunity areas for fit, aesthetics, and thickness - all of which were addressed in our final optimized products.


Ready for Showtime & Launch!

As the new protective headgear category emerges, many companies are opportunistically coming out with bulky products that are simply not ready for the market. At the end of the day if the athletes do not want to wear the protective headgear, then those products will ultimately not add any protection.
This is where 2nd Skull®  stands out. We have been at this for 5 years and our products were optimized multiple times through the years by incorporating the needs of the athletes. 2nd Skull has multiple utility patents so we are ready to bring our protective headgear products to the market and define this new category.

Your Pledge will Bring Protection to Athletes

Support for our Retail Launch while bringing protection to athletes of all ages

  • Your pledge will help us create an impactful retail packaging and help build initial inventory for retail launch
  • Your help will allow us to bring added protection to many athletes throughut the year


Exciting and Exclusive Perks 

Update: Early Deliveries to first 50 Contributors!

Deliveries to our first contributors were made starting on February 9! Don't miss this opportunity to get yours now.


Be one of the first to get 2nd Skull®  products!

  • Get your 2nd Skull®  products before these hit the stores!
  • Get exclusive 2nd Skull®  promotional products 


Our Promise to You

When the campaign hits the 33 days and the time is up, our campaign will still be alive and kicking. We understand the importance to update backers, and pledge to provide ongoing updates until the perks are in your hands or heads.


Help us make some noise!

While your pledge is important, there are many other ways you can contribute:

  • Share this campaign with your friends by using the Indiegogo share tools!

Risks & Challenges

A key challenge will be preparing for production demands to fulfill the retailer needs. In preparation for this, we have been working with three third party manufacturers in the past years and have dual sourcing capabilities right here in the United States. Beyond this, we have also identifies other domestic manufacturers that would allow us to expand our production when needed.

2nd Skull is proud to make its products in the United States. This will provide agility and responsiveness to retailer needs while eliminating long lead times driven by long distance shipments outside of the United States.


Proudly Made in the USA


About Us

Federico Olivares is the founder and CEO. He is a 15 year multi-industry veteran with marketing, strategy and innovation track record in Fortune 200 companies. He had a successful marketing career at The Kellogg Company, where he led large innovation platform efforts. Federico has a B.S.B.A. from Tecnologico de Monterrey and an M.B.A. from the University of Pittsburgh.

Tyler Palko is the Executive Vice President and has a mix of professional sports and consulting experience. Tyler was the starting QB for the University of Pittsburgh from 2004 to 2006 and former NFL player with the New Orleans Saints, Arizona Cardinals, Pittsburgh Steelers and Kansas City Chiefs from 2007 to 2011. Tyler has a B.A. in Communications and Rhetoric / Economics from the University of Pittsburgh.
story_txt:
Media Coverage


SportTechie 
CBS
Reuters
USA Today






Our Story After watching my son sustain a head injury in 2010, I felt compelled to do something about it. I asked myself, if there was one product that could add protection against head injuries that could work in any sport or activity, what would it look like?


Doing Nothing is NOT an OptionAccording to the CDC, every year there are between 1.6 and 3.8 million head injuries (including concussions) in the United States. While sports like football and hockey are top of mind, the reality is that head injuries are common across many other sports like soccer, baseball, skateboarding, basketball, BMX, etc. The bottom line is that kids and athletes are exposed to the risk throughout the year as they typically play or practice multiple sports or activities throughout the year.
Recent research from the Cleveland Clinic indicates that even hits that do not result in a concussion can also lead to long term health issues. Ignoring or not doing anything to protect our kids and athletes is not an option. 



2nd Skull® BrandIn order to make the coolest protective headgear in the market, we needed a strong brand identity that was memorable, descriptive, cool and elevated the overall experience for the athlete. The 2nd Skull® brand brings to life a great looking protective experience that athletes can be proud to wear.




2nd Skull® Products 



The 2nd Skull® CAP can be worn under any sport helmet like football, hockey, baseball, BMX, skateboarding, skiing, etc.
The 2nd Skull® BAND is perfect standalone protection for sports and activities where a helmet is not utilized, like soccer, basketball, volleyball, etc.


Key Features





Impact Testing Adhering to Industry Standards


2nd Skull® products were tested at Independent Third Party Laboratories adhering to industry (NOCSAE and ASTM) standards. 


2nd Skull adds up to 35% more Impact Protection






Impact Absorption Technology
2nd Skull® products feature a thin  layer of lightweight XRD®, an extreme impact protection material made from special urethane molecules that are soft and flexible at rest but can momentarily harden under sudden pressure.  2nd Skull® thin protect outperforms thick and traditional foams found in many helmets and protective headgear.

Instincitvely, when it comes to protection one might think that more protection is better, but not when you look like Super Mario Brothers. We don't need bulletproof materials that are hard, thick and heavy as these will slow athletes down. We needed a solution that would absorb the impact while providing great comfort; but most importantly, looks great! When we designed our Beta products two years ago, we had a good product but not a great one. These products were a but bulky. As we evaluated the products with athletes in different sports at the College and High School level, we uncovered opportunity areas for fit, aesthetics, and thickness - all of which were addressed in our final optimized products.
Ready for Showtime & Launch!As the new protective headgear category emerges, many companies are opportunistically coming out with bulky products that are simply not ready for the market. At the end of the day if the athletes do not want to wear the protective headgear, then those products will ultimately not add any protection.This is where 2nd Skull®  stands out. We have been at this for 5 years and our products were optimized multiple times through the years by incorporating the needs of the athletes. 2nd Skull has multiple utility patents so we are ready to bring our protective headgear products to the market and define this new category.  Your Pledge will Bring Protection to Athletes Support for our Retail Launch while bringing protection to athletes of all ages  Your pledge will help us create an impactful retail packaging and help build initial inventory for retail launch Your help will allow us to bring added protection to many athletes throughut the year    

Exciting and Exclusive Perks 


Update: Early Deliveries to first 50 Contributors!
Deliveries to our first contributors were made starting on February 9! Don't miss this opportunity to get yours now.
Be one of the first to get 2nd Skull®  products!

Get your 2nd Skull®  products before these hit the stores!
Get exclusive 2nd Skull®  promotional products 





Our Promise to You
When the campaign hits the 33 days and the time is up, our campaign will still be alive and kicking. We understand the importance to update backers, and pledge to provide ongoing updates until the perks are in your hands or heads.





Help us make some noise!
While your pledge is important, there are many other ways you can contribute:
Share this campaign with your friends by using the Indiegogo share tools!



Risks & Challenges
A key challenge will be preparing for production demands to fulfill the retailer needs. In preparation for this, we have been working with three third party manufacturers in the past years and have dual sourcing capabilities right here in the United States. Beyond this, we have also identifies other domestic manufacturers that would allow us to expand our production when needed.
2nd Skull is proud to make its products in the United States. This will provide agility and responsiveness to retailer needs while eliminating long lead times driven by long distance shipments outside of the United States.


Proudly Made in the USA



About Us
Federico Olivares is the founder and CEO. He is a 15 year multi-industry veteran with marketing, strategy and innovation track record in Fortune 200 companies. He had a successful marketing career at The Kellogg Company, where he led large innovation platform efforts. Federico has a B.S.B.A. from Tecnologico de Monterrey and an M.B.A. from the University of Pittsburgh.

Tyler Palko is the Executive Vice President and has a mix of professional sports and consulting experience. Tyler was the starting QB for the University of Pittsburgh from 2004 to 2006 and former NFL player with the New Orleans Saints, Arizona Cardinals, Pittsburgh Steelers and Kansas City Chiefs from 2007 to 2011. Tyler has a B.A. in Communications and Rhetoric / Economics from the University of Pittsburgh.

story:
Hello, my name is Edward Sawchyn and I am the founder and innovator at Cooler Heads Safety.  What is Cooler Heads?  Well, it’s the world’s first head and face flash fire protection system.  It is designed to protect workers in industries that are subjected to the dangers of flash fire.  These include the Oil & Gas industry, mining, mills or any other industry where there is potential for combustible dust, gas or liquid.

This entire project began with a simple question; “why?”  In the spring of 2013 I was working for a company that sold FR clothing and during the course of business I saw a flash fire test.  After watching it I wondered why there was no protection for the head and face of the test mannequin.  The answer I got back was that the expectation of the test was that there would be 100% third degree burns to the head and face.  I thought that was odd but I also assumed that this was just an oversight of this test and that someone else had this covered.  How could you leave the head and face exposed when so many resources were being spent to protect the body?


During the summer of 2013 I had some time to consider this question again.  I decided to look into it further and began to research what was available to protect the head and face from flash fire hazards.  During the course of my search I realized that there really wasn't anything available to protect the head and face.  There were FR balaclavas but who was going wear that unless it was extremely cold?

At this time I was pondering what type of person would be working in the oil patch and exposed to these hazards.  The image that came to mind was a young fellow, perhaps just recently graduated from high school and looking to make some big money to get a head start in life, come home and buy a house, meet a nice girl, start a family…whatever that looked like.  I know that sounds kind of corny and old fashioned but I think it resonates with a lot of people.  We like to think that we live in an enlightened society, but it’s pretty hard to meet someone if you don’t have a face.  I then began thinking about my own son, still 7 years from graduation, deciding to forego university and heading to the oil patch to make some big money.  What if he got burned?  It would be devastating!  At that moment I knew that I had to do something to help protect my son, and everyone else’s sons, or daughters, fathers, mothers, aunts or uncles. 

I began researching existing technologies and began putting the pieces together.  I knew that the system had to be passive so it wouldn't interfere with the worker’s everyday duties.  It had to be light, flexible and comfortable.  It had to be easy to put on and take off and it needed to work in all weather conditions.

What I came up with was the first version of what became the Flame Shield FX1.  It resembled a collar assembly that was worn like shoulder pads for hockey or football but without the weight or the bulk.  It had sensors to detect a high heat signature and CO2 canisters to rapidly inflate an FR fabric to surround the head and face of the worker.

By December 2013 I had enough drawings, sketches, diagrams and descriptions of my idea to apply for a patent.  In the spring of 2014 I applied for and received dollar matching funding from the National Research Council for the R & D portion of this project.  I hired an excellent engineering team who in turn brought in an excellent industrial designer and a great soft goods expert.  Through numerous design modifications and extensive testing we achieved proof of concept of my idea in March 2015.  We were able to prove that this device would work, will work…it works!

This is where we need your help.  Our target is to raise $200,000 to be able to produce our first run of 1,000 units and have them ready to hit the market by the end of the year.  We are going to use some of the money for additional testing and refinement of the FX1, we want it to be as good as it can be.  We want it to be perfect.  The breakdown for these costs includes engineering costs; testing costs (each burn test costs us over $3,000 at the University of Alberta burn test facility), the FR fabric, CO2 canisters, circuit boards and related electronics, dies, forms and related items required to set up manufacturing in Canada and paying for the manufacturing of the product.

We are targeting a larger production run to keep the cost of the FX1 reasonable.  We want everyone to be able to afford this protection.

Our campaign is called “I Saved Face Today” and it is a bit of a play on words, but the message is clear, we want to save a face!  It might be someone you know, someone you love or perhaps a complete stranger, but it’s someone’s face.  Your support will help us get this product to market as soon as possible.  Take advantage of our crowd funding special pricing and save $100 off our regular price.  We realize that you may not have any direct need for our product but may still want to contribute to our campaign.  Check out our numerous contribution levels and our perks that say thanks for helping us out. 

                                                                       

                        

Together we can help protect workers of the world from what could be a tragic injury.  

Here's our project timeline...

Meet our team:

Edward Sawchyn, President/Sales

     

Brad Williams, COO/CFO

Josh Erickson, B.Eng. Electrical Engineering, Motus Design Group

Jamie Cameron, M.Eng. Product Design Engineering, Motus Design Group

Adam Looker, Industrial Designer

Doug Simpson, Manufacturing, Prototyping, President at Feathercraft

Carol Vincent, Marketing, President Redbird Communications

Rasanga Weerasinghe, Video Director/Producer

Samantha Paul-Winfield, Designer, Shaded Swan Creative

Thank you for your support and don’t forget to use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word.

story:
Updates:

Now Featuring on I4U News!

About ButtonDuino

  • ButtonDuino is TINY!  At less than 18.64 mm x 18.25 mm (0.73in x 0.718in), Buttonduino is smaller than a quarter but still packs the power of the Arduino platform. It is small enough to be placed in any project. 

  • ButtonDuino is USB Powered and Programmable!  No need for those FTDI boards or IC's, USB programming is now integrated into the bootloader, this makes Buttonduino cost effective and programmable anywhere!  

  • ButtonDuino is Breadboard Mountable! No more messy wires to your breadboard like other tiny arduinos, Buttonduino is breadboard compatible, so it plugs, with no pin conflict, directly into any standard pitch (2.54mm) breadboard as well as vero-board. This makes it cleaner and perfect for prototyping. 

  • ButtonDuino is Stackable! Buttonduino can be stacked with any Buttonduino compatible ButtonShields (Coming Soon). Need more pins? No problem, Buttonduino can be expanded, via I2C or SPI. Need an SD card module or even wifi, then just stack it and program! Viola, no need to for hours of hardware debugging, Buttonduino gets you up and running in seconds.

  • ButtonDuino is Cheap! Most enthusiasts would love to leave their beloved Arduino boards in their projects if it wasn't for the price tag and size of the boards. ButtonDuino is cheap enough to pop into any project or swapped from one project to another. No need for PCB redesign. Dirt cheap but still excellent quality.

  • ButtonDuino Can Interface directly to NI LabVIEW! Create amazing Graphical User Interfaces using LabVIEW by National Instruments. All you need is the same micro-USB cable that you already have to program and power ButtonDuino.

  • ButtonDuino is Open-Source and Arduino Compatible! Best feature is that that ButtonDuino's schematics, code and bootloaders are all FREE and Open-Source. All the details will be released once the product is finalized. 

                 


Our Goal

Lumina Inova set out on a journey around  South Africa, visiting just over 46 schools and colleges. 

We wanted the answer to the fundamental question, "How many students know how to program a microcontroller or have a basic understanding of electronics?". Well, after visiting all those institutions, we found out that a shocking 5 of the 46 schools that we visited, had an understanding of electronics... but these were only technical schools! We then investigated the reasons why these learners are not learning about electronics or even robotics, despite living in an age where technology is changing at a rapid rate. The core reason was that the teachers themselves do NOT understand how they work, and neither do they posses a degree in engineering or computer science. The last reason was that electronic development kits are so damn expensive that it would be impractical to give each student one to play and learn with. This made us ask ourselves how to make a development kit that is not only affordable but also teacher and student user-friendly. 

The  solution came to us when we thought of creating a tiny development kit that packs the easy to program Power of Arduino. After many months of development, the ButtonDuino was born. Now with your support we aim to introduce this Open-Source Platform to those same schools and show them how important electronics are in this day and age. Not only will it help develop society, but it will also improve the advancement of product development, which would make our tomorrow a better one. 

The biggest successes begin with something small. And so this journey to changing the world starts with our tiny ButtonDuino, along with your support. 


ButtonDuino Specifications

  • Atmel ATTINY85-20H microcontroller
  • USB Regulated Powered up to 800mA via external power supply or 500mA from PC/Laptop.
  • Dimensions: 18.64 mm x 18.25 mm (0.73in x 0.718in)
  • Programmable via USB or AVR mkII - Choice between USB bootloader .
  • Arduino IDE 1.0+ (Windows/OSX/Linux)
  • 6 x Available I/O Pins and I2C and SPI Expandable 
  • 8k Flash Memory without bootloader ( 6k after USB bootloader)
  • I2C and SPI Expandable 
  • 3 x 8 bit Hardware PWM  pins
  • 4 x 10 bit ADC pins
  • Power LED 
  • Test LED (Pin 1)
  • Support for LabVIEW
  • Soon to Be available in Deep RED (PCB Silkscreen)


Development of ButtonDuino

Take us take you on the progress of ButtonDuino:

  1. The schematic and PCB design was planned carefully to ensure that ButtonDuino is safe and practical. 

                
  2. The next step was to get the Printed Circuit Boards manufactured. This process involved getting the best quote and reviewing the quality of their boards. 

  3. The boards were then populated and went through initial testing. The first test obviously being a simple LED blink and LED fade.

  4. SUCCESS!!


Okay! So Whats Left to Do... And how you can Help?

As enthusiastic as we are about ButtonDuino, there are still a few things to be done before it can launch ButtonDuino to the world.

  1. We need to organized the packaging and source all the components for mass production
  2. We need to create ButtonShields (Discussed in the next section)
  3. Create an online store where ButtonDuinos can be sold and distributed easily and quickly. 
  4. Organize the Pick-and-Place assembly for ButtonDuino.                          
   

AND THAT'S WHERE YOU COME IN! 

The designs are now well proven out and ready for production. Our production army has been selected for PCB manufacturing .

With your support, we'll be able to ramp up to production of these boards and to get them out to all those innovators worldwide. Your contribution will help to fund:

  • Sourcing better Tools for prototyping, production and quality testing
  • Prototyping and producing the hordes of ButtonShields and peripherals that will soon be available.
  • Bulk procurement of components making ButtonDuino even cheaper 
  • Production of the boards
  • Help Bring Arduino and Electronics development to Colleges and Schools, especially in Rural Areas. 

Interface with LabVIEW

Linking your Arduino with one of the most powerful programming languages in industry, will change the way you implement your projects.

  

ButtonDuino supports interfacing to LabVIEW 2010+ using your USB-HID interface. Create amazing and beautiful GUI applications that link to your PC. The image below is an ready to load Temperature-Sensing example that comes with ButtonDuino. No Additional debugging hardware required.


The ButtonDuino Community

                                                

You can reach Lumina Inova through Facebook, Twitter and Blogspot for more Information on ButtonDuino.

Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/luminainova
Twitter:       https://twitter.com/LuminaInova
Blogspot:    http://luminainova.blogspot.com

       

Rewards



These are just some of the awesome perks available to you. More perks are shown in the Perk Section.

Shipping

There are a few shipping options available to you:

Saver Shipping (Cheaper Option)

  • Southern Africa    - $3,00  Exl. Tracking Codes Add $4 for Tracking.
  • Rest of the World  - $4,00 Exl. Tracking Codes Add $6 for Tracking.

Expect 6 to 8 weeks delivery

!Remember to add these costs when you purchase any of the perks!

Express (Faster Option)

For Orders

  • Zone1 (Sub-Saharan Africa)         $24.5 - 1-2 Working days
  • Zone2 (Middle East,Europe,UK)   $29.5 - 2-3 Working days
  • Zone3 (Canada, Mexico, USA)     $32.5 - 2-3 Working days
  • Zone4 (Rest of the World)            $41.5 - 2-4 Working days
All Options Include Tracking.

!Remember to add these costs when you purchase any of the perks!



ButtonShields

Upcoming ButtonShields 

  • Port Expander - I2C              - Schematic and PCB layout Done!
    

  • Real Time Clock (RTC)  - I2C
  • EEPROM - I2C
  • Temperature sensor  - I2C     - Schematic and PCB layout Done!
  • RGB LED                                - Schematic and PCB layout Done!
  • Pressure Resistive Sensor 
  • Coin Battery Pack                   - Schematic and PCB layout Done!
  • 3-Axis Digital Compass           - Schematic and PCB layout Done!

Future ButtonShields

  • SD Card
  • WiFi
  • Ethernet
  • MP3 Player
  • Relay Board with LED 
  • PORT Terminals (Pheonix Contacts)
  • Infrared Reciever
  • BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy)
  • RFID
  •  Accelerometer

With your support we can bring these ButtonShields out to you, as soon as possible. Also each of these sensors shall include a LabVIEW demo example to help you develop and debug your projects with ease whilst having loads of fun.

Now Featuring on I4U News!About ButtonDuino
ButtonDuino is TINY!  At less than 18.64 mm x 18.25 mm (0.73in x 0.718in), Buttonduino is smaller than a quarter but still packs the power of the Arduino platform. It is small enough to be placed in any project.

No more messy wires to your breadboard like other tiny arduinos, Buttonduino is breadboard compatible, so it plugs, with no pin conflict, directly into any standard pitch (2.54mm) breadboard as well as vero-board. This makes it cleaner and perfect for prototyping. 

ButtonDuino is Stackable! Buttonduino can be stacked with any Buttonduino compatible ButtonShields (Coming Soon). Need more pins? No problem, Buttonduino can be expanded, via I2C or SPI. Need an SD card module or even wifi, then just stack it and program! Viola, no need to for hours of hardware debugging, Buttonduino gets you up and running in seconds.

ButtonDuino is Cheap! Most enthusiasts would love to leave their beloved Arduino boards in their projects if it wasn't for the price tag and size of the boards. ButtonDuino is cheap enough to pop into any project or swapped from one project to another. No need for PCB redesign. Dirt cheap but still excellent quality.
ButtonDuino Can Interface directly to NI LabVIEW! Create amazing Graphical User Interfaces using LabVIEW by National Instruments. All you need is the same micro-USB cable that you already have to program and power ButtonDuino.
ButtonDuino is Open-Source and Arduino Compatible! Best feature is that that ButtonDuino's schematics, code and bootloaders are all FREE and Open-Source. All the details will be released once the product is finalized.                  Our GoalLumina Inova set out on a journey around  South Africa, visiting just over 46 schools and colleges. We wanted the answer to the fundamental question, "How many students know how to program a microcontroller or have a basic understanding of electronics?". Well, after visiting all those institutions, we found out that a shocking 5 of the 46 schools that we visited, had an understanding of electronics... but these were only technical schools! We then investigated the reasons why these learners are not learning about electronics or even robotics, despite living in an age where technology is changing at a rapid rate. The core reason was that the teachers themselves do NOT understand how they work, and neither do they posses a degree in engineering or computer science. The last reason was that electronic development kits are so damn expensive that it would be impractical to give each student one to play and learn with. This made us ask ourselves how to make a development kit that is not only affordable but also teacher and student user-friendly. The  solution came to us when we thought of creating a tiny development kit that packs the easy to program Power of Arduino. After many months of development, the ButtonDuino was born. Now with your support we aim to introduce this Open-Source Platform to those same schools and show them how important electronics are in this day and age. Not only will it help develop society, but it will also improve the advancement of product development, which would make our tomorrow a better one. The biggest successes begin with something small. And so this journey to changing the world starts with our tiny ButtonDuino, along with your support. 
ButtonDuino Specifications
Atmel ATTINY85-20H microcontroller
USB Regulated Powered up to 800mA via external power supply or 500mA from PC/Laptop.
Dimensions: 18.64 mm x 18.25 mm (0.73in x 0.718in)
Programmable via USB or AVR mkII - Choice between USB bootloader .

Arduino IDE 1.0+ (Windows/OSX/Linux)

6 x Available I/O Pins and I2C and SPI Expandable 


8k Flash Memory without bootloader ( 6k after USB bootloader)

I2C and SPI Expandable 
3 x 8 bit Hardware PWM  pins
4 x 10 bit ADC pins
Power LED 
Test LED (Pin 1)
Support for LabVIEW
Soon to Be available in Deep RED (PCB Silkscreen)
Development of ButtonDuinoTake us take you on the progress of ButtonDuino:

The schematic and PCB design was planned carefully to ensure that ButtonDuino is safe and practical.             

The next step was to get the Printed Circuit Boards manufactured. This process involved getting the best quote and reviewing the quality of their boards. 
The boards were then populated and went through initial testing. The first test obviously being a simple LED blink and LED fade.



SUCCESS!!
Okay! So Whats Left to Do... And how you can Help?As enthusiastic as we are about ButtonDuino, there are still a few things to be done before it can launch ButtonDuino to the world.
We need to organized the packaging and source all the components for mass production
We need to create ButtonShields (Discussed in the next section)
Create an online store where ButtonDuinos can be sold and distributed easily and quickly. 
Organize the Pick-and-Place assembly for ButtonDuino.                          

   AND THAT'S WHERE YOU COME IN! The designs are now well proven out and ready for production. Our production army has been selected for PCB manufacturing .With your support, we'll be able to ramp up to production of these boards and to get them out to all those innovators worldwide. Your contribution will help to fund:

Sourcing better Tools for prototyping, production and quality testing
Prototyping and producing the hordes of ButtonShields and peripherals that will soon be available.

Bulk procurement of components making ButtonDuino even cheaper 

Production of the boards
Help Bring Arduino and Electronics development to Colleges and Schools, especially in Rural Areas. 

Interface with LabVIEWLinking your Arduino with one of the most powerful programming languages in industry, will change the way you implement your projects.  ButtonDuino supports interfacing to LabVIEW 2010+ using your USB-HID interface. Create amazing and beautiful GUI applications that link to your PC. The image below is an ready to load Temperature-Sensing example that comes with ButtonDuino. No Additional debugging hardware required.
The ButtonDuino Community
                                                You can reach Lumina Inova through Facebook, Twitter and Blogspot for more Information on ButtonDuino.Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/luminainovaTwitter:       https://twitter.com/LuminaInovaBlogspot:    http://luminainova.blogspot.com       RewardsThese are just some of the awesome perks available to you. More perks are shown in the Perk Section.ShippingThere are a few shipping options available to you:Saver Shipping (Cheaper Option)

Southern Africa    - $3,00  Exl. Tracking Codes Add $4 for Tracking.

Rest of the World  - $4,00 Exl. Tracking Codes Add $6 for Tracking.

Expect 6 to 8 weeks delivery!Remember to add these costs when you purchase any of the perks!
Express (Faster Option)For Orders
Zone1 (Sub-Saharan Africa)         $24.5 - 1-2 Working days
Zone2 (Middle East,Europe,UK)   $29.5 - 2-3 Working days
Zone3 (Canada, Mexico, USA)     $32.5 - 2-3 Working days
Zone4 (Rest of the World)            $41.5 - 2-4 Working days
All Options Include Tracking.!Remember to add these costs when you purchase any of the perks!ButtonShieldsUpcoming ButtonShields 
Port Expander - I2C              - Schematic and PCB layout Done!    

Real Time Clock (RTC)  - I2C


EEPROM - I2C


Temperature sensor  - I2C     - Schematic and PCB layout Done!

RGB LED                                - Schematic and PCB layout Done!
Pressure Resistive Sensor 

Coin Battery Pack                   - Schematic and PCB layout Done!
3-Axis Digital Compass           - Schematic and PCB layout Done!
Future ButtonShields

 SD Card


 WiFi


 Ethernet


 MP3 Player


 Relay Board with LED 


 PORT Terminals (Pheonix Contacts)


 Infrared Reciever


 BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy)


 RFID

 Accelerometer
With your support we can bring these ButtonShields out to you, as soon as possible. Also each of these sensors shall include a LabVIEW demo example to help you develop and debug your projects with ease whilst having loads of fun.

story:
**IMPORTANT**

AFTER DONATING, PLEASE LEAVE YOUR INGAME NAME AND PREFERRED GUN IF APPLICABLE IN THE COMMENTS TAB!!! WE CAN NOT PUT GUNS OR ANY OTHER ITEMS IN BACKPACKS!

DO NOT REQUEST ANY PERK CHANGES HERE. ANY PERK CHANGE REQUESTS WILL BE IGNORED PERKS CAN NOT BE CHANGED. YOU CAN DECIDE WHAT WEAPON YOU SPAWN WITH ONCE WHEN YOU DONATE. SO MAKE IT A GOOD ONE ;).

IF YOU DONATE, the procedure for spawning with weapons is as such:

step 1; create a new character

step 2; once logged in, log out within 25 minutes of creating the character, and wait at the lobby for 1 minute

step 3; log back in, once logged in, you will have your weapons and will spawn at your vehicle location (if you have that perk)

step 4; if this does not work, repeat. if it still does not work, contact krauterz or mancow ingame or by email at krauterz@live.com.

step 5; DONATORS CAN NOT CHANGE THEIR PERKS ONCE THE ORIGINAL REQUEST HAS BEEN PROCESSED!

**DONATION PERK RULES**

*1 DO NOT TELL ANYONE THE LOCATION OF VEHICLES!

*2 no deliberate trolling, or exploiting. this includes using vehicles that you have not got the perk access to use

*3 NO SPAWN CAMPING. it is ok to sit in capitals and murder innocents, but give them a change to get out of the city first..

*4 NO WASTING VEHICLES. dont crash one helicopter into 8 others..

*5 TRY NOT TO ADD TOO MANY VEHICLES TO THE GAME! take a chopper to a capital, but HIDE IT WELL. OR imobilize it.

*6 AND FINALLY, DONT DEATHMATCH OR SHOOT OTHERS AT PERK LOCATIONS!!! it takes up to 10 minutes to respawn there each time. please dont do it! DOING IT WILL RESULT IN A ONE DAY BAN, second warning is removal of perks for 2 days, third warning is permenant removal of perks.

*7 WE OFFER FULL REFUNDS FOR DONATIONS FOR ONLY 24 HOURS. AND ONLY IF PLAYER GIVES A RELIABLE REASON FOR THEIR REFUND REQUEST! THIS IS A DONATION SYSTEM! NOT A PAY TO RECEIVE SYSTEM!

**DONATING ACCEPTS THESE RULES. BREAKING RULES MAY RESULT IN SUSPENSION OF PERKS, REMOVAL OF PERKS AND DEPENDING ON THE MAGNITUDE OF THE INCIDENT, BANS MAY BE APPLIED**

 

Short Summary

ZUST is the most popular Day-Z sanctuary (private hive) server currently running. However, the owner has run into an unexpected problem which means he cannot pay for the next month of server hosting service. it is up to us to keep it going until the owner can once again run the show!

we just upgraded our server! its now an 8 core with HT (meaning 16 virtual cores!) 8gb of ram and almost 1gbps connection!


What We Need & What You Get
Realisticly, all we need is one months worth of funding, which is $360. ($169 for the server and $200 to hire 3 full time RDC admins) however, the more we collect, the better this server will become. more money means more slots, better uptime and less lag


QUIRKS INCLUDE WEAPONS AND VEHICLES! depending on how much you donate, the owner of the server can give you weapons, and other items. if you donate a lot, we can even give you a helicopter permenantly!
If we do not reach our goal of $260, the funds will be allocated to the next possible server restart stage. if its a few months away, this will aid in helping the server come back to life as much as possible.


The Impact
If ZUST gets shut down, players all across the world will lose their progress, vehicles and weapons. WE CANT LET THIS HAPPEN!
Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
Krauterz, the owner of the server, assures us that with proper funding, and with a goal that is met, not only could the server stay up indefinitly, but he could double the slot count. increase performance and add more perks to the game.


Other Ways You Can Help
If you cant donate, dont worry, just like us on facebook! and of course feel free to connect to our server to talk directly to the owner!

story:
I spent 4 years a soldier in the U.S. Army, and every month we had a field training exercise, every week a ruck-march, countless gear inspections, and regular deployments. As a part of my battle-gear, required for all of these events, was a hydration system such as a "CamelBak." It was a very convenient source of water and worked well, but the maintenance required to keep it working properly took a lot of time. This was a CONSTANT source of irritation for me, so I decided to do something about it. Thus I invented the "Pop N' Drop Hydration System." It basically consists of a plastic bladder similar to that of the popular "CapriSun" drinks, only scaled and shaped to fit inside a hydration system such as a "CamelBak," and recyclable. I also re-engineered the hose/straw attachment system as illustrated in the video to make storing, using, and replacing the bladder quick and easy. With this system you can have multiple "back-ups" in storage, rapidly replace empties, drink whichever beverage you choose (from those made available by the associated beverage company, of course), and NEVER have to clean the reservoir again!

My goal is to raise $17,000 to cover the costs of a provisional patent, development of my prototype into a marketable product design, and presentation of the idea to potential beverage distributors for implementation. I have selected a company called Davison Inc. in Pennsylvania which is willing to fine-tune, beautify, and tenaciously pitch my idea to a group of corporations until someone buys it. They have state of the art machine/electronic shops, as well as numerous design teams, and will use their resources to nurture my invention from baby idea to full-fledged product. The catch is that, unless I want to pay them a large percentage of my profits forever (which I certainly do not) their fees for the use of their facilities and the employ of their representatives are ... shall we say ... steep. Every penny gained from this project, whether I reach my goal or not, will be divided between providing the promised perks for those who help to make this happen, and paying the design costs (in that order).

This project is very, very significant for me because it touches on and addresses a significant need that I and thousands of others like me have personally felt. There are over two million Marines, Soldiers, Sailors, and Airmen in the United States military; for most of these heroes, a hydration system is essential for safety and survival, whether they are deployed, or involved in a field exercise, or simply conducting daily physical training. In the life of a soldier there is very, very little free time to relax and wind down. It is infuriating, therefore, when tedious activities encroach or are imposed upon these precious few moments. The water reservoirs in the average hydration system are exactly this kind of imposition. Because they can ONLY be used to hold water, soldiers are required to carry multiple, ungainly bottles of sports beverages to balance electrolytes and refresh their energy, or risk damaging the reservoir (and make cleaning it incredibly difficult) by filling it with non-water. The “seal” on standard reservoirs is imperfect at best, and leaky at worst, so water cannot be kept in readiness for long-term because it goes rancid very quickly and can cause illness. Worse, the reservoir must be cleaned after being emptied as well as before being refilled to eliminate the build up of mildew. And, because the reservoir can contain only two liters at a time, and the recommended daily intake under average conditions is greater than two liters (on average), either the reservoir would need to be cleaned and refilled more than once every day, or the soldier would need to purchase multiple reservoirs (at $30 each) and clean them both later. These, among other inconveniences, discourage soldiers from properly hydrating with any kind of frequency. By helping fund this project, you will be helping to put a product on the market which will give soldiers back that free-time which we covet so much while eliminating at least one unnecessary stressor from a life practically defined by stress.

I know that not everyone will be able to contribute financially to this project, but you can all still help! Please get the word out! The more people who know about this project the closer I will come to reaching my goal! Indiegogo has lots of tools for sharing with various social networking sites; please use them! Hundreds of thousands of soldiers will be grateful to you for your contribution.

story: n/a

Hello, 
We are a new company with a great idea. 

What We Need & What You Get

1. Send us a picture.
2. Our team will go to work and create a minifig USB stick by printing your head on the minifig of the LEGO. 

You can make great us of this dynamic minifig as a show piece or an accessory to your collection of USB stick!


We print our Minifigs using the finest print quality.

We print directly on our Minifigs with a special industrial printer, so it ain't a decal!

Get a whole, personalised LEGO minifig USB Key made to your specifications!

If you don’t want to go through our list of  LEGO parts and accessories, why not simply provide us with some photos or a description and we’ll pick the parts needed and design the minifigure’s custom outfit based on the photos.

You can use this option to make someone famous (or someone obscure) or someone you just love enough to get made into LEGO – basically what ever you want and we’ll do our best to create something that will make you smile.

Please provide as much information as possible  here. Have a think about colours, hair, expression etc…eg if the colour of the hair is unclear or varies in the photos provided please clarify the colour. Also make sure your email address is correct so we can check details if needed!

DISCLAIMER: We don’t make custom parts, only custom designs, so if LEGO don’t make the product/colour you think you need we’re going to have to find a compromise. But so far so good, LEGO is very versatile, we’ll figure it out!

story:
SnowPi the snowman

The Festive Soldering & GPIO Kit


SnowPi was successfully funded and can be ordered via our website.


Who is SnowPi the snowman?

SnowPi is one of the latest products from us at Ryanteck LTD. and is designed to be a fun kit to solder up and learn GPIO programming with the Raspberry Pi.
The kit comprises a PCB, 9 LEDs, a Raspberry Pi GPIO Header and a Resistor ladder.
All are reasonably easy to solder for a beginner.
SnowPi will also include a step by step soldering guide and a Programming with GPIO Zero Guide which will be available online.

About SnowPi

The PCB will plug on-top of your Raspberry Pi with a right angled header so will stand up. 
We are in the process of sourcing LEDs. The colours will be:
2 Crystal Blue LEDS for the Eyes.
1 Orange Diffused LED for the Nose
6 Crystal White LEDs for the body.

What can I code SnowPi in?

SnowPi has no complex circuitry, driver ICs or libraries required to code. It's as simple as blinking an LED off or on.
This makes it possible to code with every language on the Raspberry Pi that uses GPIO. 
Programming languages include C using Wiring Pi, Java using Pi4J, Scratch using either NuScratch or Scratch GPIO and most commonly Python using either RPi.GPIO or the new GPIO Zero.

What are we fundraising?

We're fundraising to make a production batch of SnowPi. The final batch size will be determined by IndieGoGo Sales.
To begin we have 200 SnowPi and will be adding more in as these sell. Ones after this 200 will have later delivery estimates (January - Feburary depending on demand).
Currently we have prototype PCBs on order and one of the components to make sure they arrive on time and pass quality control.

Why Indiegogo?

We've come to Indiegogo to fund the project. We've been busy developing other projects alongside this and want to get this out in time for Christmas.
We've used Indiegogo instead of the other popular fundraising site as it allows us to use 3D Renderings of the product. This allows us to get the product to you as quickly as possible while waiting for prototypes to arrive.
Finally over the last year we have been working lots on expanding our product range and have launched 2 products and now stock 50 products more. 

Who are we?


We are Ryanteck LTD. A small business that has been operating for 2 years and are now based at Great Yarmouth. 
This is our 5th Fundraiser and we have experience and systems in place ready for bulk shipping and production. While using fundraising less we think for this product it's the best way to get SnowPi out into the wild as quick as possible.

The Risks & Delivery Dates:

While we will try our very best to get this out as quickly as possible we also are not planning to send you a non working product. If we have any errors in the prototype we will take longer but ship you a working product.
Other fundraisers I have backed have either arrived unfinished, with faults, very late or not at all.
We're only estimating that the first 150 snowman will arrive by the end of December. We are hoping to get more out but don't want to over-predict and have lots arrive late.
As with any fundraiser we have done we will keep you informed the throughout. If we get prototypes in we'll let you know. If a LED, that we need has arrived we will let you know. The same also happens for issues. If there's any delays we will let you know.
Finally the postage system:
We have until the 10th of December to ship international orders for them to arrive by Christmas. Due to this we are not guaranteeing any Christmas delivery. However a majority of shipments should arrive 7 days after shipment.
We have until the 19th of December to ship the UK orders for them to arrive in time. While we are planning to have the shipments stating December delivery to ship in time however this is not guaranteed. 
Of course if there are delays then the project will be delayed along with the postal service experiencing a higher load.


Other FAQs

Why only 3D Renderings of the product?

We've got prototypes on the way but they will take 2-3 weeks to arrive. To try and get this out in time for the Christmas season  we need to start raising the funds while we wait for prototypes to arrive.

Will SnowPi Work?

Yes! Apart from the usual failure risks for any product we will not ship SnowPi until it works.

What do I need to assemble SnowPi?

You'll require a soldering iron, solder & other accessories. We stock a great kit on our website here. If you're a backer of SnowPi we will send you a discount code that can be used on the Iron.

Will SnowPi work on my Raspberry Pi Model X?

SnowPi will work on all Raspberry Pi models except the compute module. We have gone for the 26 pin header which makes it compatible with both the original Pis and the newer pis.
story_txt:
SnowPi the snowmanThe Festive Soldering & GPIO KitSnowPi was successfully funded and can be ordered via our website.Who is SnowPi the snowman?SnowPi is one of the latest products from us at Ryanteck LTD. and is designed to be a fun kit to solder up and learn GPIO programming with the Raspberry Pi.The kit comprises a PCB, 9 LEDs, a Raspberry Pi GPIO Header and a Resistor ladder.All are reasonably easy to solder for a beginner.SnowPi will also include a step by step soldering guide and a Programming with GPIO Zero Guide which will be available online.About SnowPiThe PCB will plug on-top of your Raspberry Pi with a right angled header so will stand up. We are in the process of sourcing LEDs. The colours will be:2 Crystal Blue LEDS for the Eyes.1 Orange Diffused LED for the Nose6 Crystal White LEDs for the body.What can I code SnowPi in?SnowPi has no complex circuitry, driver ICs or libraries required to code. It's as simple as blinking an LED off or on.This makes it possible to code with every language on the Raspberry Pi that uses GPIO. Programming languages include C using Wiring Pi, Java using Pi4J, Scratch using either NuScratch or Scratch GPIO and most commonly Python using either RPi.GPIO or the new GPIO Zero.What are we fundraising?We're fundraising to make a production batch of SnowPi. The final batch size will be determined by IndieGoGo Sales.To begin we have 200 SnowPi and will be adding more in as these sell. Ones after this 200 will have later delivery estimates (January - Feburary depending on demand).Currently we have prototype PCBs on order and one of the components to make sure they arrive on time and pass quality control.Why Indiegogo?We've come to Indiegogo to fund the project. We've been busy developing other projects alongside this and want to get this out in time for Christmas.We've used Indiegogo instead of the other popular fundraising site as it allows us to use 3D Renderings of the product. This allows us to get the product to you as quickly as possible while waiting for prototypes to arrive.Finally over the last year we have been working lots on expanding our product range and have launched 2 products and now stock 50 products more. Who are we?


We are Ryanteck LTD. A small business that has been operating for 2 years and are now based at Great Yarmouth. This is our 5th Fundraiser and we have experience and systems in place ready for bulk shipping and production. While using fundraising less we think for this product it's the best way to get SnowPi out into the wild as quick as possible.The Risks & Delivery Dates:While we will try our very best to get this out as quickly as possible we also are not planning to send you a non working product. If we have any errors in the prototype we will take longer but ship you a working product.
Other fundraisers I have backed have either arrived unfinished, with faults, very late or not at all.We're only estimating that the first 150 snowman will arrive by the end of December. We are hoping to get more out but don't want to over-predict and have lots arrive late.As with any fundraiser we have done we will keep you informed the throughout. If we get prototypes in we'll let you know. If a LED, that we need has arrived we will let you know. The same also happens for issues. If there's any delays we will let you know.Finally the postage system:We have until the 10th of December to ship international orders for them to arrive by Christmas. Due to this we are not guaranteeing any Christmas delivery. However a majority of shipments should arrive 7 days after shipment.We have until the 19th of December to ship the UK orders for them to arrive in time. While we are planning to have the shipments stating December delivery to ship in time however this is not guaranteed. Of course if there are delays then the project will be delayed along with the postal service experiencing a higher load.Other FAQsWhy only 3D Renderings of the product?We've got prototypes on the way but they will take 2-3 weeks to arrive. To try and get this out in time for the Christmas season  we need to start raising the funds while we wait for prototypes to arrive.Will SnowPi Work?Yes! Apart from the usual failure risks for any product we will not ship SnowPi until it works.What do I need to assemble SnowPi?You'll require a soldering iron, solder & other accessories. We stock a great kit on our website here. If you're a backer of SnowPi we will send you a discount code that can be used on the Iron.Will SnowPi work on my Raspberry Pi Model X?SnowPi will work on all Raspberry Pi models except the compute module. We have gone for the 26 pin header which makes it compatible with both the original Pis and the newer pis.

story:
Functionality 

Mobile OS: Dual-boots Android 8.0 and Windows 10.

Desktop OS: Windows 10

Internal storage: 500GB

RAM: 16GB

Protection: Sapphire Glass Screen/ Titanium Back Plate

Connectivity: Dual-LTE, GSM LTE, GSM LTE, GSM

Speakers: Stereo Surround Sound 4k Cinema

Battery: Silicon-anode Li-ion

What is the Android X?

In the car industry, Formula 1 provides a commercial test bed for cutting-edge technologies. The Android X project aims to do the same for the mobile phone industry -- to provide a low-volume, high-technology platform, crowdfunded by enthusiasts and mobile computing professionals. A pioneering project that accelerates the adoption of new technologies and drives them down into the mainstream.

This beautifully crafted smartphone is a proving ground for the most advanced mobile technologies on the horizon, a showpiece for true mobile innovation. And at the heart of it all is convergence: connect to any monitor and this Android X phone transforms into an Windows 10 PC, with a fully integrated desktop OS and shared access to all files. We’re fascinated by converged computing, the idea that the smartphone in your pocket can also be the brain of the PC on your desk. We’ve shaped the Android X so you can transition seamlessly between the two environments. Now all that’s needed is a phone that’s designed from the ground up to be a PC as well. The Android X is our very own superphone, a catalyst to drive the next generation of personal computing.

The Hardware

We’ve scoured the research labs of the biggest companies and most exciting startups for the latest and greatest mobile technologies to specify the first-generation X. Crafted from cool, textured titanium metal, the Android X has a distinctive, and very precise look. Gestures are the next big thing in mobile, and our testing has found that a 4.7in screen is ideal for comfortable control of all four corners with one hand.

We also believe the race for ever higher resolution has become a distraction. Beyond 400ppi you’re adding overhead rather than improving display clarity. We think color, brightness and dynamic range are now the edge of invention so we’ll choose a display for its balance of resolution, dynamic range and colour accuracy. We’ll protect that gorgeous display with something vastly tougher than glass: pure sapphire crystal, a material so hard only diamond could scratch it. For a phone to run a full desktop OS, it must have the raw power of a PC. We’ll choose the fastest available multi-core processor, at least 16GB of RAM and a massive 500GB of storage. The battery will use silicon-anode technology, so we can squeeze more energy into the same dimensions.

With that kind of muscle, this phone can be your main PC anywhere -- and we really do mean anywhere. You can use the desktop wherever you can find a standard HDMI screen, and the dual-LTE chip will get you online with 4G even when you’re travelling abroad. It’s desktop computing gone truly mobile.

The Dual Software

The Next-generation hardware deserves innovative software. The Android X will dual-boot both the Windows 10 phone OS and Android 8.0, and convert into a fully integrated Windows 10 desktop PC. 

 From mobile... to desktop. Yes, it’s the full Windows 10 desktop OS used by millions on a daily basis -- and it runs directly from the phone, so you’ll be able to move seamlessly from one environment to the other with no file syncing or transfers required. The core OS and applications are fully integrated with their smartphone equivalents, so you can even make and receive calls from the desktop while you work.

Our Roll-Out Plan

As well as being a bonus for app developers and anyone with a big Android app collection, including Android on the phone means we’re able to offer full convergence at launch.

Then shortly after we ship your phone, we’ll push out a free software update that adds this desktop integration to Windows 10 mobile as well. That’s the real goal we’re working towards. At that point you’ll have a leading-edge smartphone that runs both Windows 10 and Android 8.0, both of which can also run a fully integrated WIndows 10 desktop OS. What other phone can match that? 

However you choose to use The Android X, the incredible components will keep it running fast and fresh as our software evolves. We’ll push out monthly Android and Windows software updates, as they become available, to add features and polish, and we guarantee to keep supporting the phone for ten years. 

For Software Developers

 HTML5 apps written for other platforms can be brought over to Android with ease, and any web property can quickly be adapted to run as a web app, with its own icon and access to system services. For richer applications, use our QML toolkit for amazingly productive high-performance engineering.

But best of all, using the Android SDK you can write and upload a single native application that has desktop, tablet and phone interfaces. It’s a developer’s dream.

All The Technical Specs

Dual boot WIndows 10 mobile OS and Android 8.0

Fully integrated WIndows 10 desktop PC when docked

Fastest multi-core CPU, 16GB RAM, 500GB storage

Micro-SIM

4.7in 1,280 x 720 HD sapphire crystal display

14mp low-light rear camera, 12mp front camera

Dual-LTE, dual-band 802.11n Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4, NFC

GPS, accelerometer, gyro, proximity sensor, compass, barometer

Stereo speakers with HD audio, dual-mic recording, Active Noise Cancellation

11-pin connector providing simultaneous MHL and USB OTG

2, 3.0 USB Ports

3.5mm jack

Silicon-anode Li-Ion battery.

Our Journey

We've been through a long creative process, from early concepts and sketches to 3D wireframes and a variety of test handsets. It's all led us to the beautiful Andriod X prototype.

 The Android X is an exclusive production run, available only through Indiegogo. All of the funding we receive goes directly towards producing the device for expected delivery in October 2018. 

A lot of people around the world have collaborated to get us this far. We have a beautiful prototype Android X handset, we have advanced Android and WIndows software running across phone and desktop, we have experienced operators and manufacturing partners in place, and we have incredibly talented and passionate people to put it all together.

All we need now is you.

Risks and Challenges

Although our core business is software for PCs and the cloud, we know the phone industry pretty well too. We’ve been working with manufacturers and carriers, so everything we need is already in place. We also have a team based in China where the bulk of the production will occur; and we have engineers around the world who have built this kind of product before. We’re well prepared for the journey ahead.

And it is going to be a journey. We’ve set such a high crowdfunding target for a good reason. Between design, certification and manufacture, the costs of building a new phone are huge -- but the more we produce, the lower the final cost of each handset. Setting such an ambitious target means a more competitive price per device.

Finally, the very nature of this concept device means the exact component list is fluid until we enter production to ensure we’re picking the best available part at the time. If we are forced to change a major feature or component, we’ll come up with something just as innovative to replace it. If you’ve backed us, you’ll be kept right up to date.

story:
Unlike other micro suction technologies our trademarked synthetic setae™ technology is biologically inspired. Like its inspiration, the gecko, It sticks to nearly any flat surface. This enables incredible versatility.

From your Nintendo switch, to picture frames, to your musical.ly dedicated iPhone ... you can stik nearly anything with flipstik

 

flipstik comes in a variety of designs and collections, strech goals have already been unlocked!

"Design is not just what it looks like and how it feels. Design is how it works"

Flipstik’s incredible capabilities are possible because of our Synthetic Setae™ which mimics the organic setae hairs of the gecko. This is done using biomimetics or biomimicry. Nature is perfectly engineered, so at flipstik™ study nature to solve complex human problems.  

Did you know the tiny hooks on bur fruits inspired velcro tape?  Synthetic Setae™ raises the stakes to a whole new level.

We are a team of designers and tinkerers (and a NASA engineer) (Thx Uncle Chris). We believe in sustainable solutions for life's challenges. For us, sustainability means equitable business practices that never forget stakeholders and celebrate diversity. U.S. corporations avg 6 Trillion in net profits every year. If every corporation pledged just 3%, we could raise $180 Billion dollars. Every. Single.Year. To solve issues like poverty, cancer, addiction, education, and environmental challenges like the ones affecting the gecko’s natural habitat: Rainforests. As of 2010 the avg total corporate donations (U.S.) were only $16 Billion. We pledge that 3% of our net profits will be donated to charity, forever. Find out more at www.itjusttakes3.org 

All Graphics Copyright © Flipstik LLC 2018.

contact for Trademark and Patent Information | legal@getflipstik.com

story:
Hello,

On behalf of myself and TK-F-L-A aka Tom Kennedy, please let me say a very hearty thank you and a bless you (!) for contributing to the fledging Top Knotch Tommy Kennedy 9-Ball Tour live at Indiegogo.com. While the tour remains a gleam in our eyes we are working to further the cause of professional pool around the U.S.

If you ordered a signed book as your perk it is on the way along with signatures from Tom and me to add the front page. Regardless of your level of contribution, I'd also like to say thank you by offering you a free pool lesson either here in Gainesville, Florida or nearby your neck of the woods during my travels. I start at $250 per lesson but want you to enjoy some pool improvement "on the house" as our way of saying a hearty thank you for supporting TK and his marvelous work. Promoting Christian faith in the marketplace of ideas is difficult, at work even more so, and most of all at pool tours. Tommy and I will not gamble at pool even to entering Calcutta events. This limits our income but furthers our Christian witness that Jesus as promised long beforehand came, died and rose again so that whoever trusts Him has eternal life.

While many of the pool pros are of a different faith or agnostic or atheist, they all respect TK as he runs tournaments consistent with his trust in God. Pros know they will get a fair "break" at his events even if Tom is competing against them in the same event! We are doing what we can to make pool a safer, more enjoyable sport so that young people can be comfortably involved, and families, insuring the future of this sport.

Again, please let me thank you heartily for your help and support. We appreciate you--and so does pool and pool pros everywhere! I want to see you in Gainesville or at your place soon for a lesson and some fun fellowship.

Thank you! --
Matt Sherman
Guide to Pool and Billiards, About.com
Instruction Staff, InsidePool Magazine
Author, Book & DVD, Picture Yourself Shooting Pool

**

Dear IndieGoGo Contributor,

Did you know 30 million people play billiards in the United States alone? I'm Tommy Kennedy, known in poolrooms worldwide as TK, the youngest-ever and sole unranked winner when crowned the U.S. Open 9-Ball Champion in Chesapeake, Virginia. I beat the #2 player in the world then the #1 player 9-games-to-1 in the final match, in one of the greatest upsets in billiards history--I was barely “a kid” then as you can see in the photo below.

I’ve won nearly 200 professional-level tournaments, been ranked as high as 4th worldwide, and during my career I’ve defeated 99% of the world's top pool pros. I currently live in Florida, six-time Florida Champion and a record five-time Florida Circuit Player of the Year.

As important, I know tournament play as longtime tournament director and marketer for the Southeast Open 9-Ball Tour, where peers voted me Sportsman of the Year. I perform juggling and trick shots for the crowd and form a rapport with players and fans as a person of faith and integrity.

I’m partnering with Matt Sherman, who runs one of the world's most popular pool websites at Billiards.About.com, with over 50 million people reading About articles monthly. Between us, we bring over 75 years of playing, coaching and teaching experience to the sport.

Our dream is to host a uniquely styled pocket billiards tour, the Top Knotch 9-Ball Tour, with 9 regular tour stops plus a huge 10th event to cap the tour year. We've reached out to friends, and these top players say they're poised for this tour.  Here's why top players (and even amateurs!) are excited about the TKTOUR...

Little Money/Big Money:
Pool has rich potential (think of how many commercials, films and books you've seen recently that use pool) but lacks the big purses that make golf and tennis sustainable for their playing professionals. Currently the world's best players work hard to collect a few thousand dollars—if that—after defeating 30 to 200 or more pros over days to a week of competition. Imagine being one of the top 100 players in the world, playing the other 99, coming in 10th, and earning just a few hundred dollars, barely enough to pay your flight and hotel to get to the next competition. Now imagine the TKTOUR, where amateurs and pros go on equal footing for amazing rewards!

A "Knotch" Above:
Pool tournaments take entry fees from players minus expenses to create modest cash prizes. Each of the first 9 TKTOUR tournaments will be $10,000 U.S. added, meaning a bonus $10,000 is added to the usual prize dollars. The world's finest professionals tell us they'll definitely join theTKTOUR.

The Big Finish:
The 10th and final tournament will be the $100,000 Top Knotch Championship with $10,000 added AND a $100,000 payout to top finishers including $40,000 for the victor. The more a player participates by playing in the first 9 tournaments and the more "knotches" a player earns by finishing high in the first 9 tournaments, the higher their seed in the $100,000 Championship, be they the world's best pro or an enthusiastic amateur. With the opportunity to win an added $40,000, as much as months or a year of regular play, all 10 TKTOUR events will be attended by top professionals from across North America and overseas, the amateurs who want to challenge them, and the fans who want to watch the action ringside.

Our Pledge:
Matt and I and our families pledge to make the TKTOUR successful. We promise IndieGoGo contributors that we shall as in the past honor Jesus Christ with tournaments where families feel comfortable attending, and where pros find fair and honest competition.

Next Steps:
The $100,000 prize will help draw media attention and change the face of the sport. Matt and I and our "posse" are connected to some of the largest billiards equipment manufacturers and distributors, including the largest and most prominent table providers, who will help set tables for play, provide door prizes and incentives for players and fans ringside, and more. The TKTOUR will be streamed live and promoted online and offline. We are certain of success, but if we fall short of the $250,000 mark we will honor all IndieGoGo perks and adjust the tour, for example, by making a 5-event tour with 4 tournaments then a 5th championship event. Likewise, we will honor perks and also provide more money to tournaments if we get over-funded.

Thank You!

Our sincere and heartfelt thanks to IndieGoGo donors at all levels. We pledge to do whatever it takes so donors and sponsors feel appreciated and a "knotch" above. To Jesus be the glory, He died for our sin and He rose again, so that trusting Him we receive eternal life. We'll see you on tour!

**Thanks also for sharing the TKTOUR using IndieGoGo tools and social marketing.**
