10th event to cap the tour year. We've reached out to friends, and these top players say they're poised for this tour.  Here's why top players (and even amateurs!) are excited about the TKTOUR...Little Money/Big Money:Pool has rich potential
(think of how many commercials, films and books you've seen recently 
that use pool) but lacks the big purses that make golf and tennis 
sustainable for
their playing professionals. Currently the world's best players work hard to collect a few thousand dollars—if that—after defeating 30 to 200 or more pros over days to a week of competition. Imagine being one of the top 100 players in the world, playing the other 99, coming in 10th, and earning just a few hundred dollars, barely enough to pay your flight and hotel to get to the next competition. Now imagine the TKTOUR, where amateurs and pros go on equal footing for amazing rewards!A "Knotch" Above:Pool tournaments take entry fees from players minus expenses to create modest cash prizes. Each of the first 9 TKTOUR tournaments will be $10,000 U.S. added,
 meaning a bonus $10,000 is added to the usual prize dollars. The 
world's finest professionals tell us they'll definitely join theTKTOUR.The Big Finish:The 10th and final tournament will be the $100,000 Top Knotch Championship with $10,000 added AND a $100,000 payout to top finishers including $40,000 for the victor. The more a player participates by playing in the first 9 tournaments and the more "knotches" a player earns by finishing high in the first 9 tournaments, the higher their seed in the $100,000 Championship, be they the world's best pro or an enthusiastic amateur. With the opportunity to win an added $40,000, as much as months or a year of regular play, all 10 TKTOUR events will be attended by top professionals from across North America and overseas, the amateurs who want to challenge them, and the fans who want to watch the action ringside.Our Pledge:Matt and I and our families pledge to make the TKTOUR successful. We promise IndieGoGo contributors that we shall as in the past honor Jesus Christ with tournaments where families feel
comfortable attending, and where pros find fair and 
honest
competition.Next Steps:The $100,000 prize will help draw media attention and change the face of the sport. Matt and I and our "posse" are connected to some of the largest billiards equipment manufacturers and distributors, including the largest and most prominent table providers, who will help set tables for play, provide
door prizes and incentives for players and fans ringside, and more. The TKTOUR will
be streamed live and promoted online and offline. We are certain of success, but if we fall short of the $250,000 mark we will
honor all IndieGoGo perks and adjust the tour, for
example, by making a 5-event tour with 4 tournaments then a 5th championship event. Likewise, we will honor perks and also provide more money to tournaments if we get over-funded.Thank You!Our sincere and heartfelt thanks to IndieGoGo donors at all levels. We pledge
to do whatever it takes so donors and sponsors feel appreciated and a "knotch" above. To Jesus be the glory, He died for our sin and He rose again, so that trusting Him we receive eternal life. We'll see you on tour!
**Thanks also for sharing the TKTOUR using IndieGoGo tools and social marketing.**

story:
Traduction française en dessous/French version below

What is ThePhoneCoat? 

ThePhoneCoat is made from a high density protection film. Nanotechnology is incorporated inside to increase the quality and the resistance of the raw material to ultimately deliver the best protection. It works like a second skin for your smartphone, your watch, your tablet, computer and even more.

ThePhoneCoat protection is auto-healing. All shocks, abrasions and daily scratches disappear. Our technology is designed to absorb shocks and prevent damages. It is ultra thin (0.2mm) for a maximal comfort. 

With ThePhoneCoat you will discover again your device in its purest state.

Why is ThePhoneCoat so great? 

                           

Featured in : 

        
           

Easy to install

Every inch counts!

Almost invisible...

Improved grip for less drop

 ThePhoneCoat vs the rest

Crash test time!

Auto Healing test 
We used a metalic brush to visibly scratch our protection. Then we used a hairdryer to accelerate the regenerating processus. (The video wasn’t speed up)

Impact protection
A classic screen protection does not resist neither to a fall nor a violent shock (like a hammer shock). ThePhoneCoat protection is shockproof ! it will preserve your phone from being damaged.

A real unbreakable second skin
We used a sander machine to test the abrasion resistance. After few seconds we pilled off the protection and the screen was not damage at all.

Rewards 



Want to be sure our protection covers your device ? Find your device on thephonecoat.com

Stretch Goals

 The Team

Who never broke down his smartphone ? Like you we did! That's why we started considering this issue to find a true and sustainable solution. 
Looking around existing protections, we never found one resistant enough, combining design and reliability. The challenge was then: "are we able to find a smart and long-lasting protection for our smartphone? 

The next question was « How can we keep the original design of our lovely smartphones ? ».
Therefore we focused our research on the thinest, most resistant materials but also able to preserve the look and feel of your smartphone. A true « second skin ».

We are happy to share with you our new protection : Second Skin by ThePhoneCoat, designed and mastered to bring back the real look and feel of your smartphone whilst sustainably protecting it for long !

What does our timeline looks like ?

 

At the end of the campaign, we will send you a survey to finalize your contribution. We aim to finalize all shipping by mid-July 2018.

We don't anticipate any issues with this timeline. However, if anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during and after the campaign. 

Development & Prototype

We took time to study, measure, calculate the dimensions. Because each device is different we had to restart this process for each protection. The hardest part was to find a solution to cover the frame and we’ve done a lot of attempts. We’ve finally found the right process to create ultimate protections for all devices. 

 Installation Tutorial

About ThePhoneCoat

We founded ThePhoneCoat to protect your smartphone with an invisible, self-regenerating shield. Our ambition is to create a strong brand in smartphones and connected devices protection. As technological innovation continues, we will enrich our catalog regularly with new solutions for your devices.

www.thephonecoat.com

Retailer, distributor or larger quantities?

We want to hear from you! Contact us directly at hello@thephonecoat.com

Qu'est-ce que ThePhoneCoat ?

Second Skin by ThePhoneCoat est conçu à partir d’un film de protection ultra résistant. Une nano-technologie est incorporée pour améliorer la qualité et la résistance de notre matière première pour obtenir la meilleure protection. Une réelle seconde peau pour vos smartphones, tablettes, ordinateurs et montres connectées.

Notre protection est auto-régénérante. Les chocs, rayures et frottements fait au quotidien seront absorbés et disparaitront. Notre protection est étudiée pour résister à tout types de chocs et prévenir vos appareils d'une éventuelle casse. Elle est ultra fine (0,2mm) et presque invisible pour un confort maximal.

Avec ThePhoneCoat, redécouvrez le design de votre smartphone à l'état brut.

                            

Pourquoi ThePhoneCoat est fait pour vous ? 

                           
  

Facile à installer

 Chaque millimètre compte !

 Presque invisible...

 Surface adhérente pour limiter la chute

ThePhoneCoat vs les autres protections 

C'est l'heure du Crash Test !

Résistance aux chocs
Vous pouvez observez ci-dessous la différence entre une protection classique (type verre trempé) qui ne résiste pas à un choc violent (ex: coup de marteau-comparable à une chute de 1,2 m de haut) et notre produit ThePhoneCoat qui protègera votre smartphone de la plupart des chocs et des chutes du même type.

Auto-régénérante
Nous avons utilisé une brosse métallique pour faire de profondes rayures sur la protection ThePhoneCoat. Ensuite, nous avons envoyé de l’air chaud avec un sèche-cheveux pour voir le processus de régénération et cicatrisation à l'oeil nu (la vidéo n’a pas été accélérée).

Une seconde peau incassable 
Nous avons utilisé une ponceuse pour tester la résistance aux frottements violents. Après quelques secondes, nous avons retiré la protection pour vous montrer que l’écran est resté intact. ThePhoneCoat est une réelle seconde peau protectrice pour votre smartphone !

Contributions

Vous souhaitez vous assurer que nous couvrons votre appareil ? Consulter notre catalogue sur thephonecoat.com

 Les objectifs ciblés

L'équipe

Qui n’a jamais cassé/abimé son smartphone ? Nous les premières ! C’est pourquoi nous avons réfléchi à une vraie solution durable. 

Nous n'avons jamais réussi à trouver une protection résistante alliant esthétique et fiabilité. Pour cette raison, nous avons imaginé et conçu une solution durable pour protéger nos smartphones. Cette seconde peau, modulable devait également s’adapter à votre smartphone.

Nous avons pensé à mille et une façons pour satisfaire ce besoin afin de retrouver le design originel de votre smartphone. Nous avons orienté nos recherches sur des matériaux ultra-fins qui protègent au plus près vos objets connectés.

Nous sommes heureuses de vous faire découvrir aujourd’hui notre nouvelle protection : Second skin by ThePhoneCoat étudiée et modélisée pour rendre le design originel de votre smartphone tout en le protégeant.

 Quelles sont les prochaines étapes ?

À la fin de la campagne, nous vous enverrons un formulaire pour finaliser votre achat. Nous espérons finir les envois pour mi-juillet 2018.

En cas d'éventuels imprévus, nous vous tiendrons informé de l'avancement de notre projet tout au long de la campagne.

 Développement & prototype

Chaque smartphone étant unique et différent, nous avons pris le temps d'adapter notre produit à tout vos appareils. Plusieurs phases de prototypages ont été nécessaires à la découverte de la meilleure couverture possible en terme de dimension et de cadrage.

 Tutoriel d'installation

À propos de ThePhoneCoat

Nous avons créé ThePhonecoat pour protéger votre smartphone avec une armure invisible et auto-régénérante.
Nous continuons d'ajouter des modèles à notre catalogue pour que vous trouviez celui qui vous convient le mieux. Notre ambition est de créer une marque de protection pour tout vos téléphones et vos objets connectés.
Nous travaillerons sur de nouveaux produits après cette campagne pour être sûrs de toujours pouvoir matcher avec vos attentes.

www.thephonecoat.com

Revendeurs, distributeurs ou besoin d'un plus grand nombre de protection ?

Contactez-nous directement à hello@thephonecoat.com

story:
Our Website:

https://gabbwireless.com/

Our account creation form for our national launch will be posted on September 10th, 2019. 

Gabb Wants to Provide Parents More Options

Stephen (founder/father) and Landon (young business guy/father) are not okay with the current way technology is being introduced to children:

  • We are not doctors, but you don't need to be a doctor to see the impact on kids, when technology (a cell phone) is introduced too early
  • Stephen came up with this idea when looking for a phone for his 12 year old son
  • Contributions will help us to bring this product to the whole nation

Disclaimer: The Gabb Wireless logo and Gabb colors have been added to this image. It is for representative purposes only, however all apps present in this image are currently functioning on our prototype. 

The Gabb Phone

See additional images on the campaign to see photography of the device and in-use functionality.

 

Perks

     

    What We Need & What You Get

    We need $ to pay for FCC approval and to show the big investors that this is really a problem (somehow they don't see it yet):

    • We are raising a minimum of $50k to show potential and introduce Gabb into some states
    • We need at least $100k if we hope to launch Nationwide
    • Money raised will go towards FCC regulatory costs, registering legally in each state and manufacturing costs

    The Timeline

     

    How Does Gabb Compare?

    The Impact

    If we are successful we can provide a solution to kids and parents. We can create a great way to introduce a phone without all the negative behaviors associated with that task. 

     

    Risks & Challenges

    Building a phone network is not easy, however, we know what it takes:

    • In order to offer our phones across the country we must get approval from the FCC on a state by state basis (reason for our indiegogo). This process is detailed in our timeline section
    • If we do not get enough support via the Indegogo we will not be able to bring this product to market
    • We have worked with one of the top phone manufacturers (ZTE) in order to provide the highest quality phone
    • We are only accepting pledges (with a phone reward) from individuals in the United States
    • Due to the restrictions made to the phone, our phones CANNOT be utilized on other service providers (not a risk, but important to understand)

     

    Gabb Wireless Network

    The Gabb Plan

    The Gabb Service

    No long-term contracts

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We need more kids, parents and those passionate about this cause to know there are other options:

    • Please share our YouTube video on your social media videos with the #FirstPhone hashtag
    • Share this indiegogo with parents that you feel would be interested in this product

    Thank you for your support!

story:
Short Summary

Thank you for taking your time to watch our video. We have been working on this project for the past year and can't be more excited to bring it to Indiegogo and show the world what we envision with our new smart alarm application OnTime. With you support we will be able to move forward from the product design to the software programming and bring to you a great tool for the use of our daily lives.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $200,000. With this money we can develop the application software for iOS and advertise our new application. Furthermore, we would be able to pay to start building the software for the Android.

Check out our perks! The personalized accessories will give your iPhone or iPad a unique look with the OnTime logo, your name and a message that will read, "I supported the OnTime campaign,"

If we do not reach our $200,000 goal we will start to build the app for iOS and do our best to advertise the application ourselves. Any money that is contributed to our campaign will be used wisely and only for the use of the development of the software.

The Impact

The OnTime application was designed for everyone. We all live very busy lives trying to get everything done on time and trying to stretch the minutes to avoid being tardy, but we all know that might not always be possible without help. 

The application will help you, by alerting you in advance of any traffic delays that may put you behind schedule or late for work or school. I strongly believe this application will be a great contribution in keeping every one safer while on the highway. How is this possible? By giving you a "heads up" of what traffic looks like and giving you notice of  the extra minutes to leave before, you will not have to rush your way your destination.


Other Ways You Can Help

If this isn't a good time to contribute monetary, please help by spreading the word with your family, colleagues, and friends.

Use the Indiegogo share tools to turn your friends and family on to this cool new application that will help everyone be OnTime!!

Thank you for your time

The OnTime Crew,

Tayde Pantoja, Jesse Pantoja and Jordan Cisneros

story:
Introduction to Power Soccer Hayward

Imagine a soccer ball flying around an indoor court propelled by athletes using power wheelchairs. Kicking the ball across the court, wheelchairs spinning, the frenzied activity of a great game. 

This is what we do at Power Soccer Hayward – a part of the worldwide Power Soccer community. We create opportunities for people with disabilities to become athletes. And like all sports, we do it with the help of our families and communities. 

Power soccer is an exciting sport, similar to indoor soccer. The sport involves strategy, teamwork, and intense competition – not to mention fun.  Each player uses a metal footguard attached to the front of their wheelchair to kick the ball, generally spinning the chair to get good momentum on the ball. There are 3 forwards and 1 goalie on each team, with players passing the ball up the court to each other.  
 
Power soccer has developed in several different countries over the past 30 years, but 2012 marks the first time that Hayward had a team. We now have ten people with disabilities interested in playing power soccer in Hayward, ranging in age from 14 to 60, most being young women aged 18-22.

What We Need & What You Get

YOU make the difference for our athletes. Your support allows us to take someone from non-athlete to world-class athlete or anywhere in between. With the proper resources, each athlete is limited only by their commitment and drive.

We need your help to get our team off the ground.

We need materials and funds to make metal soccer footguards (to kick those balls across the court), gym time (to practice), tires and batteries (we burn through them quickly), uniforms (we need to look like a team), and travel expenses (to improve our skills with games against other teams).

Our goal is $1,000, and we ask you to donate $100 if you can, or $5 if that's what works for you! If we don't reach our goal, we will use whatever we raise to start making guards, and we will continue fundraising.

Be a part of our power soccer community! With your donation, you can get:

  • a signed photo of our team
  • a t-shirt
  • a chance to try out power soccer yourself!
  • our eternal gratitude!

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us spread this campaign!

  • Post a link on facebook.
  • Talk to your friends and neighbors.
  • Come check out a practice and see for yourself!

THANK YOU!

Introduction to Power Soccer Hayward
Imagine a soccer ball flying around an indoor court propelled by athletes using power wheelchairs. Kicking the ball across the court, wheelchairs spinning, the frenzied activity of a great game. 
This is what we do at Power Soccer Hayward – a part of the worldwide Power Soccer community. We create opportunities for people with disabilities to become athletes. And like all sports, we do it with the help of our families and communities. 

Power soccer is an exciting sport, similar to indoor soccer. The sport involves strategy, teamwork, and intense competition – not to mention fun.  Each player uses a metal footguard attached to the front of their wheelchair to kick the ball, generally spinning the chair to get good momentum on the ball. There are 3 forwards and 1 goalie on each team, with players passing the ball up the court to each other.  
 
Power soccer has developed in several different countries over the past 30 years, but 2012 marks the first time that Hayward had a team. We now have ten people with disabilities interested in playing power soccer in Hayward, ranging in age from 14 to 60, most being young women aged 18-22.

What We Need & What You Get
YOU make the difference for our athletes. Your support allows us to take someone from non-athlete to world-class athlete or anywhere in between. With the proper resources, each athlete is limited only by their commitment and drive.
We need your help to get our team off the ground.
We need materials and funds to make metal soccer footguards (to kick those balls across the court), gym time (to practice), tires and batteries (we burn through them quickly), uniforms (we need to look like a team), and travel expenses (to improve our skills with games against other teams).
Our goal is $1,000, and we ask you to donate $100 if you can, or $5 if that's what works for you! If we don't reach our goal, we will use whatever we raise to start making guards, and we will continue fundraising.
Be a part of our power soccer community! With your donation, you can get:

a signed photo of our team
a t-shirt
a chance to try out power soccer yourself!
our eternal gratitude!



Other Ways You Can Help
Help us spread this campaign!

Post a link on facebook.
Talk to your friends and neighbors.
Come check out a practice and see for yourself!


THANK YOU!

story:
The Summary

myMission is a mobile app that will forever alter how every missionary communicates across the world. 

My name is Michael Darr and I am a missionary working to share Christ with people groups around the world. My organization, WorldSong, is run by missionaries for missionaries. I have been working with mission workers for the past quarter of a century, with everything from short-term missionaries across the globe to long-term engagements through organizations like Wycliffe who work in remote regions of the world. I was there when the only form of communication available was mass mailings and newsletters, but as our world has gone digital, the avenues available to missionaries across the globe have radically changed. Now each missionary has a wealth of digital options to both communicate and receive funding from those back home invested in his or her mission. I want to streamline their communication and enable them to stay engaged with even more supporters through the app.

The Need & What You Get

  • The Need: WorldSong needs to raise $92,000 to fund this ground breaking app.  This will cover completing the app development, maintenance, upgrades and other related expenses, enabling us to support missionary communications around the globe. 
  • What you get: In return for your generosity and support, WorldSong is offering some great perks! Everything from small reminders to pray for your missionaries to sponsorship and advertising opportunities for individuals, corporations or in memoriam. 
  • The Contingency: WorldSong is using the flexible funding campaign through IndieGoGo which means we are able to use any amount that we raise. The priority will be funding the app development followed by other additional expenses as they occur.  

The Details

My passion is to support those around the world that are spreading the Gospel and reaching communities for Christ. Serving both full time missionaries as well as those on short-term assignments

myMission takes all the portals a missionary uses to communicate their heart, story, and need and puts them into one convenient location; a simple elegant mobile app. myMission collects the mission worker's Facebook timeline, Twitter feed, YouTube, videos, pictures, blogs, giving portal, blog, and their opportunities network. All of these will be easily managed through a website that the mission worker sets up with their profile in order to manage their links. This app is the first time anything has ever put all of these sources and information into one simple and usable location.  We project the myMission app will be launched by spring of 2014.

Join us in getting the word out!

If myMission is going to move forward and become reality, then this Indiegogo campaign needs to go viral.  This will only happen when you post this campaign on your Facebook timeline and Twitter feed.  Don't just contribute dollars, let's move forward the message together.  Encourage your friends and family to watch the video and give to this effort.  This app must be in the hands of those that work for mission agencies like The Navigators, Campus Crusade, YWAM, Wycliffe, Adventures in Mission and World Race.  Church denominations and universities that send missionaries to the field need this app.  Short term mission teams need this app.  There are literally hundreds of thousands of missionaries communicationg to millions of their friends and family every year.  The time is now, so let's seize this moment together

If you have any ideas or questions about the app or this Indiegogo campaign please contact me immediately via Email. I look forward to our dialogue.

Thank you for supporting myMission and getting behind this initiative.

I also want to thank Innovative Faith Resources and their team for making the myMission dream a reality through their work on this campaign.  Amazing job team!

And a special shout out to Noah Norooz, the video dude. In the Philippines and here in the United States. We love your work!

story:
Risks and challenges

SUBTECH SPORTS has several years of experience within product development, marketing and sales of retail products in the sport industry. After successfully launching multiple products, our team is well prepared to foresee and mitigate risks at all stages of a product development and launching campaign.

With that said, we also know that theory and practice are two different things and as a startup, with limited resources, you should communicate frequently with your customer about the situation, available resources and the plan to deal with challenges now and ahead.

We are not new to crowdfunding and given our recent campaign, PRO DRYBAG 45L, we learnt a great deal from it. Crowdfunding is a relatively new format between customers and creators and it raises the bar in product development since a significant part of the process happens ”LIVE”. But the challenges can at the same time be used as advantages and given that both parties collaborate with an open mind, great things can be achieved.

As a result and a concrete example SUBTECH SPORTS has done in advance of this campaign, is to hire a dedicated person with the sole responsibility to communicate with backers.

story:
支援方法の日本語解説はこちら

Outdoor athletes. We’ve always had our own style. Our own rules. Our own community and culture. And definitely our own language. But we never had wearable group-talk technology that could keep up with us.

Until now.

The BONX Grip enables group conversations between outdoor athletes. It was built for the places we go. For the performance we need. For the way we talk.

Combining a rugged Bluetooth earpiece and innovative group-talk app, the BONX Grip was custom-designed to out-perform, out-comfort and outlast any VoIP app or standard Bluetooth headset. It goes anywhere your phone has reception, with completely unlimited range. 

That makes it perfect for:


BONX Grip offers the most robust group-talk system designed especially for outdoor sports enthusiasts. All you have to do is speak. Within a fraction of a second, the earpiece picks up your voice with built-in dual microphones, passes it to the smartphone app via Bluetooth, and the app sends the voice data to everybody in your group via cellular network. Because wherever you go—terrain parks, 14ers, Class IV rapids, open roads—you’ve been there. You’ve had that moment, of total outdoor sports exhilaration, when you wanted to talk to your buddies. But the technology was inadequate. Or your friends were out of range. Or you didn’t want to get your phone (maybe because you were racing down moguls).

That all changes here. With your help, that is.


We did. We love outdoor sports. We love the exhilaration and the freedom. But what we love most is the community—bonding with our friends on the mountain or river or road. We developed the BONX Grip because we wanted a product like it.

We were founded in 2014 by Takahiro Miyasaka, a Japanese entrepreneur and passionate snowboarder. He had the idea for the BONX Grip one day on the slopes in Nagano, and started building our team of veteran hardware and software rockstars.

After spending a year on development, we completed one of the biggest ever crowdfunding campaigns in Japan raising upwards of $200,000 on GreenFunding.jp—and produced and shipped units to 1,344 backers in early 2016.

We’ve since made steady progress fine-tuning the product and are now ready to bring the BONX Grip to the rest of the world. Come join us!
Is the BONX smartphone app required, or can the earpiece be used standalone? The free BONX app is required for group conversation, and is available for free on the iOS App Store and Google Play.
Which smartphones are supported? iPhone 5 or newer (> iOS 8) and select Android devices with Android version 4.3 or greater
How many BONX users can join a conversation simultaneously? The BONX app currently supports up to 10 simultaneous group members.
What is the effective range between BONX users? As long as you have cell phone reception, members in your group conversation can be on opposite sides of the world!
Is cell phone reception required to use BONX Grip? Yes, BONX Grip uses your smartphone's data connection to transmit voice data. The earpiece and your phone communicate via Bluetooth and can be up to 10 meters away.
Can I use BONX Grip as a regular Bluetooth headset or headphones? Certainly! You can use BONX Grip for everyday phone calls or to listen to music at home.
Can I use BONX Grip underwater? BONX Grip is rated IPX5 water resistant, which means you can use it above and around water, but not while submerged (i.e. scuba diving, snorkeling).
Does BONX Grip come with a warranty? BONX Grip comes with a 1-year warranty against defects and malfunction. If anything goes wrong, we will replace the unit free of charge with proof of your pledge.
How can I assign the color of BONX Grip? We will send you an e-mail about color preference once the campaign is finished. At this point, there is no function to choose colors at Indiegogo platform.



Find out more about BONX

Facebook

BONX Website







アウトドアスポーツには、独自のスタイルがある。独自のルールがある。独自のコミュニティと文化がある。そして間違いなく独自の言語がある。ただし、それにピッタリなウェアラブルグループトークテクノロジーはなかった。

今までは。

BONX Gripはアウドドアスポーツをしながら仲間と会話することを可能にする。リアルなフィールドのために、求めるパフォーマンスのために、そして自分たちが気持ちよく話すために、BONX Gripは作られている。

BONX GripはタフなBluetoothイヤフォンと革新的なグループ通話アプリを 組み合わせることで、既存の通話アプリやBluetoothヘッドセットを超えた 快適で安定したパフォーマンスを実現。 携帯電波が入るところならどこでも使えて、相手との距離も無制限だ。 

 こういうアクティビティには最高のアイテムになる。

BONX Gripの頑強なグループトークシステムは様々なシーンで使えますが、アウトドアスポーツには特にピッタリです。とにかく話せばいいだけ。瞬時に本体内臓のデュアルマイクがあなたの声を拾い、Bluetoothでスマホアプリに送信。そしてアプリが3G/4G経由でグループ内の全員にあなたの声を届けます。スノーパーク、険しい山、クラス4の急流、どこまでも続く道…あらゆるフィールドに繰り出し、絶頂の瞬間を味わう。それを仲間と共有したいと思った瞬間があったはず。ただ、テクノロジーが追いついていなかった。もしくは電話を手に取りたくなかった。（コブ斜面で競走してる最中とかね）

それもすべて今日までの話。あなたの支援で変わります。


アウトドアスポーツへの情熱を共有する私たちがBONX Gripを作りました。

その自由と興奮。

そして何より海・山・川で感じる仲間との結びつき。

それこそが私たちが大切にするものです。

2014年、日本人のスノーボーダーで起業家の宮坂貴大が当社を設立。宮坂は長野の雪山でBONX Gripのアイデアを思いつき、熟練ハードウェアエンジニアやスーパーソフトウェアエンジニアを集めてチームを作りました。

一年の開発期間を経て、我々は日本のクラウドファンディング史に残る2,500万円超を集めたキャンペーンをGREEN FUNDINGにて成功させました。1,344人の支援者に対して、2016年2月までに製品を出荷しています。

その後、地道にプロダクトの改善を重ね、ついにBONX Gripを世界に発信する準備が整いました。さあ、BONXコミュニティに加わろう！

BONXアプリは必須ですか？BONX Gripイヤフォン単体では使えないのでしょうか？ BONXトーク(BONXのシステムを使ったグループ通話)にはBONXアプリがインストールされたスマートフォンが必要です。
どのようなスマートフォンを使うことができますか？ iOS6以降にアップデートされたiPhone5以降のiOS端末、またAndroidバージョン4.3以降にアップデートされた特定のAndroid端末でお使い頂けます。
何人まで同時に会話できますか？ 現在の仕様では10人までです。それ以上は一つのグループに入ることができません。
お互いの距離はどの程度まで離れていても会話できますか？ スマートフォンの電波圏内であれば、距離の制限は一切ありません。スマートフォンのデータ通信を使ったシステムのため、地球の反対側でも電波さえ入れば会話することができます。
電波がない場所でも使えますか？ BONX　Gripはスマートフォンの3G/4G回線を使って通信するため、携帯電波の圏内でしか使うことができません。なお、イヤフォンとスマートフォンはBluetoothで接続し、10m程度まで離れることができます。
BONX Gripイヤフォンは通常の音楽再生や電話にも使えますか？ 使用して頂けます。通常のBluetoothヘッドセット同様に、電話や音楽を聴くのに使えます。
水中で使用することはできますか？ IPx5(生活防水)のため水辺での使用は可能ですが、スキューバダイビングなど水中では使用できません。
BONX Gripイヤフォンに保証はつきますか？ 一年間の製品保証期間を設けています。なお、製品の修理・交換が必要になった際には、①製品購入を証明できるもの（メール等でも可）、②製品に同梱されている保証書　の２つが必要となります。
どのように色を指定すればいいでしょうか？ 色のご希望につきましては、キャンペーン終了後に、改めて弊社よりご連絡を差し上げる予定です。Indiegogoサイトでのお申込み手続きの中で、ご指定をいただく必要はございません。



Find out more about BONX

Facebook

BONX Website

				スマートフォンの電波圏内であれば、距離の制限は一切ありません。スマートフォンのデータ通信を使ったシステムのため、地球の反対側でも電波さえ入れば会話することができます。
			
		



			
				電波がない場所でも使えますか？
			
		

			
				BONX　Gripはスマートフォンの3G/4G回線を使って通信するため、携帯電波の圏内でしか使うことができません。なお、イヤフォンとスマートフォンはBluetoothで接続し、10m程度まで離れることができます。
			
		



			
				BONX Gripイヤフォンは通常の音楽再生や電話にも使えますか？
			
		

			
				使用して頂けます。通常のBluetoothヘッドセット同様に、電話や音楽を聴くのに使えます。
			
		



			
				水中で使用することはできますか？
			
		

			
				IPx5(生活防水)のため水辺での使用は可能ですが、スキューバダイビングなど水中では使用できません。
			
		



			
				BONX Gripイヤフォンに保証はつきますか？
			
		

			
				一年間の製品保証期間を設けています。なお、製品の修理・交換が必要になった際には、①製品購入を証明できるもの（メール等でも可）、②製品に同梱されている保証書　の２つが必要となります。
			
		



			
				どのように色を指定すればいいでしょうか？
			
		

			
				色のご希望につきましては、キャンペーン終了後に、改めて弊社よりご連絡を差し上げる予定です。Indiegogoサイトでのお申込み手続きの中で、ご指定をいただく必要はございません。
			
		




 



   
Find out more about BONX



Facebook


BONX Website

story:
Short Summary

Our company is trying to develop the best photo effect software on the market that will offer our users the possibility to generate new and unique photos.

We’ve already released version 1.0 of our software, as a pilot project, and received numerous emails of support and positive feedback, gaining thousands of installations per day.

This year alone our software has been installed on more then 800,000 personal computers.

We’ve decided to deliver new releases of our software that will serve to improve upon what is already a great product. The newer developments will bring more effects, more image conversion possibilities, more borders and different layers, and the ability to support a wider spectrum of social networks.

Such a job requires a significant amount of funding and we want to share these costs with our new and old software users and all those people who believe in this project.

Top designers have already been hired to work on project along with dozens of testers that will check the new effects on thousands of images.

Currently we only have a Desktop version of the application, but these new releases are designed to deliver a Web based version supported on all platforms and browsers.

What We Need & What You Get

This project requires lots of funding, but the Software is FREE.

For Premium members we offer a set of special effects and participation in our activities.
Everyone will be able to use the software for free, thus it's very important to finish the software as soon as possible, and that is why we need these funding boosts. The funding boost is especially important to get our Web version of the software on to the market as soon as possible, which requires lots of additional programming and the purchasing of fast and reliable servers.

The Impact

We are a group of enthusiastic developers - designers, photographers, programmers, and musicians, who believe that we can produce something huge, popular and financially viable.

But, our motivation is not about money.

The idea that we can produce something unique that will allow millions of users to enjoy, produce, and benefit from our unique product is our end goal, and you can help us to attain this goal!

Risks & Challenges

There are very few risk or obstacles preventing the project from being finished. As you read this programmers and designers are working on the project right now, and the software will be delivered, one way or another..

We just need to speed up the project development and you can help us to do that right now.
We have some truly innovative ideas and the best available designers, but unfortunately at present we don't have any financial collateral to develop such an expensive app.

We truly believe that we can develop something huge in the future. Something that will gain a genuinely consistent market share and become very popular among users and evolve with their needs.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this page among your friends. Spread the word about us and we promise we won't disappoint you.
Subscribe to our mailing list and you'll be informed about all of our progress, any finalizations, new releases and everything else:
http://www.exeone.com/subscribe

story:
We rely on our phones for just about every part of our day. The way you interact with your phone is crucial to your daily productivity and happiness and we intend to improve that interaction with UNO: the world's first cross-compatible USB-C magnetic USB cable.

 

The Differences between the UNO Cable and X-Connect Cable 

As you're scrolling down this page, you may be wondering what's so different about this cable? What improvements have we made? We've decided to list them out for you.

  • The UNO cable has a USB-C connector end which is an upgrade from the current USB Type A. This allows a higher power input and output and enables the UNO to be compatible with QC4.0. 
  • Introduction of an innovative locking mechanism, giving your cable a stronger connection and longer lifespan of up to 40,000 connections.
  • Reduced the size of the LED hole by 40% from 1mm (0.04") to 0.6mm (0.02"), which means less ambient light keeping you up at night.
  • Part of UNO's internal mold is made out of 9T, which is a more temperature resistant material than LCP plastic found on the X-Connect. This means the cable temperature will remain lower whilst charging.
  • The UNO wire thickness has been increased by 20% to handle more charge, bringing QC2.0, 3.0 and 4.0 compatibility. 
  • The UNO cable introduces an improved anti-fray neck, meaning your cables will have increased durability and less chance of cables fraying or snapping at the most common weak point.
  • We've increased the warranty period from the industry standard 1 year to our premium 10 year warranty.
  • Each UNO cable set comes with a 1.5m (4.9ft) cable. A 2.5m (8.2ft) cable is also available for purchase separately.
  • Each UNO set comes with a bonus tip removal tool allowing you to remove the tip from all your devices with ease.

For those who are already proud owners of the asap X-Connect cable, the beauty of the UNO cable is that it will be 100% backwards compatible with the tips and cables you already own. This allows you to easily incorporate the UNO cable into your arsenal. 

Each UNO cable set features 2x N52 grade neodymium magnets which are the world's strongest commercial grade magnets.  When we say we're using the world's strongest magnets, we mean it! How strong you might ask? Strong enough to hold an iPad Air which is 437g (0.96lb)!  

We have upgraded the magnetic strength of the UNO cable through incorporating an innovative locking mechanism, giving your cable a stronger connection and longer lifespan. This stronger magnetic strength means it can support a heavier cable, which is why we've increased the length of all the cables on offer. Each cable set now comes with a 1.5m (4.9ft) cable with a 2.5m (8.2ft) cable also available for purchase separately. We've also improved the connectivity lifespan of the older cables from 30,000 to 40,000 connections. Means a longer lasting cable that will outlast you!

When we mean 1 cable for all your phones, tablets and USB devices, we mean it. We've designed 3 connectors (Lightning, Micro USB & Type C) to fit all your modern devices from headphones, to speakers, Nintendo switch, E-cigs, the list goes on. 

The UNO cable is capable of 2-way full speed USB 2.0 data transfer at 480 Mbps between any USB devices. 

Our cables feature a reversible magnetic connection which means instant connection every single time. No more fumbling around to connect your devices, even in the dark. 

Better yet, connecting to your phone during difficult situations without pausing what you're doing has never been easier, even when you only have 1 hand free, such as driving on-the-go. 

An often overlooked feature of magnetic cables is that it will protect your phone port from dust and dirt entering. By leaving the tip in there, it will also extend the life of your phone port from the normal wear and tear of cables being inserted and pulled out on a daily basis.

Each cable set comes with a 1.5m (4.9ft) cable.  You can purchase additional cables that are a longer 2.5m (8.2ft) for $15 on the Backerkit survey.  

Our mold has already been completed so we're ready to ship in July 2019. We're currently running a beta testing program which will be open to backers of this campaign also. Details will be sent once the campaign has launched.  We'll take into consideration all this precious feedback to make any final revisions to the design to make the perfect USB cable for all your needs. Initial feedback from early testers has been very positive, though we're always open to suggestions on how to better design our cables for you.

The Alpha tip (for Apple devices) design has also been upgraded. With the first version we tested an incompatibility rate of 1 in 100. We've now reduced that to 4 in 1000 which is a far lower default rate than consumer electronics industry standards.

We understand that some of your devices still use a Type A port so to ensure we don't exclude any of them. We're offering Type A USB adapters as an optional add-on for only $9. This adapter is compatible with our UNO cable as well as all USB-C cables.

What sets our magnetic cables apart from others is our unique beveled and concave magnetic connector design on both the tip end and cable head end which has been adopted since the original asap Connect cable.

Competitor designs require the tips to be correctly aligned inside the cable head which requires guidance to be connected correctly if missed. Competitor designs also use weaker magnets and require a very perfect alignment of the cable and tip for a correct connection. See if you can guess which is our cable below.

Don't be fooled by the similar external look of competitor cables, our magnetic cables will connect correctly even if the tip is flipped 180°, due to both the strong neodymium magnets having their polarity perfectly positioned and the unique outward and concave magnetic connector design.  

We've listened to customer feedback and reduced the size of the LED hole by 40% from 1mm (0.04") to 0.6mm (0.02"), which means less ambient light keeping you up at night. The new UNO cable LED light is always on, as long as your cable is plugged into the power source so its easier to find, especially at night. This means you no longer need to plug in both ends for the LED to turn on.

A common suggestion from customers has been reducing the temperature of the cable, we've been able to achieve this initially through a more efficient processing chip.One of the biggest challenges we've overcome is reducing the temperature of the cables whilst ensuring maximum charge speed in our compact cable design.  We've been able to take the temperature reduction a step further with a revised mold design made of of 9T which is a more temperature resistant material instead of LCP plastic found on the X-Connect. The end result is a cooler to touch cable, particularly during use with QC3.0/4.0.

The UNO cable is made from quality material including military grade tangle free nylon. Thicker cables allow for extra currents, which means a faster charge. That's why we've increased the diameter of the cable by 20% to ensure QC2, 3 and 4.0 compatibility.

Above is a bend test machine. We put our cables through a bend test, at least 10,000 times of 180 degrees to ensure it can last through all your rigorous daily usage. 

With each version of our magnetic cables we carefully listen to user feedback and back improvements where we can. The UNO cable will be the first to introduce an improved anti-fray neck, meaning your cables will have increased durability and less chance of cables fraying or snapping at the most common weak point. Above you can see a direct comparison of how thicker the UNO cable (on the right) is compared to our X-Connect range. The X-Connect range is also made of premium materials of course and doesn't have any issues. This anti-fray neck significantly increases the lifespan of the cable handling everyday wear and tear well, hence we're backing it up with our first product with a 10 year warranty.

Each cable comes with a complimentary cord wrap, great for shortening the length of the cable or quickly wrapping the cable away for neat and tidy storage or transportation.

Each cable set now comes with a bonus tip removal tool to allow you to remove the tip from all your devices with ease. Please note that this tool isn't required, though some people prefer using it for phones with cases or devices with depressed USB holes such as a GoPro.

Through years of design and material testing, we've reduced the size of our magnetic cable tips to only 10mm (0.39") wide which fits perfectly into all your Apple and Android devices. We've tested the tips on over 100 phone cases and found it fit on all of them. The only exception is for some phone cases which have a protective flap on the charging port which may not be able to close properly with the tip in place. In saying that, we have tested with the popular LifeProof for iPhone X and Samsung S9 which fits fine. Do note that if you're using any old school phones such as the Samsung S5 phone with an inbuilt protective flap, you won't be able to close the flap with the tip inserted.  

With the improved materials and machinery process we're using to build each UNO cable, we can now increase the warranty period from the standard 1 year you find from most cable brands to our premium 10 year warranty. Finally a cable that is designed to outlast your next decade worth of phones!  

All previous Chargeasap products have been granted the following international certifications to meet quality manufacturing standards and sound environmental practices. UNO Cable will also be applying to receive these certifications before shipping. 

Beware of imitations, fake and low quality magnetic cables on the Internet. We have purchased samples directly off dozens of suppliers who claim to produce premium magnetic USB cables and performed both extensive laboratory and daily-use testing.

Here are our findings:

  • We have found many to not work as claimed, not be reversible, not transfer data nor charge your phone as it's maximum speed. We have even found some to create smoke and even damage your phone
  • Many of these companies offer cables that do not have the following international certifications: FCC, CE, ROHS and hence may not be approved for sale in your country. You should always ask the seller first if they have these international certifications before making a purchase
  • We have found many companies to use poor quality magnets that have weak magnetism or lose their connectivity over time due to no magnetic plating
  • We have found many companies produce tip designs that are too bulky to fit most phone cases 

Chargeasap is a consumer electronics startup based in Sydney with a global team who believe users should be the creators and innovators of products. We realize that your mobile phone is the one object you interact with every day more than any other object or person, so why not simplify this interaction? 

Our mission is to create highly innovative phone accessories that improve your relationship with your mobile phone. 

 

Our team consists of serial entrepreneurs, creatives and engineers who've worked together since 2015 to overcome painstaking obstacles to bring to life the vision of each life-changing product.

We're a startup that is backed only by ourselves. We have no external investors. Instead we launch products through the magic of crowd funding. The funds raised here will not only go towards manufacturing, they will also help us to design future products.

We've already had 4 previous successful campaigns, raising over $1.8 million and delivering to more than 130 countries.  Our previous campaigns have been featured in hundreds of publications and online media worldwide.  

Thank you to the entire crowd funding community for your support in bringing a user-driver technology startup, Chargeasap to life.  

UNO is a simple idea but we believe it impacts on your daily life in a huge way. We’re still a start up with a small team that's why we need your help. You can support by pledging and sharing the campaign on social media. Every dollar will go towards this production and developing future products aimed at improving your relationship with your mobile phone.

 

 We've Partnered up with BackerKit!

We've partnered up with BackerKit for a smooth, streamline experience for the fulfillment process. Once the campaign closes we will send you out a survey within 14 business days that will help us to review and break down your order into the specific items you ordered. This is also where you will be given the options to choose the colors, connector types and also purchase add-ons.

story:
Think of you have a different way to show/light yourself by a portable intellgent LED Pad, getting rid of those inconvinent cords, PCs and software to show your words, status and drawing not only anywhere, anytime but private and business by your smartphone.

   

"Mosaic", a magic intellgent LED Pad, is created by the lightening idea.  There are 16*48 dots matrix LED to show any content and drawing which you would present via Bluetooth of your smartphone.

 "Shake to Change"

You may be surprised "Mosaic" could be controlled by your motion, How about shaking to change contents? AND adjusting brightness by poking the front panel! 

Yes, you got cutting-edge functionality by G-sensor bulit-in.

 "Stacking and Doodling"

Stacking? Yes, you may stack Pads easily as a doodling board to show your drawing from one to three (48*48 dots/Square type) via APP, which is one of the kind function in the world.

Of course you may active effects such as flashing, rolling and anchoring of your contents, you may even reserve 8 contents in "Mosaic" for your routine usage.

That's why you got a excellent gulf steam appearance "Mosaic" on hands.  No more excess function button to bother you....

As proto type shown on the video, we would like to invite you to join the creation of this unique product.  We need your hands to make it happen!!

The Funds will be applied on the First shot of pilot run for contributors and all of operations for Mass Production.  Those items includeing:

1. Tooling: USD 30K. Lead-time 2 months, tooling start on Mar/2013

2. Pilot Run: 300 pcs (for contributors)

3. Certificate: FCC/CE (under testing)

4. Equipment of Production line

5. Materials of Package and labeling

6. App development: Android/Windows  (completed, submitted to Google play)

Schedule of Roll out:

Estimated before 15th/August

We eager your join to be a frontier of the LED display technology,  please refer our perk plan as following for project contributors.  We expect our contributors get and enjoy "Mosaic" before anyone does!

ICSquare Inc is a innovation oriented company established in Taipei, Taiwan.

Our team members come from widely IT industry field, dedicating on PC, Mobile phone, Telcom and accessory more than 10 years.  

We have the excellent execution with major ODM/OEM suppliers.  "Mosaic" is operated by the tier one manufacture supplier which serve for HTC and Apple in Taiwan.

You are welcome to visit us www.ic2.cm.tw to find more!

Think of you have a different way to show/light yourself by a portable intellgent LED Pad, getting rid of those inconvinent cords, PCs and software to show your words, status and drawing not only anywhere, anytime but private and business by your smartphone.
   
"Mosaic", a magic intellgent LED Pad, is created by the lightening idea.  There are 16*48 dots matrix LED to show any content and drawing which you would present via Bluetooth of your smartphone.
 "Shake to Change"
You may be surprised "Mosaic" could be controlled by your motion, How about shaking to change contents? AND adjusting brightness by poking the front panel! 
Yes, you got cutting-edge functionality by G-sensor bulit-in.

story:
My-Stand "World Cup 2014 Edition"

My-Stand is simple, necessary and stylish. It is a stable Mobile Phone stand composed of two acrylic pieces digitally printed.

But not just that.


INSPIRATION

Tired of dropping our phone, not being able to show any videos when hanging with our friends, or listen to music when we are stressed at work!

 We simply came up with the idea one shiny day at the office, where, brainstorming for a design competition, Christine, in an effort to show us a paradigm of synthesis,dropped her mobile phone and spilled coffee on it, resulting on a damaged device and an absolutely mad woman!

Then and there, we thought, what IF? What if we had a stand that can be used as a tool to use our phones in multiple ways without the risk of dropping it or damaging it in any way!

We are sure lots of you out there think the same!

That's why me Manolis, Dimitra, Stamatis and Christine spent a lot of time and effort to make "My-Stand" World Cup 2014 edition a realised creation!


WHAT WE ARE UP TO

The football World Cup 2014 is approaching quickly, and as we have many many fans here in Greece we said, why not?

WHY NOT create a reminder of this memory, a lucky charm to keep with, a commemorative plaque to carry in the football field! A colourful proof of support to your favourite team!

Composed of two acrylic pieces, it is easy to make your own Mobile Phone stand. 

Your favorite country's flag is digitally printed on the acrylic back of this stand, as an impressive artwork made with love from our design team. In addition, "good luck!" is signed in each language, respecting the individual culture that participates in the Games! 


What We Need (and What You'll Get!)

Our first goal is $1000, which will cover the costs of getting this project to realisation. In addition, the money will cover the cost and shipping of your rewards, paying Indiegogo and PayPal fees. The more money we raise, the more viable our World Cup 2014 campaign is, so don't stop donating if you see we've exceeded our goal.  Any additional funds will go towards promotional costs and the extension of our palette of flags.

On the surface of a transparent acrylic plaque, we have carefully designed and digitally printed an artwork of each of the 32 flags of the countries that participate in the World Cup 2014 football competition. Furthemore, a "good luck!" in each country language is printed as well as the years each team has won the Cup! (ex. Brazil, Boa sorte!, 1958, 1962, 1970, 1994, 2002)


The procedure is simple:

1. Select the artwork that represents the team you are supporting and send us by note or email your selection:


2. Receive it to your door, in an Origami Design Envelope Packaging that has the following dimensions: WRAPPED: 14,2cm x 12cm (5,60'' x 4,72'')

3. Assemble the two acrylic pieces so easily to make your own Mobile Phone stand or de-assemble them, hang the My-Stand “World Cup 2014” edition to your neck from the special made hole on its upper part, go to the football field (your couch or even your local cafeteria) and cheer your team, stating your support!

You can also use it (either the bigger,or the smaller piece) as a holder to your key-chain, holding your keys in an elegant way.

Only 100 pieces for each flag are collectable, made in an exclusive edition, where they will all be digitally numbered and be accompanied by a certificate.

BUY yours now! Be one of the first to keep forever the memory of World Cup 2014 in proof.


YOUR SUPPORT

Though the original My-Stand is now a realised ambition, there are still many costs to cover. We have to cover the cost for the material and the lasercut, the digital printing of the World Cup 2014 edition, utility bills of our office and supplies for marketing.

This is just our first aim that will give as a big smile.

SUPPORT THIS PROJECT!

SUPPORT YOUR NATIONAL TEAM!

SUPPORT WORLD CUP 2014!


PRODUCT DETAILS

International patent design.

+ Size: W: 750 mm D: 5 mm H: 120 mm (29,53'' x 0,20'' x 4,72'')
+ Digitally printed and transparent acrylic pieces
+ Made in our studio in Athens,Greece

- The Origami Design Envelope Packaging has the following dimensions :
WRAPPED: 14,2cm x 12cm (5,60'' x 4,72'')


My-Stand is:
A Super Stable, two pieces, easy to assemble, acrylic, stand for your iPhone4, 4S, 5, 5s, Samsung Galaxy S4,S3, as well as for most other phone makers and models including -but not limited to- HTC, Sony, Nokia & LG.

It is designed to measure 5mm thick, the only crystal clear acrylic (digitally printed for the world cup 2014 edition) that is so stable yet so easy to be packaged or stored. Ready to carry with when travelling!

The two ultra transparent acrylic pieces are precisely lasercut to adjust to one another perfectly. The two pieces interlock together without glue. They come nicely packed in our "origami wrap" design packaging, perfect for a tasteful small gift.

If you own a company, this is a perfect way to advertise it, as "My-Stand" can be printed in a special position with the brand name or logo of your choice. In such a case please send us a message.


Perks, Perks, Perks

Here's a list of the super cool things you will get if you help fund us:

A world map wallpaper, made with the 32 country flags participating in the World Cup 2014!


"My-Stand" in its brazilian edition!



WHO WE ARE

A group of award winning architects and designers, who are specialized in design / interior design projects internationally. Members of our team designed, produced and finally launched this very project.

If you want to learn more about us, please visit www.mydezigner.com

You can also join us on our Facebook page www.facebook.com/Mydezigner

For "My-Stand" project visit: https://www.facebook.com/mystand.gr


Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us spread the word! Share our campaign with your friends who care about design and football. Let more folks now about this amazing mobile phone stand and what it's trying to achieve. Mention it on Twitter or Facebook or wherever people hang out on the internet nowadays.

Thank you in advance for whatever help you can offer in creating this great gift for  My-Stand.

Warm regards, on behalf on the team behind,

Manolis, Dimitra, Stamatios and Christine.


RISK & CHALLENGES

We are confident that we will be able to deliver "My-Stand" as per our projected plan. We have already designed the material needed and we are programming to digital print the pieces as your support arrives.


FAQ's

Have a question? If the info above doesn't help, you can ask our team directly, through this site.


______________________________________________________________________

After the completion of this campaign, you can still find the My-STAND World Cup 2014 Edition, in the price of 20$ per unit and of 25$ per collectable unit!

https://www.facebook.com/mystand.gr

https://www.etsy.com/shop/mydezigner

story:
What’s Rainbow Drop?


     Like Pablo Picasso said, we need more colors to decorate and experience our life. Rainbow Drop will make you stand out among other iPhone 5c users. We ensure that you will love it when you own it.



 



Each package could make various designs on the case. Hope you could find out which colors and patterns are the best with your original creation.

Original idea and Rainbow Drop sketch

Design & Prototype

      Design drawing and the first prototype (1) by 3D printing 

Tooling & Production

   We dedicated to find the best manufacturer to make quality product and efficient assembly line. The factory in Taiwan could produce our product most cost-effective and meet our expectation.

    The second prototype (2) was almost perfect and met our requirement. After confirming the material durability, calculating the injection pressure, and testing the product function, we were ready to make our final product.

Product Testing 

     Comparing the first prototype and the final product, we reduced the thickness and make it lighter, smoother, and more colorful.

Market testing & Feedback




* All the Domestic (US) shipping costs are included




     Hello friends. Here is the video of introduction while Allen Shieh, Co-founder of MakeSimply, was announcing the entire project at MakeITNYC and NY-Hardware-Startup Meetup on October 24th, 2013 at eBay NYC. Hope this video would give you a better sense of who we are and the vision of this project. 

       MakeSimply is the product development company devoted to helping Start-up companies transfer an idea to realistic product.

       LaunchiN60days is Allen Shieh's (the Co-founder of MakeSimply) idea to show entire process about how to launch product and bring to market in 60 days from sketch to a finished hardware product.

       "Rainbow Drop" is the first baby from LauchiN60days project. iPhone 5c aims to play with various colors by offering 5-color of iPhone as well as 6-color of contrasting protective cases. Rainbow Drop is the simple, easy, and fun product to put on your iPhone 5c case. With your imagination and creativity, making your iPhone as a personalized device by designing your unique patterns.



      We will be working hard to promote the Rainbow Drop in a variety of ways, but we know that our first challenge is to spread the word out. We hope we can drive enough traffic to make Rainbow Drop a huge success through the use of social media, blogs and your sharing!

      We've been working with our own manufacture partners since we start "LaunchiN60days" project and we have already built several test prototypes. Mitigating the risk of delays in production and delivery is our major task now. We anticipate to send out the Rainbow Drop before Dec 24th 2013 as X'mas Gift to you.


If you like our idea of "Rainbow Drop",

want to support “LaunchiN60days” project or

believe in Allen and MakeSimply Team,

please don’t hesitate to order Rainbow Drop now.

Your support will place a huge impact to the community

and help us to make it better!


Last but not least, we want to thank you again for your invaluable support and taking the time visiting this campaign page.

Comments, Questions, Ideas?

Ask on the comment thread here or email launchin60days@makesimp.ly

story:
This campaign has ended.

Lumenator is available here.

Special thanks to all of our funders! We couldn't do it without you.



Power Panel & now...

Power Panel Plus+



Thin. LED.

Light. Bright.

Go. Anywhere.

The Go Anywhere, Do Anything LED light at a price you won't believe!

Thanks for checking out our Power Panel project! Here at ColorRight, we've been making awesome white balance tools and flash diffusers for over 5 years. We've even won awards for our ColorRight PRO line of color balance tools. Most recently, we raised almost $60K for our Lumenator project.

Now, we want to introduce you to the Power Panel. So far, we have made 2 working prototypes of this revolutionary type of LED panel light that works for both photo and Video. The Power Panel light is an ultra thin LED panel (.6 inches) that has gobs of power (approximately 6000 lumens, 500 Watt Light Bulb). Power Panel is also the very first rectangular LED panel to use LEDNatural technology for ultra soft light without the hassle of a softbox. At just over 2 pounds this panel is your Go Anywhere, Do Anything lighting solution. 

The Power Panel is amazing, but we need your help to make it a reality. We are leveraging a lot of the technology and knowledge we gained from our Lumenator project in the Power Panel, so we don't need to raise as much money to make the Power Panel a reality, but we still need lots of help! We are still a small family run company. We believe these LEDNatural LED products are the best we have ever made.

Your Impact & Our Future Plans

We think Power Panel and Lumenator are the future of photo & video lighting. By contributing you are making a difference in the lives of photographers and videographers everywhere. The Power Panel and Lumenator projects have the potential to totally up-end all our pre-conceived notions about what LED lighting can do, and where it can go. With the success of Power Panel and Lumenator we plan to introduce additional products utilizing our LEDNatural technology.

We believe the Power Panel and Lumenator represent the first products in a true 2nd wave of LED lighting technology. We can't wait to see where you take the Power Panel or what you do with it once you get there.

We can't get there without you. Please help us get the word out, by telling your family and friends and through Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc. This site has convenient links for most social sites right here on this page.

Thank you so much for supporting the future of photo and video lighting with your contribution!

Please choose your perk using the links to the right.

UPDATE 2:

Power Panel vs. LED lights



UPDATE 1:

Pre-Production Model #3 is out!
Watch this new video for all of the details...




Plus... we update you on Lumenator, give you another quick demo with 2 power panels, and walk you through all of the attachments that come with the Power Panel PRO Kits.

Thank you so much for supporting the future of photo and video lighting with your contribution! Please choose your perk using the links to the right.UPDATE 2:Power Panel vs. LED lights
